PVA_2.1.2.2.0,134	 śabda sāmarthyāt eva vyavahāra kāle pratītiḥ iti ced yadi pūrva apara adhyāropaḥ na syāt na bhavet pratītiḥ na ca śabdāt sāmānya buddhiḥ saṅketam antareṇa dṛṣṭāḥ vyakti antara darśanāt bhavati eva śabdam antareṇa iti ced tatra api tat eva liṅgantad rūpa vyavahāra bhāve saṅketa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam liṅgam api pūrvva adhyāropam eva janayati na adhikam tathā hū ṇā di jātiḥ dvija ādi jātiḥ ca saṅketa mātra bala avalambinī na vastu apekṣate saṅketa sahitam pratyakṣampramāṇandvija ādi jātiṣu ced na vastu balena yat jāyate na tad saṅketam apekṣate saṅketa mātra apekṣaṇe andha paramparā eva syāt pratyakṣam api sahakāri vidyate iti ced atra ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,135–2.1.2.2.0,136	 pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītañcet upadeśaḥ nirarthakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa agṛhītañced upadeśaḥ nirarthakaḥ yadi pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītaṅ kim upadeśena tena eva grahaṇāt atha pratyakṣeṇa pratyetum aśakyam kim upadeśa sahasreṇa api śakyam pratyāyayitum dṛṣṭe hi puruṣa upadeśaḥ mayā etat dṛṣṭam iti syāt atīndriye tu dvijāti tve na upadeśasya sāmarthyāt tat eva āha 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,137–2.1.2.2.0,139	 yāpya bheda anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu dvaya īkṣaṇe saṃketena vinā sārtha pratyāsatti nibaṃdhanāḥ tad puruṣa buddhi prabhavam apramāṇam eva atha api syāt anugata ākārā buddhiḥ padārtha dvaya darśane saṅketam antareṇa bhavati eva yathā gavā ādi biuddhiḥ śāvaleya ādi darśanāt eva na tatra saṅketa upekṣyate evantarhi brāhyaṇa tvam ajātiḥ syāt tathā tasya apratītitaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,140–2.1.2.2.0,147	 dvija ādi jāteḥ na vyaktiḥ go tva vat vyañcika īkṣyate go tve yadi anyathā bāhyaṅ kim sandegdhi atra kaścana brāhmaṇa tve tu sandegdhi kim dvijoyam iti dhvaneḥ kriyātaḥ niścayaḥ tatra na asti anyena jani śruteḥ hūṇa ādi jāteḥ na vyaktiḥ upadeśaṃvinā kṛtā na asti eva tatra tattvañcet go tva ādau= api kim matam yathā eka śabda vācya tvam aja ādau jātiḥ iṣyate tathaka śabda vācya tvaṅ karkka ādau kim aniṣṭimat ananta vyaktayaḥ gotva vācya tvantatra tat katham vyakti bhede hi tatra api kim ananta tvam asti na udātta ādi prabhede hi na ananta tvan na sādhayet pratyabhijñānam ekatvaḥ uta yatra api sambhavi 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,148–2.1.2.2.0,149	 udātta gharghaṃra ādi bhedaḥ hi ikāra ādiṣu api tad ananta tā nibandhanam asti eva pratyabhijñānāt eka tvac gharghara tva ādi bhedepi vidyate iti samānaṅ karkka ādiṣu tasmāda go tva ādau= api go śabda vācya tā vyatirekeṇa na aparaṅ go tvam iti artha pratyāsattiḥ eka śabda vācya tā eka parāmarśa jananañcā iti na jātiḥ nāma asti kvacid atha api syāt sā eva śabdavācya tā eka parāmarśa jananan na jātim antareṇa tat api asat pratyāsattiḥ vinā jātyā yatheṣṭā cakṣuḥ ādiṣu jñāna kāryeṣu jātiḥ vā yayā anvā iti vibhāgataḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,150	 na khalu eka kārya janana lakṣaṇā pratyāsattiḥ cakṣuḥ āloka manaskārāṇān jātim antareṇa asambhavinī sahakāriṇām sambhavati eva iti ced vastu dvaya īkṣaṇepi sahakāri tvam eva bhavati ekabuddhiḥ samāna kāra tā na asti iti ced na prameye samāna ākāra tāyāḥ vastu dvaya vyatirekeṇa adarśanāt iti pratipādanāt buddhi jananam eva avaśiṣyate tad cakṣuḥ ādiṣu api samānam teṣām api tat eka pratyaya janaka tvam asti iti ced śāvaleya ādīnām api eka parāmarśa jananāt na aparam iti samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ tat eva vastu bhūtam iti ced anyathā te eva tat pratyayañcanayanti na anyaḥ iti ku toyam vibhāgaḥ jātiḥ api tarhi śāvaleya ādiṣu na anyatra iti ku toyam vibhāgaḥ tatra vibhāga kāriṇā pareṇa sāmānyena bhavita vyantasya api vibhāga vṛtti nibandhanena na apareṃṇa iti anavasthā bhavet atha tathā bhūtaṅkāraṇanteṣām yena te eva śāvaleya ādayaḥ vyañjakāḥ go tvasya tad ādheyā ca iti evantarhi jātim antareṇa eva tad parāmarśa jananam sva kāraṇa vaśāt iti kimparihīyate jātim vinā iti a agra haḥ tyajyatān jātau na ca cakṣuḥ ādiṣu sāmānyam 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,151–2.1.2.2.0,153^1	 kathañcid api vijñāne tad rūpa anava bhāsataḥ yadi nāma indriyāṇām syāt draṣṭā bhāseta tad vapuḥ rūpavat tvāt na jātīnāṅ kevalānām adarśanāt vyakti grahe ca tad śabda rūpāt anyat na dṛśyate na hi cakṣuḥ ādiṣu sāmānyaṅ kathañcid api pratibhāti kārya dvāreṇa api pratīyate kārya dvāreṇa api pratīyam ānantadeka kāryam iti pratīyate tathā ca teṣām ekene kāryeṇa sambandhaḥ iti syāt na sāmānyam sambandhopi sarvatra ekaḥ sāmānyam iti ced na sambandhasya api kathañcid apratibhāsanāt tad anantaraṅ kāryasya upalabdhiḥ eva tena na aparaḥ sambandhaḥ upalabhyate 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,151–2.1.2.2.0,153^2	 uktañca kāryam api sambavyate kalpanayā iti atha śaktiḥ ekā sarvaṣām iti ucyate na śakteḥ śaktimataḥ avyatirekāt iti pratipāditam na ca śaktiḥ api pratibhāti adṛṣṭā api śaktiḥ kasmāt na parikalpyate indriya ādi vat iti ced tat asat tatra atīndriya tvasya upagamāt asmābhiḥ anupalambhaḥ ajājīpuṣpa vat ityādi vacanāt na ca sāmānyam āgama eka samādhi gamyam kārya vyatirekeṇa ca kim api rupādi pratibhāsasya kāraṇam asti tat kiṅ golaka avasthā vyatiriktam atha anyathā iti na atra vivekaḥ tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,154–2.1.2.2.0,157	 vyatiriktaṅ kim api asti viśiṣṭaṅ gola kantathā vāsanāyāḥ viśeṣaḥ vā mata bhedāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ yasya hi vāhya ūrthaḥ avyatirekāt kāryasya na sidhyati sa kiñcakṣuḥ a ādīnāṅ kārya vyatirekāt vyatiriktānām anumānam kṣamate tasmāt yathā kathañcid anumānam anavasthita prameyam eva tat iti na tad dvāreṇa upalambhaḥ rūpavatu etu anāgamaḥ eva tathā sati yadi teṣām bhavet draṣṭā dṛśyeran= cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ atīndriya tva upagame gatiḥ anyā na vidyate 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,158	 atīndriyasya eṣā eva gatī rūpava tvena upagamāt na tu sāmānyam evam kevalasya darśana anabhyupagamāt yadi yogināṅ kevalam sāmānyam upalabhyeta na sāmānyam bhavet atha samāna ākārā buddhiḥ utpadyate tasyāḥ idat nivandhamam iti yoginaḥ paśyanti na evam pramāṇa siddha tā sāmānyasya asmābhiḥ tu sāmānyam na dṛśyate eva pṛthak vyakti vyaṅgya tvāt sāmānyasya na kevala grahaṇam nahi āloka grahaṇam antareṇa rūpa grahaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,159	 tat api asat rūpam sparśa ādi avyabhicāri iti gṛhyate anumāne na ālokam antareṇa api yadi tu na gṛhyeta na bhavet eva ālokāt vyatirekaḥ na aprasiddha vyatirekam vyatirekī iti abhyupagama arham sāmānyantu na kevalaṅ kadācid upalabdhi viṣayaḥ vyakti rūpa anupraveśe tu na vidyate eva yadi paraṅ gauḥ gauḥ iti nāma mātrakam atha samāna deśa tayā na viveka upalabdhiḥ katham rūpa rasa ādīn ānteṣām bhinna indriya grāhya tvāt vivekaḥ iti ced atra tu punar avibhāga pratipattiḥ atyanta saṃsarggāt 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,160–2.1.2.2.0,163	 koyam atyanta saṃsarggaḥ kim svarūpa vimiśratā abhedaḥ eva hi prāptaḥ rūpantasya etat eva yat deśa abhedepi rūpasya bhedāt bheda grahaḥ na kim na hi rūpa atirekeṇa deśaḥ nāma pratīyate vastu vyatirekeṇa kutonyaḥ deśaḥ vastu ced bhinnam deśopi bhinnaḥ eva kathandeśa abhedaḥ deśa abhedena bhedaḥ ced tasya bhedaḥ kutas bhavet tasya deśa antarāt eva tathā syāt anavasthitiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,164–2.1.2.2.0,166	 yatas ca svarūpeṇa na pratibhāti khara ādi viṣāṇa vat jñāna mātra artha karaṇepya yogyam atas eva tat tad ayogya tayā arūpam tat hi avastuṣu lakṣaṇam yat eva na pratibhāti sva rūpeṇa grāhyā abhimatam sa na bhavati ālambana pratyayaḥ su a ākāra arppaṇa arthāt na satvāt cakṣuḥ ādi vat adhipati pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced na tatra api anvaya vyatireka abhāvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,167–2.1.2.2.0,170	 yathā ukta viparītam yat tat sva lakṣaṇam iṣyate yat punar su a ākāreṇa pratibhāsate anvaya vyatirekāmyām avadhṛta sāmarthī antat parama artha sat sva lakṣaṇam svena rūpeṇa lakṣamāṇa tvāt svarūpam lakṣaṇam asya iti na tu svarūpeṇa katham lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvaḥ na lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvasya kālpanika tvāt evamprakārā sarvā eva kriyā kāraka saṃsthitiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,171	 iti ca vakṣyate svarūpam eva lakṣaṇam yuktat na anyat anyena anyasya paramārthataḥ lakṣayitum aśakyatvāt para rūpeṇa hi lakṣaṇampara rūpa tā adhyāropaḥ eva na svarūpa lakṣaṇantat kathantarhi sāmānya lakṣaṇam avyakti vyāpanāt satyam etat na paramārthataḥ sāmānyat nāma svarūpam eva tat api jñānasya vyavahārāt evam ucyate aneka vyakti svarūpa adhyāropeṇa varttamāna tvāt tatas utpatteḥ ca katham avastu tve sati anupalambha kārya svabhāva hetu bhedaḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ viṣaya bhedāt bhedaḥ anupalambha ādīnāntu na viṣaya bhedaḥ liṅga bhedāt bhedaḥ iti ced nanu tat eva coditantad eva parihāraḥ iti katham etat tathā hi liṅga bhedaḥ eva na yuktaḥ atha dṛśyate ṣaṣ bheda tā tarhi prāpnoti athavā dvau vastu sādhanau= ekaḥ pratiṣedha hetuḥ iti vakṣyate katham avastu tve samāne vastu avastu vibhāgaḥ atra parihāram āha 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,172–2.1.2.2.0,173	 sāmānyantri vidhantat ca bhāva abhāva ubhayāśrayāt na paramārthataḥ bhedaḥ sarvatra avastu tvāt bhāva abhāva ubhayāśraya tvena tu kāryasya jñānasya bhedāt tad kāri tvena svabhāva anupalabdhi kārya hetu bhedaḥ tathā hi bhāva upādānaḥ vikalpaḥ svabhāva hetoḥ udayī abhāva upādānaḥ anupalabdheḥ ubhaya upādānaḥ vikalpaḥ kārya hetoḥ iti vyatirikta sādhanaḥ kārya hetuḥ bhāva abhāvābhyām hi vyatirekaḥ bhavati vyatiriktañca kāraṇam sādhyam athavā avastu tvepi bhāva abhāva upādāna tayā bhedam upādāna bhedāt āśritya viṣaya bhedaḥ bhāvaḥ eva dvividhaḥ vyatiriktaḥ avyatiriktaḥ ca iti viṣaya bhedāt bheda prakāraḥ trividhaḥ tatra sat asatoḥ viṣayayoḥ adṛśya anupalabdhiḥ ubhaya upādāna bhedaḥ adṛśya anupalabdhiḥ viṣayaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.0,174–2.1.2.2.0,178	 yadi bhāva āśrayam jñānambhāve bhāva anubandhataḥ na ukta uttara tvāt dṛṣṭa tvāt atīta ādiṣu ca anyathā na hi bhāva āśrayam jñānam iti eva bhāve bhavati bhāva viṣaya tvam hi bhāva svarūpa grahaṇāt na ca svarūpa grāhī sāmānya viṣayaḥ vikalpaḥ vaiphalyāt akṣa saṃhateḥ iti uktam atha bhāve satī iti ucyate tadā asiddham bhāvam antareṇa api atīta ādiṣu dṛṣṭa tvāt yadi sāmānye tad jñānam viśeṣe vā na atīta ādi viṣaya tā bhāvasya svarūpeṇa grṛhyamāṇasya atīta tva tyāgāt na atra lokaḥ bhāva viṣaya tvam avagacchati bhāvaḥ na asti svarūpa abhiniveśī bhavati pratyayaḥ iti bhrānti mātrakam ukta uttara tvāt iti ca viparyaye pramāṇa vṛttiḥ upadarśitā dṛṣṭa tvāt iti para abhimatasya hetoḥ anaikāntika udbhāvanam yadi tarhi abhāvepi vikalpasya dṛṣṭiḥ bhāvepi tadā tarhi bhāva dharmatā hīyate eva iti ubhaya dharmatā syāt tat āha bhāva dharma tvahāniḥ ced bhāva grahaṇa pūrvakam tat jñānam iti adoṣoyam tat jñānam eva na tatra kiñcid ālambanam parokṣasya sāmānyasya āmeya tvātaḥ parokṣam hi sāmānyantat ca svarūpeṇa apratīyamānaṅkatham meyam 
PVA_2.1.2.2.1,1–2.1.2.2.2,3	 meyantu ekam sva lakṣaṇam nahi sāmānyat nāma prameyam yathā kalpanam ayogāt sva lakṣaṇam eva paramārthataḥ prameyam tasya eva sat asat tvena avabodhasya prayojana tvāt kutas etat tasmāt artha kriyā siddheḥ sat asat tā vicāraṇāt artha kriyā kāriṇaḥ hi padārthasya sattva asattvābhyām arthitā prekṣāvatām tad avabodhāya ca pramāṇam anviṣyate anyathā pramāṇa parīkṣaṇam aprekṣā pūrva kriyā eva bhavet tasmāt artha kriyā kāri padārtha bhāva abhāva viṣayīkaraṇa samartham arthavat pramāṇam tasmāt dvābhyām api pratyakṣa anumānabhyām sva lakṣaṇam eva viṣayīkartavyam anyathā pramāṇa tva ayogāt yadi sva lakṣaṇam eva dvābhyām api viṣayīkriyate eka viṣaya tvāt ekam eva mānamprasaktam atha eka viṣaya tvepi sāmagrī bhedāt pramāṇa bhedaḥ evam sati prameya dvaividhyāt iti virudhyate uktañca ācāryeṇa yasmāt lakṣaṇa dvayam prameyam iti sāmagrī bhedena ca pramāṇa bhede cakṣuḥ ādi vijñānānām api bhedaḥ sāmagryāḥ iti tāvanti pramāṇāni bhaveyuḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,4	 nanu prameya bhedena api bhede aneka nīla ādi prameya tvāt ananta pramāṇa prasaṅgaḥ na sarveṣām sva lakṣaṇa tvasya bhāvāt tat viṣayam ekam eva pramāṇam eka viṣaya tvāt sāmagrī bhedepi satyakṣaja tvasya bhāvāt kinna sarvam pratyakṣam iti cetnā akṣaja tvasya alakṣaṇa tvāt tathā ca pratipādayiṣyate tasmāt prameya dvaividhyāt eva dvaividhyam anyathā ananta pramāṇa tā bhavet kathamprameyasya ananta tā na iti ced na ananta tvepi nīla ādi tve prameya dvi tvam eva yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,5–2.1.2.2.2,7	 tasya sva para rūpa abhyāṅ gateḥ meya dvayam matam sva rūpa pratibhāsanena nīla ādayaḥ ananta bheda tvepi sva lakṣaṇam eva svena rūpeṇa lakṣaṇāt nanu pratipatti bhedena bhedena pāramārthikam sva lakṣaṇa tvam tad pratipatya bhāve anya pratipatti sammukhībhāve asva lakṣaṇa tvāt tathā tadā eva ekam ekasya sva lakṣaṇam aparasya anyathā na ca pratipratipattṛ prameya bhedaḥ apekṣā kṛtasya bhedasya kālpanika tvāt aparamārtha tā ekasya ca sva lakṣaṇa tva itara tvetat ubhaya rūpam prameya antaram iti tatra aparampramāṇam udbhavet tat etat asat 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,8–2.1.2.2.2,12	 parama artha prameya tve syāt ananta prameya tā apekṣā kṛta bheda tve parama arthaḥ na lakṣaṇam atra ucyate upalambhena yat lakṣyampāram ārthikam eva tat satta upalambhaḥ eva iti bhāvānāmpāramārthikī na hi svarūpa upalabhyamāna tām anāsādya bhāvāḥ sat tām ātmasāt kurvanti nanu upalambhena jñāpyate sattā na tu saḥ eva sattā anupalabhyamānasya śaśa viṣāṇa ādeḥ asattvāt viparyayāt upalambhaḥ sattā iti vyavasthā 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,13	 nanu tatra api asattve anupalambhaḥ na tu anupalambhaḥ eva asattvam na anupalambha vyatirekeṇa asattvam aparam anupalambhena yat pratīyate tat asattvam iti ced koyam anupalambhaḥ kim upalambha abhāvaḥ atha anya upalambhaḥ kim vā na upalabhaḥ iti vikalpaḥ yadi upalambha abhāvaḥ katham atas pratītiḥ na abhāvaḥ pratītiḥ saḥ api abhāva unyena upalambha abhāvena pratyeyaḥ iti anavasthā 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,14	 nanu upalambhasya aparaḥ upalambhaḥ na asti iti na upalambha bhāvena tasya pratītiḥ yena anavasthā bhavet parokṣa tvat jñānasya yadi parokṣam jñānaṅkathantasya bhāvaḥ pratīyate yathā ca padārthasya anu palambhāt abhāva pratītiḥ tathā jñānasya api syāt iti vaiśasataram atha tatra artha āpattiḥ asti aparokṣa tva ādarśasya tena na pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,15–2.1.2.2.2,16	 nanu arthāpattiḥ api buddhiḥ eva tatas buddhi antareṇa buddhiḥ pratīyate tatas ca tatra apara artha āpattiḥ na asti iti pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvāt arthāpatti buddhiḥ na asti iti prāptam atha tatra prameya pratipattiḥ asti iti punar artha āpattiḥ anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ nanu pratipattiḥ dṛśyate yadi darśana mātram avalambyate kim artha āpattyā yathā dṛśyate tathā eva astu aparokṣaḥ dṛśyate sa tathā eva astu kim artha āpattyā buddhi parikalpanayā 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,17–2.1.2.2.2,18	 nanu arthāpattiḥ utpadyate yadi evam anavasthānāt apratipati adhyavasāya upi bhavati eva sa katham aniṣṭaḥ yadā ca upalabhyamāna tā aparokṣa tā vā buddheḥ tadā tad abhāva pratipattau= anavasthā atha padārtha anupalambhaḥ eva upalambha anupalambhaḥ evam sati anupalambhamānopyupalambhaḥ asti eva iti prāptam saḥ eva abhāvaḥ iti ced yadi anupalambhaḥ abhāvaḥ upalambhopi bhāvaḥ iti prāptam atha anya upalambhaḥ eva anupalambhaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,19–2.1.2.2.2,20	 tat api ayukktam yadi nāma anya upalambhasya nāma kṛtaṅ katham anyaḥ na asti tasya upalambha abhāvāt iti ced dattam atra uttaram saḥ eva anyasya upalambhaḥ anyatra na pravṛttaḥ iti tad anyasya anupalambhaḥ yadi nāma anyatra na pravṛttaḥ tathā api tasya abhāvaḥ iti kutas atha upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya abhāvaḥ eva anyathā tatra api pravartteta tasya api tadvat eva upalabhyamāna tvāt na ca upalabhyate tasya anupalambhaḥ kena pratipannaḥ abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ iti sā eva anavasthā pratiniyata ākāra upalambhāt iti ced nanu kim iyam arthāpattiḥ tathā iti ced anavasthā uktāḥ pratiniyata ākāra upalambhaḥ eva upalambha abhāvaḥ aparasya iti ced evantarhi na abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid anyatra apara bhāvāt atas aparaḥ yaḥ abhāvaḥ anya apekṣayā sva apekṣam abhāvaḥ iti tat ca rūpam pratiniyatam upalabhyamāna tāyām eva tatas upalambhaḥ sattā ucyate nanu pratiniyata tve upalabhyamāna tā pratiniyamaḥ na tu saḥ eva pratiniyamaḥ nanu anupalabhyamāna tāyāṅ katham pratiniyamaḥ iti buddhiḥ upalabhyamāna tā prasādāt eva tasmāt upalabhyamāna tā eva sattā 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,21	 atha na upalabhe iti vikalpaḥ eva anupalambhaḥ tat api nānā upalabhe iti vikalpa unupalabdhim eva anusarati sā ca anupalabdhi viṃcāritā tasmāt upalabdhiḥ sattā iti upalabhyamāna tā eva prameya tattvam yadi tarhi tat eva parama artha sattvan na kasyacid anyathā bhavet na etat anyathā bhavati puruṣa antara apekṣayā api tat tathā eva bhavati nīla ādi vat eva parokṣa tayā kathantat eva tat pratīyate iti ced tena eva rūpeṇa parokṣa tayā api pratīyam ānantat yadi tu na kenacid tathā pratīyate na api pratyeṣyate vṛthā tad anumānam tadā apratīyamānaṅ kathantathā iti ced anyathā api tat bhavati tat eva iti kutas upalabdheḥ abhāvāt anyathā iti ced nanu upalabdha rebhāvāt abhāvaḥ eva nanu abhāvepi anupalabdhiḥ syāt katham abhāvaḥ nanu bhāve pramāṇa bhāve sati evam vācyam syāt anumānampramāṇam iti ced tat api dṛṣṭam eva rūpam anusarati paścāt darśanāt kathampūrvan dṛśyamāna tā yadi dṛśyam āna tā na asti katham sattvam paścāt upalambhāt iti ced paścāt eva sattvam astu katham pūrvvam 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,22	 nanu pūrvam avidyamānaṅ kathampaścāt upalabhyate upalabhyamāna tayā pratīteḥ upalabhyamāna tayā pratīteḥ upalabdham anyathā anyathā iti ced anyadā api tad rūpeṇa eva adhyavasīyate iti na anyathāsattvam anyathā pratipattum aśakya tvāt anumānañca bhāvi sattāyāmpramāṇam iti pratipādayiṣyate kathantarhi meyā antaram tasya eva para rūpeṇa pratīteḥ tathā pratīyamānan dṛṣṭānta sādhāraṇena rūpeṇa meyā antaram pratipatti bhedena tad rūpa āropāt na paramārthataḥ evantarhi apekṣā kṛta tvāt na paramārtha tā satyam avastu sāmānyam iti pratipāditam eva na idam apūrvam ucyate vastu samvāda dvāreṇa vyavahāribhiḥ alakṣita nānā tvaiḥ vastu iti vyavahriyate tena tad apekṣayā it am ucyate prameya dvaividhyam vyavahāribhiḥ alakṣita nānā tvaiḥ vastu iti vyavahriyate tena tad apekṣayā it am ucyate prameya dvaividhyam atha ubhaya rūpa tvāt ubhaya grāhi pramāṇa antaram bhavet iti matiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.2.2,23–2.1.2.2.2,25	 tat ayuktam ubhaya rūpa tayā ekena pratipattum aśakya tvāt pratipattau vā pramāṇa dvayam eva tat pratitti bhede eva bhedāt athavā pratipatti bhedāt apāramārthikam eva lakṣaṇam iti naḥ bhaya rūpa tā prasaṅgaḥ nīla āditā eva hi padārtha svabhāvaḥ sā ca na apekṣā bhedāt bhedavatī kathantarhi pāramārthika prameya abhāvāt pramāṇa tvam atra ucyate bhedaḥ kalpita rūpa tvāt saḥ eva apāramārthikaḥ vastu rūpantu yat prāpi amparama athatarat na tat 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,1–2.1.2.3.1,6	 kathantarhi parama arthasya viṣayīkaraṇāt bhedaḥ svarūpa sākṣāt karaṇe hi pratyakṣa tā eva bhavet tad asaṃsparśe kathantat viṣaya tā atra ucyate ayathā abhiniveśena dvitīyā bhrāntiḥ iṣyate yathā asau= arthaḥ idānīm iha kāraṇa bhedataḥ bhinnaḥ tathā asau= abhiniveśaḥ na bhavati iti ayathā abhiniveśinī bhrāntiḥ eva pūrva dṛṣṭa artha janita vāsanā prabodha bala bhāvi tvāt avastu saṃspa śopita dadhi avasāyāt yadi tarhi vastu saṃsparśa abhāvaḥ pramāṇam eva bhavati avisamvādāt pramāṇam eva iti ced saḥ eva visamvādonya gatau= anya prāpteḥ nna syāt tat āha gatiḥ ced para rūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā yadi para rūpeṇa gatiḥ kathantasya gatiḥ para rūpasya eva asau gatiḥ tatra anyasya bhrāntau bhrāntiḥ eva bhrāntiḥ ca na pramāṇatā parihāraḥ abhiprāya avisamvādāt api bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā gatiḥ api anyathā dṛṣṭāḥ pakṣaḥ ca āyaṅ kṛta uttaraḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,7	 anyatra api yathā abhiniveśaḥ katham avagantavyaḥ abhiprāya avi samvādāt eva sa ca atra asti iti na ayathārtha abhiniveśaḥ idantu vāsanā balāt jñānampratibhāsa bhedataḥ bhedaḥ iti na evam vyavahāriṇaḥ vidanti vyākhyātṛ pratītiḥ eva iyam saḥ eva abhiprāyaḥ katham anya darśanāt iti ced na vikalpānām vastu pratiniyama abhāvāt anādi vāsanā sāmarthyam eva etat tatas katham aparicchinna tattvaḥ tatra pravarttate iti na ca udyam etat dṛṣṭe ca na anupapatti sambhavaḥ pratyakṣepi kathampravarttate tatra api na eva prāptavya rūpa paricchedaḥ sannihita mātrasya paricchedāt pratyuta kintu arthe pratyakṣame vā pravarttakam sannihita mātrasya pariprāpteḥ tatra api tad eka tva adhyavasāyāt eva vṛttiḥ bhāvini vastuni tatonumānā ipī evam eva vṛttiḥ katham asamāna tayā īkṣyate atha pratyakṣam eka tva adhyavāsāya rūpat na bhavati paricchedakam eva sannihitasya eka tva adhyavasāyaḥ tu tad uttara kālan na vinā vikalpena tat asat 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,8–2.1.2.3.1,9	 anumānena sutarām svarūpasya parigrahāt vikalpa antaram adhyāsīt grahaṇe sannidhāvataḥ yathā eva hi pratyakṣa sannihita rūpa ādi mātra grāhi vikalpa antareṇa eka tva adhyāse sati pravarttakan tathā anumānam sutarām svarūpasya sannihitatarasya grāhakam iti tatra api vikalpa antareṇa eva bhāvi adhyava sāyāt pravarttaka tvam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,10–2.1.2.3.1,14	 atha sva rūpeṇa eva anunāna madhyavasāya rūpa tvāt pravarttakam avastu saṃsparśi ced pramāṇam pratyakṣasya tu vastu saṃsparśitayā pramāṇatā tat api asat vastu saṃsparśa mātreṇa na pratyakṣam pravarttakam bhāvi eka adhyavasāyaḥ tu pratyakṣasya na vidyate yena rūpeṇa vastu saṃsparśaḥ na tena rūpeṇa pramāṇam pravarttaka tva abhāvāt atha tat eva rūpam vikalpa janane yat pravarttakam atha kim vikalpasya pravarttaka tvam asti yena tad dvāreṇa pratyakṣasya pravarttaka tā tat hi svayam apravarttakam apravarttaka vikalpa jananena pravarttakam iti kā iyam vācaḥ yuktiḥ pravarttakaḥ vikalpaḥ ced avastu grahaṇe katham tathā api varttayati etat anumānena kimmatam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,15	 yadi hi vikalpa janana dvāreṇa pratyakṣampravarttakam āyātantarhi vikalpasya pravarttaka tvāt pramāṇa tvam tathā asatyanumānasya prāmāṇyam avyāhatam eva anumānasya avastu grahaṇāt aprāmāṇyam apravarttaka tvāt iti ced kathantarhi vikalpasya pratyakṣa uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ tatra pratyakṣasya vastu grahaṇāt na vikalpe bhāvini tasya apravṛtteḥ tad santāne pravṛtta tvāt pravṛttiḥ iti ced katham prathama kṣaṇasya santāna tā na ca anyatra vṛttam anyatra vṛttambhavati tathā ced anumānam api svarūpe bṛttam arthepi vṛttam eva bhavet upacāra mātram etat na parama artha satyepi na uttaram pratyakṣam api ekatra vṛttam anyatra api vṛttam iti na upacārāt etat anyat pratyakṣan tad jātīye vṛttam anumānantu tatra api na iti vyāhatam vikalpasya pratyakṣa uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ tad jātīye vṛtyabhāvāt tatra pratyakṣasya vṛttiḥ iti parihāre anumānā ipyetat iti samānam etat anumāna viṣaya tajjātīye pratyakṣa vṛtteḥ mahānasa dahane hi pratyakṣam pravṛttam eva anumāna viṣayetatra asti iti ced sarvvam samānam tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,16–2.1.2.3.1,19	 yathā anumāna viṣaye na pratyakṣa pravarttanam tathā vikalpasya na kimpratyakṣa uttara bhāvinaḥ anya vyakti pravṛttañcet pratyakṣam anumāna kṛt anya rūpe na vṛttaṅ kimpratyakṣanta d vikalpa kṛt eka tva adhyavasāyaḥ tu samānaḥ ubhayoḥ api sāmānyam ubhayatra api gṛhyate prāpya vastunaḥ vahneḥ ādi kṣaṇaḥ tatra vikalpasya akṣa gocaraḥ nanu anyasya grahe anyasya grahaḥ na iti niveditam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,20–2.1.2.3.1,23	 tad sambandhi grahe tasya grahaṇam yadi sammatam anumānepi sarvu atra sambandhi grahaṇam samam vikalpye akāraṇan dṛśyam anumānepi kārya dṛś yathā vikalpasya pratyakṣa uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ viṣaya pratyakṣam apravṛttam api tad kāraṇe vṛttam vikalpasya pravṛrttaka tva prāmāṇyam vidadhāti tathā anumāna viṣaye apravṛttam api tat kāryam pravṛttam anumānasya api prāmāṇyam vidadhātu sambandha viśeṣāt kārya kāraṇa sambandhaḥ ubhayatra samānaḥ pratyutkāraṇāt kārya gatiḥ anaikāntikī iti pratyakṣam eva apramāṇambhavet na anumānam atha pratyakṣa tvāt anaikāntika udbhāvanam ayuktam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,24	 nanu yatra pratyakṣatā sannihita mātrake na tatra anaikāntikatodbhāvyate bhāvini tu na pratyakṣam etat tad jātīye pratyakṣan tatra api pratyakṣam eva iti api acodyam tad jātīyatā anumāna viṣayepi pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ tatra vṛttam pratyakṣam iha tu pravarttate iti viśeṣaḥ tatra vyakti antare vṛttam iha tatra eva iti asāmānya viṣaya tā pratyakṣasya na bhāvi bhūtayoḥ ekatva abhāvāt apratyakṣa tvāt ca sāmānya viṣaya tā samānā eva katham vā tad jātīya tā bhāvi viṣayeṇa na adṛṣṭasya avagamyate anyatra tathāgrahaṇāt etat iti ced vyakti antara sādhāraṇa tā eva tarhi sarvatra sāmānyaṅ gamyate na viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ atha avaśyam bhāvitāḥ bhāvinaḥ tena na anā ekāntika tā yatra kāraṇantatra avaśyam bhāvitāḥ yatra kāryantatra sutarām eva avaśyam bhāvitā avaśyambhāvini ca kārya kāraṇa tvam eva iti pratipāditam tasmāt na bhāvini pravarttye prāpye pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,25	 atha pratyakṣantāvāt vastu saṃspaśe tena pramāṇat nānumānam iti ced tat api asat prāpya viṣaya tā bhāve bhrāntasya abhrāntasya ca na viśeṣaḥ atha bhāva abhāvābhyām viśeṣaḥ iti ced na samvādam antareṇa tasyavā artha bhāva itara tvasya adhigantum aśakyatvāt atha pratyakṣe nara antara samvādāt asamvādepi vastu viṣaya tā tat api anumāna gamyam eva iti na viśeṣaḥ tasmāt abhipreta artha avisamvādāt pramāṇān na vastu grahaṇam upayogi anyathā pratyakṣam apramāṇam eva bhavet 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,26^1	 tatra eva vyākhyāyate anyathā api gati dṛṣṭā bhāntā api gati dṛṣṭā athavā gatiḥ pāda viharaṇantadanī athā api para rūpeṇa pratipattau= api dṛṣṭāḥ kathamprāptiḥ sadbhāvāt arthasya yasya sadbhāvaḥ sa prāpyate tathā hi samarthakāre hasta parāmarśatopi prāpti darśanam niyatā katham iti ced sambandha balāt eva astitvam api sambandhi sadbhāvāt eva katham sambandhitā gatiḥ pratyakṣepi kathambha avi sambandhi tā gatiḥ evam eva dṛṣṭa tvāt iti ced samānam ubhayatra api iti avivādaḥ atas tat eva pratyakṣan tatra pramāṇanta dvi kalpa jananāt iti ced anumāna jananāt api tat eva pūrvvakam pratyakṣam kinneṣyate atīta tvāt tasya iti ced vikalpa udaya kālepi pratyakṣam atītam eva na hi kārya kāraṇayoḥ samāna kālatā iti pratipādayiṣyate atha vikalpa samāna kālam api prabandhena pratyakṣam āste eva iti viśeṣaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,26^2	 na uttara pratyakṣa kṣaṇānām apramāṇa tvāt atha uttareṣām api pramāṇa tā anyathā prabandhasya bhāvinaḥ apariniściyāt pūrveṣa antarhi apramāṇa tā prāpya viṣaya tvā abhāvāt pūrvareva niścaya janane uttera ṣām apramāṇa tā bhavet sandehe hi na niścitya aniścaye vā na sandehaḥ niścaya itarayoḥ eka viṣaya tva ayogāt atha pūrveṣām apramāṇa tā eva tathā sati na pravarttate iti kasyacid prāmāṇyam paśyāmi tāvat kim atra prāptiḥ uta na iti pravṛttau= anumānepi samānam etat tasmāt gatiḥ api pratyakṣa abhimatā anyathā dṛṣṭā para rūpeṇa eva na kācid pravṛtti viṣaye sva rūpeṇa gatiḥ anyatra tu vastu rūpe svarūpe vā gatiḥ ubhayoḥ api iti bhāvivaḥ tubhi kaḥ viśeṣaḥ kathantarhi pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ viṣaya bhadaḥ spaṣṭe aspaṣṭam adhyāropyate aspaṣṭe ca spaṣṭam iti athavā anyathā 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,27–2.1.2.3.1,29	 yatra bhāvi gatiḥ tatra anumānam mānam iṣyate varttamānā iti mātreṇa vṛttau= adhyakṣamāna tā yatra atyanta abhyāsāt avikalpayata upi pravarttanantatra pratyakṣampramāṇam anyathā vikalpasya pramāṇa antara tā prāptā yadi yatra vikalpaḥ tatra eva pratyakṣampravarttakampramāṇañca iti atha pratyakṣam eva pramāṇan na vikalpaḥ gṛhīta grahaṇāt iti ced vicāritam etat yathā gṛhīta grāhitā na asti punar api ucyate tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,30–2.1.2.3.1,33	 na upayogaḥ vikalpasya pravṛttau yadi tena kim upayogaḥ vikalpasya pravṛttau ced pramā na kim yadi vikalpasya anupayogi tā eva katham asau sahāyatayā iṣyate pratyakṣasya na khalu nirupayoginā api sahāyena kasyacid arthitā atha tena vinā na pravarttanam pratyakṣam apramāṇam bhavet tena api vinā na pravarttate iti ced ubhayantarhi pramāṇam prasaktam atha apramāṇa vikalpaḥ padārtha rūpa asaṃsparśāt pratyakṣam api apramāṇam prāpya rūpā saṃsparśāt iti uktam idānīm eva tasmāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām vikalpasya pravarttane yadi kāraṇa tā na asti tadā syāt apramāṇa tā pratyakṣāt paratas vṛttiḥ vikalpasya pravarttane śaktiḥ ced vyavadhānana pratyakṣasya apramāṇa tā 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,34	 atha vyavahitasya api apramāṇa tā tathā sati cakṣuḥ ādīnām api pravarttaka tve pramāṇatā syāt ajñāna tvāt na iti ced samanantara pratyayasya syāt anya viṣaya tvāt tasya na iti ced samāna viṣaya tve syāt bhavati eva iti ced na tatra pravarttye ajñāna tvāt na hi pravartti aviṣaya tvam pūrvakṣaṇa grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya asti tasmāt anantara tvāt pramāṇām vikalpaḥ eva syāt atha api pravṛtti viṣayaḥ pratyakṣam pravartteta pratibhāsa mātreṇa tathā api pramāṇam vikalpaḥ gṛhīta grāhi tve katham apramāṇam iti ced pravarttaka tvāt yathā svabhāva anumānam na hi pratibhāsa mātreṇa pratyakṣampramāṇam kṣaṇika tvepi pratyakṣa grāhya tā syāt bhavati eva iti ced kṣaṇika grāhakam anumānan na pramāṇam bhavet gṛhīta grāhi tvāt atha vyavahāra sādhanāt pramāṇam vikalpopi tathā iti samānam bhavet tasmāt pratyakṣa viṣaya pravarttaka tvepi spaṣṭa aspaṣṭa bhedāt pramāṇa dvitayam eva tad para rūpeṇa api gatiḥ avisambādāt pramāṇam eva yathā ca avisambādepi na vastu svarūpa grahaṇan tathā pratipāditam eva avisamvādāt pramāṇa tvepi bhrānta tān darśayati 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,35–2.1.2.3.1,38	 maṇi pradīpa prabhayoḥ maṇi buddhyā abhidhāvataḥ mithyājñāna viśeṣa ipi viśeṣa urtha kriyām prati yathā tathā ayathārtha tvepi anumāna tad ābhayoḥ artha kriyā anurodhena pramāṇa tvam vyavasthitam maṇi prabhāyām kuñcikā vivara vihita maṇi saṃsthāna viśeṣāyāmmaṇi viśeṣam anāśritāyām pradīpa prabhā yāñca sarasiruha rāga maṇi bhrāntiḥ parasparat na viśiṣyate atha ca maṇi prāpti kṛtaḥ asti eva kasyāścid viśeṣaḥ tadvat anumāna tad ābhāsayoḥ api tatas eva pramāṇa itarate adṛṣṭā ipi maṇau pradīpa prabhāptam maṇī adhyavasāyī pravarttamānaḥ upalabdhaḥ eva na ca bhrāntiḥ iti samāna tā sarvatra sāmagrī viśeṣataḥ viśeṣāt na hi jñāna tvāt sa kalambhrā antam itarathāḥ vā tasmāt bhrāntam api pramāṇam avisamvādāt sāmagrī viśeṣāt viśeṣa vat bhrānti adhya vasita tā bhrāntiḥ api sambaddha padārtha janitā pramāṇa udaya nibandhanam bhavati samīhita prāpti hetuḥ pratyakṣa udaya nibandhana anumāna jñāna vat na hi anumānam prati akṣa udayam antareṇa pramāṇaḥ na ca pratyakṣam anumāna udayam vinā iti pratipāditam tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,39–2.1.2.3.1,41	 vinā anumānam pratyakṣat na pravarttakam āditas tathā anumānam pratyakṣam vinā iti pratipāditam viśeṣaḥ tu ayam eva atra kvacid pūrvvaṅ kvacid param anumānāt parannākṣat nākṣāt pūrvva anumeṣyate atha api syāt pratyakṣam antareṇa anumānam pravarttate anumānantu vinā api pratyakṣam iti viśeṣāt anumānam pratyakṣeṇa asamānam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,42–2.1.2.3.1,46	 tat api asat pratyakṣam anumānena vinā mānam sva vedane vyavahāraḥ tathā na asti pramāṇa tvepi kimbhavet sva samvedana mātre ca pratyakṣe artha aprasiddhitaḥ bhedasya ca na kiñcid syāt advaitam avaśiṣyate tasmāt arthasya bhedasya na adhyakṣa sādha kamvinā anumānantataḥ tasya pramātu anna anumām vinā atha api syāt pratyakṣam anumānam apekṣā eva bhede arthe ca pravarttata anumānantu pratyakṣambinā api tathā hi dhamāt agni anumānam pratyakṣam anapekṣā eva uttara kāla bhāvi tatas eva tasya arthasya prāpteḥ na etat asti 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,47–2.1.2.3.1,48	 na hi deśa viśiṣṭa tvam pratyakṣeṇa vinekṣyate anumānampunar deśā viśeṣeṇa agni samvide kuḍaya ādi vyavahitaḥ vahniḥ na pratiniyata deśa tayā pratyetum śakyaḥ anumānena kuḍyāt para deśe kvāpi vahniḥ iti sāmānyena anumāne pratyakṣāt pratiniyata deśu parigrahaḥ na ca apratiniyata deśasya hutabhujaḥ janma prāptiḥ maṇiprabhāyām api maṇi jñānasya pratiniyata deśā parigrahaḥ eva doṣaḥ na ca sandeha viparyayayoḥ pratiniyata padārtha aprāpaka tvena viśeṣaḥ atha api syāt viparyaya pratyayaḥ anyatra pravarttaka tvāt apramāṇam sandehaḥ tu kadācid tatra api pravarttayati iti bhavet pramāṇam tat asat 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,49–2.1.2.3.1,50	 ubhaya aṃga avalambī hi saṃśayaḥ na pravarttakaḥ viparyāsaḥ viparyāsāt pravarttayati dehinaḥ saṃśayaḥ hi viparyāsāt adhamaḥ umaya aṃśam avalambamānaḥ dolāyamāna cetasaḥ kathampravarttakaḥ tatosau dolāyamāna tā pratyakṣāt apaiti viparyāsopi maṇi prabhāyāmmaṇi jñāna lakṣaṇaḥ anumānāt paścāt bhāvina iti na anumā antarāt maṇi prabhāyām maṇi jñānasya viśeṣaḥ pramāṇa tvena kintu pramāṇam iti ced 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,51–2.1.2.3.1,53	 pratyakṣam eva tat mānaṅ kathambhrāntan tathā eva tat samvādena pramāṇa tvam kva upayogi bhrama itarat pramāṇam avisamvādi jñānam iti lakṣaṇa sāmānyena tat bhrame sati anyathā vā iti kva idam upayoga vat nanu bhrānta tve satya visambādopi bhavet na anyathā na etat api satyam abhrāntiravisamvādāt kāla deśa nara antare na bhrānteḥ avisamvādaḥ abhra anteḥ eva aprasiddhitaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,54–2.1.2.3.1,56	 idambhrāntam idam anyathā iti na avisamvādanam antareṇa atha ābādhita tvāt abhrāntiḥ iti ced na avisambādasya eva tathā abhidhānāt visamvāt ehi sati sarvvaḥ vibhramaḥ eva avādhita tvepi sā eva bādhā iti ced avisamvādaḥ eva tarhi tasya ābādhita tvam iti avisamvādāt eva abhrāntiḥ iti siddham avisamvādepi bhrāntiḥ eva anumānam iti api na mī mām sa kaḥ sya matam lo kā yata sya api na matam bhrānteḥ sarvvasyā pramāṇa tvena upagamāt yadi tarhi bhrāntam api pratyakṣamprāṇaṅ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ pratibhāsa bhedāt iti vakṣyate bhrānta tvepi pratibhāsa bhedaḥ anumāna ābhāsa taimirika jñānayoḥ iva abhrāntam eva sakalam jñānam mānam na vibhramaḥ vibhrama avibhrama tu asya viśeṣaḥ kaḥ iva īkṣyate 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,57	 vibhramaḥ hi svarūpa asaṃsparśaḥ eva sa ca pramāṇasya sakalasya samānaḥ yathā eva anumānasya prāpya rūpā saṃsparśaḥ tathā pratyakṣasya api iti viśeṣaḥ tasmāt maṇi prabhāyām api maṇi jñānam pratyakṣam eva bhāvini viṣaye bhāvi anumānam pramāṇam iti ced itaratra api pratyakṣe samānam etat tatra na asti pramāṇa antara tva abhimānaḥ maṇi jñāne tu asti eva iti ced na atyanta abhyāsataḥ maṇi jñānepi na asti pramāṇa antaratva abhimānaḥ iti samānam nanu bhrānti abhimānaḥ prabhāmaṇi jñāne na tu stambha ādi jñāne atra ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,58–2.1.2.3.1,60	 parama artha samāna tve abhimānāt apramāṇakāt viśeṣasya na sattya tvam pramāṇa dvayam eva tat sarvatra pratyakṣa anumāne ca pramāṇa antaram asti abhimānaḥ tu na asti iti na etāvatā vastu bhedaḥ apramāṇaka abhimānasya yathā kathañcid bhāvaḥ iti na tad sada sat tayoḥ viśeṣaḥ tasmāt pratyakṣam eva tat jñānam anumānam atha api vā maṇi prabhā maṇi jñānam iti tattva viniścayaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,61–2.1.2.3.1,63	 atha maṇi svarūpasya agrahaṇāt katham pratyakṣa tā stambha ādau tu yadi nāma bhāvi svarūpa agrahaṇantad svarūpa grahaṇantu tad kāla bhāvi vidyate eva tat asat tathā hi bhāvi rūpāgrahe anyasya jñāna jñeyasya tad grahaḥ samānaḥ eva ubhayathā prāptiḥ tu pratibandhataḥ prāpya rūpasya bheda grahaḥ tad aparasya svarūpasya vā bhavatu parigrahaḥ para rūpasya vā iti na viśeṣaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,64–2.1.2.3.1,65	 maṇi pratibhāsaḥ tu maṇau maṇi prabhā yāñca samānaḥ eva tatra kvacid deśa bhrāntiḥ kvacid svarūpa bhrāntiḥ kvacid ubhayam kvacid anubhayam maṇi prabhāyām maṇi jñānasya deśa bhrāntiḥ maṇau= eva prāpya svarūpa bhrāntiḥ sāmānya anumānasya ubhaya bhrāntiḥ sva samvedanasya na ubhayathāpi iti prakāraḥ tatas yat uktam yā gatiḥ sāmya rūpeṇa eva yathā pratyakṣā gatiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,66–2.1.2.3.1,68	 yat pramāṇantada bhra antam yathā pratyakṣam tat ayuktam pratyakṣā api gatiḥ na svarūpeṇa na ca abhra antam pratyakṣam asti svarūpe ca yathā pratyakṣa bhrāntam tathā anumānam api anye ca bhrānta abhimatāḥ pratyayāḥ iti na tathā bhrānta tā pratipādanaṅ kvacid upayogi evanta hi katham pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ uktam atra spaṣṭa itara pratibhāsa bhedāt iti saḥ eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ tathā kutas bhavati yasya svatantraṅ grahaṇantasya spaṣṭa pratibhāsa tā yasya anyathā tad aspaṣṭa pratibhāsam atīndriyam parokṣam etat eva katham bhavati yena evam ucyate buddhiḥ yatra artha sāma arthyāt anvayavi atirekiṇī tasya svatantraṅ grahaṇam atas anyat vastu ati indriyam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,69	 yasya hisākṣāt pratibhāsanam saḥ eva arthaḥ anati indriyaḥ svalakṣaṇam sākṣāt pratibhāsaḥ ca buddheḥ anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānena tad ākārāyāḥ jananāt yat tu pūrvva darśana janita vāsanā pravodhataḥ avabhāsa biṣayaḥ pūrva pratipanna rūpa ākāra tayā niścīyate tat atonyat ati indriyam na hi tadā indriya vyāpāraḥ tad sambhavī vā sākṣātkaraṇa ākāraḥ sākṣāt pratīyate na ca tad ākāra vyatirekeṇa aparā tasya pratītiḥ tat sākṣāt eva yasya ca va sākṣāt tasya na eva pratītiḥ atha ākrama saṅgatya bhāvāt parokṣam sva rūpeṇa tarhi pratīyamānam eva parokṣam akṣa vyāpāra abhāvāt iti prāptam tat etat anabhimatam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,70–2.1.2.3.1,71	 tasmāt parokṣa viṣayaḥ pratyayaḥ yadyavaḥ tudṛka pratītasyā parokṣa tvāt parokṣaḥ viṣayaḥ katham yadi pratīyate na parokṣaḥ na ca vastu asaṃsparśane vastu viṣaya tā sāmānya viṣaya tāya antarhi kathamparokṣa viṣaya tā sāmānyantatra sākṣātkṛtam eva vastu tu punar na saṃspṛṣṭam iti kathamparokṣa viṣaya tā sāmānya jñānasya lakṣita lakṣaṇena pratipannam iti ced kena rūpeṇa viśeṣasya lakṣaṇam yadi viśeṣeṇa śabda ādeḥ eva tasya pratītiḥ astu kim antar gaḍunā sāmānyena sāmānya rūpeṇa lakṣaṇe anavasthā iti uktam viśeṣa rūpeṇa ca lakṣaṇe indriya vaiphalyam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,72	 atha sāmānyam eva pratibhāti viśeṣaḥ parokṣaḥ apratibhāsanāt atra api su ākāraḥ eva vāsanā bala āyātaḥ pratibhāti sākṣāt arthaḥ tu parokṣaḥ iti kathantat viṣaya tā tatra pravarttanāt apratipanne kathampravarttanam apratipannaḥ eva sarvu atra pravarttanam iti pratipāditam apratipannepi hi devadatta rūpe yajñadattasya samānasya darśanāt pravṛtti darśanāt tatra samvādaḥ iti ced na avisamvāda kāraṇasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt samvandhāt avisamvādaḥ iti yadi bhrāntiḥ asau vāsanā balāt vāsanāyām eva tarhi pratipannaḥ iti katham arthasya adhyavasāyaḥ prāptiḥ vvā na vāsanā prabodhasya api kāraṇa tvāt tad samvandhena arthasya iti na doṣaḥ tat eva āha 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,73–2.1.2.3.1,76	 tasya adṛṣṭa ātma rūpasya gateḥ anyorthaḥ āśrayaḥ tad āśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syāt gamakaḥ tadā adṛṣṭa svarūpaḥ hi artha unyatas sambandhāt pratīyate anya mātrāt pratītau= ati prasaṅgaḥ svayam pratītau sarvvam eva sarvu adarśī syāt viśeṣa abhāvāt tena āśrayeṇa ca sonyaḥ yadi sambandhī tadā gamakaḥ katham etat evam eva dṛṣṭeḥ nanu smaraṇam eva tatra sambaddhāt bhavati tat ca sambandha ādeḥ api iti saḥ eva atiprasaṅgaḥ na ābhoga ādi janitāyāḥ smṛteḥ anyathā bhāvāt ādeśa ādi vyavasthasya tasyāḥ bhoga āditas smṛtiḥ deśa kāla viśiṣṭasya tad āśraya samāgamāt 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,77	 dharmmi sādhya sambaddha padārtha darśanāt hi deśa kāla niyataḥ śakya prāpaṇa ūrthaḥ pratīyate na ābhoga āditas tathā hi ābhogaḥ kim mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kim iti anveṣaṇa paraḥ mānasaḥ vyāpāraḥ tatra sati tathābhūta deśa kāle eva vastuni smaraṇat nādhika vyapārantena apramāṇantat sadṛśa grahaṇāt anena sadṛśā usau= iti etāvat mātrikā pratītiḥ sadṛśatvantu na deśa kāla viśiṣṭasya sarvadā sadṛśa tvāt anekasya ca sādṛśyam itarat vā iti na pratiniyata gatiḥ iti na tad pramāṇam tena tu tad sadṛśena yat karttavyantat kriyate iti pramāṇam eva tatra pratyakṣam anyathā tu pratyakṣāt pravarttanam eva iti na pramāṇam iti pratipāditam eva iti na punar ucyate evam eva na sambandhāt api pratītiḥ anumāna ātmikā pramāṇam tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,78–2.1.2.3.1,79	 liṅgantad lakṣaṇa tvena kārya ādi gamakammatam tad lakṣaṇa tvāt aparat na liṅgasya asti lakṣaṇam tat etat vakṣā artha kriyā kāri śiśaṃpātvam dhūma ādi kañcāgya ādi janitaṅkārya tvena kāraṇa tvena vā sādṛśya avagatiḥ tatra api tat etat sattvam anitya rūpam purvvā pararupa rahita tvena na anyat anyasya api ānitya tvasya rūpam iti savva nimu mānapratītiḥ evambhūte ca sannihita kāraṇañca dhūmasya rupam viśeṣeṇa kenacid upalakṣitasya asat nihita kāraṇañca bhasma ādeḥ iti dvayam api yathāyogaṅ gamakam tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,80–2.1.2.3.1,83	 yaḥ yathā dṛśyate bhāvaḥ ekadā sa tathā anyadā prabodhakaḥ smṛteḥ eva yathāyogampravarttakaḥ anyathā pūrva dṛṣṭasya calitā syāt yadā smṛtiḥ pravarttanam bhavet tatra na tu sambāda saṅgatiḥ pratyakṣam avisamvādi smaraṇantu tad āśrayāt tathā eva aham smarāmi iti smṛtessyāt yadi sā pramā darśane vyabhicāreṇa tathā tvepi na ced pramā darśane vyabhicāropi sa smṛteḥ anyathātvataḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,84–2.1.2.3.1,88	 tathā hi darśanam anālambe smaraṇam anyathā sa ālambana tvena yatas tathā tat na pramā bhavet smaraṇe na anyathā anugamyamānan darśana pramāṇam iti darśanasya svatas doṣaḥ api tu smaraṇasya tat api hi smaraṇam sādṛśyāt anyathā upajāyate smaraṇa pāṭavāt bhāvāt eva tasmāt kārya svabhāvābhyām smaraṇam jāyate artha bhāj upalakṣitābhyān tattvena syāt smṛteḥ vibhrama unyathā tasmāt smṛti vibhrama kṛtaḥ eva sarvu athā visamvādaḥ tasmāt parokṣa viṣayam smaraṇam eva sambaddhāt yathādṛṣṭasya pramāṇam tat ca anumānam eva na anyat atas eva āha gamaka anuga sāmānya rūpeṇa eva tadā gatiḥ tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣa ūrthaḥ viśeṣeṇa na gamyate 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,89	 gamaka paratantrā hi gamyasya pratītiḥ tat ca gamakam sāmānya rūpeṇa na viśeṣeṇa tasya lakṣayitum aśakyatvāt alakṣitena api rupeṇa gamaka tve sarvu ākāra sarvu akāraṇa paramparā prati iti prasaṅgaḥ tat ca dhūma ādi sāmānyam sarvu atra agni ādau dṛṣṭam tatas anaikāntika tvāt na tatas viśeṣasya pratītiḥ viśeṣa upalakṣaṇe pratītiḥ iti ced na avāntara viśeṣasya lakṣayitum aśakya tvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,90	 nanu viśeṣa upalakṣaṇam api kasyacid sambhavati eva na atyantam viśeṣasya aśakya tvāt viśeṣa upalakṣaṇantu tatra apekṣā akṛtam yā ca yāvatī ca mātrā iti yasya tu sarva ākāra pratītiḥ tasya sākṣātkaraṇāt avyaktam eva tat iti pratīmaḥ viśeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ viśeṣa pratītiḥ iti ced na tatra api sāmānyasya eva gatiḥ iti pratipādayiṣyate etat eva āha 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,91–2.1.2.3.1,93	 yā ca sambandhinaḥ dharmmāt gatiḥ dharmiṇi varttate sānumān amparokṣāṇām ekantena eva sādhanam anya lakṣaṇa abhāvāt anumāna lakṣaṇa sambhavāt ca na anumānāt aparamparokṣa viṣayam pramāṇam asti nanu pramāṇa antara viṣayam pramāṇa antaram iti na dve eva pramāṇe atra parihāraḥ na pratyakṣa parokṣābhyām meyasya anyasya sambhavaḥ tasmāt prameya dvi tvena pramāṇa dvi tvam iṣyate 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,94–2.1.2.3.1,95	 nanu pramāṇa dvi tvena prameya dvi tvam iti yuktam pramāṇasya sattā sādhana tvāt na etat asti prameyampramāṇena sidhyati pramāṇa svarūpantu sva samvedana ākāra siddheḥ jñāna kāra eva ca sva samvedanaḥ sva sāmānyatayā upalabhyamānaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna viṣayaḥ iti uktam viṣaya dvaividhyāt ākāra dvaividhyāt iti arthaḥ su a ākāra dvaya samvedane hi na ekam iti yuktam na api tri ādikam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,96–2.1.2.3.1,98	 tri eka saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ vā prameya dvaya darśanāt prameya dvayāt aparasya prameyasya asambhavāt apara pramāṇat na asti iti pratipāditam idānīn dvitīyasya prameyasya sambhavāt na ekampramāṇat na api tri ādikam iti pratipādayiṣyati na hi dvitīye prameye sambhavati pramāṇam ekam dvitīya prameya viṣayasya api pramāṇasya bhāvāt na ekena pramāṇena dvitīyasya api siddhiḥ atha sāmānya viśeṣa rūpam ekam eva prameyam aparaḥ tu na asti iti prameya dvaya siddham iti āha 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,99–2.1.2.3.1,104	 ekam eva aprameya tvāt asataḥ ced matañca naḥ dṛṣṭam eva etat sva lakṣaṇāt aparamprameyam asat tat ca na prameyam ekam eva tu sva lakṣaṇam prameyam tat eva sva para rupābhyāṅ gateḥ sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti prāk uktam kiñca anekāntaḥ aprameya tve hi abhāvasya api niścayāt tad niścaya pramāṇam vā dvitīyam abhāva upi hi prāc abhāva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ prameyaḥ iti katham asat aprameya miti vyāptiḥ avyāptikaḥ ca katham hetuḥ aikāntikaḥ tathā hi prāgabhāva ādya vedane sarvam eva miti ambhavet na kāyanna api kāraṇam tathā ca pratipādayiṣyate itaretarāve ca satim miśrībhaveyuḥ dravyāṇi iti advaitva sakalam bhavet tat niścayaḥ pramāṇam vā dvitīyam yatas na akṣajā matiḥ na akṣa jñā matiḥ abhāve artha balāt jāte artha śakti anapekṣaṇe vyavadhāna ādi bhāvepi jāyeta indriya jā matiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,105	 na khalvabhāvaḥ nāma indriya gocaraḥ śabda ādi svabhāvasya eva tatra pratibhāsanāt tat atra na asti iti tu tasya rūpam asat tayā na akṣa gocaraḥ vyavahitasya api tasya asattvena vyavasthāpanāt atha vivikta pradeśa upalambhāt eva tathā niścayaḥ kā iyam viviktitāḥ nāma yadi pradeśa ādi rūpam tasmin= upalabdhe anyat na asti iti kutas tasya tad abhāva rūpa tvāt iti ced katham anyaḥ anyasya abhāvaḥ tena saha asaṅgamāt ced asaṅgamaḥ kutas saha āvedanāt ced saha āvedanāt tarhi vyavasthā abhāvasya tad anya vedanam eva tasya āvedanam tat anyat tvam eva tasya āvedane kathaṅ gṛhyate tasya prāk vedanāt iti ced tat etat na vedyate iti katham abhāva gatiḥ tasmāt ayama bhās vaniḥ cayaḥ na indriya jaḥ tatas na pratyakṣam etat 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,106–2.1.2.3.1,108	 atha api syāt pratyakṣam eva nivarttamānam abhāva niścaya nimittam tat api asat abhāve vinivṛttiḥ ced pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ viruddham sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya vyatirekiṇī pratyakṣasya eva nivṛtteḥ abhāva niścayaḥ iti ced vyāhatam etat tat ca na asti tena ca pratipattiḥ pratyakṣam hi samvedana ātma tayā yatra pravarttate tatra niścaya kṛt anubhūte niścāt anubhava abhāve tu kathat niścayaḥ tathā hi vaktāraḥ bhavanti na jāne kim asti anyat atha na asti iti na atra sama samvedanām iti katham aniścaya heta uḥ asamvedanāt niścayaḥ atha upalabdhi yogyasya anupalambhaḥ na sati padārthe tatas abhāva niścayaḥ iti ced na tarhi para loka ādeḥ atīndriyasya abhāva niścayaḥ yadi ca anupalabdhiḥ sadbhāvāt vyāvṛttā tadā tad viparyaya vyāptā satī gamikā iti liṅgam anvaya vyatireka yogāt siddham anumānam aparam pramāṇam liṅgāt utpatteḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,109–2.1.2.3.1,112	 anena svabhāva retuḥ anupalabdhiḥ ca tad antargata uktāḥ kārya hetum āha siddhañca para caitanya pratipatteḥ pramā du ayam vyāhāra ādau pravṛtteḥ ca siddhaḥ tad bhāba niḥ cayaḥ nahim para caitanyam ātmanaḥ iva pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati na khalu jāne kim asya caitanyam asti na vā iti tad ākāra parisphuraṇāt eva tathā pratipatteḥ kārya viśeṣeṇa viśeṣasya dveṣa ādeḥ niścayaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,113	 bhavatu yathā kathañcid ayat niścayaḥ sa tu pramāṇan na bhavati na eṣa doṣaḥ tad anurūpasya vyavahārasya vyāhāra ādi lakṣaṇasya darśanāt yathākathañcida pramāṇikā eva pravṛttiḥ iti ced na vicārya parityāga prasaṅgāt anyasya upāyasya abhāvāt agatyai aparityāgaḥ iti ced anyasya upāyasya abhāvaḥ iti eṣopi niścayaḥ pramāṇam eva tat ca anumānam iti uktam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,114	 para abhyupagamena etat ucyate tenā adoṣaḥ na para abhyupagatasya para artha anumānaḥ eva avatārāt na hi atmānam eva para abhyupagamā iva pratipādayati kaścid gati antarantāvat na pratipadye tena eva mahampravṛttaḥ para loka īpi tarhi pratipattiḥ astu para loka tyāgepi jīvitum śakyam tena tatra apravṛttiḥ iti ced evan jīvitum śakyam iti kutas etat jīvita arthī api kim atīta jīvita arthī atha varttamāna jīvita arthī iti tatra atīta arthī na atīta tvāt eva na varttamāna arthī tasya api prāpta tvāt anāgata arthī ced anāgatantarhi jīvita manena upāyena bhavati na anyathā iti anvaya vyatirekataḥ pratīteḥ anumānam eva 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,115	 kiñca yathā kathañcit ayam vyavahāraḥ iti kimbhavataḥ eva atha anyasya yadi bhavataḥ eva ubhaya asiddha tvāt kathamparaḥ pratipāditaḥ atha anyasya api upāya abhāvaḥ eva tathā sati para caitanya pratipattiḥ avaśyam iti katham yathā kathañcidiyampratītiḥ atha iyam api bhavati yathā kathañcid eva evantarhi bhavataḥ eva asampratyayaḥ kathamparasya pratipattiḥ mama tāvat evamparasya tu katham iti na jāne avacanam eva tarhi prāptam parasya api evam eva bhaviṣyati iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt iti yaktiñcid etat tasmāt asti para pratītiḥ tatas anumānam abhyupaganta vyampareṇa api 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,116–2.1.2.3.1,117	 pramāṇam avisamvādāt tat kvacid vyabhicārataḥ na āśvāsaḥ iti ced liṅganduḥ dṛṣṭeḥ etat īdṛśam avisambādaḥ hi pramāṇa lakṣaṇanta dasti anumānasya iti pramāṇatā atha visambādepi kvacid dṛśyate iti viparyayaḥ tathā hi sa śyāmaḥ tad putra tvāt iti anumānam vyabhicāra āsaṅgī api tat ayuktam anumānam eva etat na bhavati liṅga ābhāsāt utpatteḥ pratibandha abhāvāt na hi śyāma tāya antad putra tvam pratibaddham eka sāmagrayadhīna tayā samāna rūpa tā ced na eka sāma grayadhīnatā abhāvāt karma āhāra kāla viśeṣasya sambhavāt eka sāma grayadhīnatāyām yugapad utpatti prasaṅgāt tasmāliṅga rūpa tattva anupalakṣaṇāt ahetau= api hetu tva adhyāropataḥ vyabhicāra abhiprāyaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,118–2.1.2.3.1,120	 atha api syāt evam prāyam eva sarvvā anumānanna aparambiśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti kasya avyabhicāraḥ tat api asat yatas kadācid siddhāsya pratītiḥ vvastunaḥ kvacid tat avaśyantataḥ jātantad svabhāvopi vā bhavet tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇa pratibandha saṅgatam hi liṅgaṅgamakam anyasya tad ātma tvāt yatas ca pratītiḥ avyabhicāriṇī sādhyasya tat niyamena tatas utpannam tat niyatam tattva svabhāvam vā na anyayā avyabhicāra gati sambhavaḥ ati prasaṅgāt na ca sarvu atas pratipattiḥ sarvu asya upajāyate kādācid katayā upalabdheḥ tasmāt iyampratipattiḥ niyamena pratibaddha padārtha janitā prativandhaḥ ca dvividhaḥ eva eka sāmagrayadhīnasya api tad utpatti lakṣaṇam eva pāramparyeṇa pratibandhaḥ tatas eva avyabhicāraḥ yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,122–2.1.2.3.1,123	 sva nimittam svabhāvam vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ yat ca rūpantayoḥ dṛṣṭanta devānyatra lakṣaṇam yasya ca kārya svabhāva hetoḥ lakṣaṇam yat dṛṣṭam anyatra api tat eva na ca tad putra ādeḥ tat asti na tena sarvu atra anāśvāsaḥ lakṣaṇa yukte hi bādhā sambhave tad lakṣaṇam eva dūṣitam syāt iti sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ na anyathā iti nyāyaḥ na ca nimittam abhāvam vā vinā kasyacid sambhavaḥ tathā śaṅkāyām avyavahāraḥ eva sarvu atra syāt vyāvahārika pramāṇa prastāvaḥ ca eṣa na anyaḥ tasmāt samvyavahāra arthinā niyamena anumāna arthinā bhāvyam anupāye kathampravṛttiḥ iti ced na asiddha tvāt upāya tvasya vicāryamāṇe viśīryate iti ced na vicārasya api anumāna ātmaka tvāt soyam yathā gacchataḥ saḥ eva vismṛtaḥ panthāḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,124–2.1.2.3.1,129	 anupalabdheḥ tarhi kaḥ pratibandhaḥ saḥ eva tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti darśayati tathā hi svabhāve sva nimitte vā dṛśya darśana hetuṣu anyeṣu satsu adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham yatas eva asau tatra pratibaddhaḥ ataeva tad abhāvāt na bhavati anyathā anyasya abhāve kim iti na bhavet atiprasaṅgaḥ evam sati syāt evam hi asau pratibaddhau yadi tad abhāvena bhavet anyathā pratibandha abhāvāt tasmāt yatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā anupalambhaḥ tatra tayoḥ abhāvaḥ yatra ca tayoḥ abhāvaḥ na tatra kārya vyāpyayoḥ sambhavaḥ iti anupalabdheḥ api avyabhicāraḥ evaṅ kārya svābhāva anupalambha lakṣaṇam trividham api anumānam asti iti sādhitam yasmāt aprāmāṇye ca sāmānya buddheḥ tat lopaḥ āgataḥ pretyabhāva vada akṣaiḥ ced paryāyeṇa pratīyate tat ca na indriya śakta yādau= akṣa buddheḥ asambhavāt abhāva pratipattau syāt buddhi janma animittakam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,130	 yadi hi sāmānya buddheḥ apramāṇa tā tadā parokṣat nāma prameyat na asti iti prāptam para loka vat eva atha na sarvaḥ parokṣa arthaḥ na asti paryāyeṇa akṣaiḥ pratīteḥ para loke tu na paryāyeṇa akṣa vṛttiḥ iti tathāvidhaḥ eva na asti yadā eva tarhi pratīyate tadā eva asti prāk asti iti kutas prāk api anyena pratīyate tena asti para loka upi prāk anyena na pratīyate svayam va iti kutas para loka ādeḥ anyā upi vā anyena pratīyate iti kutas tathā vyavahārāt iti ced āyātam anumānasya prāmāṇyam na ca akṣe yogyatāyām vā paryāyeṇa akṣa vṛttiḥ kārya svabhāva hetu bhāva anumānena eva tayoḥ avagamāt tad abhāve ca buddheḥ janma ca padārtha nāma nimittakam eva bhavet tasmāt kārya darśanena kārya vyatirekeṇa ca yogyatā cakṣuḥ ādi kañcā anumīyamānam asti eva na ca paryāyeṇa tatra akṣa vyāpāra avatāraḥ tatas para loka ādikam api evam eva tasmāt sāmānyam anumānam antareṇa na pratīyate yasmāt 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,132–2.1.2.3.1,135	 sva lakṣaṇe ca pratyakṣam avikalpa tayā vinā vikalpena na sāmānya grahaḥ tasmin= tatas anumā sāmānya avadhāraṇa rūpāḥ api pratipattayaḥ vyavahāra kāriṇyaḥ na ca sāmānyam avikalpya gṛhyate na ca sa vikalpa kamprati akṣama vicāraka tvāt tasmāt sāmānya viṣayam anumānan na pratyakṣam yat tarhi iṃda m anitya ādibhiḥ ākāraiḥ varṇṇa ādi gṛhyeta etat katham sāmānya rūpa grahaṇam etat prameya niyamaḥ ca bhavatā iṣyate prameya niyame varṇṇa anitya tā na pratīyate pramāṇam anyat tad buddhiḥ vinā liṅgena sambhavāt 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,136	 niyamaḥ hi nāma prameyasya sva lakṣaṇasya sāmānyasya ca pratiniyata pramāṇa grāhya tā miśra pratipattiḥ ca iyam varṇṇa ādi anityam iti sva sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ paraspara miśra tayā pratipatteḥ tatas ubhaya rūpa pratipattiḥ anyat pramāṇam prasaktam liṅgena ca vinā sambhavāt anumānam etat na bhavati sāmānyasya ca grahaṇāt na pratyakṣam sva lakṣaṇasya ca na anumānam iti tad pramāṇa antaramvinā liṅge na vṛtteḥ sāmānyasya ca pratibhāsāt viśeṣa dṛṣṭe ca anumānena sāmānya gatiḥ liṅgasya sāmānyena sambandhasya apratīteḥ tat āha 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,137–2.1.2.3.1,140	 viśeṣa dṛṣṭe liṅgasya sambandhasya apratītitaḥ tad pramāṇa antaram meya bahu tvāt bahu tā api vā pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtteḥ ekatra vā yathā viśeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ eka tri saṅkhyā apohaḥ na vā bhavet viṣayān iyamāt anya prameyasya ca sambhavāt anityam idam varṇṇa ādi iti na khalu kiñcana atra liṅgam asti na ca tat pratyakṣam sāmānyasya api anitya tvasya pratīteḥ viśeṣa dṛṣṭe ca viśeṣasya eva pratītiḥ tasya viśeṣasya liṅgasya sāmānyena sambandha apratipatteḥ tena tat tvad matena pramāṇa antaram na sākṣāt pratītiḥ iti na pratyakṣan na sāmānya viṣayam iti na anumānam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,141	 kiñca sāmānya viśeṣa ubhaya bhedena prameya bahu tvāt pramāṇa bahu tvam iti na tri saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ anekasya apramāṇasya ekatra vṛtteḥ na eka saṅkhyā apohaḥ yathā viśeṣa dṛṣṭena saha pratyakṣasya vṛttiḥ ekatra sva lakṣaṇe tathā sāmānyepi pratyakṣasya iti yat uktam eka saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ prameya dvaya darśanāt iti sa na bhavet pratyakṣasya eva sāmānyepi vṛtti sambhavāt viṣaya niyame prameya antara abhāve ca tri eka saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ na ca uktena nyāyena ubhayam api iti na abhimata prayojana siddhiḥ pramāṇa samplavāt prameya bahu tvāt ca pramāṇa bahu tvam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,142–2.1.2.3.1,143	 nanu śakti aśaktitaḥ ityādinā prameya bahu tvat nivāritam eva tat kathantasya upanyāsaḥ sattyam etat api dṛśyate iti upadarśyete viruddha avyabhicāri upadarśanam vā pareṇa kṛtam iti adoṣaḥ pramāṇa samplava upadarśanantu yuktam eva tasmāt sarvvaḥ parokṣa ūrthaḥ viśeṣeṇa na gamyate iti etasya api asiddhim udbhāvayati tasmāt na tri eka saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ atra ucyate yojanāt varṇṇa sāmānye na ayan doṣaḥ prasajyate 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,144–2.1.2.3.1,146	 varṇṇa tvam sāmānyam anitya tvena yojayati anityam varṇṇā ādi iti tena sāmānyaka rūpam eva prameyam na ubhaya rūpam iti na doṣoyambiṣayā aniyamāt anya prameyasya ca sambhavāt iti sāmānya viśeṣa bhāve hi syāt ayan doṣaḥ na sāmānya eka bhāve yadi anitya tvam varṇṇa tvena sāmānyena eva yojayati tat vastu dharmmaḥ na syāt yatra hi yaḥ dharmmaḥ yuktaḥ pratīyate tasya eva asau dharmaḥ sāmānya yukta tve ca sāmānyasya tad rūpam na vastunaḥ sāmānyasya ca vastu tvāt tad dharmaḥ avastu dharmaḥ eva syāt na etat asti yatas na avastu rūpantasya eva tathā siddheḥ prasādhanāt anyatra na anya siddhiḥ ced na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,147	 yadi vastu dharmaḥ na bhavati avastuta tvena kalpita tvāt sāmānyasya tat api vastunā nitya tva ādi kambhavet ubhayam api vastu rūpat = a iti ced na vastunaḥ eva tathā prasiddheḥ yohi vikalpe pratibhāti varṇṇa tva anitya tva ādikaḥ sa sva lakṣaṇa ipi vidyate eva sva lakṣaṇa anubhavāt eva tad rūpa vikalpa utpatteḥ yadi vikalpaḥ sva lakṣaṇena na pratibaddhaḥ tatra sva lakṣaṇasya apratibhāsanāt tat kathantasya eva tathā prasiddhiḥ na pāramparyeṇa sambandhāt sākṣāt apratibandhepi pāramparyeṇa pratibandhaḥ iti tasya avikalpasya avisamvādi tā 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,148–2.1.2.3.1,151	 nanu vāsanā pratibandha tve katham vastu pratibaddha tā tad vāsanāyāḥ vastu pratibandhāt katham ityāt yaḥ hi bhāvaḥ yathābhūtassa tādṛś liṅga cetasoḥ hetuḥ tad jā tathābhūte tasmāt vastu niliṅga dhīḥ yaḥ hi sādhya dharmaḥ sa sādhanasya hetuḥ vyāpakaḥ vā bhavet iti pratipāditaṅ kārya vyāpya cetasaḥ kāraṇam vyāpakaḥ ca hetuḥ tata upi ced sā yā utpannā liṅgadhī sā pāramparyeṃṇa vastu pratibaddha tā tatas liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ evampā āramparyeṇa vastuni pratibandhāt tad ābhāsa śūnyayoḥ api avañcanam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,152	 na vastu prāptiḥ pratibhāsāt eva adhyavasāyāt api vastu prāpteḥ sambhavāt pravarttamānaḥ hi prāpnoti pratibhāsa mātrāt pravarttanañcā adhyavasāyāt api dṛṣṭam anyathā pratibhāsāt api na pravattate adhyavasāyena pravarttitaḥ prathamam abhyāsāt paścāt pratibhāsāt pravarttetum kṣamaḥ taramāt pravṛttā = astitve prāptiḥ yathā ca pratibhāsamānasya astitā tathā pratibhāsamāna kāraṇa vyāpakasya api iti ubhayatra api prāptiḥ astu na ca kvacid pratibhāsinaḥ prāptiḥ iti prāk eva idam pratyapādi yathā ca pratibhāsanāt asti iti jñāyate tathā pratibaddha pratibhāsanāt api 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,153–2.1.2.3.1,155	 yadi ca prāpti viṣayaḥ na asti iti matiḥ pratibhāsa mātram eva jagat syāt bhrānta abhra anta vivekān avadhāraṇāt na hi pratibhāsa mātre bhrānteḥ avivekaḥ tasmāt parokṣa gatau bhrānta abhra anta vyavasthā na anyathā iti niścayaḥ liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ evam pāramparyeṇa vastuni pratibandhāt tad ābhāsa śūnyayoḥ api avañcanam tad rūpa adhyavasāyāt ca tayoḥ tad rūpa śūnyayoḥ tad rūpā vañcaka tvepi kṛtā bhrānti vyavasthitiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,156	 atra kecid āhar liṅga buddhiḥ liṅgi pratibaddha tayā dhūma ādeḥ buddhiḥ na hi liṅgam indriya vat sattā mātreṇa gamakam na api sva ālambana vijñāna pratibhāsana mātreṇa adṛṣṭantat rūpantad sambandhasya api pratipatti prasaṅgāt tasmāt pratibaddha tayā grahaṇam liṅga grahaṇam sa ca pratibandhaḥ na ubhaya rūpa saṃsparśam antareṇa grahītum śakyaḥ anyathā grahaṇasya adarśanāt tatra yathā liṅga grahaṇam liṅga viṣayan tathā liṅga grahaṇam api kevalam prādhānya itara tā liṅga grahaṇe hi liṅgampradhāna tayā liṅga grahaṇe liṅgī pradhāna tayā pratīyate tena yat uktaṃliṅginaḥ tu na mātrā anumānantasya ca avisamvādena bhrāntate prastute tad koliṅga gateḥ avasaraḥ yena tasyāḥ api vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ atha sā api anumāna ātmikā tathā sati liṅgi pratipattiḥ eva iti na pṛthak nirdeśaḥ pratyakṣa rūpā api liṅga pratipattiḥ nna sā liṅga ābhāsa śūnyā liṅgī ābhāsa śūnya tve ca sati api na bhrānta tā tad aviṣaya tvāt na hi stambha vijñānam kumbhakāra śūnya tayā bhrāntam iti tad nirā kṛtam eki viṣaya tvāt liṅga liṅgi dhiyorepratyakṣa tvāt ca atra ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,157–2.1.2.3.1,160^1	 pratibaddha tayā liṅga grahaṇam yadi liṅga dhīḥ pratibandha grahaḥ sāmya dharmayoḥ anumānataḥ tathā sati anavasthā syāt tatra api pratibandha vid anumāna antarāt eva tatra api ca tad antarāt atha pratyakṣataḥ liṅgam liṅga tvena pratīyate evam sati tad ābhāsa śūnyatā asya katham bhavet gṛhītā upi pratyakṣeṇa tadā smaryate liṅga tvena dhūma ādikaḥ evam sati smaraṇam apramāṇam eva kim asya avañcaka tva pratipādanena na hi tat tatra pramāṇam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ eva pramāṇa tvena avisamvāda saṅga gamaḥ atha smaraṇam api pāramparyeṇa pratibandhāt pramāṇam eva 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,157–2.1.2.3.1,160^2	 tat eva tarhi liṅgi jñānam anumānañca iti kim liṅga liṅginoḥ bhedena nirdeśaḥ atha tad apramāṇam eva gṛhīta grahaṇāt iti ucyate tathā sati pratyakṣa vṛttam pratyakṣam eva tatra pramāṇam tat ca tad ābhāsa śūnyan na bhavati iti virodhaḥ tasmāt anyathā upapattyā vyākhyāyate liṅga dhīḥ svabhāva hetoḥ jātā liṅgi dhīrā iva liṅga liṅginoḥ paramārthataḥ bheda abhāvāt liṅgi dhīḥ kārya hetoḥ kāraṇa viṣayāḥ tatra bhedāt asau na liṅga dhīḥ na ca atyanta abhyāsāt asmāt dhamāt agni dhīḥ sva lakṣaṇa grāhiṇyā dhūma dhiyaḥ na udeti 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,161–2.1.2.3.1,162	 dhūmasya ca tattvena grahaṇam eva pratibaddha tā tat tvañca pratyabhijñānāt pratyabhijñānañca tad rūpa darśanāt anumānam eva tad rūpa darśanañca pratyakṣam atyanta abhyāsāt vyavahāra kāraṇam iti na anavasthā tasmāt sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇam eva liṅga pratipattiḥ yat tu agni pratibaddha dhūmasya tad sāmānya grahaṇantad rūpa darśanāt udayam āsādayat anumānam eva liṅgi pratipatti rūpam iti na anyathā vyapadeśaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.1,163–2.1.2.3.1,164	 tasmāt vastuni boddhavye vyāpakam vyāpya cetasaḥ nimittantad svabhāvaḥ vā kāraṇantat ca tat dhiyaḥ dvividham hi sādhyam vastu tad pratiṣedhaḥ ca vastuni sādhye vyāpakam sādhyam yatas tad vyāpakam vyāpya cetasaḥ nimittam tat ca vyāpyasya liṅgasya svabhāvaḥ kāraṇam vā tat ca vyāpaka cetasaḥ nimittam iti parāmparyeṇa pratibandha sambhavāt pramāṇam anupalabdheḥ katham pratibandhaḥ iti darśayati 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,1–2.1.2.3.2,2	 pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarvu atra sādhyate anupalambhataḥ siddhimpramāṇauḥ vadatām arthāt eva viparyayāt yatra nāma kvacid pratiṣedha sādhanan tatra sarvu atra anupalambhataḥ eva yatra vastu sādhanāya pramāṇam pravarttate tatra vastu eva sidhyati na tasya pratiṣedhaḥ atas viparyayāt eva pratiṣedha siddhiḥ tathā hi yukta upalambham anupalabhamānā asti iti āhuḥ anupalambhaḥ eva hi pratiṣedhaḥ iti tanmātra anubandhi tvāt tā dāmyam eva pratibandhaḥ iti 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,3–2.1.2.3.2,5	 nanu virodhopi nāma sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā pratibandhaḥ eva tata upi vastu pratiṣedha siddhiḥ upalabhyate yathā na asti śīta sparśaḥ agneḥ na asya romaharṣa ādi viśeṣaḥ sannihita dahana viśeṣa tvāt iti tat katham sādhyate anupalambhataḥ tatra parihāraḥ asti etat kintu dṛṣṭā viruddha dharma uktiḥ tasya tad kāraṇasya vā niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇa tva sūcanā 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,6	 viruddhopi padārthaḥ tad abhāvaṅgamayati na virodha sambandhāt eva nahi virodhī pramātum iṣṭaḥ asat rūpa tayā iṣṭaḥ iti ced asattvena eva tarhi pratibandhaḥ sampradhāryom na ca tena saha virodhaḥ yatra asau tatra asat tvam bhavati iti ced kutas etat evam eva prāk dṛṣṭa tvāt iti ced tad asattvam virodha grahaṇa kāle kim upalambhe vastunaḥ cetarathāḥ yadi upalambhaḥ katham abhāvaḥ atha anupalambhaḥ tat idam āyātam anupalambhāt eva pratiṣedhaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,7–2.1.2.3.2,10	 anyathā ekasya bhāvasya sadbhāva uktyā parasya tat nāstitvaṅkena gamyeta virodhāt ced asau= api siddhaḥ kena saha sthānāt iti ced tat kutas matam dṛśyasya darśana abhāvāt iti ced sā apramāṇa tā ekasya hi sadbhāve yadi paraḥ na bhavet sarvasya bhāve parasya pratiṣedhaḥ bhavet virodhopi saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ vinā anupalabghyāḥ na pratīyate yadi evam virodhaḥ anupalabdhyā pratīyate tatas virodhinaḥ liṅgat abhāva gatiḥ na anupalabdheḥ atha virodha sādhikā nupalabdhiḥ prāk āsīt tad anusaraṇāt eva viroghinā upi liṅgada bhāva gatiḥ iti sā eva paramārthataḥ abhāvasya sādhanī yadi evam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,11–2.1.2.3.2,13	 pratibandha prasiddhi artham upayogī yaḥ īkṣitaḥ sādhya siddhiḥ tatas ced syāt anumānaṅkatham pramā pratyakṣeṇa hi sambandhaḥ anumānasya prasiddhi bhāj tatas eva hi sādhyasya siddhiḥ iti apramā anumā na yatas eva hi pratyakṣāt anumānasya sambandha grahaṇantataḥ eva sādhyasya agneḥ siddhiḥ iti katham anumānam aparampramāṇam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,14–2.1.2.3.2,15	 atha parokṣe agnai na pratyakṣampravṛttam iti tatra anumānam parokṣepi khalvabhāve kim anupalabdhiḥ pravṛttā yā api pravṛttā sā na upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ atha smaryamāṇa upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ tat api asya durnītam smaryamāṇam yata udhyakṣam anumānepi na asti na adhyakṣasya eva tatra api prāmāṇyam anumā vṛtha 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,16–2.1.2.3.2,19	 tasmāt idam atra artha sat tattvam abhāvena hi śītasya bahneḥ prāk upalaṃbdhi bhāj sambandhaḥ tena tad siddhyā tad abhāvaḥ prasidhyati sa ca abhāvaḥ anupalabdhiḥ eva tena anupalabdhiḥ eva anumāna siddhā sādhayati abhāva vyavahāram yathā pratyakṣa siddhāḥ yatas vakṣyati tasmāt anupalambhoyam svayam pratyakṣataḥ gataḥ iti 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,20	 atra api anumānataḥ gataḥ iti avagantavyam yadā tu romaharṣa abhāvaḥ sādhyate tadā agninā śīta anupalabdhiḥ tayā kāraṇa anupalabdhyā roma harṣa abhāvaḥ tatra agniḥ upeṇa sparśasya uṣṇa ātmanaḥ eka sāmagrī adhīnatayā anumānam sa ca śīta bhāva svabhāvaḥ tasya anumāna upalabdhiḥ eva śīta anupalabdhiḥ tena kārya hetu kāraṇa anupalabdhyoḥ ekatra pravṛtta tvāt na virodhi liṅgantaram tasmāt anupalabdhiḥ eva anumāna siddhā abhāvaṅgamayati tena anumita anumānam etat 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,21	 yadi evam anumānena pratyakṣam prasādhyate tena ca vastu bhāvaḥ iti na vastu viṣayamprāmāṇi ambhavedanumānasya tat api yat kiñcadeva yatas pratyakṣam upalambha rūpam eva upalambhaḥ sattā ca ucyate iti tena vastu viṣayam anumānam anupalambhaḥ eva asattā iti ced bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ agninā abhāvaḥ sādhyate na anupalambhena iti mahān doṣaḥ nanu agniḥ eva śīta abhāvaḥ iti saḥ eva tena eva ca sādhyate yāvān eva deśaḥ uṣṇa tayā vyāpyate tāvatī eva śīta abhāvaḥ iti na uṣṇa sparśa vyatirekī śīta abhāvaḥ svabhāva hetuḥ ayam iti ced iṣyate eva anupalabdheḥ svabhāva hetu tā tena na asti atra sīta sparśaḥ agneḥ iti kārya svabhāva hetū nirddeśyete 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,22–2.1.2.3.2,23	 tasmāt sva śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhikāḥ yasyāḥ pramāṇam sā avācyaḥ niṣedha rutena sarvu athā virodhinaḥ hi vahnayādeḥ yaḥ sva śabdaḥ tena uktā api pratipāditā api sā eva anupalabdhiḥ anya bhāva lakṣaṇā sā eva anupalabdhiḥ abhāvasya sādhikā yasya sā na pramāṇantena virodhi sadbhāvena avācyaḥ niṣedhaḥ na khalu niṣedhasya anyā gatiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,24–2.1.2.3.2,26	 etena tad viruddha artha kārya uktiḥ upavarśiṇa tā prayogaḥ kevalam bhinnaḥ sarvatra arthaḥ na bhidyate pratiṣedhya śīta ādi viruddhasya agni ādeḥ arthasya yat kāryantatrā api anumita anumānena anupalabdhiḥ eva sādhitā abhāvaṅgamayati vyavahārataḥ tathā hi dhūmāt agniḥ kārya bhūtāt prasiddhaḥ śīta abhāvam sādhayet pūrvva yuktyā 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,27–2.1.2.3.2,30	 śīta abhāvaḥ hi anyathā na eva sidadhyeta pāramparyāt eva tatra api abhāvaḥ dhūmāt agniḥ agneḥ śīta abhāva rūpāt upalabdhi viparyayāt śīta abhāva vyavahāraḥ iti tasmāt prayoga vacana vinyāsa mātram eva vidyate viruddhantat ca sa upāyam avidhāya apidhāya ca pramāṇa uktiḥ niṣedhe yā na sā nyāya anusāriṇī ukti ādeḥ sarvu avid prebhau= ādi pratiṣedha vat atīndriyāṇām arthānām virodhasya aprasiddhitaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,31	 na khalu vacanam sarvu avedana viruddham na khalu atīta indriyeṇa saṃha virodha siddhiḥ samvedanāt eva vacanam pravarttate kathantada bhāvam sādhayet sarvvavedanena viruddham iti ced kena virodha grahaṇam yadi hi vedanā utkarṣa anvaye apacayaḥ dṛśyate vacasvi tā yāḥ sarvvam śobheta sarvu avedane sakala vacasvi tā abhāvaḥ eva na ca etat vaktāraḥ asarvvavedinaḥ upalabdhāḥ iti ced vaktāraḥ mūrkhāḥ upalabdhāḥ iti kin na sarvu asya mūrkha tā vaktuḥ pāṇḍityam upalabhyate iti ced tat api na upalapsyate iti kutas tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,32–2.1.2.3.2,33	 bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ kaḥ syātām yat yukti samvidau tādṛśaḥ anupalabdheḥ ced ucyatām sā eva sādhanam yathā hi mūrkhasya vacanantat abhāvepi pāṇḍitya samaye viśeṣam vacanan tathā yadi savva vedana avasthāyām api kaḥ virodhaḥ na hi sarvu amvedanā utkarṣa virodhi vacanam atyanta utkarṣe viroghya iva iti ced na virodhasya agrahaṇāt tādṛśasya vaktuḥ anupalambhaḥ eva iti na uttaram anupalambhasya draśya viṣaya tvena gamaka tvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,34–2.1.2.3.2,37	 aniścaya karam proktam īdṛkkvān upalambhanam tatra atyanta parokṣeṣu sat asat tā viniścayau atyanta parokṣasya hi sarvu avid pretya bhāva ādeḥ anupalambha mātrāt abhāva niścayāt atha api syāt sarvvavedane sati abhra antasya kutas vacana sambhavaḥ vivakṣā hi pūrvvāpara parāmarśataḥ bhrānta upajāyamānā pravarttayati vacāṃsi na etat api samyak spaṣṭam sarvu apadārthānām vedanepi pravarttate vivakṣā abhyāsataḥ tatra vacasaḥ asambhavaḥ kutas 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,38	 na khalu bhāvanā bala avalambi spaṣṭatara parimita itara padārtha darśana sama kāla abhyāsataḥ vivakṣā na bhavati vivakṣā abhāvepi pūrvva āvedhataḥ vacanam na hi vacanānām sannihitā eva vivakṣā kāraṇam pūrvva āvedha tonya manasā upi pada vākya vivikta pāṭha darśanāt aneka pūrvva abhyasta kriyā prakrama darśanāt ca anena pūrvva apara paryālocanam antareṇa api sannihita pratipattṛ prativacan aṅkatham iti pratyuktam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,39–2.1.2.3.2,42	 śatru sannidhi mātreṇa pravarttante avikalpataḥ prage ca tad nirākāri prakriyāḥ kāya nirmitāḥ yathā ca pūrvva abhyāsataḥ jhaṭiti prabodhitasya ariṇā prahāra ādi dānena anurūpaḥ eva prakramaḥ śastra uddharaṇa ādikaḥ tathā sarvu avedinopi sakalāḥ kriyāḥ iti aviruddham tasmāt viruddhāt eva abhāva niścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ bhinnā abhinnopi vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prasajyate yathā agniḥ ahime sādhye sattā vā janma bādhanī 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,43–2.1.2.3.2,46	 śīta uṣṇa sparśayoḥ parasparambhedāt saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ sattā janmanoḥ ca paraspara parihāra lakṣaṇaḥ iti abhedaḥ na khalu janma sattā vyatirekeṇa virodhaḥ ca na hi sat eva jāyate sataḥ hi sarvu aniḥ āśaṃsasya kaḥ janma arthaḥ katham avyatiriktayoḥ parasparam virodhaḥ pareṇa avyatirekeṇa abhyupagamāt evam ucyate nanu koyamvirodhaḥ nāma nivarttya nivarttaka bhāvaḥ tathā hi avikala kāraṇam ekam yat apara bhāve yadā bhavet na bhavet bhavati virodhassa tayoḥ śīta hutāśa ātmanoḥ dṛṣṭaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,47	 nanu yadi anyasya abhāvaḥ anyena kriyate tat ayuktam abhāvasya kāryatva abhāvāt atha na kriyate tadā svayam eva vinaśyataḥ kaḥ pareṇa virodhaḥ na ca kṣaṇasya vināśaḥ anyena kriyate utpannān utpanna avasthayoḥ ayogāt anutpannam asat kasya virodhaḥ vināśaḥ vā utpannam sva kāle vināśayitum aśakyam kṣaṇasya avikārya tvāt anya kāle tu eva na asti kasya vināśaḥ santateḥ vināśaḥ iti ced na tad vyatirekeṇa santati abhāvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,48–2.1.2.3.2,50	 nanu santateḥ saḥ evam vināśaḥ yaḥ uttarakṣaṇa prabandha vighātaḥ tat api asat yadi kāraṇa sadbhāvaḥ katham vyāghāta kṛt paraḥ atha kāraṇa sadbhāvaḥ katham vyaghāta kṛt paraḥ yadi uttara kṣaṇa utpattau kāraṇam asti katham vyāghātaḥ atha na kāraṇandā eva raktāḥ kiṃśukāḥ atha kāraṇa vaikalyam eva virodhinā kriyate tat api asat yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,51–2.1.2.3.2,54	 asataḥ yadi vaikalyaṅ kiṃśuke daiva rakta tā sataḥ ca svena rūpeṇa vaikalyaṅ kim kariṣyati yadi tatra asti avaikalya kāraṇantadasat katham atha avaikalya kṛt na asti vikalaḥ svayam eva saḥ kāraṇasya api hi vaikalyam avaikalya kāraṇa sadbhāve na śakti abhāve tad kāraṇasya svayam eba bhavati vaikalī antatra kimvirodhī kariṣyati atra parihāraḥ śītāt śīta antara utpattiḥ anagni sahakāriṇaḥ sahakāriṇam āsādya tad aśītasya kāraṇam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,55	 sannidedhīyamāna dahana sahakārī mandataratamādi śīta sparśa janakaḥ hi pūrvakaḥ śīta sparśaḥ yāvat śīta antaram śīta sparśasya ajana kambhavati tasya svayam eva nivṛtteḥ aparasya ca kāraṇa abhāvena anutpattiḥ iti sahakāri tvena viguṇa śīta kāraṇa jananena nivarttakaḥ vahniḥ śītasya iti vyapadiśyate tad kṛtā tasya vikala kāraṇa utpattiḥ iti tatas anutpattiḥ eva tasya prāgabhāva lakṣaṇā nivṛttiḥ iti vyapadiśyate utpattau hi kāraṇāni vyāpriyante na nivṛttau athavā śītasya sva hetu niyataḥ sa svabhāvaḥ yena agni sannidhāne śītakṣaṇa antaram sva kāryat na utpādayati pratiniyatāḥ hi bhāvānām śaktayaḥ ekatra sannidhānam viruddhayoḥ katham iti ced evam eva virodhaḥ anyathā ayogāt na ca kṣaṇayoḥ virodha upi tu prabandhayoḥ dṛśyate ca evam uṣṇam anubhavatā upi na adya api śītam apaiti iti samvedanam tathā na su aṣṭa andhakāram apaiti iti ati parisphuṭa āloka sambhave tasmin= eva kṣaṇe apaiti iti ced na tatra api tad kāraṇa sahitasya andhakāra antara janana sāmarthyāt ālokaḥ eva utpattimān na andhakāraḥ saḥ eva naṣṭaḥ iti ced na tasya sva rūpeṇa utpanna tvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,56–2.1.2.3.2,58	 yena svabhāvena utpattiḥ na te na eva vinaśyati yena api tasya anutpattiḥ tathā api na vinaśyati tasmāt na saḥ eva vinaṣṭaḥ nanu adarśanam eva vināśaḥ saḥ eva ca vināśa avasthāyāma pratīteḥ katham saḥ iti pratītiḥ yadā pratīyate na tadā vinaṣṭaḥ yadā api vinaṣṭaḥ tadā api na pratīyate tena eva asau vinaṣṭaḥ yena na praṃtīyate anyathā pratīyamāne kaḥ vināśa arthaḥ yadi na upalabhyamānaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ na pradeśaḥ ghaṭopalabdhiḥ iti sā upi naṣṭaḥ bhavet prāk dṛṣṭaḥ na upalabhyate yaḥ sa vinaṣṭaḥ iti ced sā upi prāk dṛṣṭaḥ eva yatra dṛṣṭaḥ tatra tadā eva na upalabhyamānaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ tadā eva upalabhyate tadā eva na upalabhyate iti vyāhatam kāla antare na upalabhyate anantaraḥ iti ced deśa antare anantare anupalabhyamānaḥ kathat na naṣṭaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,59–2.1.2.3.2,62	 kāla antarena naṣṭaḥ ced naṣṭaḥ deśa antare na kim na ced deśa antara vyāptiḥ nanu kāla antarasya kim yadi deśa antara vyāpī na sambhavati eva kaścid tena saḥ eva na naṣṭaḥ kāla antara vyāpi api na eva sambhavapti katham sā upi naṣṭaḥ nanu deśa antare anupalabhyamānepi deśa antaraḥ upalabhyamānaḥ katham vinaṣṭaḥ deśa antara vat eva tarhi kāla antara īpi upalabhyamānaḥ katham vinaṣṭaḥ kāla antare anupalabdhiḥ iti ced samānam etat ubhayatra api tasmāt yaḥ yathā dṛśyate bhāvaḥ sa tathā eva anyathā na hi nīlat nīlatayā dṛṣṭan na sitattvena vidyate 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,63	 tasmāt na saḥ eva vinaṣṭaḥ api tu paraḥ na utpannaḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt tad anupalabdhau sa naṣṭaḥ iti abhimāna mātrakam tena evambhūte viṣaye saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇa virodha vyavasthā paramārthataḥ kāraṇa bhāva viśeṣaḥ eva virodhaḥ paraspara parihāra sthita lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ evam eva yaḥ kṣaṇikañjanayati sa nitya svabhāvan janayitum asamarthaḥ tena nitya tvasya anutpattiḥ eva yathā ca anitya tvam api tad nitya tvena tathā nīla tvāt ayopi parasparam iti na anayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,64–2.1.2.3.2,65	 na anayoḥ paramārthataḥ parasparam virodhayoḥ vviśeṣaḥ tatas parasparam vilakṣaṇa tvam eva virodhaḥ kāraṇa vaśāt sa ca padārtha svarūpam eva anyathā svarūpa abhāvāt sā ca tayoḥ para sva rūpa vilakṣaṇa upalabdhiḥ anyā apekṣayā anupalabdhiḥ eva iti sarvvaḥ anupalambhataḥ eva abhāva vyavahāraḥ iti prayogaḥ kevalam bhinnaḥ sarvu atra arthaḥ na bhidyate 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,66–2.1.2.3.2,67	 iti yuktam uktam atīndriyāṇāñca na ayam virodhaḥ iti na abhau= asādhikā viruddha upalabdhiḥ na api anupalabdhi mātram na upalabhyate iti etāvatā na asti iti na bhavati yasya hi darśanan jñeya sattām vyāpnoti saḥ evambruvāṇaḥ śobheta tadā api saḥ eva sarvvajñaḥ iti apratikṣepaḥ sarva vidaḥ na api para loka ādeḥ sarvu adarśinā na upalabhyate iti atra pramāṇa abhāvāt viparyaye ca pramāṇam uktam tasmāt yathā vastu eva vastūnām sādhane sādhanam matam tathā vastu eva vastūnām sva nivṛttau nivarttakam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,68	 yathā pratibandhataḥ vastu eva vastunaḥ sādhanam yathākathañcin na vastu vastunaḥ sādhakam apratibaddham eva tathā vastavā iva sva nivṛttau nivartakam vastunaḥ na hi pratibandham antareṇa vastu nivṛttau vastu aparat nivarttate yathā kāryaṅkaraṇam sādhayati vyāpakañca vyāpyantathā kāraṇa abhāvaḥ kāryasya abhāvam vyāpaka abhāvaḥ ca vyāpya abhāvasya iti anyathā saḥ eva pratibandhaḥ na syāt ayam api pratibandhasya bhāvaḥ yau= anvaya vyatirekau na anyaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,69–2.1.2.3.2,70	 etena kalpanā nyastaḥ yatra kvacana sambhavāt dharmaḥ pakṣa sapakṣa anyatara tva ādiḥ apa uditaḥ na hi pakṣāsa pakṣānyatara tvad nitya anityayoḥ ekatra api pratibaddham icchā kṛtaḥ hi pakṣaḥ tad anusāreṇa yaḥ sa pakṣaḥ sa upi tathā eva tatas icchā mātra pratibaddha tvāt na vastu gamayati na hi anya pratibaddha tvamanyaṅga mayati atiprasaṅgat na api vyāparttate kutaścid yena tad abhāvaṅga mayet tasya api pakṣa tvam icchā kṛtam asti eva tasmāt sa pakṣa anyatara tvam agamakam tathā avipakṣa tva ādi kañca 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,71–2.1.2.3.2,74	 tasmāt pratibandhāt eva vidhi niṣedha prasiddhiḥ tatra api vyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ nivṛtteḥ gamakaḥ mataḥ vyāpyasya sva nivṛttiḥ ced paricchinnā kathañcana nanu svabhāva anupalambhopi gamakaḥ eva na etat asti na tatra paramārthataḥ gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ eva asau yaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalambhaḥ tatas tena siddhena vyāpyasya abhāva sādhanam yat apramāṇa tā abhāve liṅgantasya eva kathyate tat atyanta vimūḍha artham āgopālam asamvṛteḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,75	 ayam eva abhāvaḥ svabhāva anupalambhaḥ nāma āgopāla aṅganā prasiddham etat sām khya stu śāstra dṛṣṭyā vyāmūḍhaḥ prabodhyate etāvat mātra nimitta koyam anyatra api abhāva vyavahāraḥ anyathā sukha ādīnām ātmanāñca na bheda siddhiḥ śāstrāt eva bheda siddhiḥ iti ced na prāmāṇika tvāt bhedasya śāstrasya api ca parasparat na bhedaḥ syāt paraspara vivikta upalabdhim antareṇa sā eva ca vivikta upalabdhiḥ anyasya anupalabdhiḥ vyakta avyaktayoḥ ca bhedaḥ na anupalabdhim antareṇa sidhyati 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,76–2.1.2.3.2,79	 etāvat niścaya phalam abhāve anupalambhanam tat ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśya tayā mate trividhaḥ eva anupalambha hetoḥ vyāpakasya svabhāvasya ca iti tasya ca hetu ādeḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalambhaḥ gamakaḥ na anyasya na anyathā tasmāt kārya svabhāva anupalabdhi janitam liṅga jñānam sādhya pratipādakam avisamvādi tatas tena vastu eva tathā asiddham iti na avastu dharmaḥ nanu anitya upamvarṇṇaḥ iti sva lakṣaṇa yojanā anitya tvasya tat katham yojanāt varṇṇa sāmānyaḥ ityādi na etat asti anumānāt anitya ādeḥ grahaṇeyaṅgamaḥ mataḥ prāmārāyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta grahaṇāt matam 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,80	 sva sāmānya lakṣaṇābhyām hi avyapadeśya varṇa tvābhyām varṇṇa ādi gṛhītvā anitya tayā ca anityam varṇṇā ādi iti manasā saṃdhatte yat uktam ācāryeṇa tatra ayaṅkramaḥ varṇitaḥ yojanāt varṇa sāmānyaḥ ityādinā anumānena varṇṇa tva sāmānye anitya tā pratipattau pramāṇa antaram tad sāmāndharmi kena pratipannam anumānena pratipattau aparaḥ tatra api dharmī iti anavasthā syāt yadā ca aliṅga jñānam pratyakṣa uttara kāla bhāvi tadā pramāṇa antaram eva sva lakṣaṇena yojanāt ubhayatra api parihāraḥ prāmāṇyam eva tatra na asti ubhayatra api pratyakṣatas eva siddha tvāt vikalpasya sāmānya grāhiṇaḥ gṛhīta grahaṇa tvāt katham anitya tvam pratyakṣa siddham yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,81–2.1.2.3.2,82	 na anyāsya anitya tā bhāvāt pūrvve siddhaḥ sa ca aindriyāt na aneka rūpaḥ vācyaḥ asau vācyaḥ dharmaḥ vikalpa jaḥ na khalu anityatā varṇṇa tva ādi ca anya bhāva svarūpāt abhāva svarūpam eva tat tādṛśam tat eva vikalpasya tad rūpa grahaṇa aśakteḥ sāmānya rūpam bhavati grahaṇa vyāpāraḥ eva na tu sāmānyantat na hi nīlam etat iti pratyakṣa pratibhāsamāna rūpāt aparam idat nīlam iti vikalpe pratibhāti tat eva tu tathā vyavahniyate atha yathābhūtantad nīlan tathā bhūtam etat iti sāmānyam pūrvva apara pratyayā bhyāmāgṛhītam eva gṛhyate tat api ayuktam na hi pūrvva apara rūpa vyatirekeṇa aparam sāmānyam upalabhyate tat eva tu tena vyavahriyamāṇam sāmānyam vyavahārasya ca tat eva sva lakṣaṇam āśrayaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,83–2.1.2.3.2,84	 nanu sāmānyānām anitya tva ādīnām parasparantadvataḥ ca bhedaḥ nānātvam atra ucyate na aneka rūpaḥ vācya ūsau sva lakṣaṇa ātmā vikalpa mātrasya anādi va āsanā sāmarthyāt bhedaḥ vikalpasya hi vyāvṛtti bhedāt anvaya vi atireka kalpanayā bheda adhyāra upavṛtta tvāt sāmānya āśrayam asiddhau sāmānyam siddham eva tat tad asiddhau tathā asya eva hi anumānasya siddhaye 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,85–2.1.2.3.2,87	 vyavahāra mātrakam hi sāmānya vyahāra viṣayasya ca prasiddhau vyavahāraḥ niyamena sāmānya adhika raṇyena anyathā vā prasidhyati vyavahāra aprasiddhau tu nimitta pradarśanena sa vyavahāraḥ vismṛta vyavahāra nimittasya nimitta tva smaraṇena smaraṇa viṣaya bhāvam upanīyate tasmāt anumānam vyavahāra mātrakam eva sādhayati na aparam nanu kārya hetoḥ anumānāt vastu eva asiddham agni ādikam sādhyate na vyavahāraḥ tat api asat tatra api hi anumānena yadi vastu prasādhyate sarvu ākāra prasiddhau syāt na tatra eva pramā antaram 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,88	 yadi anumānāt agni ādi vastu prasidhyati tadā tatra kīdṛśaḥ a gneḥ ayam iti avāntara bheda ji ghṛkṣāyām pramāṇa antaram adhyakṣa ādikat na pravarttate tasya prathama anumānataḥ eva sarvu ākāra prasiddheḥ prāk sambhavaḥ asambhavaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ ca iti kāraṇāt yogyāt kāryam utpattimat iti sambhavaḥ kāraṇa abhāve kārya anutpattiḥ iti asambhavaḥ pramāṇa virodhopi śītaḥ agneḥ iti tatra adhyakṣeṇa sarvvā akāra grahaṇam iti sambhavaḥ anumānena asambhavaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ ca iti pramāṇa antara pravṛtteḥ tat etat tamaḥ vijṛmbhitam yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,89–2.1.2.3.2,90	 asambhave virodhe ca vastunaḥ grahaṇaṅ kutas grahaṇe vastunaḥ prāptam dvayam etat ayuktimat yadi tad avyatirikta ākāra parityāgaḥ asambhavāt sarvu ākāra grahaṇasya pramāṇa antara pravṛtta virodhāt ca tadā vastu grahaṇam api na asti eva katham hi tad grahaṇe tad avyatirikta aparigrahaḥ na khalu tat eva gṛhītam agṛhī tañca yuktimat tathā jñānam api tat grahi tad agrāhi ca iti eṣā upya sambhavasya 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,91–2.1.2.3.2,96	 atha api syāt sarvu ākāra grahe hetuḥ na liṅgam vyabhicārataḥ sāmānya avyabhicāri tvāt viśeṣasya aprasiddhitaḥ liṅgam hi sakala vyakti sādhāraṇa tayā parigṛhītam anaikānti kamprati niyata vyaktau yadi evamaḥ viśeṣa grahaṇat na asti liṅga sāmarthya sambhavi anaikāntika tā hetoḥ iti vastu grahaḥ katham na jñāyate kotra vahniḥ iti vahni mātram eva pratīyate kopyatra vahniḥ iti pūrvva aneka vahni darśana anusāreṇa pratītiḥ eva iyaṅ kevalāḥ na vastu saṃsparśaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vastu saṃsparśe kimbheda sandehaḥ sambhavī 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,97–2.1.2.3.2,99	 nanu sandehe kathamprāptiḥ prāptiḥ api sandeha anurūpā eva kadācid kasyacid agne prāpteḥ tena kārya hetau= api vyavahāraḥ eva kevalan na vastu sādhanam nanu svabhāva hetau vastu dṛṣṭam iti prāpyate kārya hetau tu katham adṛṣṭasya prāptiḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti eva arthasya prāptiḥ astitvataḥ sadā tasya vastu nivṛttiḥ tu bhrānteḥ api tad arthinām 
PVA_2.1.2.3.2,100	 na khalu keśa ādiṣu darśanam asti tathā api tarda artha tayā bhavati eva vṛttiḥ yatra asti tatra prāptiḥ anyatra na iti nirṇṇayaḥ na ca svabhāva hetau pratyakṣe kārya hetau ca vastu gṛhyate agṛhī tasya eva sarvu atra prāpteḥ bhāvi hi vastu prāpyam na ca svarupaṅ kathantasya grahaṇam bhāvi rūpeṇa eva gṛhyate iti ced na tathā apratīteḥ atha api bhāvi rūpeṇa pratīyate tathā api tat anyathāpratītam anyathā utpattimat na syāt sāmānyasya pratītiḥ iti ced sāmānyasya pratītau viśeṣasya kathamprāptiḥ sthita tvāt ced na hi sāmānyam viśeṣa vastu antareṇa bhavati dhūma ādikam eva tarhi liṅgam vastu antareṇa na bhavati iti tatas eva astitvam iti kim sāmānyena āsāmānya pratītim antareṇa kathampravarttate liṅga pratītau= eva pravarttiṣyate anye pratītau katham anyatra pravṛttiḥ sāmānyam api anyat eva iti samānaḥ doṣaḥ na ekāntena anyat sāmānyam yadi evam
