PVA_2.1.2.4.6,7	 nanu tasya anena saha ekatvam anadhyakṣa gamyam tena tu asya kathat na syāt na samāna tvāt dvayoḥ adhyakṣeṇa agrahaṇe kathantat eka tvam adhyakṣa viṣayaḥ eka tvam adhyakṣagamyan na padārthaḥ iti ced tad tarhi eka tvat na padārtha gatam eka tvasya svatantrasya asambhavāt tat vā an ākṣipyate ākṣepaḥ hi nāma anumānam tatas pratyakṣeṇa svatantrasya grahaṇe anumānataḥ anyathā grahaṇam iti ayuktam pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt anumānasya tasmāt pūrva apara parāmarśa abhāvāt ayaṅgauḥ iti na pratyakṣā pratītiḥ kiñci mṛtepi pūrva apara parāmarśaḥ sambhavī tat katham asya pramāṇatā tasmāt sannihita mātra grahaṇam iti pramāṇam tatra ca na yojana iti avikalpakam adhyakṣam kiñca 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,8–2.1.2.4.6,9	 anyatra gata citta upi cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate tad saṅketā grahaḥ tatra spaṣṭaḥ tad jā ca kalpanā na khalu vikalpayan= eva rūpa ādikam īkṣate yena smaraṇa sahakāritā bhavet indriyasya na hi yaḥ sahakārī yasya tam antareṇa sva kārya karaṇe sāmarthyantasya kṣiti ādi virahaḥ iva bījasya aṅkura karaṇe atha kārya karaṇa mātreṇa na sahakāritā smaraṇasya api tu sa vikalpaka janane tat api asamyak 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,10–2.1.2.4.6,13	 citra eka tva cintā vyatiriktena kalpena yadi tat sa vikalpakam siddha sādhanam anyatram viruddha adhyāsa sambhavaḥ yadi saha vikalpena pareṇa varttate iti sa vikalpa katāyān tathā bhūtāyām smaraṇam sahakāri siddham eva sādhyate atha ātma bhūtena vikalpena tadā na yuktam tasmin sati api yat na asti tad abhāvepi vidyate viruddha dharma saṃsargge tena tasya ekatā katham 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,14	 anyat eva tat sa vikalpakam anyat prāc avikalpakam iti tathā sati bhavataḥ pratyabhijñā viśīryate atiprasaṅgaḥ ca iti uktam tasmāt yat eka dā anyatra gata citta avasthāyām avikalpakam anyat api tat tathā eva iti yuktam atha anya vikalpena eva sa vikalpakam tathā asati śrotra vijñānena api sa vikalpa kamprāpnoti śrotrasya api sahakāri tvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,15–2.1.2.4.6,18	 atha pṛthak eva tāni jñānāni samānam anyatra api iti na viśeṣaḥ atha anyopi tad avasthasya asti vikalpaḥ tat asat anupalambhāt atha vyavahārāt anupalabhyamānam api sādhyate na hi avikalpayataḥ vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kārya kāraṇa tā siddhāḥ vyavahāra vikalpayoḥ kārya anumānam atra iti tad saṅketā grahaḥ katham na khalu anumānena śabda yojanā na pratītā bhavati tasya api prāmāṇyāt atha anena eva vyabhicāraḥ na pakṣeṇa vyabhicārāḥ bhāvāt anyathā dhūmāt agni anumānepi vyabhicāraḥ pakṣeṇa eva bhavet na tadā anumānena upalambhāt sparśa para vyavahārāt api pratīteḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,19–2.1.2.4.6,22	 parokṣaḥ sparśa vijñānāt śīta nud vyavahārataḥ pratīyate pāvaka ātmā tat api atyantadu ghaṭam yadi anumīyamāna vahni adarśanam āśaṅaka aviṣayaḥ kadācid idānīm eva dhūmaḥ vahnimbinā bhavet iti tatra sparśa vijñānena dhūma rūpa pratipatteḥ vitapana vyavahāreṇa vā vyabhicāra parihāraḥ tat api asat sparśa vid vyavahārābhyām anumānena tad gatau tasya api ca anumānasya avyabhicāraḥ anuma antarāt samāna tva anumiteḥ anavasthā tathā sati 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,23	 yadi anumāne vyabhicāra āśaṅkāyām anumānam eva avyabhicāra sādhanan tathā sati samānam eva anumānam iti tad lakṣaṇe sarvatra āśaṅkā bhavet iti tat idam asiddham asiddhena sādhyate iti na ca sparśena rūpasya sādhanam sparśasya pīta śaṅkha ajñāna viṣayepi sambhavāt yatra ca dhūmasya vyabhicāra śaṅkā tatra vahni pūrva kṛtānām vitapana ādi vyavahārāṇām sutarām eva tasmāt anumānena vikalpa sādhane yadi pakṣeṇa eva vyabhicāraḥ sarvatra anumāne syāt iti na iyam sadhvī kalpanā tat asat 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,24–2.1.2.4.6,25	 paraḥ vastu balāt dhūmāt anumānam pravarttate tat ca dṛṣṭa avisamvādan na tathā kalpa sādhanam agni anumānam hi parokṣa viṣaye pravarttamānan na pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate pratyakṣasya ātad viṣaya tvāt vikalpa sādhane tu vikalpasya sva samvedana pratyakṣa viṣaya tvāt na dūrāt iti sūkṣma tā api para upalambha apekṣayā ātma rūpe tu yathā sūkṣmatā upalabhyasya tathā upalambhakasya api iti na śvapacaḥ śvapacāt vibheti sva samvedanasya api ca ayam eva vā bhāvaḥ yat asamvedat nāma na ca anumānam vikalpe pravarttate vahni ādau= iva tathā pratīteḥ abhāvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,26–2.1.2.4.6,28	 nanu vikalpamvinā vyavahāra ayogāt pratibandha grahaṇa kathat na anumānam na pratibandha grahaṇasya eva anyathā bhāvāt tathā hi vicāra ādi vinā bhāvāt anabhyāsasya sambhavī vyavahāraḥ na tattve tu vyavahāraḥ vinā api saḥ vyavahāraḥ hi pūrva apara paryālocanam antareṇa anabhyāsasya na iti pratibandha parigrahaḥ abhyāse tu satyanyathā api iti na anyathā 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,29–2.1.2.4.6,34	 atobhyāsāt vinā api eṣa vyavahāraḥ pravarttate prāṇinān dṛṣṭiḥ atra eva vyavahāreṇa na anumā pratibandha grahaṇa anurūpā eva anumānasya pravṛttiḥ anyathā anumāne pratibandha grahaṇanna upayogī sa ca pratibandhaḥ anabhyāsā avasthāyām eva gṛhyate na anyatra tatas na asti vicāra ādeḥ anumā vyavahārataḥ vyavahāraḥ hi nāma ayam anyathā api upalabhyate anyathā rūpavatyām vilāsinyāṅkāminām vṛtti dṛṣṭitaḥ virūpāyām api tatas rūpavat tānumīyatām tasmāt saṅketa kāla upalabdha śabda agrahaṇam anya vikalpane parisphuṭam eva iti tad jā kalpanā api na asti eva 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,35^1	 nanu pratyakṣeṇa yadi śabda sambandhaḥ na gṛhyate katham ayam sa tasya śabdasya vācyaḥ iti kṛtvā vyavahāraḥ na bhrāntyā api vyavahāra sambhavāt bhrāntiḥ api ca vastu sambandhena pramāṇam eva yathā taruṣu apiṇḍa ādi grāhiṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra api na piṇḍa tā nāma asti tathā api vṛkṣa vyavahāraḥ avisamvādī evan na yojanat nāma asti tathā api yojya vyavahāraḥ avitathaḥ tathā hi gaurayam iti samāna adhikaraṇa arthā pratītiḥ anyasya go śabdosya vācakaḥ iti arthaḥ tatas avisamvādinī pratītiḥ iyam evambhūtāḥ evam viṣaye asya prayogasya darśanāt yathā vṛkṣa viṣaye piṇḍa pratipatteḥ bhāvaḥ na anyatra iti pratibandhāt avisamvādaḥ yadi tarhi go śabdāt sva lakṣaṇan na pratipannaṅkathantad darśane soyam iti pratipattiḥ yat tat mayā pratipannam āsīt abhidhāna ādi dantat iti loke pratītiḥ na dṛṣṭe pratyabhijñāna abhāvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,35^2	 soyam iti pratyabhijñānannāyam iti saḥ iti ca parokṣa ākārā pratītiḥ na darśana ākārāḥ tatas nyonya vilakṣaṇa tvāt pratītyoḥ na eka viṣaya tvam pratibhāsa bhedaḥ hi bhedakaḥ iti tasya abheda ātmaka tvena bheṃdaḥ bhaveta atha artha kriyā bhedāt bhedaḥ na pratibhāsa bhedāt na pratibhāsa bheda vyatirekeṇa artha kriyāyāḥ abhāvāt artha kriyā viśiṣṭa pratibhāsa bhedāt iti ced yadi artha kriyā rahitaḥ pratibhāsaḥ tat tarhi nirālambana vijñānam anyat eva akṣaja pratyayāt saḥ iti hi vāsanā mātra bhāvitayā na artha kriyā kāri vaḥ tu grāhi jñānam atas vastu saṃsparśa abhāvāt saḥ eva ayam iti pratyayayoḥ na sāmānādhikaraṇyam ayam iti api pratibhāsaḥ idantat iti sakala puras vartti sādhāraṇa rūpa adhyavasāyī sādhāraṇa tā viraheṇa tu nirvikalpakaḥ eva yadi ca kalpanā rūpam indriya vijñānanta dāyam aparaḥ doṣaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,36–2.1.2.4.6,37	 jāyante kalpanāḥ tatra yatra śabdaḥ niveśitaḥ tena icchātaḥ pravartterannekṣeran bāhyam akṣa jāḥ śabdaḥ hi parokṣa arthe niveśitaḥ tatra ca kalpanānāt niveśaḥ tatas na bāhya darśi syāt indriya vijñānam anāla mvanam śābda vat eva bhavet na hi parokṣe pravarttamānam sa ālambanam svarūpasya asaṃsparśāt sva rūpa saṃsparśe varttamānam spaṣṭa grahaṇa āt ayam iti eva syāt na saḥ iti smaraṇasya vā sakalasya indriya jñāna tā viśeṣa abhāvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,38–2.1.2.4.6,39	 na khalu śābdāḥ pratyayāḥ bāhya rūpa saṃsparśinaḥ atha bāhyerthe śabda niveśaḥ tathā sati sa abda pratyayaḥ yathā icchayā pravarttate tathā indriya jopi tatas bahis artha abhāvepi pravarttamānaḥ nirālambanaḥ bhavet viśeṣa abhāvāt atha yatra icchā anuvidhānan na asti tatra artha anuvidhānāt bāhya artha ālambanatā yadi evam artha anuvidhānam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇantadā nirvikalpakam eva indriya vijñānām śabda ākāra tāyāḥ icchā para adhīna tvāt na sā bāhya artha anvayinī vāsanā anvayitvāt atha yadi api vāsanā anvayaḥ śabda ākārasya tathā api vāsana indriya sāmagrīta ekam eva tat iti sa vikalpa kamprati akṣam evam hi vyavahāraḥ anyathā parāmarśena aviṣayīkṛte vyavahāraḥ eva na syāt niścinvataḥ hi sukha sādhanam evam etat iti lokasya vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tat api asat eva yatas yathā eva khalu sāmagryāḥ pratyaya udayaḥ iṣyate vyavahāraḥ tathā eva astu pramā atra eva hi vidyate 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,40	 yatas kāraṇa bhedāt abhedaḥ kāraṇañca vāsanā ādi bhinnam eva śabda indriya ja pratyaya artha ākārayoḥ vyavahāraḥ tu na ekatvena sāmagrī mātreṇa pratyaya dvayasya vyavahāra upapatteḥ anya vikalpanepi ca vyavahāra sambhavāt na hi anya vikalpa sammukhībhāve tasya parāmarśena viṣayīkaraṇam na ca śabda yojanā mātreṇa vyavahāraḥ artha kriyā yojanena vyavahārāt artha kriyā ca pūrva anubhūta anubhaviṣyate ca na sa indriya vijñāna viṣayaḥ anumāna abhāva prasaṅgāt na īkṣeran bāhyam akṣa jāḥ iti korthaḥ na īkṣeran ye bāhyanta īpyakṣajāḥ prāpnuvanti viśeṣa abhāvāt iti evam vyavadhāna ādi bhāvepi jāyeta indriya jā matiḥ iti vyavadhāna ādi bhāvepi yā matiḥ sā api indriya jā syāt yathā saḥ iti aṅśaḥ iti etat ca prāk eva pratyapādi kathantarhi idam vastu iti niścayaḥ vastunaḥ purovṛtteniḥ cāyakaḥ na hi atra parokṣa viṣaya tā niścayasya idañca pratyakṣam sannihita artha tvāt tat asat māna sampratyakṣam etat iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ yadi ca pratyavamarśam antareṇa vyavahāraḥ na asti na aparāmṛ aṣṭaḥ gṛhītaḥ tadā 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,41–2.1.2.4.6,42	 rūpam rūpam iti īkṣeta tat hiyaṅ kim iti īkṣate asti ca anubhavaḥ tasyāḥ saḥ avikalpaḥ katham bhavet sakala sa vikalpaka pratyaya vādī hi rūpam iti īkṣeta rūpantaddhiyantu katham īkṣate na hi tatra tat dhīḥ iti vikalpaḥ atha anubhavaḥ eva na asti tathā api vyavahāra usti tatra ananubhūyamānepi yāvat vyavahāraḥ samvedane bhavat mate na artha apatya ādeḥ sambhavati kimpunar avikalpaka tvena spaṣṭa ākāra tayā anubhūyamāne na ca anubhavavaḥ tasyāḥ na asti anyathā rūpa darśanam mama idam iti vikala asya kutas sambhavaḥ sukha ādayaḥ ca tadānīm anubhūyante eva na ca tatra sukha ādikam idam iti vikalpaka anubhavaḥ tatas avikalpakaḥ eva buddheḥ anubhavaḥ avikalpaka anubhave na api vyavahāre buddhi vat rūpa ādiṣu api vyavahāroḥ tu atha ayam api vikalpaḥ rūpa darśanam mama idam iti pratyakṣam eva sa vikalpakam atra uvyate tad sa vikalpa kamprati akṣam rūpa darśanam eva atha anyat rūpa darśanāt iti dvayī gatiḥ tatra 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,43–2.1.2.4.6,44	 tayā eva anubhave dṛṣṭan na vikalpa dvayam sakṛt yadi saḥ eva rūpa pratyayaḥ ātmānam vikalpya pratyeti tadā sakṛt vikalpa dvaya prasaṅgaḥ ekasya krama ayogāt na ca dṛśyate sā eva krameṇa rūpa ādi svarūpa anubhava ātmikā iti ced yadi ekā buddhiḥ kramam svīkaroti krama upyakramaḥ prāptaḥ tam api krameṇa svīkaroti iti ced anavasthā syāt rūpa abhiniveśa avasthāyām sva abhiniveśa abhāvāt katham ekatā nahi abhiniveśam antareṇa aparā buddhiḥ tasya bheda buddhiḥ api bhinna iti katham ekasyāḥ kramaḥ abhiniveṣṭā abhinnaḥ iti ced tatra api svarūpa abhiniveśe apareṇa abhiniveṣṭrā bhavitavyam iti sā eva anavasthā tasmāt tayā eva anubhave sakṛt eva vikalpa dvaya prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,45–2.1.2.4.6,48	 etena tulya kālāni avijñāna anubhavaḥ gataḥ tulya kāla vijñāna anubhava bhāvepi sakṛt vikalpa dvaya prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca tatra api apareṇa vikalpena bhavitavyam iti ananta vikalpa prasaṅgaḥ ayā api syāt utara kāla bhāvinā buddhi antareṇa anubhūyate pratyakṣeṇa arthāpattyā vā na sat etat yatas smṛtiḥ bhavet atīte ca sā agṛhīte katham bhavet syāt ca anya dhī pari= chedā abhinna rūpā sva buddhi dhīḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,49–2.1.2.4.6,50	 yadi atītam samvedanan na tatra pratyakṣam vidyamāna viṣaya tvāt tadā api vidyamānam eva samvedana miti ced na tarhi rūpa grahaṇa svabhāva grahaḥ na ca anyā buddhiḥ atas bodha rūpā buddhiḥ tasyām yaḥ yaḥ eva sannihitorthaḥ saḥ eva pratibhāti sphaṭika darpaṇa ādi vat tat asat atītam eva tarhi tadā rūpa grahaṇam bodha rūpa tā tu tadā sati api kva upayoginī tatas rūpa grahaṇam mam etat iti na syāt āsīt iti syāt na ca tathā pratyakṣa vṛttiḥ atha rūpa grahaṇasya atīta tvam api asti varttamāna tvam api tathā sati pūrvam api atīta tvam asti iti durghaṭam bhavet tathā hi sarvadā atīta bhāveta varttamānaḥ sadā sa na tathā sati sadā eva asti rūpa grahaṇam iti asat 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,51	 sadā eva atīta tve tata upi prāk asti iti sarvadā rūpa grahaṇan na bhavet atha pūrvam varttamāna tā paścāt atīta tā tathā sati tat ekam jñānam iti na syāt atha ekatā tathā sati sakṛt ubhaya grahaṇam bhavet krameṇa grahaṇe ekaḥ eva na syāt eka tvaṅ kramaḥ ca iti viruddham ekasya tyāge parasya upādānam iti krama arthaḥ etat ca prāk eva pratipāditam iti na ucyate punar tasmāt atītasya grahaṇa abhāvaḥ eva smṛtiḥ api grahaṇanna antareṇa iti abhāvaḥ eva prasaktaḥ rūpa grahaṇa pratipatteḥ yadi ca samvedanam atītat na samvedanam etat iti pratītiḥ tathā sati na jñāyate kasya idam samvedanam iti anya dhī pratipatti tulya tā bhavet atīta tva smaraṇasya aviśeṣāt katham idam vijñāyate anyadhī pari= chedāt iti kim anya dhiyā paricchedaḥ kim vā anyasya dhiyaḥ paricchedaḥ yadi tāvat anya dhiyā paricchedaḥ tat etat iṣṭam eva asvasam vedana vādinaḥ anyathā anyasya dhiyaḥ paricchedaḥ tat asat anya dhiyaḥ pariccheda asambhavāt anumānena hi anya dhī pari= chedaḥ na ca ātma dhiyām anumānamparicchedakam atas kathantulya tā paricchedasya atra ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,52–2.1.2.4.6,53	 atītasya parokṣa tvam abhipretya idam ucyate sākṣāt siddhau tu na atīta parokṣa tvasya sambhavaḥ yadi hi tad sākṣāt pratīyate tadā rūpa ādi vat asya na parokṣatā na api atītvam sākṣātkriyamāṇasya varttamāna tvāt anyathā varttamāna tā eva na syāt tasmāt parokṣam sakalam anumānataḥ eva pratyeyam tat ca smaraṇa rūpam iti samāna tā buddhi samvedanasya bhavet 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,54–2.1.2.4.6,57	 atha pakṣasya api ātma buddhiḥ anumānāt anyena mānena mīyate tathā sati sā eva samāna tā prāptā atha para buddhiḥ para sambandhi tvena pratīyate na ātma buddhiḥ tasyāḥ sva sambandhi tvena eva pratītiḥ na hi anyat anyathā pratyetum yuktam tat asat sākṣātkaraṇa rūpe hi grahaṇe sambhavet idam anumāna smṛtau pūrva grahaṇasya anuvṛttitaḥ tat eva darśayati atītam apadṛṣṭāntam aliṅgañca artha vedanam siddhan tatkena tasmin hi na pratyakṣat na laugikam 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,58–2.1.2.4.6,59	 na hi atīta pratipattau dṛṣṭānta usti pratyakṣa abhāvāt tatas na laiṅgikam jñānam ātma para samvandhitayā pratyeti vedanam tathā pratyakṣa abhāvāt bhāve vā atītatā na syāt iti uktam tatas ca liṅgam sambandha grahaṇam antareṇa anumāpakam iti buddhi mātra paricchedakaḥ eva prasaktaḥ sva samvedane tu tad itara tva kṛtaḥ eva vibhāgaḥ atha sambandham antareṇa yathā anumānan tathā vibhāga anumānam api na etat api yuktam rūpa grahaṇam atra āsīt yena tad buddhiḥ īkṣyate yathā agniḥ atra prāk āsīt deśe dāhasya darśanāt 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,60–2.1.2.4.6,61	 na ca agniḥ mayā kṛtaḥ anyena vā iti tatra vibhāgaḥ atha para deha sambandhitayā anumīyate sā para buddhiḥ anyathā anyeti vibhāgaḥ tat etat ātmani buddheḥ pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe yuktam tathā hi sva samviditam yat rūpa grahaṇanta dāstīyam anyat anyathā iti yuktaḥ vibhāgaḥ atha yathā sautrantikasya rūpa ādayaḥ tad anantara bhāvinā tad rūpa avabhāsa vijñānena gṛhyante atītāḥ eva santaḥ tathā rūpa grahaṇam api tat asat yatas tad svarūpa avabhāsinyā buddhyā anantarayā yadi rūpa ādiḥ iva gṛhyeta na syāt tad pūrvadhī grahaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,62	 na hi rūpa ādayaḥ pūrvarūpa tayā avabhāsante varttamāna buddhi saṅkrāntāḥ varttamāna tayā eva avabhāsinaḥ tad rūpa buddhi grahaṇam eva ca rūpa grahaṇam na tu ā ivambuddheḥ buddhi grahaṇa abhāvāt atha tadā buddhi buddhiḥ api gṛhyate tathā sati tad aparā api buddhiḥ grāhya iti anavasthā tathā satya grahaṇam eva sakalasya atha buddhi buddheḥ agrahaṇam eva tathā sati sat saṅkrāntasya grāhyasya api agrahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ yad anantara bhāvinī buddhi buddhiḥ sā eva gṛhyeta na tatas pūrvikā atha pūrva buddhi anantaram api buddhiḥ utpattim atīṣyate tathā sati nirantara rūpa buddha ādi grahaṇa abhāvaḥ iti vakṣyate atha ekā eva prabandhena buddhiḥ utpadyate tad anantaram sarva pūrva buddhi grāhikā buddhiḥ udeti tathā api krama vat sarva buddhi pratipattiḥ na syāt akrameṇa buddhi buddha avabhāsanāt atha krameṇa eva avabhāsanan tathā sati pratyakṣatas eka tva pratipattiḥ na syāt truṭyat tayā grahaṇāt smṛtiḥ eva iti doṣaḥ prāk uktaḥ eva 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,63–2.1.2.4.6,65	 yadi nāma svarūpam svena gṛhyamāṇam avikalpakena gṛhayate vyatiriktasya tu grāhyasya sa vikalpakena grahaṇe kaḥ virodhaḥ na kaścid kintu saḥ avikalpaḥ sva viṣayaḥ vijñāna anubhavaḥ yathā aśakya samayanta dvadan ya daḥ tu avikalpakam tat tāvat svarūpa grahaṇaṅ kasmāt avikalpaka grahaṇa grāhyam tatra api idam eva uttaram na hi svarūpeṇa svarūpasya yojanā śabdena anyena vā dharmeṇa sambhavati evañcet rūpa ādikam api na yojayitum apareṇa apareṇa śakyam svarūpeṇa pratibhāsamānasya yojanā asambhavāt na hi svarūpeṇa pratibhāsamānam apareṇa pratibhāsamānena yojyate sva rūpa pratibhāsana vyatirekeṇa yojana anupalakṣaṇāt apratibhāsamānañca svena rūpeṇa yojyate iti na parama arthaḥ atha āyaṅ gauḥ iti pratyaya pratibhāsena eva yojanā atra pratipāditam ayaṅgauḥ iti na ca āyaṅ go śabda svabhāvaḥ iti pratyayaḥ api tu go śabda vācyoyam eva niścaya anubhavāt 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,66–2.1.2.4.6,68	 kiñca yasya sāmānya viṣayāḥ eva mīmāṃsakasya śabdāḥ tad eka arthāḥ na kalpanā tasya abhāve nirvikalpasya viśeṣa adhigamaḥ kutas sāmānya viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ tad eka arthā ca kalpanā abhāve nirvikalpasya viśeṣa adhigamaḥ kutas atha tad eka arthā na bhavati kalpanā tathā sati na śabdena yojyate viśeṣaḥ iti ayaṅ gauḥ iti sa vikalpakaḥ pratyayaḥ viśeṣa grāhī na bhavet anyohi yojana apratyayonyaḥ ca viśeṣa grāhī iti prāptam parisphuṭa itara svabhāva bhedāt kāraṇa bhedāt ca tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,69–2.1.2.4.6,70	 kāraṇam śabda sāmāni a ākāra tāyāḥ sva vāsanā spaṣṭa rūpa ādi nirbhāsaḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ udīyate śabda ākāra tā hi saṅketa samaya anubhūta śabda bhāvanā balā deva udayam āsādayati na cakṣuḥ ādikāt tathā sāmāni a ākāra tā api tathā hi cakṣuḥ ādikam antareṇa api bhavati pūrva anubhūta vāsanā saṃskṛta cetasaḥ sati api cakṣuḥ ādike tad anurūpa vāsanā vinākṛta cetaḥ tad abhāvāt cakṣuḥ ādi hetuka tva abhāvaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,71–2.1.2.4.6,73	 atha cakṣuḥ ādi kāraṇa pratibaddha pratibhāsa padārtha samāna adhikaraṇa tā na bhavati eva cakṣuḥ ādikam antareṇa iti matiḥ tat api yat kiñcit anumāna pratītena rūpeṇa api hi dṛśyate soyam agniḥ iti jñāna sāmāna adhikaraṇyataḥ na khalu tena sāmānādhikaraṇya mātrāt eva tat grāhi pratyaya eka kāraṇa adhīna pratyaya grāhyatā pratyaya antara anumāna ādi gṛhītena api sāmānādhikaraṇya sambhavāt na ca tad ākāra dvaya anubhava vyatirekiṇī samāna adhikaraṇa tā kaḥ tarhi samāna adhikaraṇa itarayoḥ viśeṣaḥ rūpa dvaya anubhavaḥ hi bhinna adhikaraṇayoḥ api padārthayoḥ na asambhavī tat api sugamam yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,74–2.1.2.4.6,76	 eka artha akriyā eka tva vyavahārasya jātitaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyasya vyavahāropya durghaṭaḥ vyavahārasya yathā kathañcid kāraṇa mātrataḥ bhāvaḥ anādi vyavahāra paraṃpara āyātaḥ hi sāmānādhikaraṇyī divyavahāraḥ parīkṣaṇā akṣamaḥ eva yatas parīkṣamāṇaḥ viśīryate eva tathā hi soyam agniḥ iti jñānam dvayam eva atra kevalam tad svarūpa avabhāsāt na samāna ādhāra tā parā iti saṅgrahaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,77	 kasmāt anyatra api dvitaya pratibhāsena sāmāna adhikaraṇya vyavahāraḥ vāsanā niyamena vyavahāra niyamāt prabodhopi vāsanāyāḥ eka artha kriyā kṛtaḥ niyataḥ eva pratyaya dvaya pratibhāse kasmāt bheda vyavahāraḥ eva na bhavati vāsanā niyamāt iti uktam tasmāt na sāmāna adhikaraṇyataḥ sa vikalpaka eka pratyaya tā atha sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ na atyantambhedaḥ tatas eka artha tvepi viśeṣa adhigati savikalpikā tat asat 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,78–2.1.2.4.6,80	 sāmānyatas viśeṣasya vedanam yadi abhedataḥ sarva ātmanā kathañcid vā sarvāḥ vid sama tāmbrajet yadi kalpanāyām sāmānya pratibhāsane tad bhedāt viśeṣasya api pratibhāsaḥ śābda pratyayepi pratibhāsaḥ bhavet nyāyasya samāna tvāt na khalu nyāya samāna tāyām nyāyasya asamāna tā nyāyyatā abhāva prasaṅgāt atha cakṣuḥ ādi kāraṇā bhāvāt apratibhāsaḥ sa viśeṣasya kathantarhi tat abhinnam na hi tena saha an anupraveśe abhinnam iti śakyam vijñātum paścāt anupraveśāt iti ced tat eva tadānīt na asti na tu tasya anuveśaḥ tena eva hi rūpeṇa tasya tattvam 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,81–2.1.2.4.6,83	 tat ced tena avabhāseta anupraveśa gatiḥ katham no ced tena avabhāseta anupraveśa gatiḥ katham yena rūpeṇa sa pūrvan dṛṣṭaḥ tena eva yadi avabhāsamāna tā katham anupraveśa gatiḥ pūrvavat na ced tena rūpeṇa avabhāsate tattvam asya na asti iti kathantasya anupraveśaḥ iti gatiḥ tasmāt apratibhāsamānat = a ekat na ca nānā tatas pūrvambhedena pratibhāsitasya paścāt anupraveśaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat tena kāraṇa abhāvena api apratibhāsitasya ekatvena nānātvam eva tasmāt 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,84–2.1.2.4.6,86	 abhāve nirvikalpasya viśeṣa adhigamaḥ kutas asti ced nirvikalpañca kiñcid tad tulya hetukam sarvan tathā eva hetoḥ hi bhedāt bhedaḥ phala ātmanām atha kalpanā rūpamparityajya viśeṣa adhigamañcakṣuḥ ādi kāraṇa āhita viśeṣa samvedanāt tathā sati tad kāraṇa adhīnam sa vikalpakam avikalpakam eva na khalu kāraṇa bhedam anavalamvya bhāva bhedaḥ sa pramāṇakaḥ yuktaḥ tatas tad jātīya kāraṇā saṅgi tajjātīyam eva na ca sa vikalpa ketara pratyayayoḥ samāna kāraṇa tā tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,87–2.1.2.4.6,90	 anapekṣita bāhya artha yojanā samaya smṛteḥ tathā anapekṣya samayam vastu śaktyā eva netra dhīḥ paraspara parihāra vyavasthita svabhāva sāmagrī balāt upajāte hi indriya vijñāna yojana asvabhāva kalpane katham iva svabhāva sāmagrī bhāva bhājā svabhāvena saṃsarggavatī bhavetām bāhya anapekṣa samaya smaraṇa bālāt eva yojanā bāhya sa apekṣam samaya anapekṣam indriya vijñānam na tatra kalpanā kāraṇa abhāvāt kalpanā tvam na hi kāraṇam antareṇa kārya udayaḥ atha bāhyasya śabda sāmānya ādi sambandhasya sāmarthyāt upajāyamānam indraya vijñānam sa vikalpa kambhavet tat api asat yatas yasya yena abhisambandhaḥ sa tena saha bhāsate niyamāt iti naivedampramā gocara tāṅ gatam 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,91	 evaṅ kim atra api darśane sakala samvandhi pratibhāsana prasaṅgaḥ atha yat yatra vyavasthitam sāmānya ādi tat tatra pratibhāsamānam pratibhāsate eva tat api asat śabdasya agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt na hi śabdaḥ paṭa ādike vidyate anyathā agṛhīta saṅketasya api paṭaḥ iti pratyayaḥ bhavet na ca asti vācya tāyām sandeha darśanāt tad artha siddhau= api vācaka prabhedasya aniścayāt samāna ākāra tāyāt niścayaḥ eva iti ced na prathama darśane abhāvāt na tasmāt bhinnam ityādi pratipādanāt ca 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,92–2.1.2.4.6,93	 atha api syāt gauḥ iti ādi pratyaya saṅketa smaraṇam apekṣya rūpa ādikam eva indriya sahakāri sa vikalpa kañjanayati na anapekṣya sāmagrītaḥ kārya niṣpatteḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyam anyat vā viśeṣaṇam yadā gṛhītamprāk smaryate tadā smaraṇa sahāyañcakṣuḥ ādikañjanayati tena gṛhīta saṅketa pūrva darśana rahitayoḥ na bhavati tat na sunirūpaṇam tathā hi saṅketa smaraṇa apekṣam rūpam yadi akṣa cetasi anapekṣya na ced śaktam syāt smṛtau= eva liṅga vat 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,94	 na hi pūrva anubhūtim antareṇa tena yojanā na ca pratiniyata smṛtim antareṇa pratiniyata śabda ādi yojanā na ca pratiniyata smṛti bīja prabodhakama reṇa pratiniyata smaraṇam na ca darśanam antareṇa pratiniyata prabodhaka tvam tena darśane tasya tad vācaka smaraṇam smaraṇe ca yojanam iti dṛśyamānasya tad smaraṇe liṅga tā eva tasya prabodhakasya dṛṣṭasya rūpa ādeḥ tatas yojana apratyayaḥ laiṅgikaḥ eva sakalaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,95	 atha sāmānyat na dṛṣṭam eva katham liṅgāt pratīyate avayava samāna tā hi sāmānyam ucyate sā ca prāk upalabdhā eva tatas sā smaryate tādṛś avayava yogasya tad samāna tā vyavahāra viṣaya tvāt avayavānām api samāna tā tādṛśa avayava sāmyāt yāvat tathābhūta buddhi sāmyāt buddheḥ api tathā bhūta parāmarśāt iti parāmarśa upyana ādi vāsanātaḥ iti na doṣaḥ tasmāt śabdena sāmānya ādinā ca yojanā liṅgataḥ eva smṛtiratra anumānam 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,96–2.1.2.4.6,98	 atha akṣa vyāpāreṇa yojanā pratyakṣam eva ucyate tathā sati sakalam anumānam akṣajam eva iti pratyakṣam prasaktam tathā hi pradeśe vahniḥ atra iti pradeśe na agni yojanā na akṣa vyāpāra virahe prāptā pratyakṣatā na kim atha agni mātre anumāna yojana āyāntu pratyakṣam eva tat api ajñānam yatas evam api śakyam vuktum 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,99–2.1.2.4.6,102	 pradeśa mātram pratyakṣam yojanā tu anumānataḥ pāvakena indriya jñānam agṛhītvā na yojanā anumānena eva hi yojanā yuktāḥ dahane akṣa vyāpārā sambhavāt na hi pratyakṣeṇa agṛhītantena yojayitum śakyam apratipannantena yuktam pratipannam iti vyāhatam nanu anumānena api na yojanā syāt yatas pradeśe na anumā vṛttiḥ agṛhītan na yojyate pratyakṣaḥ arthaḥ anumānena gṛhītaḥ iti sāhasam 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,103–2.1.2.4.6,105	 yathā eva hi parokṣe hutabhuji na jāyate pratyakṣan tathā pratyakṣepi pradeśe na anumānam iti samānaḥ nyāyaḥ anumeya tve ca na pratyakṣatā na hi pramāṇa samplavaḥ iṣyate yojanā parama arthena na sambhavati kasyacid dvābhyām anantarañjātaḥ vikalpaḥ tu tathā vidhaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna pṛṣṭha bhāvī vikalpaḥ eva idam atra iti yojana apratyayaḥ sa ca anādi tathā bhūta vyavahāra jātaḥ anumānam eva sva artha anumānam tatas anumānena yojanā vyapadiśyate anumānam api katham yojana arūpam utpadyate pratyakṣeṇa tathā dṛṣṭeḥ iti adoṣaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,106–2.1.2.4.6,109	 tasmāt na pratyakṣam yojana arūpam iti sthitam etat ca prāk eva pratipādite atha api syāt parokṣepi pratyakṣampravarttatam eva smaryamāṇe tena pratyakṣatas eva yojanā tat api asatyam yatas tasyāḥ tad saṅgama utpatteḥ akṣadhīḥ syāt smṛteḥ na vā tatas kāla antarepi syāt kvacid vyākṣepa sambhavāt tasyāḥ akṣadhiyaḥ smṛti saṅgamena smaryamāṇe yadi utpattiḥ iṣyate tadā akṣadhīḥ smṛteḥ eva syāt na artha sannidhānam apekṣeta atha artha sannidhānam apekṣeta tadā na eva asau smṛteḥ bhavati sākṣātkaraṇasya smaraṇāt anyat tvāt kāla antarepi vā syāt kvacid vyākṣepasya anya vikalpa lakṣaṇasya tadā sambhavāt tatas tad api indriya vijñānaṅ kāla antara smaraṇam bhavet 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,110–2.1.2.4.6,112	 kiñca yadi asau= arthaḥ prathamam avikalpaka jñāna hetuḥ sarvadā tathā eva bhaveta tatas avikalpakam eva pratyakṣam krameṇa ubhaya hetuḥ ced prāk eva syāt abhedataḥ yadi asau= ubhayasya hetuḥ prāk eva ubhayam utpatti saṅgatam syāt atha smaraṇa sahāyam indriyam sa vikalpa kañjanayet na anyathā tat asat na khalu smaraṇasya cakṣuḥ saha āyata upalabhyate na hi sahāyaḥ iti eva sarvvaḥ saru u asya sahāyaḥ kintu yaḥ tathā dṛśyate na khalu smaraṇena parisphuṭa ādi kaṅ kriyate cakṣuḥ ādi pratyayasya atha niścita rūpa tā kriyate tad asāram yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,113–2.1.2.4.6,115	 niścayaḥ yadi tad rūpe prāk eva syāt abhedataḥ atad rūpepi tat prāptam pratyaya antara makṣa jāt yadi pūrva pratibhāsitaḥ eva rūpa niścita tvam na atiriktam tat prāgrūpa samānam iti na adhika tvam niścayasya aniścayāt atha adhikam rūpantatra pratibhāti tat tarhi rūpa antara āsaṅgi pratyaya antaram eva tatra rūpe viśeṣaṇa ādau= akṣa vyāpāra abhāvāt atha idam iti ullekhaḥ tatra eva pravarttate tena sākṣātkaraṇa pravṛtta tvāt asya pratyakṣatā tat api asat yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,116–2.1.2.4.6,117	 vikalpasya idam iti asya nirvikalpaka tā bhavet artha kriyā ādi sambandha paurvāparyā prakalpanāt sannihita rūpa ādi mātra sākṣātkaraṇāt paurvāparya artha kriyā ādi sambandha grahaṇa rahita tvāda vikalpa katas aparasyāt na viśiṣyate na hi avikalpayan= eva sa vikalpakaḥ nāma tasmāt smaryamāṇa viśeṣaṇa ādeḥ aspaṣṭa ākārāt anyadeva idam iti spaṣṭākārantat tathā sati 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,118–2.1.2.4.6,120	 anyokṣa buddhi hetuḥ ced smṛtiḥ tatra api anarthikā atha api syāt smaryamāṇāt ākārāt anyaḥ eva spaṣṭa ākāraḥ akṣa buddhi viṣayaḥ yadi evam smṛtiḥ tatra āpārthikāḥ na hi smaraṇan tatra grahaṇaḥ upayogi smaraṇam antareṇa api tasya tathā pratipatteḥ yathā samita siddhi artham iṣyate samaya smṛtiḥ bhedaḥ ca asamitaḥ grāhyaḥ smṛtiḥ tatra kimarthikāḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,121	 yadi smṛti sahāya cakṣuḥ ādinā tad rūpatā ullikhyate tad abhāve tad pratyayaḥ na syāt na bhavati eva idam iti ullekhaḥ iti ced na idam iti ullekhā abhāvepi tad rūpa avabhāsanāt satā api tena viśeṣa antarasya abhāvāt kaḥ tatra upayogaḥ pravarttanam upayogaḥ ced vinā api tena pravarttanam iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ mānasañca tat pratyakṣam iti pratipādayiṣyate 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,122	 atha api syāt smṛtim antareṇa na prāthamikasya anabhyāsavataḥ pravarttanam iti tad artham smṛtiḥ iṣyate atra ucyate bhedaḥ ced asamitaḥ eva asaṅgataḥ eva grāhyaḥ smṛtiḥ tatra kim aparaṅkariṣyati yatas saṅgata siddhayartham smṛtiḥ iṣyate sa ced na tathā sidhyati na tad pratipattau smṛtiḥ upayoginī pravarttanantu pramāṇa antarāt anumānāt prāthamikasya bhavet eva tasmāt na vikalpasya svarūpa grahaṇam prati vyāpāraḥ na pravartanam abhyāsāt tu nirarthaka upyeṣa pravarttate eva na hi prayojanam iti eva bhāvāḥ bhavanti kāraṇa mātra apekṣi tvāt bhāva bhāvasya 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,124–2.1.2.4.6,126	 atha pūrvasmāt anya svarūpa grahaṇan tathā sati pratyaya antaram eva etat mānasa pratyakṣa rūpam tathā pratipādayiṣyate atha api syāt sāmānyam eva tayā parigṛhyate na bhedaḥ pūrvvama paridṛṣṭaḥ evantarhi sāmānya mātra grahaṇe bheda apekṣā na yujyate yadi sāmānya grahaṇam eva cakṣuḥ ādikāt tadā parasya bheda grāhiṇaḥ asambhavāt sāmānya grahaṇe sati bheda grahaṇa akāṃkṣāḥ na bhavet bhavati ca tathā hi sāmānya grahaṇe gauḥ iti pratipattyā kimbhūtaḥ gauḥ iti dṛśyate loke 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,127–2.1.2.4.6,130	 tasmāt cakṣuḥ ca rūpañca pratītya udeti netra dhīḥ smaraṇasya tatra anupayogāt cakṣū rūpa mātrataḥ eva udayam āsādayāṃta netra buddhiḥ tathā hi rūpa mātre pravṛttasya puratas cakṣuṣaḥ gatiḥ anyatra gamyamānasya vyāpāroḥ tu anyathā katham na hi anyathā pratīyamānam anyathā śakyaṅkalpayitum na khalu puras vartti rūpa mātre cakṣuḥ pravarttanam īkṣamāṇam śabda sāmānya ādau pravarttate iti śakyam vaktum pramāṇa abhāvāt tathā kalpanāyām atiprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt 
PVA_2.1.2.4.6,131–2.1.2.4.6,133	 smaraṇa uttara kālam vā pūrvam vā smaraṇa udayāt viṣayasya vibhinna tvāt pratyakṣam avikalpakam na hi smaraṇāt uttara kālam sugandham idanduḥ gandham ityādi jñānam pratyakṣam rūpa mātraḥ eva cakṣuḥ vijñānasya vyāpārāt tasmāt yat eva arthe cakṣuḥ ādi samāśrayeṇa utpattimat tat eva pratyakṣam na tat anyat atas śabda sāmānya ādi ākārasya apratyakṣatā anyat api yat spaṣṭa pratibhāsa nimittantad āśrayatā api gṛhyate tena mānasa ādi kam prati akṣam athavā tat api akṣam eva aśnute vyāpnoti artha rūpam iti uktam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,1	 atha kasmāt viṣaya adhīnāyām utpattau pratyakṣam ucyate na prativiṣayam viṣayeṇa hi rūpa ādinā vyapadeśaḥ yuktaḥ na indriyeṇa na hi indriyeṇa janitam iti eva pratyakṣam viṣaya svarūpa grahaṇa pravṛttantu sakalam eva pratyakṣam akṣāśrayantu kiñcid pratyakṣam aparam anyathā vyapadeśaḥ ca sa tasya yuktaḥ yaḥ avyabhicāra nimittaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,2–2.1.2.5.1.0,3	 nanu viṣaya janitam api dvi candra ādi rūpambhrāntam eva tatas na viṣayāt api udayam āsādayat sakalam abhra antam nanu viṣayaḥ eva asau na bhavati ākāra arpaṇa akṣama kāraṇa tvāt tasya evantarhi akṣam eva tat na bhavati upahata tvāt anupahatam akṣam sa tvakṣa ābhāsaḥ evantarhi sākṣāt vijñāna janena samarthaḥ viṣa yokṣa vat atha kasmāt dvaya adhīna janma tat tena na ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,4–2.1.2.5.1.0,9	 viṣayasya akṣasya kāraṇa tvena samāna tve kasmāt viṣayeṇa na vyapadeśaḥ na hi prekṣā pūrva kāribhiḥ yathā kathañcid vyapadeśāḥ kriyante tyajyante vā atra ucyate samīkṣya gamaka tvam hi vyapadeśaḥ niyujyata tat ca akṣa vyapadeśa isti tad dharmaḥ ca niyojyatām gamaka āgamaka tvena hi upādāna parityāgau akṣa vyapadeśe ca gamaka tvam asti yat akṣa aśritanta pratyakṣam upahatena vyabhicāraḥ tu pratyuktaḥ viṣayeṇa api tarhi vyabhicāraḥ na asti tasya aviṣaya tvāt na etat asti viṣayaḥ yadi asau na syāt pratyakṣonyasya kimbhava iti indriya tvantu na ekasya bhāva abhāva viśeṣaṇam atas eva āha sādhāraṇena vyapadeśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ bherī śabdaḥ yavāṅakuraḥ iti yava aṅkuraḥ iti uktena āyava aṅku pratītiḥ pṛthivī aṅkuraḥ iti tu bhavati tasya api evam anyatra api 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,10	 atha prativiṣayam iti viṣaya svarūpa grahaṇam tathā sati sva samvedanam eva pratyakṣambhavet anyatra āgamaka tā syāt atha loka prasiddha viṣaya svarūpa grahaṇam ucyate tathā sati pratyakṣam iti loka prasiddhiḥ eṣā eva astu kim vyapadeśa antara kalpanayā vaibhāṣika ādi matena tu manaḥ vijñānam api pratyakṣamprāpnoti viṣaya grahaṇāt tasmāt api pratyakṣa vyapadeśya tā eva yuktāḥ tathā ca āha viṣayaḥ hi manaḥ vijñānānya santānika vijñāna hetu tvāt sādhāraṇaḥ tasmāt indriyeṇa vyapadeśāt kalpanā apoḍha tā pratyakṣasya svarūpam śakyam lakṣayitum na viṣaya vyapadeśāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,11	 nanu viṣayeṇa api śakyam upalakṣayitum tathā hi arthasya sāmarthyena samudbhavāt iti āha tat hi arthasya sāmarthyena utpadyamānantat rūpam eva anukuryāt na anekāntika tvāt dvi candra ākāra tayā vyabhicārāt atha artha sāmarthyena bhrāntasya na utpattiḥ tathā sati nirvikalpaka tvam asya na anayā yuktyā sādhitam syāt tasmāt indriyam eva atra arthasya iti vyapadiśyate artha abhiniveśi tvāt atas eva indriyasya gamaka tvāt tena eva vyapadeśaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,12–2.1.2.5.1.0,14	 tatas liṅga svabhāvotra vyapadeśe niyojyatām nivarttate avyāpakasya svabhāvasya nivṛttitaḥ prekṣā pūrva kāriṇaḥ niyogam eva gamaka tvam āhuḥ tatas gamakatāyām etat evam liṅgam nanu prekṣā pūrva kāritā niyoktuḥ kutas gamyate sattyam etat na puruṣa prāmāṇyāt vacanasya sat artha tā gatiḥ loka vyavahārāt evam ucyate paramārthataḥ tu liṅga tvena vyāpyatā ucyate yena vyāpakasya svabhāvasya nivṛttyā nivṛttim āha 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,15–2.1.2.5.1.0,19	 nanu prativiṣayam iti sa vikalpakasya loka prasiddhasya gamakaḥ vyapadeśaḥ pūrva apara bhūtaḥ ca eka viṣayaḥ sa vikalpakasya pratyakṣasya idam hi loke pratyakṣam iti prasiddham tathā hi saḥ eṣa yaḥ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate loka pratīti gamyāḥ hi śabda arthāḥ sarve eva hi abādhitā pratītiḥ ca pramāṇa vyapadeśa bhāj pramāṇena pratītañca kiṅkarttum śakyam anyathā tat etat asat eva sākṣātkaraṇam eva atra pratyakṣa arthaḥ pratītimān na hi sākṣātkṛteḥ anyat anumānāt pramā antaram 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,20	 asākṣāt karaṇa ākāram anumānam eva ekampramāṇam tatas yadi pratyabhijñā pramāṇam asākṣātkāra vṛttantatonumānam eva sākṣātkāritāyāḥ puras vartti vastu mātra vṛtti tvāt na pratyabhijñānam tena sākṣātkaraṇam indriya vyapadeśāt eva pratīyate na anyatas viṣaya vyapadeśena sa viṣaya tā nāma syāt na sākṣātkāritā kathanam na ca tad vyapadeśye pratyakṣatā loka prasiddhāḥ pramāṇañca pratyakṣat na ca sākṣātkaraṇa vyatiriktam samvedanam pratyakṣam iti sthitam avikalpa kamprati akṣam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,21–2.1.2.5.1.0,25	 kathantarhi idam uktam tatra aneka artha janya tvāt sva arthe sāmānya gocaram na khalu sāmānya gocaram avikalpakam sāmānya kalpanāyāḥ tad virodhi tvāt tat eva āha sañcita ssamudāyaḥ sa sāmānyantatra ca akṣadhīḥ sāmānya buddhiḥ ca avaśyam vikalpena anubadhyate na khalu bahūnāmparaspara svarūpa parihāreṇa avasthitānān tathā eva grahaṇe samudāya buddhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ kalpitaḥ vā samudāyaḥ syāt na tāvat pāramārthikaḥ tad vyatirekeṇa samānya ābhāsā bhāvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,26–2.1.2.5.1.0,30	 pratibhāsaḥ vā tenyasya saḥ aparaḥ pratibhāsatām na tu asau samudāyaḥ tathā tve vātaḥ eva paraspara vyapekṣayā samudāya vyapadeśa bhājaḥ bhavantu kim apareṇa atha teṣām rūpanti rodhāya param rūpam pratibhāti tat api vastunaḥ tathā bhūtasya abhāvāt adhyāra upamātraṅ kathat na kalpanā viṣayaḥ kalpita viṣaya tve ca sa vikalpaka tvandurvāram atra ucyate artha antara abhisambandhāt jāyante ye aṇavaḥ apare uktāḥ te sañcitāḥ te hi nimittam jñāna janmanaḥ aṇūnām sa viśeṣañca na antareṇa aparān aṇūnaḥ tad eka aniyamāt jñānam uktam sāmānya gocaram 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,31	 aṇavaḥ hi paratas anupajāta jñāna hetu śaktayaḥ samvidam upajanayitum na kṣamāḥ sūkṣma itara dṛśāḥ tatas sarvaiḥ samvid upajanayitavyā na hi eka niyatantu jñāna nirmita sāmānya viṣayam uktam paraspara vivaktāḥ eva kasmāt na pratibhāsantaḥ iti ced nanu asaṃsaktāḥ keśādayopi dūre na asaṃsakta tayā pratibhāsa gocarībhavanti tatas sva kāraṇa niyata svarūpa arpaṇā sakteḥ yadi na pratibhānti kasya atra upālambhaḥ na tarhi apratyakṣe bhāva tva pratibhāsaḥ iti bhrānta tā bhavet adhyāsepi tathā avabhāsane ca sa vikalpaka tvam apara sāmānya vikalpa vat 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,32–2.1.2.5.1.0,34	 atha tatra buddhi svarūpam eva eka ghana sthūla ākāra tayā sākṣātkṛtam pratibhāti tatas avikalpa tā ucchinnam idānīm sa vikalpaka tvam sarvatra kalpanā jñāne buddhi rūpasya eva pratibhāsāt atra ucyate vādhaka pratyaya abhāvāt idānīntana janminām abhrānta ta ucyate arthāḥ tu sarvam ālambane bhramaḥ anudita prabodha prabhāvānām idānīntana janminām idam abhra antam iti pratibhāti tat apekṣayet am uktam abhra antam iti paramārthataḥ tu sakalam ālambane bhrāntam eva atas 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,35–2.1.2.5.1.0,36	 avikalpaka tā evam hi pratyakṣe na iyam ucyate sākṣātkaraṇa rūpa tvāt grahaṇe na samucyate na hi sākṣātkāri sa vikalpakam kalpanāyām pūrva upagṛhīta vastu adhyāsāt na hi sākṣātkaraṇam eva adhyāsaḥ ucyate tad viparyaye tattva prasiddheḥ evantarhi sāmānya gocara tvam asat loka prasiddhyā sva lakṣaṇa tvasya bhāvāt uktañca āyatana sva lakṣaṇam pratyete sva lakṣaṇa viṣayāḥ na dravya sva lakṣaṇam tat api asat 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,37–2.1.2.5.1.0,40	 parama artham abhipretya pūrva ācāryaiḥ prakalpitaḥ vibhāgoyamataḥ sāmya gocara tva avirodhitā paramāṇavaḥ eva tathā gṛhyamāṇāḥ sāmānyam yat api ucyate sarvam eva avikalpakam iti tatra api brūmaḥ dṛṣṭam eva tadāyātampramāṇena pratītitaḥ para prasiddhim āśritya vibhāgam śāstra kṛt jagau mīmāṃsaka ādi para prasiddhim āśritya anusmaraṇa vikalpa tayā kalpanā artha pratipādanam na ca sākṣātkaraṇe tat asti iti vikalpa ketara vibhāgam śāstra kṛt karotisma 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,41–2.1.2.5.1.0,43	 atha eka āyatana tvepi na anekaṅ gṛhyate sakṛt tatas pūrvva gṛhīta artha adhyāropāt sa vikalpakam sakṛt aneka paramāṇu grahaṇe hi na pūrva gṛhīta artha adhyāropaḥ iti na anusmaraṇa vikalpena sa vikalpaka tvam krama grahaṇāt tu durnivāram na ca ekam jñānam ekadā aneka grahaṇa samartham ekatra manasaḥ vyāpṛta tve paratra tadā eva vyāpāra ayogāt ekam vā avayavi dravyam abhyupagantavyam sakṛt grahaṇāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,44–2.1.2.5.1.0,47	 ekaika aneka grāhyantadeka tvaṅgatopi ca sakṛt graha avabhāsaḥ kim viyukteṣu tila ādiṣu yadi paramāṇavaḥ na sakṛt gṛhyante tathā sati pūrva adhyāropāt sa vikalpaka tvam asmābhiḥ iṣyate eva atha dṛśyante tathā sati sākṣāt karaṇāt avikalpaka tvam siddham kiñca kena idamprasiddham anekam yogya deśa vyavasthitam ekena sakṛt na gṛhyate manasaḥ eka tvāt iti ced na manasaḥ yugapad jñāna utpatti virodhinaḥ asiddha tvāt manaskāra mātrakasya eva manaḥ tu asya prasiddha tvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,48–2.1.2.5.1.0,50	 kiñca sakṛt grahaṇa pratītiḥ upalakṣate eva parasparam aptaṃsargeṣu tila taṇḍula daṇḍaka maṇḍalu bhāṇḍa kuṇḍaleṣu lāghavāt grahaṇasya sakṛt avabhāsaḥ iti api asat yatas pratyuktam lāghavañca atra teṣu eva krama pātiṣu kinna ākrama grahaḥ tulya kālāḥ sarvāḥ ca buddhayaḥ kāścid tāsu akrama ābhāsāḥ kramavatyaḥ aparāḥ ca kim sarva artha grahaṇe tasmāt akramoyam prasajyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,51	 nahi lāghavāt sakṛt grahaṇam upapattimat lāghavasya abhāvāt pratyukta tvāt kutas etat pratipannam lāghavāt asakṛt grahaṇa abhimānaḥ utpala patra śata vedha vat iti ced na dṛṣṭānta mātrāt artha asiddheḥ na hi ekatra siddham aparatra api tathā patra śata bedhe tu auttara adharya yoginā saha bedha asambhavāt anumāna siddhaḥ kramaḥ na ca evaṅ kalpanāyām atiprasaṅgaḥ śakyaḥ nivārayitum tasmāt bādhaka abhāvāt na sidhyati bhrāntiḥ yadi ca lāghavāt sakṛt grahaṇa abhimānaḥ teṣu eva krameṇa etatsu prāk asatsu kinna tathā lāghava abhāvāt iti ced atra api tat iti kutas etat sakṛt graha abhimānāt iti ced etat api kutas itaretara āśraya prāpteḥ yāvat sakṛt grahasya bhrānta tā na sidhyati na tāvat lāghava siddhiḥ yāvat ca na tad siddhiḥ tāvat bhrānta tāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ api ca 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,52–2.1.2.5.1.0,54	 kṣaṇika tvena buddhīnām sarvāsān tulya kālatā tatas sarvatra buddhīnām kasmāt na akrama bhāsanam buddhi parimāṇa kālam hi prameya pratibhāsanam tatas sarvvaḥ eva akramaḥ pratibhāsaḥ bhavet prameyasya tasmāt na lāghava kṛtaḥ sakṛt avabhāsaḥ api tathā eva sadbhāvāt yatra tu kāraṇa vaikalyāt na sakṛt avabhāsaḥ tatra viparyayaḥ iti vyavasthā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,55–2.1.2.5.1.0,59	 ekam agrahaṇe akalpa pratibhāsasya sambhavaḥ na vikalpa ka tā bhāve spaṣṭa artha graha sambhavaḥ āropaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya katham spaṣṭa avabhāsanam atyantambhāvana abhāvāt avikalpakaḥ eva saḥ tathā hi yoginām jñānam evam eva avikalpakam tathā ca sakṛt avabhāsanam eva pūrvarūpa tā grahaṇa abhāvāt na ekañcitra pataṅga ādi rūpam vā dṛśyate katham citrantadekam iti cedi dañcitratarantataḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,60–2.1.2.5.1.0,62	 yadi manasaḥ ekatra vṛtteḥ na yugapad aneka grahaṇantataḥ na citra pataṅga rūpa grahaṇam iti ekaḥ eva avayavī iti abhyupagamyate tat etat abhyupagamanantasmāt api citra paṅga ādi vicitrāt citrataram yatas na ekaṃsvabhāvam citram hi maṇi rūpam yathā eva tat citram iti paraspara saṃsakta svabhāvasya bhāva ātmanaḥ vyapadeśaḥ anyathā kaḥ iha citra arthaḥ tatas nānā rūpa ratna sañcaya vat kutas citra pataṅga ātmanaḥ eka tvam atha maṇīnām vibhāga yogya tvāt aneka tā na pataṅgasya na tatra api vibhāga sambhavāt paraspara vibhāgena priti bhāsanam eva vibhāgaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.0,63–2.1.2.5.1.0,65	 atha sati api vibhāgaḥ eka tvam tathā sati ratna sañcayasya api anyaḥ tatra vibhāgaḥ viyojana ākhyaḥ tatas aviyojanañcitram api ekam eva tat na sarvatra viyojana sambhavāt tathā hi cheda bheda ādinā sarvatra viyojana sambhavaḥ tadā vināśaḥ dravyasya iti etat sarvatra sambhavi yadi vibhāgaḥ viyojana ākhyaḥ sambhavati maṇi samūhaḥ iti na ekaḥ tatra avayavī tat etat citra pataṅga ādau= api kinna bhavati tatra yatnāt viyojane cheda ādinā vibhāga utpatteḥ avayavi vināśaḥ tatas aviyojanam iti na doṣaḥ etat maṇi samūhepi kalpyatām iti samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,1–2.1.2.5.1.1,4	 nanu nīla ādīnāmparaspara parihāreṇa upalakṣaṇa ipi sparśasya tad eka rūpa tvāt paraspara avicchedāt ca avayavānām ekaḥ eva ayavī tat api ayuktam yatas nīla ādi pratibhāsaḥ ca tulyaḥ citra paṭa ādiṣu vijātīya sūtra sama āhāra rūpeṣu kṛtrima citra pataṅga ādiṣu samānaḥ eva nīla ādi pravibhāgaḥ sparśa ādi avibhāga sahacārī tatra tatas ekatra avayavī paratra na iti ku toyam vibhāgaḥ tatra avayava rūpañcet kevalan dṛśyate tathā nīla ādini nirasya anyat citrañcitram yadīkṣase 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,5	 yadi citra paṭa ādiṣu kṛtrimeṣi avayava rūpam eva kevalan tatha upalabhyate eka tva abhiniveśena tadā nīla ādīni vibhāga rūpeṇa vyavasthitāni parityajya anyat citram akṛtrimeṣu api na asti eva ekatra abhiniveśaḥ tatra śaraṇam tat ca avayavinam antareṇa api kṛtrimeṣu vidyate tatas sā api pratyāśā vyapagatā eva iti na avayavimaḥ citra tā yuktimatī pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ asādhaka tvāt eka ākarṣaṇetu aparākarṣaṇam ayaskānta ayaḥ ga ulaka ādīnām upalabhyate eva tatra ca anekasya sakṛt upalambhaḥ iti siddham 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,6–2.1.2.5.1.1,8	 atha krameṇa eva kṛtrimeṣu nīla ādīnām upalambhaḥ tat anyatra sakṛt iti vibhāgaḥ tat api asata tulya artha ākāra kāla tve na upalakṣitayordhiyoḥ nānā arthā kramavatyā ekā kim eka arthā akramā aparā artha ākāra kālayoḥ samāna tvepi dhiyoḥ ekā nānā artha pratibhāsā kramavatī aparā tu punar ekam eva artham avayavinam sva gocara cāriṇam vidadhānā na kramavatī iti kim atra nibandhanam na khalu sarvatra samāna ta upalakṣaṇe vilakṣaṇa tvam abhyupagama viṣayaḥ kṛtrima akṛtrima citra abhimatayoḥ ca idam abhyupagamyate tat etat apramāṇakam abhyupagama mātra kan na trāṇāya 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,9–2.1.2.5.1.1,11	 nanu yadi kutaścid pramāṇa balāt ayam eka aneka vibhāgaḥ tadā kaḥ iva atra doṣaḥ na yuktam etat yatas vaiśvarūpyāt dhiyām eva bhāvānām viśva rūpa tā tat ced anaṅgaṅkena iyam siddhā bheda vyavasthitiḥ eka aneka rūpa pratibhāsavatīnām dhiyām eva tad rūpa vyavasthāpane prāmāṇyat nāparaḥ pramākramaḥ tāḥ ca tathābhūta vyavasthāpanā prahata prakramāḥ api dhiyaḥ yadi sādharmmya mātra upanibandhana prakalpita prāmāṇyayā apara dhiyā avadhūyeran kva nāma sādharmmyan na labhyam etat iti na bhāva vyavasthānām ā asti iti sakalam asamañjasambhavet tasmāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,12–2.1.2.5.1.1,14	 pratibhāsā antara āsiddhi pratibandhāḥ hi tāḥ dhiyaḥ pratibhāsasya vaiyarthi aṅkathayanti iti yuktimat sādharmmya mātrakāt eva yadi bhāvaḥ prasidhyati kva nāma na tat asti iti sarva sidhyet na vā kvacid na hi pratyakṣa parigṛhīta pratibandhakam anumānam apareṇa anumānena tathā udayam āsādayatā pratyakṣa antareṇa vā pratiyogitā yogam vibhrāṇena śakyantiḥ askarttum na hi pramāṇam pramāṇena tiraskriyate samāna bala tve kaḥ tiraskāraḥ pramāṇa tvañca kathantiḥ askāra karaṇe asamāna bala tāyām vā atha pramāṇam eva tat na bhavati yat anumānena vā adhyate anumānam eva tat na bhavati yat prakṣeṇa iti samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ artha pratibhāsāḥ yathā kathañcid kāraṇa doṣataḥ bhavanti na anumānam tatas tat eva bādhakam iti tat api asat 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,16–2.1.2.5.1.1,17	 hetu doṣāt prameye dhīḥ anyathā api iti yuktimat svarūpe tu katham yuktā hetu doṣa śatāt api kramavat pratibhāsa svarūpam hetu doṣāt akramambhavati iti na yuktam na hi ekasya svarūpannānā tathā pratipatti prasaṅgāt apratibhāsaḥ ekasya iti ced na svabhāvatā abhāva prasaṅgāt na khalva pratibhāsane pratibhāsanat nāma apratibhāsanampratibhāsana svabhāvaḥ iti durghaṭam atha krama bhāsanam eva na itarat bhrānti mātram eva itarat keyambhrāntiḥ kim apratibhāsam atha anyathā pratibhāsanam kiñca atas 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,18–2.1.2.5.1.1,20	 bhrāntiḥ apratibhāsaḥ ced sarvatra syāt avāritā tat eva pratibhāti itthaṅa kathambhrāntiḥ nirucyate yadi sarvā pratibhāsanambhrāntiḥ suṣaptasya upalādeḥ ca bhrānta tā prasaṅgaḥ yadi ca ākramasya apratibhāsaḥ kramaḥ eva tarhi pratibhāti anupahataḥ tatas kathambhrāntiḥ na hi stambha ādeḥ pratibhāsanam eva bhrāntiḥ bhrāntiḥ anyavabhāsaḥ ced svarūpa ābhāsitā katham asvarūpa avabhāse ca tat na asti iti bhramaḥ katham 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,21	 yadi anyasya vivakṣitāt pratibhāsasya bhrānta tā tadā tarhi svarūpa pratibhāsanam eva tasya na asti katham sā buddhiḥ asti apratibhāsamānā api yadi buddhiḥ asti sarvadā sarvasya sarvāḥ eva dhiyaḥ santi iti vaktavyam bhrāntiḥ ca atha na asti eva sā buddhiḥ evantarhi avidyamānā eva kramavatī buddhiḥ akrama ābhā para utpannā iti kathambhrāntiḥ atha tasyāḥ prameyat na asti iti bhrāntiḥ asau 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,22–2.1.2.5.1.1,23	 nanu akrameṣu tila ādiṣu akramāyāḥ eva buddheḥ prameyam asti pratyuta kramavatyāḥ prameya asambhavaḥ anyathā avabhāsanāt atha ākramam prameyam eva na bhavati tena evam iti ced svarūpepi tarhi na akrama avabhāsaḥ tatas na bhrānti yogaḥ atha svarūpe buddhiḥ aparā yadi buddhau kṛta grahāḥ krama graha svarūpāyāḥ katham akrama bhāsanam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,24–2.1.2.5.1.1,25	 yadi kramavatī buddhiḥ buddhi antareṇa gṛhyate prameyasya akrama avabhāsaḥ na syāt maṇi muktā ādeḥ tad grāhikāyāḥ buddheḥ krameṇa pravarttanāt buddhi grāhikāyāḥ ca na prameye vṛttiḥ na ca kramaḥ akrameṇa pratibhāti bhrāntyā tad pratibhāsaḥ ced sā eva abhrāntiḥ prasajyate prameya grahaṇantasyāḥ tathā kena nivāryate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,26	 yadi krama avabhāsinī buddhiḥ udayavatī buddhi buddhyā api tathā bhavitavyam bhrāntyā sakṛt grahaṇañcet ekayā sakṛt aneka grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ na hi pūrva apara grahaṇānām ekatā pratīti abhāvāt uttarayā buddhyā ekatayā pratītiḥ iti ced sā api kramavatī katham ekatāmpratīyāt grahaṇa kālaḥ hi grāhi kālān atipātī atha ākrama eva asau tathā sati ekayā aneka grahaṇam atas eva asau bhrāntiḥ iti ced tathā api aneka svarūpa pratibhāsanam avyāvṛttam eva citrā buddhiḥ ekā eva ced kin na maṇi muktā ādayaḥ nīla ādayaḥ ca prameyam virūpeṇa avabhāsamānāḥ api yadi buddhi rūpāḥ iti sarvu asya prameyasya tathā prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt na bhrāntau= api pratibhāsanam yuktam sakṛt anekasya tasmāt yaḥ yathā anubhūyate sakṛt anyathā vā sa tathā eva abhyupagantavyaḥ tathā eva vicāra krama tvāt anyathā prameya sthiti abhāvaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,27–2.1.2.5.1.1,29	 nanu ālekhya ādau citra buddhiḥ upalakṣyate katham ekatā na yuktāḥ maṇi muktā ādiṣu tu na citrā ekā buddhiḥ tatas buddheḥ eva pratibhāsa vibhāga ādayam vibhāgaḥ na sva samaya virodhāt yatas vijātīnām anārambha anna ālekhya ādau vicitra dhīḥ arūpa tvāt na saṃyogaḥ citraḥ bhakteḥ ca na āśrayaḥ yadi buddhiḥ anuvidhīyate sva samayaḥ parityaktaḥ vijātīya anārambhāt iti vijātīya sūtra saṃyoga upajanitasya hi paṭa ādi rūpasya na citra avayavitā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,30–2.1.2.5.1.1,32	 atha buddhiḥ iyambhrāntā tathā api asti sakṛt grahaḥ asattya rūpa grahaṇe sattya rūpa grahaḥ na kim bhrāntā api hi buddhiḥ pravarttamānā sakṛt aneka grahaṇe pravarttate eva kaḥ hi puras vartti tva pratibhāsane sattya asattyayoḥ vivekaḥ atha buddheḥ eva tad rūpam tat etat asat satya buddheḥ asat rūpam ātma bhūtaṅ kathat na tat eka ātma tve vibhāgaḥ yama sattyau na ekatā athavā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,33–2.1.2.5.1.1,36	 atha api syāt ātma abuddheḥ tena rūpeṇa sattyaḥ pīta ādi ātmā bāhya rūpaḥ tu asattyaḥ na etat sārantasya rūpam na tat ced tasmin= eṣā kalpanā yukti yuktā atha api syāt ātma rūpe pravarttate ekā api buddhiḥ anekatra tatra prayāsa abhāvāt para rūpe tu mahān prayāsaḥ manasaḥ gamana ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tatas na ekayā grahaṇa sambhavaḥ grahaṇasya sakṛt viruddha deśeṣu asambhavāt yadi tarhi gamane na manaḥ grahaṇa kāraṇam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,37	 śākhā candramasoḥ tulya kāla grahaṇā sambhavaḥ śīghra vṛttessakṛt grahaṇa avabhāsaḥ iti ced na ati dūre śīghra tā asambhavāt kiñca kim atra pramāṇamprāpya kāri cakṣuḥ ādi iti paraḥ prāha upalabdhi anupalabdhyoḥ anāvaraṇa itara apekṣaṇāt dūra itara apekṣaṇāt ca yadi cakṣuḥ ādikam aprāpya kāri bhavet yathā āha cakṣuḥ śrotra manaḥ aprāpta viṣayam iti tad āvaraṇa bhāvāt anupalabdhiḥ anyathā upalabdhiḥ iti na syāt na hi tatra āvaraṇam vyāghāta karaṇa samartham prāpya kāri tve tu mūrtta dravya pratighātāt upapattimān vyāghātaḥ ati dūra tve ca gamana abhāvāt tat asat aprāpyakāri tvepi yogya deśa apekṣaṇāt ayaskānta vat na khalu ayaskāntaḥ aprāpya ākarṣaṇe pravarttamānaḥ ayasaḥ sarvasya samarthaḥ atha tatra api ayaḥ sparśa usti eva sūkṣma tvāt anupalakṣitaḥ yathā na ayana raśmi saṃsparśaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,38–2.1.2.5.1.1,40	 nanu etat eva anyena sādhyate kathantat eva sādhanam tasmāt atyantaṅkriyamāṇeyan= aṣṭaiḥ kaṣṭa prakalpanā viduṣām upahāsāya varttate na tu samvidā atha api syāt saṃsṛṣṭasya ākarṣaṇan dṛṣṭam iti ayaskānta ākṛṣyamāṇasya api tat na mantrasya api ākarṣaka tvan dṛṣṭantadā kṛṣṭasya api sparśa prasaṅgena atiprasaṅgāt bhavatu tatra apīti ced na śabdasya guṇa tvāt yadi vā anaikāntika tva darśana viṣayepi saḥ eva dharmmaḥ āsajyate na kvacid anaikāntika tvena bhavitavyam sa śyāmaḥ tad putra tvāt iti vyabhicāra darśane gaura putreṇa tatra api asti śyāma tā iti prasaṅgaḥ kasmāt na dṛśyate iti adarśana kāraṇam atramīyatām 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,41	 kiñca yadi cakṣūraśmayaḥ nirgatya saṃsarggavantaḥ kasmāt ati dūra īpi na darśanam avyavahite pradīpa raśmi vat iti na doṣaḥ evantarhi ati nikaṭa grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ na hi pradīpa raśmayaḥ ati nikaṭe na pravarttante tasmāt aparaḥ dharmaḥ cakṣuḥ ādīnām pradīpāt abhyupagantavyaḥ saḥ eva grahaṇa kāraṇan na raśmi sannikarṣaḥ yadi ca raśmayaḥ cakṣuḥ ādīnām anukāra ipi grahaṇa prasaṅga atha manasaḥ sā śaktiḥ yatas sā śīghra tā sakṛt grahaṇam eva tarhi janayatu kim anayā kaṣṭa kalpanayā na ca manaḥ tathābhūtam pramāṇa siddham manaskāraḥ eva pūrva vijñāna rūpaḥ tad artha kriyā kārī tasya viṣaya antara avadhāna vaiguṇye anyatra jñāna anupapatteḥ yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ tatas ca anyathā siddhi tvāt na manaḥ tatas liṅgāt avagatiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,42–2.1.2.5.1.1,43	 tasmāt buddhiḥ tad atkāra grāhikā vyapadiśyate sandaṃśaiḥ iva vijñānaiḥ na tu artha grahaṇa īkṣaṇam tasmāt abhra antam eva ālekhya aneka ākāra grahaṇam sakṛt atha tatra saṃyogaḥ citraḥ na avaya vi rūpam tat asat saṃyogasya guṇa tvāt na tatra rūpa grahaṇa samavāyaḥ tathā sati guṇavat iti dravyam eva bhavet evañca vijātīya anārambhāt iti samaya vyatikramaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,44–2.1.2.5.1.1,45	 atha upacāreṇa saṃyogasya citra tā tat api asat eka artha samavāyena hi vanaṅkusum iti yathā buddhiḥ tathā iyam api syāt na ca anayoḥ sāmyam vanam hi vahutva saṅkhyāyā taruṣu asamavetāḥ yatra kusumita tvantataḥ eka artha samavāyaḥ iti uktam natu atra citra tvam avayaveṣu samavetam yatra saṃyogaḥ yat āha pratyekam avicitra tvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,46–2.1.2.5.1.1,47	 na khalu pratyekam sūtra ādīnāñcitra tā yena tad samavetaḥ saṃyoga upi tathā bhavet atha yathā agni tvac gṛhītam agnau tīkṣṇa tā sādharmmya grahaṇa upapāditā a gni vāsanā prabodhaḥ tasya smaran= adhyāropayati māṇavakepi pāvaka tām tathā krameṇa gṛhītān nīla ādīn anyatara grahaṇa samaye gṛhyamāṇe adhyāropayati iti citra pratītiḥ tad anupapannam yatas gṛhīteṣu krameṇa ca na citra dhī saṅkalanam anekasya ekayā agrahāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.1,48	 tatra hi tīkṣṇa tā sādṛśyam adhyāropa nimittam iha tu gṛhyamāṇaspa nīla ādeḥ katham adhyāropaḥ atha pratyāsattiḥ sā sakṛt grahaṇaḥ eva upapattimatī krama grahaṇe tu na pratyāsatti grahaṇam tad deśe grahaṇāt iti ced tad deśa grahaṇepi na pūrva aparayoḥ citra tā grahaḥ adhyāropāt bhavati iti na yuktam asya eva cintya tvāt atha smaryamāṇaṅ gṛhyamāṇa tayā pratyavabhāsate bheda agrahaṇāt katham anyasya anyathā grahaḥ smaryamāṇa rūpa tāmparityajya pratibhāsane grahaṇam eva tat tatas na saṅkalanam atha grahaṇa rūpam eva saṅkalanam tathā sati anaikasya ekayā grahaḥ eva prasaktaḥ na ca iṣyate cakṣuḥ vyāpāreṇa sakalasya pratīti upalakṣaṇāt tasmāt anartham amībhiḥ anibaddha kalpanā kalaṅkāṅikata jaḍa jana kalpitaiḥ iti āha 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.2,1–2.1.2.5.1.2,2	 nānā arthikā bhavet tasmāt siddhātopya vikalpikā vikalpayan= api eka artham yatonyat api paśyati citra pratibhāse hi nānā nīla dirūpe nīlam idam iti vikalpayan= api paryanta varti pīta ādi kampaśyati eva na ca yugapad aneka vikalpa sambhavaḥ citram iti vikalpate eva iti ced na niyama abhāvāt na hi avaśyañcitram iti eva vikalpitavyam ekatra api vikalpa darśanāt evañca sakṛt sakala nīla ādi ākārā buddhiḥ ekā eva citra ākārāḥ tatra codyam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.2,3–2.1.2.5.1.2,10	 citra avabhāseṣu artheṣu yadi eka tvat na yujyate sā eva tāvat kathambuddhiḥ ekā citrāvarbhāsanī etat pratipādayati yathā eva buddhiḥ bhavatā citra ākāra upagamyate tathā eva yadi bāhya upi vibhāgaḥ tatra kiṅkṛtaḥ vaiśvarūpyāt dhiyām yatra bhāvānām citra rūpa tā tad ārūḍhasya kimbuddheḥ na bhaviṣyati tasmāt buddhi dṛṣṭānte na anaikāntikam etat citra tvāt eva anekam iti tatra idam ucyate idam vastu bala āyātam yat vadanti vipaścitaḥ yathā yathā arthāḥ cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā yatas kiṃsyāt sā citra tā ekasyām na syāt tasyām matau= api yadi idam svayam arthānām rocate tatra ke vayam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.2,11	 ayam arthaḥ na khalu ekā satī buddhiḥ api citrā tatra api aneka ākāra tvāt aneka eva ākāra lakṣaṇa tvāt vastunaḥ ākāra bahu tvena niyamena vastunopi tatas tāvatyaḥ eva buddhayaḥ yadi kā kṣatiḥ uttara pakṣa vādinaḥ atha nānātve buddhīnām pratiparamāṇu tāvatyaḥ buddhayaḥ iti paramāṇu grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ aneka pratipatya prasaṅgaḥ ca parasparam apratipatteḥ abhāvāt na khalu sva samviditānāt nānātva pratipattiḥ santa antarasya api pratibhāsa prasaṅgāt na etat asti dṛṣṭa tvāt na hi dṛṣṭā ipi anupapannatā nāma na tarhi sva samveda namparasparasya api vedanāt na sva samvedanam antareṇa vedanā sambhavāt etat ca pratipādayiṣyate samvedane tu para samvedanena prayojanam eva kaḥ tarhi bahu tvam pratipadyatām na kaścid tad vyatirekeṇa pratipad tuḥ abhāvāt tasmāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.2,12–2.1.2.5.1.2,14	 na eka tvat na api nānā tu ambuddhīnām upapattimat eka tve citra tā abhāvaḥ aneka tve sutarām asat tasmāt yathā yathā vastu cintyate tathā viśīryataḥ eva iti kim atra kurmaḥ tasmāt āha vijñānam vijñāna rūpa tayā śūnyam iti sakala dharma śūnyatā eva nyāyyāḥ atha pratibhāsamānaṅ katham ekatva aneka tva vikalpanāt eva na bhavati vikalpamānam api tat pratibhāsate eva māyā marīci prabhṛti pratibhāsa vat asattva ipi na doṣaḥ teṣām api avidyamāna tve kathampratibhāsaḥ pratibhāsaḥ ced katham avidyamāna tā artha kriyā kāritvā abhāvāt eva artha kriyā kāritva lakṣaṇa tvāt sattvasya na pratibhāsa mātreṇa sattva vyavahāraḥ keśa ādi pratibhāsepya sattva niścayāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,1–2.1.2.5.1.3,4	 nan kā iyam artha kriyā kimpratibhāsamānāt aparā atha tat eva aparā ced tasyāḥ api pratibhāsamāna rūpāt apara artha kriyā abhyupagamyate anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ sā eva ced sarva pratibhāsanām sattva prasaṅgaḥ iti na māyā ādīnām asattvam atra ucyate kasyacid vyatiriktā eva kasyacid tad viparyayāt svabhāvaḥ eṣa bhāvānām vibhāgena vyavasthitiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,5–2.1.2.5.1.3,6	 na hi pratibhāsamānaḥ iti eva sarva urtha kriyā yaḥ eva artha kriyā tvena pratibhāti saḥ eva artha kriyā svabhāvaḥ na ca artha kriyā svabhāvasya asattva vyatirekeṇa vyatirekeṇa ca sattva vyavasthiteḥ evantarhi na sarva pratibhāsānām asattvaṅ kasyacid artha kriyā sambandhāt na para abhyupagamena prasaṅga karaṇāt artha kriyayā hi sattvam abhyupagacchanti sattva vādinaḥ tad pratibhāsa vyatirekeṇa artha kriyā na hi nīla ādi svarūpāt aparam artha kriyā tvam avabhāsate yat eva yasya iṣṭam sā eva artha kriyā etat anavasthitam eva kasyacid kiñcid eva iṣṭam pīḍā nivarttanam āhlādanam ca artha kriyā iti ced na pīḍā āhlādayoḥ api anavasthita tvāt bhāvanā vaśena ca sarvasya utpatteḥ bhāvanāyāḥ bhāve ca abhāvāt asattvam eva parāmārthataḥ iti vyavasthā yadi evambhāvanā balāt jñānam eva tathā bhūtan na tu asattvam avidyā vaśāt utpana tvam eva asattvam tathābhūtasya sthita rūpasya asattvāt pratibhāsa mātreṇa tva vicārita ramaṇīyena bhāvāt samvṛti sattyatā eva tasmāt na artheṣu na jñāne sthūla ābhāsaḥ tad ātmanaḥ ekatra pratiṣiddha tvāt bahuṣu api na sambhavaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,7^1	 artha eṣu hi paramāṇuṣu avayaviṣu ca na sthūla ābhāsaḥ sthūla tā hi diś bhāga bhinnāḥ diś bhāga anāñca parāpara parihāreṇa sthāna anaikatvam atha bahuṣu sthūla ābhāsa tā tathā hi bahavaḥ samāna jātīyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ avicchinna tayā pratibhāsamānāḥ sthūla tayā vyapadiśyante na etat api yuktam bahavaḥ evate sthūla tāyāḥ pratyekam abhāvāt samudāyasya bhaviṣyati iti ced koparaḥ tebhyaḥ samudāyaḥ eka ghanaḥ ca pratibhāsaḥ sthūla vyapadeśa bhāj na ca paraspararvi vikta pratibhāse eka ghana tā asti antarālasya api pratibhāsanāt atha na pratibhāti na tarhi te pratibhāsitāḥ syuḥ atha paramāṇu pralaye tad saṃyogāt anyaḥ eva avayavī jāyate na tatra paramaṇavaḥ avayavāḥ vā kecana yadi anyaḥ eva avayavī utpannaḥ tathā sati paramāṇavopi naśyanti avayavī ca aparautpannaḥ vīja ādi vāṃkuraḥ tatas ca saṃyoga sahāyāḥ paramāṇava ādayaḥ avayavinam sva samavetam ārabhante iti samavāyikāraṇa tvan tantu ādīnāt na syāt dviṣṭha tvāt sambandhasya iha buddhiḥ ca nirālambanā bhavet saptamī arthasya abhāvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,7^2	 tasya vā anavayavasya grahaṇe para bhāga ādi grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ para bhāge ca dṛśyamāne aparasya api darśanantasya api avayavi tvāt para bhāgasya iti sarvvaḥ sarvu adarśī bhavet atha para bhāgaḥ na dṛśyate para bhāgasya eva abhāvāt pareṇa kathan dṛśyate anyaḥ eva asau= iti ced na tarhi asau= avayatī na ca sthūla tā paryāyeṇa tasya darśanam iti ced na ekatra payīyā sambhavāt na ca saḥ eva asau= iti śakyam pratipattum spṛśyatayā dṛśya tayā ca pratīteḥ avayavī iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt paraspara svarūpa parihāreṇa pratipattau katham ekatvam grahaṇa kṛta uyamparaspara vibhāgaḥ grāhyantu ekam eva sakalaḥ tarhi bhedaḥ viśīryate dvayam eva bhavet na ca tad vyatirekeṇa tasya api pratibhāsanam iti śūnyāḥ sarva dharmmāḥ na ca yat eva dṛśyate tat eva spṛśyate iti pramāṇam asti tasmāt na avayavī na avayavāḥ pratibhāsa gocarāḥ pratibhāsaḥ iti eva astu yadi tarhi pratibhāsaḥ eva ayam saḥ eva vi jñāḥ na vā daḥ prasaktaḥ katham sarvu adharmma śūnyatā atra ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,8–2.1.2.5.1.3,11	 pariccheda untara nyoyambhāgaḥ bahis iva sthitaḥ jñānasya abhedinaḥ bheda pratibhāsaḥ hi upaplavaḥ jñānam api yadi idam sva samvedanam sva svarūpa paryavasānāt bheda avabhāsitāḥ na yuktāḥ na hi sva samvedane para samvedanam tatas na bheda pratibhāsaḥ atha paraspareṇa eva samvedanantena bhedaḥ tatra api pratyekam pratipattau syāt santāna antara vat pramā tathā mayā paricchinnam iti na asti asva vedane 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,12–2.1.2.5.1.3,13	 yadi te vedane svañca parañca vittaḥ sva para vedane dvayam sva samvedanam āyātam na hi svarūpa samvitpara samvidam āviśati atha sva samvedanat na asti parasya eva samvedanamparasparābhyām tathā sati devadatta yajñadatta paricchinnam iva na dvayam iti vedyeta mayā viditam etat iti ca na syāt karttuḥ asvasam vedana tvena avabhāsanāt tatas ca te eva sva samvedane syātām tathā ca santāna antara pratipannavat apratipattiḥ dvayoḥ atas eva ātmā dvayoḥ pratipatta iṣyate anyathā ayamprasaṅgaḥ iti paraḥ atra ucyate sva sam vedanā itara tve pūrva nyāya anatikramāt sā upi paryanuyogena na eva anena vimucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,14	 yadi samvedana rūpaḥ ātmā tasya tasya sva ātmani nimagna tvāt na para samvedanam parasya api vedane kaḥ virodhaḥ iti ced tena rūpeṇa paramvetti pareṇa vetti vikalpayoḥ ekatra sthātavyam svarūpeṇa vetti iti na yuktam svarūpasya sva ātmani vyavasthānāt svarūpe niviṣṭam yat rūpam sva abhimukham eva tat katham param vetti anya mukhañcet tena tarhi sva ātmā na pratīyate tatas santāna antara vedana vat na dvayam pratītiḥ yasya tat asti mukha dvayam saḥ ekaḥ iti ced dvayam etat iti kaḥ pratipattimān saḥ eva iti ced punar ābhimukhya dvayena prayojanam iti anavasthā tatas sva samvedana rūpam trayam tatas tad veda neparaḥ ātma upagantavyaḥ punar aparaḥ iti mahati anartha paramparā tatas vedanāt ekam eva samvedanam atas jñānasya abhedinaḥ bheda pratibhāsaḥ upaplava iti jñānam ati sva rūpeṇa apratipannam asat evā iti śūnyatā eva avaśiṣyate yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,15–2.1.2.5.1.3,16	 tatra ekasya api abhāvena dvayam api avahīyate tasmāt tat eva tasya api tattvam yā dvaya śūnyatā syāt etat ekasya parityāge jñāna mātram bhaviṣyati pratibhāsamāna parityāge dvayam api tathā na vā kiñcid iti ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ astu dvayam api iti ced na ukta uttara tvāt na sva sam veda nampara samvedanam iti pratipādanāt tasmāt śūnyatā eva jyāyasi iti yuktam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,17–2.1.2.5.1.3,20	 idānīm mādhyamika yoga ācāra bāhya artha vādi nayena ca śūnyatā artham pratipādayati rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāraḥ vijñānam iti ādi bhāvānām vyavasthā sā tat bheda āśrayaṇī ca iyambhāvānāmbheda saṃsthitiḥ tad upallava bhāve ca teṣa ambheda upyupaplavaḥ vijānāti iti vijñānam iti na grāhya grāhaka ākāra vāhyam asti ca lakṣaṇam atas lakṣaṇa śūnya tvāt niḥ svabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,21–2.1.2.5.1.3,26	 vyāpāra upādhikam sarvvam skandha ādīnām viśeṣataḥ lakṣaṇam sa ca tat tvan na tena api ete vilakṣaṇāḥ iti antaraślokāḥ nanu bāhya padārtha rūpa ādi deśanā bhagavataḥ tad anyā ca katham iti vaktavyam iti āha yathā svampratyaya apekṣādavidyā upapluta ātmanām vijñaptiḥ vitatha ākārā jāyate timita ādi vat asamvidita tattvā ca sā sarva apara darśanaiḥ asambhavāt vinā teṣāṅ grāhya grāhaka viplavaiḥ tad upekṣita tattva arthaiḥ kṛtvā gaja nimīlanam kevalam loka buddhyā eva bāhya cintā pratanyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,27	 nanu yadi paramārthataḥ sakalam eva śūnyam bhagavān= ca tattva darśī tad kathambāhya padārtha deśanā bhagavataḥ na hi tattva darśya tattvan deśayati deśane vā kathantattva darśī iti gamyate atra ucyate na bāhya artha vidhāna artham bhagavataḥ bāhya deśanā api tu anuvāda artham ātma niṣedhasya tad anuvādena vivakṣita tvāt anuvāda upi katham śūnyatā darśinaḥ tad apratibhāsanāt na loka buddhyā eva anuvāda sambhavāt lokasya ca tathā buddhiḥ anādya vidyā abhyāsāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,28–2.1.2.5.1.3,30	 nanu yadi loka buddhiḥ bhagavataḥ kathan tattva darśitā na pūrva vedhena deśanā sambhavāt cakra bhramaṇa vat tasmāt aneka ākāra deśana avatārāya lokasya virudhyate evantā vat buddheḥ śūnyatām abhyupagamyānaikānti parihāraḥ kṛtaḥ idānīn citra tvam abhyupagamya pariharati citra ābhāsā api buddhiḥ ekā eva bāhya citra vilakṣaṇa tvāt śakya vivecanañcitram anekam aśakya vivecanāḥ ca buddheḥ nīla ādayaḥ yatas nīla ādiḥ citra vijñāne jñāna upādhiḥ ananya bhāj aśakya darśanaḥ tam hi patati arthe vivecayan 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,31	 citra vijñāna ātma bhūtaḥ yaḥ nīla ādiḥ kevalaḥ aśakya darśanaḥ tatas vivecayitum aśakya tvāt ekatā eva buddheḥ citrāyām api yadi tarhi citram api ekam śabda ādi pratibhāsi api ekaḥ syāt bhavatu yadi vivecayitut na śakyaḥ atha karṇṇau pidhāya api rūpa ādikam upalabhyate tatas kevala grahaṇāt aneka tā tat api asat na jñānasya vivecanam tadā pūrvva pratibhāsasya abhāvāt apratibhāsanāt apratibhāsamānaḥ śabdaḥ āste tatas bhedaḥ iti ced na asau tadā jñāna parokṣa tvāt evam hi vivecayan= arthaḥ eva patet asamvidita tvāt arthasya 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,32–2.1.2.5.1.3,34	 atha pūrvvaka vijñāna ākārāt saha pratibhā samānāt idānīṃ= kevalaḥ pratibhā samānonyaḥ iti vivecanam tat api asat na hi pūrva tāyām jñānam prati akṣampravarttate api tu yat yathā bhāsate jñānantat tathā eva anubhūyate iti nāma syāt na tu anubhata bhā āsīt iti bhavati na hi sva samvedana pratyakṣamparokṣe pravarttate parokṣasya asva samvedanāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,35	 atha smatvā jñāyate na yuktam etat smṛteḥ apramāṇa tvāt atha anubhavāt utpattimatī smṛtiḥ pramāṇam eva na anubhavāt smṛtiḥ udayavatī iti kiñcid atra pramāṇam anubhava kāle smṛtiḥ abhāvāt na ca asya smṛtiḥ aham anubhavāt utpannā iti jānāti anubhavasya tayā adarśanāt anubhāva anubhave vā na smṛtiḥ bhavet anubhavaḥ eva tadā syāt tasmāt aśakya vivecanañcitram ekam iti na doṣaḥ bāhyasya api tarhi aśakya vivecana tvāt ekatā iti ced na tadā eva pareṇa ekasya darśanāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,36–2.1.2.5.1.3,38	 atha pareṇa yat dṛśyate tat anyat eva sutarām tarhi vivekaḥ sva dṛṣṭam eva ekam iti ced na sva samvedana pratibhāsāt jñānam eva tat iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākārasya cetasaḥ na hi jñāna tvam pratyākhyāya vivecanam asti tasmāt grāhya grāhaka nīla ādi ākārā citrā buddhiḥ ekā eva iti citrā dvaitam eva na vā tad citram acitrāt bhedena vyavasthāpanā sambhavāt tasmāt samvedanam eva kevalam advaitam aparasya abhāvāt iti sthitam evantarhi bhāva abhāvābhyām viveka sambhavāt katham advaitam tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,39–2.1.2.5.1.3,41	 na bheda usti tatas abhāvāt bhinnaḥ abhedaḥ vyavasthitaḥ abhāva apratipattau tu bhedyasya advaitatā kutas yadi bhedaḥ na asti bhedāt anyaḥ abheva eva asti iti pratīyate tathā satyabhāvām pratipadyamānaḥ bhāvañca bhāva abhāvayoḥ dvaitam eva pratipadyate tat katham advaitam tathā hi stambhotra kumbhe na astiti pratiṣedhan na na astitām 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,42–2.1.2.5.1.3,44	 vinābhedasya samvittiḥ āyātā na antarīyikā pratiṣedhaḥ hi bhedena antarīyakaḥ eva sakalaḥ tatra pratiṣedham pratyeti pratiṣedha apratipattau tu yathābhūta abhyanujñānāt na kiñcid pratipāditam syāt parañca pratipādayatā parobhyupagantavyaḥ iti katham advaitam na hi ātmānam eva kaścid pratipādayati atha parat na kaścid pratipādayet tathā satya ātmanaḥ eva vyāmohaḥ katham advaita pratipādanam vyāmohe vā nivarttamāne para rūpasya utpatteḥ advaita abhāvaḥ kathañca pūrva apara pratiprattiḥ iti sarvvamasam añjasam atra ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,45–2.1.2.5.1.3,46	 bhedaḥ nāma na dṛśyoyam yena evam pratipāditam bhāva abhāva ādi kalpoyantam prati syāt na saṅgataḥ na tāvat pūrva aparayoḥ ayambhedaḥ pratibhāsavān pratyakṣasya pūrva aparayoḥ avṛtteḥ yadi pūrvvam prati akṣe tadā eva pratibhāseta varttamāna tā eva tasya syāt dvitīya vat etat eva tasya varttamāna tvam yat pratyakṣe sākṣātkaraṇa rūpe pratibhāsaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,47–2.1.2.5.1.3,51	 atha yoginām sākṣātkaraṇena pratibhāsamānam api katham atīta ādikam atha na eti ucyate katham atīta ādi vedanam tat asat iha janmani keṣāñcid na tāvat upalabhyate tām avastha aṅgatānāntu na vidmaḥ kimbhaviṣyati yatra hi dṛśyamāna abhimatasya api pratiṣedhaḥ tatra anāgate kaḥ iva ādaraḥ iha api sattya svapna darśinoti ita ādikam vidanti eva na utthitānām anupalambha avasthāyān tathā vyavahārāt tasmāt na atītam pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate na āgatam tatas kathantataḥ bheda pratipattiḥ smaraṇam eva atīte tat api apramāṇam atha anumānena dṛḍha tā ādi pratipatteḥ kāraṇasya tatas bhedam pratyeṣyati tat api asat yatas anumānam hi vyathana tena sambandha vittitaḥ kāraṇasya dṛḍha tvasya na ca adhyakṣeṇa vedanam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,52	 yadi bhāvi arthena dṛḍha tāyāḥ kāraṇasya ca sambandha grahaṇantada anumānam yuktam pratibaddhāt parokṣa artha pratītiḥ anumānam iti anumāna vādinaḥ atha pratibandha grahaṇam antareṇa eva anumānan dṛṣṭa tvāt iti ced atiprasaṅgaḥ eva tarhi prasaktaḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt eva na bhaviṣyati na hi dṛṣṭam itarat ca śakyam ekīkarttu yadi dṛṣṭa tvāt parihāram vadet dṛṣṭa tvam anumānena pratyakṣeṇa vā iti cintyam yadi anumānena tat eva anumānañcintyate kathantena atha pratyakṣeṇa tat etat asat na hi pratyakṣeṇa anumānam śakyan draṣṭum tasya parokṣa viṣaya tvāt parokṣe ca pratyakṣasya āvṛtteḥ kathamparokṣa viṣaya tayā anumānasya svīkāraḥ na hi parokṣam aviṣayīkurvvatā tad viśeṣaṇam anumānam śakyam pratipattum 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,53	 atha tad viṣaya tayā na gṛhyate tathā sati tad anumānan na dṛṣṭam eva kathandṛṣṭa tvāt iti hetuḥ svarūpa samvedana mātram eva anumānam sva samvedana pratyakṣeṇa tathā dṛṣṭa tvāt atha evam eva vyavahāraḥ tathā sati vyavahāra mātrakam eva astu kimbheda abhiniveśena bheda abhiniveśa upi dṛśyate iti ced kindṛṣṭam apanetum aśakyam eva evam etat iti ca na saṅgatam sarvasya vyāmohasya apanetum dṛṣṭa tvenā śakya tvāt vyarthakaḥ eva bhavatām upadeśa dāna udyamaḥ bhavatām api vyarthakaḥ eva iti ced na adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭa abhimāna sambhavāt tathābhūta tva kathana arha tvāt tathā sati bheda abhiniveśam antareṇa eva bhavatā ambheda abhiniveśa abhimānaḥ iti tad yogaḥ eva yuktaḥ tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,54–2.1.2.5.1.3,57	 varttamānaḥ pratībhāsaḥ nirvibhāgaḥ na bheda bhākr pūrva apara pratyayayoḥ pratyekañca na bhidgrahaḥ samudāyāt tathā syāt ced guḍa nāgara kārya vat kāryan tatra dvayoḥ ekam iti sambhūya kāritā na kāryam iha kiñcid tu syāt pūrva apara cetasoḥ tatas parā tu vijñaptiḥ smṛti ssānu bhava antarā bhede ca anubhavaḥ na asti smṛtiḥ na anubhavāt vinā tayā samāna kālasya vedane prāptam advayam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,58	 icchu vikāra nāgarābhyām hi tad nivartti aroga nivarttanam svāsthyam vā kāryaṅ kriyate tena samudāya vyapadeśaḥ iha tu pūrva apara pratyayayoḥ sva artha mātra pratīti rūpayoḥ na kāryam aparam pratītiḥ tayoḥ ātma bhūte ca tasyāḥ ca bhede kim aparama bhinnam yad apekṣayā samudāyatā bhavet smṛtiḥ tayoḥ kāryam ekam pūrvva apara grahaṇa rūpāḥ na smṛtiḥ anubhavāt bhavantī tathābhūta rūpa anukāriṇī na ca anubhāvaḥ dvaya grāhī tatas na smṛtiḥ api kathantarhi rūpa sparśa vijñāna arthayoḥ mānasaḥ eṣa smārta vikalpaḥ bheda grahaṇam abhipretya tat uktam na ca atra tathā prakram na ca smṛtiḥ artha grahaṇe pravarttate yena svatantrā pravartteta smṛtyā ced dvayaṅ gṛhyate samāna kālam ekam eva tad avivekāt iti pratipāditam kiñca 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,59–2.1.2.5.1.3,63	 smṛtiḥ eva vivekasya grāhikā iti matam bhavet na eva anubhavaḥ iti etat sāmvṛtambheda vedanam tathā hi rakta ārakta avabhāse hi citram ekaṅ gatam bhavet pṛthak abhūtammayā dṛṣṭandrakṣyate ca tathā punar evam hi bheda a= asatiḥ anyathā na pravarttate tasmāt na bheda grahaṇaṅ kvacid sidhyati tattvataḥ na ca avabhāsa mātreṇa citrā citra viveki tā tasmāt pūrva anusāreṇa sarvvam etat vivecyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,64–2.1.2.5.1.3,67	 smṛti abhyāsādita pāṭavā tarhi pratyakṣāt bheda upagrahaḥ iti ced pratkṣeṇa na yat siddhantad abhyāsāt katham bhavet abhyāsāt api tasya iṣṭam yugapad pratibhāsanam tatra api tad vivekasya smṛtyā eva kṛtiḥ iṣyate evañca anubhā= a ārūḍhaḥ na bhedaḥ sidhyati kvacid smṛtau smṛti anubhavayoḥ kevala unubhavaḥ yadi aneka rūpa tā sā api na viviktā parasparam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,68–2.1.2.5.1.3,70	 viveka karaṇa aśakteḥ svayam anyena bhāvataḥ vicchidya śakyate netun na draṣṭunna anyathā ca yat bhinnena api hi kinteta hema upādeya tā kṛteḥ nanu smṛtiḥ api yadi pratyakṣa pratyaya samāna kāla janmā tena saha eka tām svīkuryāt sa vikalpakaḥ eva pratyakṣa ātmā prasaktaḥ tatas ca vikalpa kam prati akṣam iti prastutasya hāniḥ sa upam śuṣke patiṣyāmi iti kardame pātaḥ na sat etat 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,71–2.1.2.5.1.3,73	 bheda vādinam ārabhya smṛteḥ anyat tvam ucyate hetu svabhāva bhedena sakalasya vibhinna tā bheda vādinaḥ hi sakalaḥ eva bhedaḥ hetu bhedena svabhāva bhedāt tatra smṛteḥ vāsanā mātrakāt udayaḥ na tathā indriya vijñānasya smṛtiḥ parokṣa viṣayā na indriya ja sam vedanam atas stambha ādi vat eva bhedaḥ anayoḥ iti bā hyā rtha vā dī sva abhyupagamena prabodhyate abheda vādinaḥ tu ku toyam vibhāgaḥ na hi kāraṇa vat vittiḥ pratyakṣeṇa tad agrahāt anumānantu na adhyakṣam antareṇa pravartate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,74	 na khalu pratyakṣataḥ pūrva aparaḥ tu dvaya grahaṇam kārya abhimata grahaṇa kāle smaraṇam eva kāraṇa abhimate yadā sa gṛhyate tadā sva rūpeṇa eva grahaṇan na kāraṇa tvena kāryasya agrahaṇāt kārya grahaṇa kāle ca tat atītam smaraṇa gocaraḥ eva na ca smaraṇam ananubhūte na ca kāraṇa tvasya anubhavaḥ katham smaraṇam atha kārya kālepi tat anubhūyate iti matiḥ tathā sati pūrvarūpa tā anubhava abhāvāt samāna kāla tayā aśakya vivecana tvāt abhedaḥ eva kutas kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ atha smaraṇena pūrvam api kevalam etat anubhatam iti vyavasthāpyate tatas vivecanāt bhedaḥ eva 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,75–2.1.2.5.1.3,77	 atha kintat smaraṇam anumānam atha smṛti mātram yadi tāvat anumān aṅkatham pratyakṣam antareṇa na hi pratyakṣeṇa prāk pūrvvata aparigrahaḥ varttamāna grāhi sakalam eva adhyakṣam atha yat pratyakṣeṇa niyatau= adhi gṛhītamprareṇa amiśritantad eva para grahaṇa apekṣayā pūrvvakam iti vyavahāraḥ tat api asata na para apekṣayā pūrvva pratyakṣasya pravarttanam tatas tena na pūrva tvac gṛhyate sva ātmani rithateḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,78–2.1.2.5.1.3,80	 pūrvvaṃkam hi pratyakṣam sva kālam parigṛhṇat kathampara apekṣam ātmānañjānīyāt tathā param api pratyakṣam tatas eṣā pūrvva apara pratyakṣā na pūrvva para pratyakṣa grāhyā tatas smaraṇam api kathantatra pravarttate tasmāt na adhyakṣataḥ na api smṛtyā apekṣā pratīyate tatas samvidite kasmāt anumānampravarttate atha smaraṇa mātrantada pramāṇaṅkathantaḥ pratīyatām pūrva para vyapekṣā yena kārya vid

PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,100–2.1.2.5.1.3,101	 atha buddhi vat eva ghaṭa ādi rūpam api citram ekam eva kaḥ virodhaḥ iti ced pada ādi rūpasya ekatve tathā syāt aviveki tā ! yadi paṭa ādi rūpam aviveki bhavati tathā sati buddhi rūpam eva tat buddhi samāna dharma tvāt yathā hi buddhiḥ na pareṇa dṛśyate na uttara kālat nāpidhāya khaṇḍaśas tathā bāhyepi yadi arthaḥ tathā sati buddhiḥ eva sā mām a mātram eva bāhyam iti atha pidhāne sati tathā bhatonyaḥ eva utpadyate yaḥ tad ā rddhata ādinā dṛśyate tatas ca 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,103–2.1.2.5.1.3,107	 yaḥ yathā vidyate bhāvassa tathā eva upalabhyate iti kinna eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākāra īpya cetasi atra samādhiḥ yathā yathā dṛśyate tat tathā eva utpadyate yadi parokṣa paradṛśya tva bhāvena utpadyatān na saḥ kāraṇa antara janya tvan tathā na asti iti gamyatām vijñāna kāraṇebhyaḥ tu jātaḥ vijñānam eva hi na khalu parokṣa tayā vastu dṛśyate na api anya dṛśya tayā na ca kāraṇa antaraḥ cakṣuḥ ādi kāraṇataḥ eva tu grāhaka vat asya nirvṛttiḥ iti kathat na vijñāna tā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,108–2.1.2.5.1.3,111	 atha yāvat upalabhyate sarvu ā usau= arthaḥ eva sukhādayopi na samvedana svabhāvāḥ vastu eva tadā antaram iti paraḥ etat api asat yatas upalabhyasya vastu tvam yadi sarvasya kalpyate jñānasya anupalabhyasya sattā syāt apramāṇikā yena upalabhyate grāhyantat ceñjñā anantat api asat svayam eva upalabhyasya vedanam syāt tathā sati 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,112–2.1.2.5.1.3,114	 yadi grāhakasya anupalabdhiḥ tat asti iti kutas upalabhyatā upalambhāt upalambhakaḥ anumīyate upalabdhiḥ vā anyathā kena idam upalabdham iti paryanuyogevatarati yadi na artha āpattiḥ parihāraḥ eva na syāt tasmāt artha āpattyā vijñānasya sattā pratītiḥ tat asat upalabhyatāyāḥ vicārya tvāt pareṇa svayam eva ca iti para upalabhyatā hetuḥ yadi kena upalabhyate sā api anyena iti ced evam anavasthā prasajyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,115–2.1.2.5.1.3,117	 svayam eva upalabhya tve grāhyasya api prasaṅgi tat sva bodha rūpam sakalam ātma vat vastu gṛhyatām atha ātmā sva bodhaka rūpatayā upalabhyate rūpa ādi kantu para apekṣa tayā mayā upalabdham etat anyena upalabdham iti vyapadeśa niścayāt para apekṣā yadi jñātā kathat na para vedanam paramvinā para apekṣā para apekṣā kathat na sā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,118–2.1.2.5.1.3,121	 sandigdhā ipi para apekṣā sandigdhaiḥ ca eva niścitā aniścitasya hetu tvat niścayāya na vidyate atha ātma apekṣā vedya tvam siddham ātma sva vedanāt sva vedanam samastam syāt ātma vat na anya vedanam buddhiḥ anyā tathā na asti tāvat mātrāt samāptitaḥ atha api syāt yathā aham ātmā karttā iti jñātā iti ca sāmānidhikaraṇyan tathā ahaṅ kuṅyaṅghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ sa śakaṭam iti syāt tathā yathā mama samvedanan tathā mama rūpam sparśaḥ gandhaḥ iti api syāt tat api yat kiñcit 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,122–2.1.2.5.1.3,127	 sāmānādhikaraṇyasya prasādāt ekatā yadi ahaṅgaurādiḥ iti evam samāna ādhāra tā na kim yatra sāmānādhikaraṇyam yadi tatra ekatā avaśyantat abhāvāt aneka tā tadā bhavet aneka tve na sādhyat na viparyayaḥ tathā rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti asāmāna adhikaraṇyepi na bhedaḥ bādhyate bheda dṛṣṭyā ced śiraḥ rāhoḥ idam yadi sva samvittiḥ iha api asti bheda adhyāra upabādhanī 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,128–2.1.2.5.1.3,129	 yathā khalu rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti bheda adhyāropasta dvi paryaya upalambhena bādhyate tathā mama samvedanam mama rūpasya darśanam iti sva samvedana mātreṇa bādhyatām na hi nīla śarīra mukha ādi vedanambheda vat svarūpa samvedanasya pratipādanāt jātam samviditam vastu sāmānādhikaraṇyadṛkaḥ kinna asti yena samvedya samvidobhada kalpanā

PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,135	 avedanepi vedanā abhimānaḥ kasyacid yathā kṛtam etat mayā dṛṣṭam etat mayā iti tatra atīta tvāt avedanasya vismaraṇe bhavati abhimānaḥ iti ced kim idam vismaraṇat nāma viparīta adhyāropaḥ iti ced iha api samānam saṃskāra kṣayaḥ iti ced na saṃskārasya abhāvāt na hi saṃskārasya prāgabhāvam antareṇa kṣayaḥ na hi bhūtam kṣayam upanetum śakyam iti pratipāditam yadi ca saṃskāra abhāvaḥ kāraṇam viparīta adhyāropasya bheda adhyāropaḥ anvaya vyatireka adhyāropopi tathā astu iti kotra virodhaḥ na ca paramārthataḥ anvaya vyatireka pratipattiḥ anyatra abhimānāt abhimāna mātram eva sakalam iti tasmāt vivekataḥ grahaṇepi pūrva aparayoḥ eka tā abhyupagantavyā anyathā jñāna mātrakam na ca sa abhyupagantum śakyāḥ yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,136–2.1.2.5.1.3,138	 vivekīni nirasya anyadā viveki ca na īkṣyate na hi adṛśyamānam asti iti śakyam abhyupagantum na ca tasmin= asati avayava avivekinaḥ nirvivekasya avayavinaḥ iti śakya pratipādanam tasmāt bāhyam artham abhyupagacchatā sakṛt eva grahaṇam abhyupagantavyam nanu anekam ekena kathan dṛśyate sakṛt na hi darśanam ekatra pravṛttam anyatra tadā eva pravarttitum prabhavati yadi aneka darśanam evam eva na anyathā iti pratipāditam paramārthataḥ tu sva samvedanam ekam eva na anyena anyasya grahaṇa sambhavaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,139–2.1.2.5.1.3,143	 kiñca na grahaṇat nāma kasyacid api tu tad ākāratayā buddheḥ utpattiḥ na ca anekam eka syājanakam yatas kaḥ vā virodhaḥ bahavaḥ sañjāta atiśayāḥ sakṛt bhaveyuḥ kāraṇambuddheḥ yadi na ātma indriya ādi vat yathā eva hi indriyā artha m anaskārāḥ ātma indriya manortha sannikarṣā vā sakṛt ekam indriya vijñānam janayanti tathā yadi paramāṇavopi kaḥ virodhaḥ nanu anitya tvepi paramāṇu ūnāṅ kotiśayaḥ na hi paramāṇavaḥ sahakāri sannidhāna īpi mahāntaḥ bhavanti sūkṣma tāñcet na parityajanti kathaṅ grāhyāḥ tat api asat mahat tā atiśayaḥ na atra sāmarthya atiśayaḥ sa tu asāmarthyādahetu tvam amahatvāt tu na iṣyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,144	 yadi paramāṇoḥ svarūpa anukāridhī jana nandṛśya tā sā na asti eva iti siddha sādhya tā atha vijñāna mātra jananam tat asti eva na viruddham keśa ādiṣu darśanāt yathā eva keśāḥ davīyasi deśe asaṃsaktāḥ api ghana sanniveśa avabhāsinaḥ paramāṇavopi tathā iti na virodhaḥ tat api sūkṣmāḥ kathañcanayanti kevala vat eva iti ced kevalānām asāmarthyāt asāmarthyam eva hetu bhāva virodhi na sūkṣma tā keśa va deva na ca indriya ādīnām sthūla tā ādi viśeṣaḥ upajāyate sāmagrī avasthāyām atha ca sāmarthya viśeṣāt eva janakatvam kathantarhi pareṇa sannihitena tad sāmarthyāt na dṛśyate adṛśyamānaṅga katham asti kathañca samāna tve tat ekasya kāryan janayati na aparasya iti vibhāgaḥ dūra deśa tā ādi saha kāritā vibhāgāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,145–2.1.2.5.1.3,147	 nanu dūra deśa tvena api te eva keśāḥ kutas vibhāgaḥ sāmagryantara anupraveśāt iti vicāritam etat yadi kāraṇa tvāt grahaṇañcakṣuḥ ādīnām api grāhyatā prasaṅgaḥ kāraṇa tvāt tat āha hetu bhāvāt ṛte na anyā grāhyatā nāma kācana tatra buddhiḥ yat ābhāsā tasyāḥ tat grāhyam ucyate rūpa āyatana sāmānyena tad ākāra tā na paramārthataḥ tathā hi nīla paramāṇu sañcayāt nīla ākāra tā vijñānasya paramāṇu ākāra tā mā bhūt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.1.3,148–2.1.2.5.1.3,152	 nanu yadi paramāṇu ākāra tā na pratibhāti paramāṇūnām iyat nīlākāra tā iti kutas anyathā ayogāt iti na doṣaḥ yadi ca sakṛt anekan na gṛhyate tadā ayam aparaḥ doṣaḥ yat āha katham va avayavī grāhyaḥ sakṛt sva avayavaiḥ saha gṛhyate eva iti ced na na hi go pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sāsna ādīnām adarśane guṇa pradhāna adhigamaḥ saha api abhimataḥ yadi sampūrṇṇa aṅgaḥ na gṛhyeta sakṛt na api guṇa ādimān
