PVA_2.1.2.5.3,257–2.1.2.5.3,259	 atha api syāt yadi samvedanam aparat neṣyate tadā mokṣa avasthāyām sukha duḥkha vinirmuktaḥ katham muktaḥ bhaviṣyati svabhāvasya parityāge dharmi lopaḥ prasajyate na hi sva ātmā hātum śakyam vyatiriktāḥ tu sukha ādayaḥ viveka adhyāra upagocarīkṛtāḥ śabdāḥ eva hātum yadi nāma abhedena idanīntana avasthāyāmpratīyante yadi nāma idam iṣṭantathā api pramāṇa aprasiddhan na sidhyati na hi iṣṭam mama na sidhyati iti apramāṇa korthaḥ bhavati siddha viṣayaḥ na ca kāraṇāni iṣṭim anuvarttante na ca asya arthasya kāraṇam asti iti pramāṇam atra kiñcat idānīm eva bhāvanā āptau leśasya hāni dṛṣṭeḥ samvedana antaram eva idānīn tathā bhūtam upajāyate na tu sukha ādeḥ samvedanāt bheda avagamaḥ evam muktā avasthāyām api iti na virodhaḥ tasmāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.3,260–2.1.2.5.3,261	 tān= tān arthān upādāya sukha duḥkha ādi vedanam ekam āvirbhavat dṛṣṭan= a dṛṣṭantu anyat antarā nanu buddhi sukha dukha ādayaḥ iti vyapadeśa bhedāt eva bhedonyathārtha bhedam antareṇa katham vyapadeśa bhedaḥ na ekam eva idam harṣa viṣāda ādi aneka ākāra vivartamya śyāmaḥ tatra yatheṣṭam saṃjñāḥ kriyantām avasthā bheda pratyāyana artham eva bheda vyapadeśaḥ vīja aṅkura patra nāḍa vyapadeśa vat 
PVA_2.1.2.5.3,262–2.1.2.5.3,263	 saṃsarggāt avibhāgaḥ ced ayaḥ golaka vahni vat bheda abheda vyavasthā evam utsannā sarva vamtuṣu yadi dṛṣṭānta uḥ ti iti etāvatā eva saṃsṛṣṭa dvayam etat iti pramāṇam antareṇa eva kalpyate tathā sati sarvatra eka ākāra pratipatti ke stambha ādau na ekatva prasiddhiḥ eka tā prasiddhau ca tad samudāya rūpasya aneka tvasya api na prasiddhiḥ iti utsīdet sakala bhāva vyavasthā eka aneka vyatirekeṇa bhāvasya abhāvāt tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.5.3,264–2.1.2.5.3,267	 abhinna vedanasya aikye yat naivantad vibheda vat sidhyet asādhana tvesya na siddhambheda sādhanam tasmāt ekā siddhau dvayoḥ api asiddhiḥ tasmāt abhinna vedanam eva tad viparyayāt anekam iti yuktam sām khya sya tu bhinna ābhassita duḥkha ādirabhinnaḥ buddhi vedane abhinna ābhe vibhinne ced bheda abhedau kim āśrayau iti antaraḥ cokaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.3,268–2.1.2.5.3,269	 atha api syāt yathā vedanā cetān ādīnān caittānām mahā bhūmikā ādīnāt na parasparambhedaḥ upalabhyate athavā anupalakṣaṇa ipi bhedaḥ iṣyate tathā buddhi samvedanayoḥ api kinneṣyate abhinna vedanam ekam iti citta parikara bhūtaḥ ca etaiḥ anekāntaḥ tatra edam ucyate tiraskṛtānām paṭunā api ekadā bheda darśanāt pravāhe cita caittānām siddhā bheda vyavasthitiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.3,270	 na evam abhyupagamyate cittebhyaḥ caitasā na anyāḥ iti vacanāt abhyupagamya parihāraḥ yadi api ekena paṭutara vṛttinā cetanā ādi tiraskṛtam na paṭutara upalabdhi viṣayaḥ tathā api anyadā upalabdhi viṣayaḥ iti bhinnam eva vedanā āditaḥ cetanā ādikam anyadā sva rūpeṇa upalakṣamāṇa tvāt dinakara nikara parākṛta sva prakāśana śaktikam iva tārakā nikurumbam na tadā na asti na tu evam buddhi samvedanayoḥ ekadā api vivekasya spaṣṭa grahaṇam caitasāna antu kadācid kasyacid prakaṭībhūtasya grahaṇam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.3,271	 nanu vikalpa pratyayaḥ eva nimitta grahaṇa ādikam upalabhyate na avikalpake na tatra api santi eva caitasāḥ tathā hi kadācid anubhava anantaram nimitta vikalpaḥ kadācid idam kariṣyāmi ityādi vikalpaḥ tatonubhava anusāri vikalpatovasīyate santi avikalpāḥ api ca etāḥ iti tatas eṣām bhede yukti leśa upi vidyate na eṣā upi buddhi samvedanayoḥ iti parama arthaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,1–2.1.2.5.4,3	 prāk uktam yoginām jñānanteṣa an tat bhāvanā mayam vidhūta kalpanā jālam spaṣṭam eva avabhāsate catur ārya sattya viṣayam yoginām jñānam prāk uktam kutas hetoḥ tat bhavati iti āha bhāvanā mayam bhāvanā hetukam bhāvanā balena ca spaṣṭa ābham spaṣṭa ābha tvāt eva avikalpakam tatas pratyakṣam nanu arthasya sāmarthyena samudbhavāt varttamāna artha viṣayam āvikalpakam iti yuktam atīta anāgata viṣayasya avidyamāna viṣayasya ca kathambhāvanā mātrāt avikalpaka tā bhāvanā api eva bhūta kārya samarthā eva iti darśayati avidyamāna viṣayepi athāḥ hi 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,4–2.1.2.5.4,6	 kāma śoka bhaya unmāda caura svapna ādi upaplutāḥ abhūtān api paśyanti puratova sthitān iva na hi abhūta viṣayam samvedanam artha sāmarthyate upajāyate na ca tat sa vikalpakam puras sthita tvena darśanāt tathā ca sākṣātkaraṇa kāratayā avikalpakam pratyakṣam atha sa vikalpakam api sat spaṣṭa ābhanna avikalpakam iti ced tat na na vikalpa anubaddhasya spaṣṭa artha pratibhāsitā svapnepi smaryate smārttam na tat tādṛś arthavat 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,7	 vikalpasya parokṣa viṣayam eva rūpam iti pratipāditam tat ca yadi na syāt tat eva savi kalpakan na bhavet svapna īpi vikalpāḥ parokṣa viṣaya ākārāḥ samvedyante na ca te spaṣṭa avabhāsinaḥ viplava balāt tu spaṣṭa tāyāt na kiñcid svapna ādiṣu aspaṣṭam bhavet dṛśyante ca spapnenu bhūta smaraṇa ākārāḥ vikalpāḥ tasmāt na viplavāt vikalpasya api spaṣṭa tā tatas nirvikalpaḥ eva parisphuṭa ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,8–2.1.2.5.4,9	 atra vaibhāṣikāḥ āhuḥ nanu vastuni pramāṇa prasiddhe bhāvanā balāt spaṣṭa ābhata iti yuktam bhāvanayā avidyā kāluṣya apagame svena rūpeṇa arthasya pratibhāsanāt avidyamāne tu na svarūpām iti kasya pratibhāsaḥ yoginā antu atīta anāgata viṣaya jñānam atīta anāgatasya vidyamāna tvāt atra āha aśubhā pṛthivīkṛtsnā ādi abhūtam api dṛśyate spaṣṭa ābhat nirvikalpañca bhāvanā bala nirmitam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,10	 atattva manaskāra tvāt aśubha ādīnānna ākāśe pṛthivī ādīnām sambhavaḥ atha pṛthivī āt ayaḥ vi vidyante yogi pratyakṣaṇe dṛśyamāna tvāt na bhāvanā amātrataḥ eva yogī bhavati api tu śruta mayena jñānena arthān gṛhītvā yukti cintā mayena vyavasthāpya bhāvayatā antat niṣpattau yat avitatha viṣayantat eva pramāṇanta dyuktāḥ yoginaḥ tathā ca śamatha vipaśyanā yuga naddha vāhī mārgaḥ yaḥ gaḥ iti vacanam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,11	 tatra yoginām yadi api amī pratibhāsante tathā api kārya artham asau= atat tvarapa eva bhāvanā tatas atattva rūpeṇa eva teṣām amī pratibhāsante tena yadi yoginām a tattva rūpa tayā pratibhāsatante kathantāvatā sattvam tad smāt atattva rūpa tā eva teṣām yogi pratyaya pratibhāsanām api na hi pratibhāsa mātrāt tattvam api tu parīkṣātaḥ na ca kalpanā mātrāt udayam āsādayantī bhāvanā tattva pratipatti hetuḥ pramāṇa bala āyātā tu tathā iti ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,12–2.1.2.5.4,15	 bhāvanā mātra bhāvi tvam atattvam iti gīyate vastuddhāra pratīteḥ tu vastu nirṇṇayaḥ iṣyate bhāvanā mātrataḥ tu tasmāt bhūtam abhūtam vā yat yat eva abhibhāvyate bhāvanā pariniṣpattau tat sphuṭa ākalpa dhī phalam na hi sat eva bhāvyatenyasya api bhāvanā gocara tvāt tatas yadi yat eva abhibhāvyate tat tat sphuṭa ākalpa dhī phalam eva abhibhāvanam bhāvanā pariniṣpattau na hi bhāvanā anyathā bhavantī dṛśyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,16–2.1.2.5.4,17	 tatra pramāṇa samvādi yat prāk niṇarṇīta vastu vat tad bhāvanā jam pratyakṣam iṣṭam śeṣāḥ upaplavāḥ yat khalu bhāvanā bala bhāvi tvepya visamvāda sambhavi prāgnīrṇṇītavaḥ tu para loka catur ārya satti ādikam tat viṣayam eva pratyakṣam na tu kāma ādi viṣayam tad vispaṣṭa ābha tayā nirvikalpaka tvepi upaplavaḥ eva etena svapna ādi jñānānām visamvādinām apratyakṣa tā eva 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,18–2.1.2.5.4,20	 nanu bhāvanā balāt jñāna pratyakṣam iti sakala tīrthya saṅgata samvedana pratyakṣata aprasaṅgaḥ na hi teṣām bhāvanā na astiti śakyam etat tathā hi loka sādhāraṇaḥ yorthaḥ kasyacid sambhavet asau iti kid niyamaḥ nyāyam anatikramya varttate tatas ca teṣām api tī rtha kara antarāṇām bhāvanā prabhava pratyakṣa prasiddhā sva prakriyā prapañca antargatāḥ padārtha rāśayaḥ na bhavanti iti kutas etat tatas ca tad upadeśa topi vartitavyam anumāna ādinā bādhanāt na iti ced na 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,21–2.1.2.5.4,23	 atīndriyāḥ na samvedyān paśyanti ārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā ye bhāvān vacananteṣāt na anumānena bādhyate atha etat eva na jñāyate taiḥ idan dṛṣṭam iti yadi paśyanti na bādhyate etat vacanam yadi evambhagavatā api vyajñāyi satya ādikam iti kutas etat tat asat tāthāgate hi vacasi pramāsam vādaḥ īkṣyate pramāṇa bādhā tu anyeṣām atas draṣṭā tathāgataḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,24–2.1.2.5.4,27	 nanu pauruṣeyampramāṇam apramāṇam eva atīndriya irthe tat kathantena sādhanambādhanam vā arthasya atīndriyasya samāna viṣayā yasmāt bādhya bādhaka tā sthitiḥ atīndriye ca saṃsāri pramāṇan na pravarttate yogi jñānena api teṣāmbādhanam eva tathā hi tāthāgatam vacaḥ teṣām virodhena vyavasthite tad vacaḥ hetu vijñāna bādhita tvam prakāśayet 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,28–2.1.2.5.4,31	 tat etat viparyayepi tulyam tat asat yatas atīndriya artham kathayet kevalam yadi vedakaḥ tad vacastaḥ pravartteta na kaścid api paṇḍitaḥ atīndriya artham hi vacaḥ sarveṣām eva vidyate paraspara viruddhañca tatas tatra apravarttanam tasmāt param pratipādayatā śakya paricchedaḥ eva itaraiḥ pratipādayitavyāḥ asambhavān naim iti ced yogi jñānam api tatra kutas sambhavati iti cintyam etat 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,32–2.1.2.5.4,35	 vedaḥ svabhāva siddhaḥ vā yogī tad pratipādakaḥ iti cerd nirṇṇayaḥ bhāve vastuni atra pramā kutas atha śabda paricchadaḥ na upādeyaḥ tad arthinām iti ayuktat na duḥkhasya vicchitteḥ apradhāna tā na khalu sakala duḥkha vyapagamaḥ na upādeyaḥ tathā hi ātma ātmīya graha āveśāt jantūnānduḥkha saṅgatiḥ tasya vyapagame sarvu aduḥkhānām pralaya udayaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,36–2.1.2.5.4,40	 sukhānām api ced evanduḥkha abhāvaḥ param sukham yadi samvedayan= āste sadā duḥkha viparyayam tatas param ṛpādeyaṅ kim anyat yukti saṅgatam pradīpasya iva nirvāṇam iti ced na apramāṇakam idam yatas dāha= cheda ādinā jñānam vicchettum hi na śakyate tatas prabandha āvicchedāt āste eva nirākulam tām avasthā aṅgatasya asya vaimukhyam syāt vivekataḥ udvejanīye vaimukhyam yadi kasmin virodhitā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,41–2.1.2.5.4,44	 śamatā darśinaḥ tasya vaimukhyam api kiṅkṛtam na asya pīḍā kṛtaḥ kecid samādhi bala bhāvinaḥ kṣudh duḥkha ādi samādhānāt sarvvam eva pratyīyate śastra ādi pīḍā api tatas sarvvā eva asya pratīyate bhāvanā balataḥ sarvva śaurya dherya ādi sambhavi dhṛtimvinā hi na āhāraḥ kasyacid paripuṣṭaye dhṛteḥ yogāt tu yaḥ kaścid āhāra paripuṣṭaye vinā api ca evamārādasya athasya āpti sambhavaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,45–2.1.2.5.4,48	 janma antara ādi samvittiḥ abhyāsāt eva jāyate tatas karmma phala jñānam tatas saru u asya vedanam kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya viśeṣeṇa viniścaye atīta anāgata jñānam asya bhāvi parisphuṭam bhāvanā avalataḥ jñānambāhyānām api bhāvi ced tat etat iṣyatesmābhiḥ sarvu ākārantu tāyinām sthira madhya akṣaṇambhāva nairātmya ādi pravedanam rāga ādi vyākula tvāt na tīrthyānām vedanan tathā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,49–2.1.2.5.4,52	 evam bhūta artha vacasaḥ tad karttuḥ jñāna vat gatiḥ pariśuddhamvacaḥ na asti pariśuddha vidamvinā sva tarka anusmṛteḥ eṣa prapañcaḥ kcasām yadi bhāvanā jñānam api asti sat artha ūnādaraḥ na hi tatosya vīta rāga tve sarva artha jñāna sambhavaḥ samāhitasya sakalam cakāsti iti viniścitam sarveṣām vīta rāgāṇām etat kasmāt na vidyate rāga ādi kṣaya mātre hi taiḥ yatnasya pravarttanāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,53–2.1.2.5.4,56	 tad nivṛttau tatas teṣāṅa kṛtārtha ātma abhimāninām yatnaḥ na eva uttaraḥ tāvat viśrānti sukha lipsayā punar kāla antare teṣām sarvu ajña guṇa rāgiṇām alpa yatnena sarvajña tvasya siddhiḥ avāritā pradīpasya iva nirvāṇam iti ced tat na sambhavi niṣkleśe hi ātmani kutas tasya vairāgya sambhavaḥ prekṣā pūrva kṛtaḥ tasya tad ādhikyena vāñchitam yadi tasya api kim hānim asau vāñchāyanāḥ dṛtaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,57–2.1.2.5.4,60	 na vīta rāgasya sukham yoṣit āliṅgana ādi jam vīta dveṣasya tu kutas śatru senā vimarda jam vīta mohasya na sukham ātmīya abhiniveśa jam tatas kintā dṛśā tena kṛtyam mokṣeṇa janminām tat etat asat ava ittham madya pāna ādi cintyatām madya pāna ādi sukham dvijāḥ na atra asti santatam purīṣa bhakṣaṇa sukhat nāga kroḍa janminām āma māṣam a asiddhi sukhat na eva asti arakṣāḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,61–2.1.2.5.4,64	 svāmi prasāda ādi sukham kim abhṛtyasya vidyate śirasaḥ tāḍana sukha nnādāsasya vikāśayat iti sarvam idam prārthym āyātam adhimuktiṣu na apārasīke mātrā ādi śroṇī saṅgamaḥ ipi aprāptasya ca avīcim tad viyoga sukham kvacid tatas naraka pāta ādi sa vaṃmiṣyeta janmibhiḥ atha viśiṣṭam iṣyate sukhan tathā sati tat eva asmad īpsitam āyātam atha sarva vedanasya katham sambhavaḥ katham vā tatra samvādaḥ katham vā sakala vedane sakala rāga ādi para citta sākṣāt karaṇena rāga ādita ādayaḥ doṣāḥ iti āha 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,65–2.1.2.5.4,67	 aneka upāyam adbhāvāt kāla vaipulya yogataḥ abhyāsāt sarva vid tvasya prāptiḥ asya iti yuktimat asaṅkhyepa kalpa tayā abhyāsaḥ hi kintat asti yat na prāpayati samvādaḥ tu punar asmākam sarva vedanam prati na astotīṣyate etra etat tathā ca uktam asarva vid sarva vidam kaḥ katham tvām avabhātsyate svayam vidita māhātmya vistarāya namaḥ stute 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,68–2.1.2.5.4,71	 na asarva jñaḥ sarvajñam jānīte tathā mā bhikṣavaḥ pudgalaḥ pudgalam praviṇotu aham vā praviṇuyām yaḥ vā syāt yadvidhaḥ iti sarva vedate tu sarva ātmanā para santāna rāga ādi vedane rāga ādimattvam iti na sat tathā hi para santāna samvittau vīta rāgi tva vedane tasya rāgi tvam api asti iti etat atyanta durghaṭaḥ yadā eva asau rāgī para rāga vedane tathā para vīta rāga vedane vīta rāga upi ubhayam api tadā eva iti ced na 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,72–2.1.2.5.4,74	 ekanā api anubhūta tva abhāve rāgaḥ katham mataḥ taṭa sthasya hi samvittaḥ na rāgi tva ādi sambhavaḥ tathā hi na ghaṭa vedane ghaṭī bhavati evam rāgādayopi para santāna antargatāḥ taṭa stha tayā avagamyamānāḥ na rāgi tvat nirvarttayanti atha sarva ātmanā vedane yathā svayam vetti asau tathā yogyapi iti na rāgi tva hāniḥ tat ayuktam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,75–2.1.2.5.4,78	 tad rṛpeṇa eva vedya tve svayam rāgi tva sambhave katham api avyavasthāpyam para rāga ādi vedanam na hi tad ātmā ananupraveśe para rāga ādi vedanam saḥ eva ātmīyaḥ rāgaḥ iti ayam api aparaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced tathā hi taṭa stha tvena vedya tve tattvena āvedanam bhavet tad ātmanā tu vedya tve rāgitā eva prasajyate tat asat tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,79–2.1.2.5.4,82	 rāga ādinā para sthena tasya vāc kāya vikriyā para sthāḥ na bhavatthā iva tasya rāga ādi vāsanā vāsanā sāmarthya āyātaḥ hi rāgaḥ rāgitam āvahati na para vāsanā abala āyātaḥ siddha upasthāyitayā samvedyamānaḥ nanu svarūpa samvedane romāñca dikāya vikāropi kasmāt asya na bhavati vacana vikāraḥ ca na sat etat kāya vācoḥ vikāra uyam vāsanā bala sambhavī prahīṇa vāsanasya asya dvayoḥ api na sambhavaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,83–2.1.2.5.4,85	 nanu bhāvanā balāt eva para citta vedanam bhāvanā saṃskāraḥ ca vāsanā tatra bhāvanā saṃskāra sambhave kathat na vāsanāḥ na hi bhāvanā vāsanāyāḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ na yuktam etat tathā hi gamakasya viśeṣasya tātparyeṇa upalakṣaṇe viśeṣa pratibhāsosti para cittasya vedane liṅga viśeṣa upalakṣaṇe hi tatra bhāvanā vyāpāraḥ na ca tatra arthasya gamyasya bhāvanā satyām vā na ātma sambandhi tayā tatas tatra vāsanā abhāvāt pratibhāsā īpya rāgitāḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,86–2.1.2.5.4,89	 anena aśuci rasa ādi vedanepi doṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ apavitra tva yogaḥ syāt indriyeṇa asya vedane karma jena na ca anyena bhāvanā bala bhāvinā bhāvanā balāt rasanam utpādya yadi veda nam adoṣaḥ eva tadā na hi svapne agamyā gamane doṣaḥ asattya tā tasya tena adoṣaḥ iti ced samvāde sati katham asattyatā yadā mātuḥ api svapnaḥ tathābhūtaḥ tadā bhavet tad āgamya āgatau doṣaḥ bhavataḥ kinna sambhavī 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,90–2.1.2.5.4,93	 tasmāt parama tamasat krameṇa vedane anādi vastunaḥ vedanam katham iti ced na akrameṇa eva sarva arthānām pravedanāt yathā sakala śāstra arthaḥ su abhyastaḥ pratibhāsate manasi ekakṣaṇena eva tathā ananta ādi vedanam yathā hi śāstra arthaḥ su abhyāsate eka kṣaṇaḥ eva manasi pratibhāti tathā ana ādi ananta vedanam api parimāṇavat tvāt śāstrasya iti ced na parimāṇa vat iti pratibhāsanam api tu abhyāsāt tat sakalam śāstra abhidheyam pratibhāsitam tena smaraṇe pratibhāti iti ced na apūrvasya api śāstra arthasya bhāsanāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,94–2.1.2.5.4,96	 nanu śāstra arthaḥ parasparam sambaddhaḥ tatra kenacid pratyāsatti nimittena aparam api pratibhāti na tu evam anādi anantānām iti katham apūvasya pratibhāsaḥ iti sarve samānam tathā hi kārya kāraṇa sambandha vinābhūtāḥ na vidyate pratyāsattiḥ padārthānām vyavahāra īpi asau na kim kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi padārthānām śāstre pratyāsattiḥ tatas pūrvasya pratibhāsanam evam ca vyavahārepi tulyaḥ tathā hi ayam asya vikāraḥ evaṃbhūtena asya kāraṇena bhavitavyam tat ca kāraṇam iyat kāryāṇām pāramparyeṇa janakam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.4,97–2.1.2.5.4,101	 īdṛśāni asya pūrvāṇi yena asya sahakāriṇaḥ na santi santi vā iti etat para citta vidīkṣate pūrva janma ādi vittau ca pāraṃparyāt parasparam sambaddham sarvathā vetti tatas kalpa antarāṇi api kalpāt kalpa antara utpattau kārya kāraṇa tā vidā vetti sarvam jagattatvam tasya ca avāntara sthitim iti sakala padārtha vedanam sa kalanayān avadhūya darśitam iha nayam anusṛtya yat parantat api sukhena paraiḥ parīyatām 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,1	 yadi bhāvanā balataḥ spaṣṭa ākāram pramāṇaṅ kalpanā jñānat na tarhi pramāṇam spaṣṭa ākārasya abhāvāt atha arthe aspaṣṭa ākāra tā iṣyatenyathā na pramāṇam svarūpepi tarhi iṣyatām na svarūpantadeva spapṭa ākāram arthaḥ tu na tathā tatas svarūpe tad nirvikalpakam arthe tat sa vikalpakam iti smaraṇam artha smaraṇam svarūpe pratyakṣam kutas etat svarūpe tat abhra antam arthe bhrāntam iti svarūpasya ananya samvedya tvāt para rūpasya tu vedanā antareṇa tatas tena tasya anyathā vedanāt bādhā tatas bhrāntiḥ na hi svarūpe smaraṇasya saṃbhavaḥ tadā eva tasya utpatteḥ vedanāt ca yadi ca svarūpam api pūrvam āsīt idānīm na asti iti na idānīm smaraṇam bhavet atha tena eva idānīm smaraṇam tat idam āyātam mṛtena api kukkuṭena vāsitavyam atas eva āha 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,2–2.1.2.5.5,8	 kalpanā api sva samvitta āviṣṭāḥ na arthe vikalpanāt svarūpasya avikalpa tvāt parokṣa tva aprasiddhitaḥ tena eva tasya grahaṇe sākṣātkaraṇa saṃbhavāt atas eva samvedanam pratyakṣa muktam yatas śabda artha grāhi yat yatra tad jñānantatra kalpanā svarūpaḥ ca na śabda arthaḥ tatra adhyakṣam atokhilam sa vikalpasya itarasya ca svarūpan na śabda arthaḥ na sāmānyat na parama artha viṣayaḥ tathā sati śabda ayojanā abhāvāt sāmānya saṃsarga abhāvāt ca avikalpaṃka śabda artha grāhi ca jñānam kalpanā tasmāt avyaktam spaṣṭa abhatā kathat na bhavati spaṣṭam eva tat kim ucyate na iti yatas tad rūpasya parityāgāt aspaṣṭam iti gīyate svarūpasya parityāgaḥ katham iti avagamyatām 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,9^1	 na hi svarūpanti aktum śakyam tad parityāge samvedanat na asti iti uktam tathā ca na svarūpa samvedanam na para samvedanam iti sarva abhāvaḥ eva atha artha apatyāḥ vedanam iti na svarūpa vedanam na arthāpatteḥ api svarūpam samvedanena eva gantavyam atha atra api arthāpattiḥ sā api tathā iti anavasthā artha samvedane siddhe yadi arthāpattiḥ kimartha saṃvedane arthāpattyai arthe siddhe na artha saṃvedane siddhaḥ iti ced kā iyam arthasya siddhiḥ yadi utpattiḥ sarva artha vedana prasaṅgaḥ atha artha jña ananta dāyam arthaḥ artha jñānāt artha jñāna vedanam iti sādhvī vācā uyaktiḥ atha arthāt jñāpanāt artha jñāna vedanam kim idam arthasya jñāna tvam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,9^2	 jñāne pratibhāsanañceta ajñāte jñāte jñāna pratibhāsanaṅkatham jñāyate pratibhā samāna ūrthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ eva iti ced pratyakṣa prasiddhiḥ ced tathā eva astu kimartha antara kalpanayā idam eva pratyakṣam anyathā ghaṭeta yadi pratyakṣam jñānan na syāt cakṣuḥ vyāpāre sati etat bhavati anyathā na iti kim jñānena śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam iti ced kā iyam śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ jñānam iti ced tat jñānam parokṣam katham jñātam śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ eva jñānam iti ced śrota ādi vṛttiḥ pratyakṣā tena jñāyate jñānam tu kutas anyathā kim śrotra ādi vyaktyā iti cetaḥ kim bhavataḥ prayojanam apekṣya bhāvāḥ bhavanti 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,10–2.1.2.5.5,11	 kāraṇāt eva bhāvānām bhāvaḥ na eṣām prayojanāt prayojanamvitā bhāvaḥ na bhavet anyathā tava yadi nāma aśrotra samat makhī bhatam jñānasya kim āyātam yadi jñānanna udapatsyata parokṣaḥ eva arthaḥ syāta yadi jñānamat pannam arthasya kim āyātantathā api parokṣaḥ eva syāt na hi jñāna pratyakṣatā parokṣa tva prasaṅgātaḥ tasyāḥ parokṣa tvātaḥ dṛśyate ced yathā tarhi dṛśyate tathā eva astu tava api katham iti ced tad ākāra tā jñānasya arthasya jñāta tvad nāma sā ca sva samvedana gamyā na tad ākāra jñāna antara gamyā yena anavasthā patet tasmāt sva samvedanam eva jñāna svarūpa sādhanam iti yuktam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,12–2.1.2.5.5,15	 yadi tarhi bhāvanā balāt upajāta vaiśadyam pratyakṣam svapna jñānam api pratyakṣa prāptam avisamvādaka tvam api tatra asti eva tatra api gamana prāptayaḥ na etat asti yatas bhrānti samvṛ saṃjñānam anumāna anumānikam smārtta abhilāṣikañcā iti pratyakṣa ābham sa taimiram dvividhaḥ pratyakṣa ābhaḥ vikalpaḥ viplavaḥ ca punar caturvidhaḥ tat āha trividhaṅkalpanā jñānam āśraya upaplava udbhavam avikalpam ekañca pratyakṣa ābhañcaturvidham 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,16^1	 saḥ eva dvividhaḥ vikalpasya tridhā bhedāt caturvidhaḥ kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣantataḥ vikalpaḥ trividhopi pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ tatra bhrānti jñānam mṛgatṛṣṇā ādiṣu toya ādi kalpanā pravṛtta tvāt pratyakṣa ābhāsam samvṛti satsvartha antara adhyāropāt tad rūpa kalpanā pravṛtta tvāt anumāna tad phala ādi jñānam pūrva anubhūta kalpanayā iti na pratyakṣam prabhāsvara spanda māna marīci nicaya pratibhāsam pratyakṣam eva toya ādi kalpanā tu pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ toye asākṣāt karaṇa ākāra tvāt samvṛti satsu api rūpa ādi grahaṇa mātram eva pratyakṣam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,16^2–2.1.2.5.5,18	 avayavini tu tad samavāya kāraṇa tvena abhimatena sākṣātkaraṇam artha antarasya sparśa ādeḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya adhyāropāt dravyasya vā pūrva pūrva pratyayena kalpitasya na avayavī rūpa ādi vyatirekeṇa kvacid pratyakṣe pratibhāsitaḥ iti anumāna jñānam liṅga jñānam tat phalam liṅga jñānan na pūrva anubhūtim antareṇa etat ca anumāna jñānam kvacid apratyakṣam kvacid tu pratyakṣam eva akasmāt dhūmāt agni pratipattau na hi pūrva anubhūta kalpanā asti avikalpya katham liṅga pratipattiḥ iti ced tathā eva dṛṣṭeḥ na khalu dṛṣṭam anyathā bhavitum yuktam kasmāt punar kalpanā prabheda nirdeśaḥ udāharaṇa prapañca artha tvāt iti ced na lakṣaṇasya abhedāt prapañca mātra nirdeśe tu atiprasaṅga na etat asti anyat asti prayojanam iti tathā hi anakṣaja tu asiddhi artham ukte dve bhrānti darśanāt siddha anumādi vacanam sādhanāya eva pūrvayoḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,19	 akṣa jam eva tat iti pareṣa ambhra antiḥ mṛgatṛṣṇikā jala jñāne tathā hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyadeśyam avyabhicāri pratyakṣam iti atra lakṣaṇe marīci jala jñāna vyavacchedāya avi abhicāri grahaṇam kṛtam yadi punar anindriya jam eva tat syāt prathama padena eva vyāvarttanāt kim etad arthena avyabhicāri grahaṇena dvi candra ādi jñānasya anartha saṃbhatasya nivṛtti artham iti ced na artha sannikarṣa grahaṇena eva tasya vyāvarttanāt indriya grahaṇena anindriya jasya vyāvarttanam samvṛti sat viṣayasya tu indriya jatvā abhimānaḥ pareṣām sa vivādaḥ eva anumāna ādi vacanantarhi vyartham na hi tena anidra yaja tvam sādhyate siddha tvāt anumāna ādiḥ anindriya ja tu asya atra ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,20–2.1.2.5.5,23	 siddhasya api anumāna ādeḥ sādhana tvāt upātta tā dṛṣṭāntena hi siddhena sarvatra eva prayojanam na hi asiddham asiddhena sādhyate kim atra bhrānti kāraṇam yena sādhya tā pūrvayoḥ iti ced āha saṅketa saṃśrayānyārtha samāropa vikalpane pratyakṣa āsannivṛtti tvāt kadācid bhrānti kāraṇam saṅketa saṃśrayaḥ vayavī saṃketa mātrasya tad vyavasthā hetu tvāt anya arthaḥ jalam samāropodhikā adhya āropaḥ vikalpanam smaraṇam jalam hi pūrva dṛṣṭa tvāt smaryate na tasya āropaḥ eva kevalaḥ darśanasya samatayā bhāvāt athavā viparyayaḥ āropaḥ jalasya vikalpanam avayavinaḥ ubhayatra vā ubhayam iti te ca samāropa vikalpane pratyakṣasya indriya jasya āsannivṛttī kadācid abhavata iti īdam asanna vṛtti tvam vā tatra bhrāntikāraṇantaḥ eva vā tena bhrānti kāraṇam iti asmin bhrānti kāraṇe sati dṛṣṭānta dvāreṇa anumānam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,24–2.1.2.5.5,26	 yathā eva iyam parokṣa artha kalpanā smaraṇa ādikāḥ samayā apekṣiṇī na artham pratyakṣam pratyavasyati tathā anubhūta smaraṇam antareṇa ghaṭa ādiṣu na pratyayonuyan= tat ca pratyakṣāt parihīyate anumādi kalpanā hi sambandha grahaṇa apekṣiṇī sambandha grahaṇam eva ca samayaḥ tatassambandhāt parokṣa arthaṃpratipattiḥ iti na adhyakṣataḥ sākṣātkaraṇena hi sā bhavet evac ghaṭa ādiṣu api ekena kenacid indriyeṇa rūpa ādi kampratipannantataḥ pariśeṣe rasa ādau smaraṇam pūrva anusārataḥ rasa ādau= eva smaraṇam na avayavinī iti ced na rasa ādi vyatirekeṇa tasya anupalakṣaṇāt yat etat śuklantad eva karkaśam iti ādi eka tā pratipatti viṣayaḥ vayavī iti ced tathā hi na tāvat varṇṇasya sparśasya ca ekatā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,27–2.1.2.5.5,28	 tatas ekatva pratītiḥ eva va syāt yadi avayavī na bhavet yadi api avayavī tathā api katham varṇṇa sparśa ādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam na hi tayoḥ eka tā eka adhikaraṇa tvāt ekatā iti ced upacāraḥ eṣaḥ na ca atra upacāra pratipattiḥ pratipattau ca upacārasya na avayavi siddhi ssyāt anyathā api upacāreṇa sāmānya dhikaraṇya sambhavāt samāna deśatā bhāvāt eka artha viniyogataḥ tad vikāra vikāri tvāt ekatā vyapadiśyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,29–2.1.2.5.5,32	 yaḥ eva deśaḥ sparśasya saḥ eva rūpasya pratīyate tena aikatā adhyavasāyaḥ yat eva udaka ādi dhāraṇam sparśasya kāryantatra eva rūpasya api vyāpāraḥ spṛśye masṛṇa tām āpādyamāne rūpasya api ca ekacikya āditā tatas ekam eva idam iti vyavahāra adhyavasāyāḥ yadi punar anyat eva adhikaraṇam rūpa ādhibhyaḥ teṣa antasya vivekena pratipatyā bhāvyam apratīyam ānantu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam asat iti atha avayavinam antareṇa parasparasya kasmāt na vighaṭanam sati api avayavini etat kasmāt na vighaṭanam traye samavāya sambandha balāt tasya api astu viyogitā ayam eva svabhāvaḥ ced ādau= eva idam ucyate rūpa ādīnām svabhāvoyam sva hetoḥ upapatti bhāj samavāyasya nityasya kutas etat vicintyatām 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,33	 yadi api avayavī paraḥ tathā api tritayam jātam kasmāt trayasya api parasparasya na vighaṭanam atha samavāyaḥ hetuḥ avighaṭane asau= api kasmāt na vighaṭate tasya saḥ eva svabhāvaḥ iti api na uttaram rūpa ādīnām eva sa svabhāvoḥ tu kimartha antara kalpanayā rūpa ādīnāñca sva hetoḥ svabhāvaḥ iti yuktimat etat samavāyasya tu ahetukasya kutas svabhāvaḥ samavāya āśrayasya sva hetoḥ sa svabhāvaḥ yena samavāyaḥ evam iti ced tat kim anayā paramparayā taiḥ sva hetoḥ tathābhūtaiḥ bhāvyam yena samavāyaḥ teṣām avighaṭanam kuryāt tad hetuḥ eva tad avighaṭane hetuḥ iti kim atra nyūnam āste yad artham paramparā iṣyate evam etat dṛśyate iti ced bhavatu yadi dṛśyate dṛśyamānasya anyathā vikalpayitum aśakyatvāt rūpa ādayaḥ eva tu dṛśyante parasparam aviyuktā na tu tad adhikam iti eṣām eva sa svabhāvaḥ kalpyatām tasmāt avayavi adhyāropaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,34	 tat asya nyāya prapañcasya pradarśana arthan daṣṭānta dāṣṭa antika upanyāsaḥ sa taimirika grahaṇam kim artham taimiram api sa vikalpakam iti kaścid tad vyāvarttana arthantat vacanam anyathā smārtta ādi grahaṇena asya api grahaṇāt pṛthak upādānam anarthakam yadi avikalpa kaṅ kalpanā apoḍha tvāt pratyakṣam prāptam na sarvaṅ kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣam api tu abhra anta tve sati abhra antaṅ kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣam na sarvam yatas prakalpya apavāda viṣayam tad apavarjite tu utsargaḥ pravarttate kopa vādaḥ iti ced 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,35–2.1.2.5.5,38	 apavādaḥ caturthotra tena uktam upaghāta jam kevalantatra timiram upaghāta upalakṣaṇam trividhāt vikalpāt caturthan taimira grahaṇam apavādaḥ kalpanā apoḍham iti sāmānyena pratyakṣa vidhānam ataimiram iti viśeṣe pratyakṣa ābhāsa tā vidhānam viśeṣa vihitañca sāmānya vihitasya bādhakam kim atra pramāṇam sāmānya pratipattiḥ viśeṣa pratipattyā bādhyate yatas prāc adarśana mātreṇa anumānam śeṣavat yadā kalpanā apoḍha tā mātrāt vipakṣasya pravarttate tasya atīva prasaktasya viśeṣe bādhakam sphuṭam tatas tad aparatra eva tasya pūrvasya vṛttitā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,39	 nahi sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam adarśana mātreṇa vipakṣasya anumānam apareṇa pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā na bādhyate tena pratyakṣa siddhaḥ sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ viśeṣe bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tad artha sūcakayoḥ api vacasoḥ saḥ eva bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ ācāryaḥ tarhi sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa anumānāt lakṣaṇam kasmāt āha na ācāryeṇa viśeṣataḥ dṛṣṭam eva anumānam abhipretam tasya tu yorthaḥ saḥ ekena vacasā nirdeṣṭum aśakyaḥ iti apavāda sahitam na uktavān kimarthantarhi kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇa sahitam eva abhrānta grahaṇan na kṛtam kiṅga ja snāna aṅgīkaraṇena sa taimira grahaṇena ca apavādena abhrānta grahaṇa arthaḥ labdha vyoni athā= a iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ anantaram eva kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇasya labhyatām iti ced na viśeṣa abhāvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,40–2.1.2.5.5,43	 arthataḥ hi asamānānām ānantaryam akāraṇam bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ ca pramāṇa viṣayaḥ sūcitaḥ yathā syāt iti evaṅkāraṇam na hi avaśyambādhakam anantaram eva bhavati abhra anta grahaṇam eva kasmāt na kriyate iti ced sattyam etat sākṣātkāri hi pratyakṣan tat ca abhra anta grahaṇena śakyat nidarśayitum na hi asākṣāt karaṇa ākāram abhra antam sa vikalpakasya bhrānta tvāt pare tu sa vikalpam api sākṣātkaraṇa ākāram abhra antam icchati tad anurodhena dvayam etat ucyate tathā ca āha viśeṣaṇa lakṣaṇe parama tāpekṣam sava tu avikalpakāḥ eva iti athavā pratipattrapekṣaḥ saklaḥ bādhya bādhaka tānayaḥ adṛṣṭa bādhakaḥ pūrvvam sāmānyena avagacchati 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,44	 na ācārya abhiprāyañjānāti viśeṣa utra abhimataḥ iti bādhaka darśanāt avagacchati asau= api paścāt viśeṣam apauruṣeye tu vacasi pramāṇa mūla tva abhāvāt na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ pauruṣeye tu pūrva buddheḥ bhrānta tā jñāpyate pramāṇa mūlayā parayā buddhyā na tu vedāt bhrānta buddhi udayaḥ tathā veda pramāṇa tā sarvasya tathā tva prasaṅgāt abādhane pramāṇam eva iti ced na paścāt api bādhaka sambhavāt paryāya ālocaya tonyaḥ eva arthaḥ bhavati iti pramāṇa ipi evam iti ced na pramāṇasya sthira tvāt tathā ca pramāṇa viruddhaḥ āgama arthaḥ tyajyate veda vādibhiḥ anyathā arthavāda vyākhyānam anibandhanam syāt tasmāt pauruṣeyaḥ eva vacasi bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ taimiram iti eva bādhakan na kāmalā ādi iti ced āha sarvam eva tena upaghāta jamuktam timiram punar upaghāta upalakṣaṇat na upaghāta antarāṇām vyāvarttakam yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,45–2.1.2.5.5,47	 taimirasya artha śūnya tvāt asākṣāt karaṇa tvataḥ pratyakṣa ābhāsa tāndatvā pratyakṣa tva nirākriyā sā ca artha śūnyatā kāmalā vahala avalepa lupta locana balānām vijñānasya na nyūnākalayā api tena upalakṣaṇam sa taimira grahaṇam iti nyāya vādibhiḥ avagantavyam timiram aśeṣa upaghāta upalakṣaṇam anye tu kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇam pratyudāharaṇam eva etat na apavādaḥ tat āha 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,48–2.1.2.5.5,49	 mānasantat apī iti eke teṣāṅ granthaḥ virudhyate nīla dvi candra ādi dhiyām hetu rakṣāṇi api iti ayam mānasam eva etat dvi candra ādi jñānam marīcikā jala jñāna vat tathā hi marīcikāsu prathamam indriya jñānam abhra antam eva upajāyate paścāt tu jala anubhava vāsanā prabodhāt sa vikalpakam jala jñānam sa ca prabodhaḥ marīci darśanāt eva sādṛśya bhājaḥ marīcayaḥ evaṃdharmāṇaḥ tathā atra api candra viṣayam abhra antam prathamam jñānam paścāt dvi candra ākāraḥ vikalpaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,51–2.1.2.5.5,55	 tatra kecid āhuḥ stimita akṣṇoḥ madhye sthātā saḥ ekaḥ candraḥ ubhaya pāśve krameṇa upalabhyamānaḥ kāla saukṣmyāt yugapad eva lakṣyate pārśva dvaye ca dvi tva adhyāropaḥ teṣāṅ grantha virodhaḥ yadi api indriya vijñapteḥ kāraṇam paramāṇavaḥ atad ābhatayā na asyāḥ akṣa vat viṣayoṇavaḥ te eva hi cakṣuḥ ādi paramāṇavaḥ tathā anyathā ca bhavantaḥ dvi candranīla ādi ābhāsa hetavaḥ dvi candra pratibhāsasya hi mānasa tve na indriya hetu toktiḥ samarthāḥ atha mānasa tve paramparayā hetu tvam indriyasya na virudhyate sākṣāt hetu tvam indriyasya mānasa tvena viruddham dvi candra pratyaye atra ucyate pāramparyeṇa hetuḥ ced indriya jñāna gocare vicāryamāṇe prastāvaḥ mānasasya iha kīdṛśaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,56	 indriya jñānasya gocaraḥ kaḥ iti paryanuyukte yatas sākṣāt indriya jñānam utpadyate tad ākāratayā anyathā vā iti pareṇa vaktavyam na tāvat tad ākāratayā viṣaya tvam asambhavāt paramāṇūnām eka dhana ākāra sthūla tva abhāvāt atha atat ākārasya api yaḥ hetuḥ sa viṣayaḥ tat api ayuktam indriya vat anya ākāra vijñāna hetu tvepya viṣaya tvam tatra yadi pāramparyeṇa hetu tvam abhipretam ācāryasya te eva hī tyādi vacasā tadā param prati na indiyasya viṣaya tām prasañjayet sākṣāt paramāṇūnām hetu tve viṣaya tvasya pareṇa ukta tvāt prasaṅgaḥ eva tarhi na yuktaḥ iti vaktavyam kim ucyate prastāvaḥ mānasasya iha kīdṛśaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,57–2.1.2.5.5,60	 paraspara vivikta aṇu prathama pratibhāsanam vikalpakāt tu vijñānāt ghana ākāra avabhāsitā paraḥ prāha vikalpakasya vijñānasya eka ghana avabhāsitā tasya api pāramparyeṇa paramāṇavaḥ hetu tvāt viṣayaḥ yathā smaraṇasya artha viṣaya tā ācāryaḥ prāha atad ābhatayā na asyāḥ akṣa vat viṣayoṇavaḥ yathā akṣāṇi paramparayā hetu tvepi na viṣayaḥ tathā aṇavopi anyathā bhavanti hi akṣāṇi dvi candra jñānasya pāraṃparyeṇa hetuḥ atra uktam indriya jñāna gocare vicāryamāṇe prastāvaḥ mānasasya iha kīdṛśaḥ iti na ca mānasa tve viṣaya nirūpaṇā sādhvī nirviṣaya tvāt tathā na atra pramāṇaṅ kiñcid iti yuktam uttaram ācāryasya na tu ati prasaṅga codanam tat eva uktam prastāvaḥ mānasasya ityādinā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,61–2.1.2.5.5,63	 anye tu bruvate mānase dvi candra ādi jñāne yadā indriyāṇām kāraṇa tvam kathayati tadā mānasam eva prativiṣaya tva cintā syāt tatas ca prastāvaḥ kīdṛśaḥ iti uttaram tat ayuktam iti pratipāditam kim vaindriyam yat akṣāṇām bhāva abhāva anurodhi ced tad tulyam vikriyāvat ced sā eva iyaṅ kinniṣidhyate yadi tāvat mānasam etat dvi candra ādi jñānam indriya bhāva abhāva anurodhi na syāt atha indriya bhāva abhāva anurodhi api mānasam eva etat tathā sati stambha ādi jñāneṣu api mānasatva prasaṅgaḥ prathamam su a ākāram eva jñānam paścāt artha ākāra tā manasi atha mānasam eva indriyam prasaktam aindriyasya api vikāraḥ eva iti ced dvayam api tarhi indriya jam prasaktam sākṣāt iti ced na aparasya vikārasya adarśanāt etad anusāreṇa tat api vikṛtam eva jñātavyam iti ced tat api mānasam eva iti vikṛta tvāt etadvat iti anavasthā tasmāt etat eva indriya jam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,65–2.1.2.5.5,67	 sarpa ādi bhrānti vat ca asyāḥ syāt akṣa vikṛtau= api nivṛttiḥ na nivartteta nivṛtta īpi akṣa viplave kadācid anya santāne tathā eva api eṃta vācakaiḥ dṛṣṭa smṛtim apekṣeta na bhāseta parisphuṭam yadi mānasī dvi candra ādi buddhiḥ akṣa vikṛtau= api nivṛttiḥ akṣa vikāre hi sarpa bhrāntiḥ sati api vicāre nivarttate na dvi candra ādi bhrāntiḥ atha sarpa ādi bhrāntiḥ api śyāma tā ādi lakṣaṇāḥ na nivarttate samandhakāre hi pradeśe sarpa bhrāntiḥ tatra rajvādeḥ timiram antareṇa api śyāma tā ādi rūpa tā timiratiskāre tu cakṣuṣā unvathā bhūtepi śyāma tā ādi rūpa tā sā katham akṣa vikārepi nivarttate tatas nivarttanam asiddham katham sādhanam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,68–2.1.2.5.5,69	 yat api ucyeta na nivartteta nivṛtta īpi akṣa viplave iti tat api asat na hi manasi api jala bhrāntiḥ nivṛtta akṣa viplavasya dṛṣṭāḥ prabodhaka pratyayasya ātapa upatapta tvasya abhāve abhāvāt na ca anya santāne jala bhrānteḥ arpaṇan dṛṣṭam na asaṃtaptasya para vacanasya asau bhavati sarpa ākāra tā api na eva dṛṣṭa smaraṇam apekṣate śyāma tā āditāyāḥ prathamataram eva bhāvāt parisphuṭa pratibhāsanantu mānasyāḥ api bhrānteḥ svapna ādau= asti eva tatas na bhāseta parisphuṭam iti sakalam etat ayuktam tad bhāva bhāvitā tad vikāra vikāritā tu pāramparyāt api kārye bhavati eva atra ucyate śyāma tā ādi avabhāsaḥ yaḥ tatra aindriyakaḥ eva sa anivṛtti ādayaḥ dharmāḥ tatra iti na sat uttaram 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,70	 avaśyam hi śyāma tā ādi pratibhāsaḥ tatra aindriya jaḥ tad vikāra anivṛttau na nivarttate parisphuṭa tā api indriya janya tāyām eva na mānasa tve bhāvanā balāt ātapa upataptasya mānasa tāyām api iti ced parisphuṭa tāyām avikalpikā eva asau= iti na indriyaja tvāt viśiṣyate tathā ca apavāda tvan timira grahaṇasya na vyāhanyate sa vikalpaka tvam hi mānasa tvāt abhipretam pareṣān na mānasatva mātram tathā hi avikalpakam ekañca iti etāvat mātram atra sādhyam dvividhaḥ pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ vikalpaḥ nirvikalpaka viplavaḥ ca sā ca sa vikalpikā sakala bhrāntiḥ tadā vighaṭate na anyathā parisphuṭā api tarhi dvi candra ādiḥ bhrāntiḥ mānasī bhavatu iti ced na mānasī bhāvānām antareṇa bhāvāt bhāvanā balena hi mānasī sphuṭa tām bhajeta tad abhāvāt indriyaja tvat na śakyannivārayitum dvividham eva spaṣṭa ākāra tāyāḥ kāraṇam akṣam bhāvanā ca atra api bhāvanā vyavahitāḥ asti eva iti ced vyapagataḥ tarhi bāhya artha vādaḥ iti atlamprasaṅgena 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,71–2.1.2.5.5,72	 kā tarhi sarpa ādi bhrāntiḥ mānasī yasyāḥ dṛṣṭānta tvam jala ādi bhrāntiḥ ca upaghāta anugrāhaka tva avabhāvaḥ upaghāta anugrāhaka tva avabhāsaḥ hi akṣa vikṛtau= api nivarttate eva nivṛttepi ca akṣa viplave na nivarttate eva cintayataḥ evam anyat api yojanīyam evañca suptasya jāgrataḥ vā api yā eve dhīḥ sphuṭa bhāsinī sā nirvikalpa ubhayathā api anyathā eva vikalpikā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,73–2.1.2.5.5,75	 mānasa tvenyathā vā ubhayathā api avikalpaka tvam spaṣṭa tāyāt nirvikalpaka tvam iti pratipāditam etat tasmāt tasya avikalpepi prāmāṇayam pratiṣidhyate visamvādāt tad arthañca pratyakṣa ābham dvidhā uditam vikalpa bhrānta tābhyām dvidhā eva pratyakṣa ābhāsa tā darśita ācāryeṇa iti karaṇa vyavacchinnāt vikalpa vaśāt pṛthak taimira upalakṣitasya viplavasya nirdeśāt anyathā pṛthak nidaśasya prayojana abhāvena akauśala tva udbhāvana hetu tā syāt 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,76	 kathantarhi tat uktam sa naḥ bhrānti viṣaya tvāt vyabhicāriṇaḥ para abhiprāyeṇa tasya ukta tvāt yasya hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇantasya manaḥ bhrānti viṣaya tā vyabhicāriṇaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate nahi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannasya eva vyabhicāritā sambhavati pāriśeṣyāt manasā yat adhikasya vikalpanantatra vyabhicāraḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,77–2.1.2.5.5,80	 nanu artham antareṇa indriya mātrāt yat uti adyate tasya api vyabhicāritā tat kim manaḥ bhrānti viṣaya tvāt iti vacanam na tasya artha grahaṇena nirākṛt tvāt vidyamānam api tad avidyamāna kalpam eva tathā ca uktam indriya artha udbhave na asti vyapadeśya ādi sambhavaḥ iti vyapadeśya ādayaḥ mānasāḥ eva iti pratipattavyam nanu na vyāvarttakamvacanam avyapadeśya ādi kintarhi svarūpa kathana param tad indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannanta devambhūtambhavati na anyathā na vyavasāya ātmakam iti anirdeśa prāpteḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,81–2.1.2.5.5,82	 nahi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam eva vyavasāya ātmakam anumānasya api vyavasāya ātmaka tvāt tasmāt yat vyavasāya ātma kantat adhyakṣam anyat tu na bhavati iti vyāvarttaka tā eva yuktāḥ atha kiñcid vyāvartta kaṅ kiñcid svarūpa kathanam iti tena yadi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam vyavasāya ātma kañcet tadavyābhicāri bhavati avyapadeśyañca 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,83	 tat ayuktam avyabhicāri tvaṅ kathayitum yuktam evam hi pramāṇatā avyapadeśya viṣaya tvena tu kim na hi tathā pramāṇyam anyathā api pramāṇyāt tatas yat kiñcid etat svarūpa kathane ca atiprasaṅgaḥ ātma ādi sat sannikarṣasya api katham aprasaṅgāt atha yat pratyakṣa tve asādhāraṇantadeva kathyate na tu asādhāraṇam ātma ādi evantarhi vyāvarttakam viśeṣaṇam na svarūpa kathana param 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,84	 etena sat sannikarṣa ādi kathanam pratyākhyātam tathā hi lakṣaṇam eva etat syāt sva rūpa kathanam vānya artha vidhāna artham tatra yadi lakṣaṇam sat sannikarṣaḥ iti eva vaktavyam sat artha grāhi pratyakṣam indriya jam vā pratyakṣam abādhitam atha dharmam pratyanimitta tā pratipādana artham svarūpam anūdyate tathā api indriya jam iti eva vaktavyam kim apareṇa vyartha jalpitena 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,85–2.1.2.5.5,87	 kiñca anuvāda mātram ayuktam tathā hi bāhya artha sādhane yatnaḥ karttavyaḥ veda vādibhiḥ mīmāṃkasakairatonyeṣām lakṣaṇena nirākriyā bau ddhā dīnām hi lakṣaṇam pratyakṣasya anyathā abhimatam tu aprakriyā anukūlam tatas tad vyavacchedāya niyamena anyathā lakṣaṇam vidhātavyam sau ga tāḥ nām vijñāna vāda śūnya tā vāda anukūla tvāt lakṣaṇasya avaśyam eva tad nirāsāya lakṣaṇa antara karaṇam eva śobhate na avapatitairu ṣṭra haraṇa śakyam kaḥ vā lakṣaṇa karaṇe doṣaḥ pramāṇena aprasiddha tā iti ced tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,88–2.1.2.5.5,91	 prāmāṇikam vidhātavyam lakṣaṇat niścayaḥ tatas itaretara hetu tvāt na ekam api atra sidhyati itaretara āśraya tvāt ekasya api aprasiddhiḥ iti na lakṣaṇa karaṇam yadi evam anuvāda upi na apramā prasiddhasya yuktaḥ loka prasiddhitaḥ ced prasiddhiḥ yadi evam dharmopi loka prasiddhaḥ eva bhaviṣyati akāraṇam mī mām sā dharma viplavasya darśanāt asiddhiḥ eva paramārthataḥ iti ced yadi evam mīmāṃsayā api kim dharma viplavaḥ daṇḍa vāritaḥ anyathā etāvatas kālān nāma na syāt matā antare tasmāt pramāṇa siddhaḥ eva anuvāda upi karttavyaḥ tathā lakṣaṇam api anavadye 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,92	 na ca sau ga taiḥ rapi lakṣaṇam kriyate prasiddha artha anuvādāt yathā eva hi dharmaṃpratyanimitta tva pradarśana artham anuvādaḥ tathā nimitta tva pradarśana artham iti samānam ubhayatra api yathā ca etat tathā upadarśitam eva prāk tatā ūrtha ajñānam pratyakṣam iti tu lakṣaṇam eva tatas iti anena anyasya prakṛtasya abhāvāt yorthaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tatas eva iti gamyate tena dvi candra ādi jñāna parihāraḥ na hi tat tatas eva api tu anyatas kathantarhyā cā ryai ṇa uktam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,93–2.1.2.5.5,94	 yad ābhāsā na sā tasmāt citta ālambam hi pañcakam na hi paramāṇubhyaḥ utpadyam ānantat ākārañcakṣuḥ ādiṃjñānam anya ākārasya api vijñānasya kāraṇa tvena ālambana tve cakṣuḥ ādi paramāṇūnām api ālambana tva prasaṅga tepi hi tathā anyathā vā bhavantaḥ dvi candranīla ādi ābhāsa vijñāna hetuḥ iti parama artham adhikṛtya uktam etat loka prasiddhyā tu vāda vivecanam lokaḥ hi na paramāṇu ādi kalpanā etāvat pratyakṣam loke prasiddham vicāryam āṇantu na yuktam 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,95–2.1.2.5.5,97	 tatā ūrtha ādi tva siddha tvam anaikāntika tā sphuṭāḥ paramāṇūn abhipretya anaikāntikam idam bhavet paramāṇūnām eva janakatu anteṣām ālambana tve cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anekāntar atha ca te iti pratibhāsamānam ucyate tadā asiddha tā na hi tasya samāna kālasya jananam dvi candra ādinā ca anaikāntika tā atha samāna kālam api janakam tat api ayuktam avastu tvāt samudāyasya anaikāntika tā ca bhrānta vijñānaiḥ iti atha prāc bhāva janakam tadā api asiddha tā 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,98–2.1.2.5.5,103	 na hi jñānāt purobhāvaḥ tena jñānena gṛhyate pareṇa grahaṇe tasya api evam eva anuyogitāḥ anumānena vijñāne pratyakṣāt eva tat punar itaretara hetu tve prathamaṅkasya saṃbhavaḥ samāna kāla tā na asti pratyakṣa anubhayoḥ kvacid tasmāt asiddham eva etat parama arthena lakṣaṇam loka prati iti apekṣa tayā na virudhyate yat api ucyate śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam iti tat api asat śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ bhrāntepi nahi nāma na vidyate na ca jñānamvinā vṛttiḥ śrotra ādeḥ upapadyate 
PVA_2.1.2.5.5,104	 pravarttana kāmaḥ hi pratyakṣa ādikam pramāṇam anvicchati śrotra ādīn āñca vṛttiḥ avijñātā katham lakṣaṇam anupalakṣitāt katham ayam pravartteta atha pratyakṣatas śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ upalakṣyate asya tarhi pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam vaktavyam tatas sākṣātkaraṇa ākāram pratyakṣam tat tu svayam eva upalakṣyate iti parihāraḥ tathā sati tat eva sākṣāt karaṇam abhra antam lakṣaṇam bhrāntā ipi ca vijñāne śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ katham lakṣaṇam bhavet artheṣu vṛttiḥ iti adoṣaḥ artheṣu vṛttiḥ arthāmi mukhya tvam tat api bhrānte vidyate eva atha tad svarūpa samvedanam tat eva tarhi svarūpa samvedanam iti lakṣaṇam tat ca sākṣātkaraṇam eva avikalpakāpara nāmakam tasmāt aparama lakṣaṇam eva 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,1–2.1.2.6.1,3	 kimpunar asya pramāṇasya phalam prameya adhigatiḥ uktañca pramāṇa adhīnaḥ hi prameya adhigamaḥ nanu tat jñānam eva tat ca phalam iti kim idānīm pramāṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa ālocana viśeṣaṇa jñānāni iti kecid tat ayuktam adhigamasya sādhanam tat eva yuktam yatas sa bhavati nanu jñānasya tāvat utpattiḥ indriya ādeḥ dṛśyate tatodhigamasya api tat eva iti kim akalpanayā 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,4–2.1.2.6.1,8	 na hi dṛṣṭa parityāgāt kalpanā ani atra yukti bhāj anavasthā prameye syāt tathā satya nivāritā na etat asti kriyā sādhanam iti eva sarvam sarvasya karmaṇaḥ sādhanan= ahi tat tasyāḥ sādhanam yā kriyā yatas yadi ekatra dṛṣṭa sāmarthyam iti eva tat eva ekam aparatra api sādhanāya upakalpyate yasya kasyacid sādhanasya upādānāt sakala samīhita sādhanam iti sarvu añjagat alpa āyāsena sustham syātam na ca evam atas yā kriyā yatas dṛṣṭā tat eva tatra sādhanat nāparam 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,9–2.1.2.6.1,11	 tatra anubhava mātreṇa jñānasya sadṛśa ātmanaḥ bhāvyam tena ātmanā yena pratikarma virudhyate anubhavaḥ hi sā ṅaḥ khya sya nīla pīta ādau samānaḥ sattā mātreṇa tatas sarvam vyavasthāpayet abhimata vyavasthāpita padārtha vat navā anavasthāpita vat vyavasthāpana arham api tasya aviśeṣāt tathā hi yathā tad vodhakam vastu tathā eva tat abodhakam yadā tad vodhakam kena matat neṣṭam a bodhakam 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,12–2.1.2.6.1,14	 avyāpṛta avasthāyāḥ hi viśeṣam ātmasāt kurvāṇam idam atra vyāpṛtan= a iti gamyeta tathā api kim svabhāvāt asaḥ pracyavate yadi ātmā aham tad ātma bhūta upi na jāne tadā mayā sorthom na jñātaḥ eva bhavati tatas na pramāṇa tā puruṣa ātmā eva lokoyam bhogyam vastu avagacchati sa ca ātmā na vijānāti sādhvī bhoga vyavasthitiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,15	 buddhiḥ sukha nīla ādi avasāya rūpam ātmā anan tathā vyavasthāpayati iti ced saiṃva tarhi bhoktrī kim apareṇa samvedanena sukha ādi avasāya rūpā sukha ākāravā iti ākāraḥ eva pramāṇam buddhi adhyavasitam artham puruṣaḥ ced yatas iti ced kā iyam buddhiḥ koya madhyavasāyaḥ kaḥ puruṣaḥ iti vācyam buddhiḥ karaṇam adhyavasāyaḥ karma karttā puruṣaḥ iti ced puruṣa ūrtham avagacchati tatas karttā adhyavasāyasya iti kim buddhyā adhyavasāyasya buddhiḥ sādhanam avagamasya puruṣaḥ iti ced avagamasya adhyavasāyasya ca na viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ tad ākāra sākṣāt karaṇam avagamaḥ saḥ eva ca adhyavasāyaḥ tad ākāra tā eva adhyavasāyaḥ na sākṣātkaraṇam iti ced 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,16–2.1.2.6.1,19	 yadi nāma tad ākārā buddhi vat tā kathantaraḥ tad rūpa sākṣāt karaṇāt arthaḥ eva tathā na kim tad ākārā yadā buddhiḥ sākṣātkriyate arthaḥ eva tathā iti vyarthā artha ākārā buddhiḥ buddhi aḍhaurtha ākāraḥ ḍhaukyate tatas adūre deśasya pratipattiḥ vyāpit tvāt ātmanaḥ adūra deśakam eva sakalam na ca dūra deśaḥ iti pratipattiḥ syāt na ca tad ākāra buddhi vyatirekeṇa arthaḥ iti ca artham antareṇa tad ākārā buddhiḥ kutas iti ced nanu buddhitaḥ eva tad ākāra tā arthānām iṣyate tat ki m ayam viparyayaḥ sva mukham iva na asaṅkrāntam pratipattum śakyam na ayogya deśa tvāt mukhasya saṃkrāntiḥ ddarppaṇāt āviṣyate 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,20	 na evam anyeṣām darppaṇasya ca asaṃkrāntasya katham pratipattiḥ tasya api buddhi darppaṇe saṅkrānta tvāt iti ced buddhiḥ api tarhi buddhiḥ darppaṇa antare ca asaṃkrāntiḥ iṣyatām buddhiḥ aviditā eva astu iti ced ātmā aparokṣa iti vyartham jagat syāt ātmanaḥ apakṣa tve tena arthaḥ eva vedya tām kim atra dhiyā karaṇam antareṇa katham paśyati iti ced cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ karaṇam antaḥkaraṇena prayojanam iti ced antarantaḥkaraṇa ūna api prayojanam iti anavasthā na ca anupakārakam karaṇam taiḥ abhivyajyate puruṣaḥ ca id na udāsīnasya iva abhivyakteḥ agrāhaka tvam tasmāt artha antareṇa ātmanā bhavitavyam 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,21–2.1.2.6.1,25	 darppaṇaḥ iva tatra avikāra kāriṇī tat ākāra tā iti ced na  darppaṇam pratītya tad ākārā buddhiḥ upajāyate tena vikāronyathā kaḥ saṃkrama arthaḥ yadi na vikāraḥ darppaṇa ibhi mukha ākārā bhrāntā buddhiḥ udayavatī atra api viṣaya ākārāḥ buddhiḥ bhrāntā eva na paramārthataḥ viṣaya prapañcaḥ pradhāna puruṣa mātra ātmakattvāt jagataḥ pradhāna ātmakattvam api tarhi bhrāntam eva jagataḥ ghaṭa ādyāḥ maka vat tathā puruṣa ātmaka tvam api etat ca paścāt pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ anyathā na sām khya prasthānena tasmāt asya śuddhasya anubhavasya bhāvi antena ātmanā yena karmma karmma prativibhāgaḥ nīlam idam pītam iti ādikaḥ nanu śrotra ādi vṛtti pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti aktam uktam idam ayuktam tu tathā hi anātma bhūtaḥ bhedaḥ sya vidyamānopi hetuṣu bhinne karmmaṇi abhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,26	 asya puruṣasya abhinnasya sarvu atra karmmaṇi nīla ādau na bhedena niyāmakaḥ indriya ādi bhedaḥ sa hi tasya kāraka tvena jñāpaka tvena vā niyāmakaḥ syāt kāraka tvena niyāmake na yuktaḥ tasya nityat tvāt sa ākāra tā prasaṃgāt ca anākāra tve saḥ eva doṣaḥ sva ātmanaḥ eva vedana prasaṅga gāt atha jñāpaka tvāt niyāmakaḥ aparijñāterthe katham jñāpakaḥ jñāpakān niyama jñānam niyama jñānāt jñāpakam iti itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ āloka vat jñāpakaḥ iti ced na teṣām api jñāpya tve apareṇa jñāpakena prayojanam iti anavasthā na ca sarvu atra ālokaḥ jñāpakaḥ ālokena vā jñāpite kim cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ tatra vā āloka bhūtā śabda ādīnām iti ced tathā api asau sva bodha rūpaḥ katham vetti svarūpā iva asthānām iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,27–2.1.2.6.1,32	 tasmāt yatosya ātma bhedaḥ asya avagatiḥ iti ayam kriyāyāḥ karma niyamaḥ siddhā sā tad prasādhanā yatas svarūpa hetau tasya samvedanasya iyam asya nīlasya pītasya ca adhigatiḥ iti niyamaḥ sā api gatiḥ tad sādhana asiddhāḥ tanmātrakāt eva niyamasya asya bhāvāt tathā ca uktam bhāvāt eva asya tad bhāve na ca iyam arthasya ghaṭa nāsā rūpyāt atas samvedanasya yatas arthena ghaṭayati enām na hi muktvā artha rūpa tām anyaḥ sva bhedāt jñānasya bheda kopi kathañcana tasmāt prameya adhigateḥ sādhanam meya rūpa tā sādhanenyatra tad karma sat arthaḥ na prasidhyati 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,33–2.1.2.6.1,36	 tad ākāram hi samvedanam artham vyasthāpayati nīlam iti pītañcā iti yathā ca ākārayogitāḥ jñānasya tathā uttaratra pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ anyatra tu sādhane tena karmaṇā sva arthaḥ na prasidhyati samviṛtteḥ tad ākāra tā ced parityajyate kathantasya samvedanam iti niyamaḥ sākṣātkaraṇāt eva niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced kim idam sākṣātkaraṇam artha svarūpam atha samvedanam atha anyat eva kiñcat arthasya sākṣātkaraṇam yadi rūpam sadiṣyate sākṣātkāri hi jñānam katham arthasya sambhavet atha samvedanasya eva rūpam sākṣātkriyā matā sākṣātkṛtaḥ katham saḥ arthaḥ na hi anyasya anya rūpa tā anyat tva ipi eṣa doṣaḥ tu bhavet evāḥ nivāritaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,37	 tathā hi yadi sākṣātkaraṇam arthasya svabhāvaḥ nīla ādiḥ sādhāraṇaḥ iti sarvu asya saṃviditaḥ saḥ arthaḥ bhavet sākṣātkriyā ca arthasya na yuktāḥ jñāna dharma tvāt atha jñāna dharma usā= artha viṣayaḥ tena arthaḥ samviditaḥ ucyate artha viṣayaḥ iti kaḥ viṣaya arthaḥ artha samvedana rūpattvāt iti ced arthasya samvedanam iti kim artha rūpa tvāt samvedanasya iti ced tasya eva artha ākāra tā samvedanasya atha artha jñā tattvāt artha samvedanam tathā asati cakṣuṣā upi jñā tattvāt cakṣuḥ samvedanam iti prāptam artha paśyati na cakṣuḥ iti ced artha paśyati iti korthaḥ arthampaśyan dṛśyate tena paśyati iti ucyate kena paśyati svarūpeṇa yathā eva tarhi svarūpam samvedana rūpeṇa paśyati tathā artham artha rūpeṇa iti artha rūpatā arthasya samvedana rūpa tā samvedanasya iti tad ākāra tā eva saru u asya sādhikā na anyaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhedakaḥ vijñānasya arthena ghaṭayati 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,38–2.1.2.6.1,42	 sā ca tasya ātma bhūtā eva tena na artha antaram phalam artha antara phala vādinām hi sarvvam durdhaṭam iti ātma bhūtā eva samvedanasya artha ākāra tā pramāṇam samvedanantadātma bhūtam eva phalam pramāṇasya artha ākāra tā anubhava vyatirekeṇa na anyārtha adhigatiḥ na hi sukha ādi ākāra tā arthasya samvedanam tad viśeṣāt artha viśeṣa anubhava prasaṅgāt atha hetu tayā arthasya anubhavaḥ iti ced yadi artha ākāra tā na syāt sukham eva kevalam anubhūyeta arthe sukha samvedanam iti ced nīle pīta samvedanam kasmāt na bhavati parasparasya vailakṣaṇyāt iti api sva pakṣa upaghātaḥ sukha nīlayoḥ api tathā iti alampiṣṭa peṣaṇena svarūpam eva tat tasya na samvedana vyāpāraḥ iti ced atra ucyate dadhānam tat ca tām ātmani artha adhigamana ātmanā sa vyāpāram iva ābhāti vyāpāreṇa sva karmaṇi tad vaśāt tad vyavasthānāt akārakam api svayam 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,43	 na hi paramārthataḥ kasyacid kopi vyāpāraḥ svarūpam eva padārthānāntasya tathā bhavada tattva vedibhiḥ avyāpāraḥ yatas vyāpāraḥ ucyate na paramārthataḥ jñānam ca puruṣasya sva arthaḥ sukha jñāna vat tatas sukha jñānam utpannam sva arthaḥ na tu sukha jñānena kiṃcid kriyate iti evam rūpa ādi jñānam api sva rūpeṇa eva sva arthaḥ na tu tena jñāyate arthātu tad utpattiḥ iti samāptaḥ vyavahāraḥ etāvatā kimarthe vyāpāreṇa na tarhi artha samvedanam phalam phalam api artha ākāram samvedanam artha samvedanam iti kaḥ virodhaḥ kathantarhi arthaṃsam vetti iti bheda vyavahāraḥ tām eva dadhānam artha ākāra tām vetti iti vyapadiśyate tathā hi cakṣuḥ vijñānam pītam apahāya yadā nīla ādau varttate tadā parityāga upādāna lakṣaṇa ūsya vyāpāraḥ iva la yate yadi nīla samvedanam nīla rūpam eva pītam na yāyān = anyasya svarūpam anyasya bha ti iti tena tat pṛthak bhūtam yuktyā vyavasthāyyate sa vyapāraḥ ca sā ca artha āpattiḥ eva paramārthataḥ ca tad atad ākāram aparāparam vijñānam eva na tatra vyāpāra vyatirekau 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,45–2.1.2.6.1,50	 anvaya vyatirekābhyām bheda vyāpāra kalpanā anādi vāsanā saṅgāt na bhāva vyakta pūrvakau sa jāti pūrvvavijñāna anubhava ahita vāsanā vyatireka kalpanā bījam kevala andha paramparā antara ślokau nanu yadi tat ākāram jñānam tena janyate saḥ eva arthaḥ tatra vyāvṛtaḥ syāt na tu jñānam arthe tat katham vijñānam gṛhṇāti iti niścayaḥ atra samādhiḥ yathā phalasya hetūnām sadṛśa ātmatayā udbhavāt hetu rūpa grahaḥ loke kriyāvat tva ipi kathyate 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,51–2.1.2.6.1,54	 tat yathā pitṛ sadṛśaḥ putraḥ utpattimān pittṛ rūpam gṛhṇāti iti vyapadiśyate loke vinā api grahaṇa vyāpāreṇa tathā jñānepi vyapadeśaḥ iti kaḥ virodhaḥ tatra tad ākāra tā dṛṣṭāḥ iha tu katham iha api dṛṣṭā eva kāma śoka ādiṣu tad ākārā jñānāt eva sā tad ākāra tā na arthāt iti codyam tad ākārā tāvat tat ākāratā upalabhyate bhavantī yadi vāsanā sāmarthyam asti darśane kāraṇam anubhavāt tat ākāra tā atha adṛṣṭa śruta pūrvve pravarttate tadā vāsanā sāmarthya abhāvāt anyatas tad ākārāt iti vākya arthaḥ tad ākāraḥ karaṇam tathā hi vāsanātaḥ yat udbhūtam tadā ekasya eva vidyate tatra arthasya sthitattve tu sarvu asādhāraṇa udayaḥ tasmāt artha ākāra tā eva sādhanam ālocana akṣa sambandha viśeṣaṇa dhiyām ataḥ na iṣṭam prāmāṇayam eteṣām vyavadhānāt kriyām prati 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,55	 kecid āhuḥ ālocana ajñānam pramāṇam tatas param jāti ādi viśiṣṭa vastu niścaya ātmakam phalam tata upi pravarttanam tatas prāptiḥ tatas sukham iti pūrvva pūrvvam pramāṇam uttara uttaram phalam iti kramaḥ ākāra balāt eva hi pratiniyata artha vyavasthāḥ na anyatas ālocana vijñānam hi yadi pratiniyatam ākāram na upādadīta katham asya idam ālocanam iti syāt atha aparam api niścaya ādi vijñānam evam eva tattva vyapadeśa lābhi pūrvva pūrvvam tu kāraṇam uttara uttara utpattau= eva kāraṇam na pratiniyata artha vyavasthāyāḥ tad ākāra tā eva tu yatas tatra sādhanam 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,56–2.1.2.6.1,57	 sarvu eṣām upayoga ipi kārakāṇām kriyām prati yat antyam bhedakam tasyāḥ tad sādhakatamam matam sā dha ta kaḥ mam hi kaḥ ra ṇaṃtasya ca sarvu akārakopa yogepi kriyāyām katham prakarṣaḥ na hi kriyā nirvvarttanam eva bhāvepi tatra ānantaryam yasya kriyām prati tat eva sādhakatamam tathā hi satsu api indriya ādiṣu adūra deśa tā ādinā yadi pratiniyata ākāra tā na pratiprāpyeta na tad ākāra artha pariccheda vyavasthā tad anantara bhāsinī sā kriyā iti tat eva karaṇam nanu adūra deśa tā eva sādhanam na indriya upaghāte adūra deśa tāyām api na niyata artha vyavasthā anupaghātaḥ tarhi sādhanam na idam api asti yatas 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,59–2.1.2.6.1,61	 akṣasya anupaghātaḥ hi tad ākāra viśeṣataḥ samvedanasya viṣayaḥ tatas sa vyavadhīyate nanu saḥ eva ākāraḥ vyavadhīyate iti prāptam tena hi ākāreṇa niścitaḥ anupaghātaḥ pratiniyata artha vyavasthā hetuḥ na idam sādhīyaḥ yatas ākāra niyamaḥ siddhaḥ yadi sārthavya sthitiḥ akāraṇam śaraḥ siddhe prāptaḥ kim iti poṣyate 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,62–2.1.2.6.1,63	 na asiddhaḥ ākāra niyamaḥ akṣa anuyātam sādhayati sa ced prasiddhaḥ sā eva artha vyavasthitiḥ vyarthaḥ eva akṣa anupaghātaḥ na khalu siddhe arthe prāptaḥ sādhayati kaścid siddhasya sādhana asambhavāt tatas siddha upasthāna hārī kim apekṣyate tad ākāra tāyām api niścaya uparaḥ pratiniyata vyavasthāyām apekṣyate iti ced na pratyakṣa prāmāṇya prastāvāt abhyāsam ambhave hi pratyakṣam pramāṇam tad ākāra mātrāt eva ca tadā pravarttana niścayam antareṇa api yadā tu niścaya apekṣā tadā anumānam pramāṇam tasya api ākāra mātrāt eva pravṛtteḥ na apara apekṣā tasmāt ākārān na aparam kaḥ ra ṇam tathā asādhāraṇam iti tatra sarvam sāmānya hetuttvāt akṣāṇām asti na īdṛśam tat bhedepi hi abhinnasya tasya idam iti tat kutas 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,64	 sarvu asya hi nīla pīta ādi viṣayasya sāmānyena hetut tvāt akṣam na bhedakam nanu nīla pīta tad ubhaya ādi viṣayam anya anya dakṣam bhaviṣyati tad abhimukha tā hi tatra anya eva tatas dharma bhede akṣāṇām iti tad bhedāt eva bheda pratipattiḥ iti kim ucyate sarvu asāmānya hetu tvāt iti tat asat ābhimukhyasya viśeṣaṇa ākāra bhedam antareṇa pratipattum aśakyatvāt tad bheda īpya ākāra rahitasya asya idam ābhimukhyam nīla pīta ādi viṣayam iti kutas na hi nīla ādi viśeṣa pratipattim antareṇa ābhimukhya viśeṣa pratipattiḥ sā ced asti kim idānīm ābhimukhya prakhyānena athavā tad bhedepya bhinnasya iti tasya nīla pīta ādi vedanasya bhedepi abhinnasya indriyasya asya idam karaṇam iti kutas ābhimukhya viśeṣāt viśeṣaḥ iti ced nābhi mukhya tvasya akāraṇa viśeṣa pratipattim antareṇa viśeṣeṇa pratipattum aśakya tvāt iti uktam tatas ākāra viśeṣaḥ eva prārthanīyaḥ sa ced asti kim apareṇa 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,65	 nanu ākāra upyarthasya eva na jñānasya tasya artha tayā pratipatteḥ jaḍa rūpa tayā hi saḥ ākāraḥ pratīyate varṇṇa saṃsthāna ātmanā jñānantu tad viparyayeṇa bodha rūpa tayā na ākāra vyatirekeṇa bodha rūpa tāyāḥ pratyetum aśakyatvāt nīla ādi sukha ādikam antareṇa aparasya jñāna ākārasya anupalakṣaṇāt parokṣam tarhi jñānam na ca asti iti prāptam 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,66–2.1.2.6.1,70	 tat asat tathā hi parokṣam yadi tat jñānam jñānam iti eva tat kutas parokṣasya svarūpam kaḥ tasya lakṣayitum kṣamaḥ yatas aparokṣata arthasya tat jñānam iti ced matam artha aparokṣata ajñānam astu tatra pareṇa kim sthiterthe tu bhavati eṣā asthitaḥ eva na bhāvinī tatorthena bhavati iti etat anāyāsena sidhyati etena abhāvopi pratyākhyātaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,71–2.1.2.6.1,74	 na ca aparokṣa ta avyatirekeṇa nīla ādita anubhava kālenubhūyate tatas nīla ādi ākārā sā nīlantu tasyāḥ upadhānam anyat eva darpaṇa mukha prativimba ādi ca mukham iti ākāraḥ eva asau na svayam arthaḥ nanu darpaṇa prativimba mukhayoḥ dvayoḥ api pratipattiḥ iha tu ākāram antareṇa na arthasya etat uttaratra pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ iti āstām tāvat etat jaḍa rūpa tā tu sva yañcakāśataḥ katham śakya upapādayitum yadi ca artha aparokṣātāyaḥ kaścid aparosti yatas idam iti sādhyate tadā vāsanā bhaviṣyati vāsana balāya atoyam ākāraḥ vijñānasya na ca vāsanā balāt arthaḥ sambhavati tad abhāva prasaṅgāt nanu vāsanā balāyātaḥ artha śūnyaḥ bhavati svapna ākāra vat vāsanāyāḥ viśeṣasya kasyacid tatra sambhavaḥ yena artha śūnyaḥ na bhavati ākāraḥ jāgra t īkṣitaḥ vāsanā hi tāvat ākārasya janikā upalabhyate svapna ādiṣu tatas eṣā upi jāgrat upalavdhi viṣaya bhāvam gataḥ tatas eva tad jātīya tvāt 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,75	 nanu ākāra tvam eva tasya asiddham arthaḥ eva asau= iti pratipatteḥ na vyabhicārātm svapna jñāna ākāraḥ hi arthaḥ iti pratīyate eva paryālocanataḥ anyathā pratipattiḥ iti ced atra api paryālocanan na kākaiḥ bhakṣyate vāsanā viśeṣaḥ tu jāgrat avasthā kāraḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti varam kalpitam svapna ādi pratyayopi na sa ākāraḥ tatra api arthasya sambhavat iti ced tat uttaratra pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ atha artha ākāra tā na aparokṣaḥ arthaḥ eva nīla ādi kortha ākāraḥ sā tu vastu pratyāsatyā tathā lakṣyate darpaṇa prativimba vat mukha pratyāstyā hi darpaṇam anākaram api ākāra vat iva lakṣyate pradīpa ādi prabhāvat vā pradīpa prabhā hi anākārā api ghaṭa ādi saṃkrāntā ghaṭa ādi ākārā iva lakṣyate 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,76–2.1.2.6.1,79	 tat asattyam mukha ādi vyatirekepi darpaṇa ādiḥ nirīkṣyate na tu ākāra atirekenaṇa aparokṣat tvat nirīkṣyate apara ukṣatā hi nīla ākāra ātma bhūta eva sarvvadā nirīkṣyate na anyathā tat kim artha pratyāsatya evam pratibhāti yathā evambhūtaiḥ eva iti kim atra pramāṇam bhavatā upa kim pramāṇam iti ced abheda upalabdhiḥ eva bhrāntiḥ eva iyam iti ced na bādhaka abhāvāt artha prāptiḥ iti ced na prāpteḥ api ākāra lakṣaṇa tvāt na hi tad ākāra tām antareṇa prāptiḥ asti iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ yadi sa tathābhūta ākāraḥ na syāt na kaścid pratiniyatam artham vyavasthāpayet etena śeṣam vyākhyātam viśeṣaṇa dhiyām punar atā drupye na bhedopi tadvat anya ādhiyā upi vā 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,80	 ālocana artha sannikarṣa ādiḥ śeṣaḥ artha sannikarṣa upi na ākāram abhipatya jñāyate tatas teṣām api kriyām pratyasādhakatamat tvam vyavadhānāt viśeṣaṇa dhiyām punar tat ākāra tā bhāve viśeṣaṇa buddhiḥ eva na sidhyati tad viśeṣya ādi buddhi tvam iti na teṣām api karaṇa tvam yadi tāvat kāla aviśeṣaṇa buddhiḥ viśeṣaṇam etat iti katham jñātavyam na hi viśeṣya upāruḍha rūpam antareṇa viśeṣaṇa tvam nāma na api tad upārūḍha tva grahaṇam vinā viśeṣaṇattva grahaṇam tad ākāra grahaṇe ca viśeṣyam api gṛhītam eva iti katham tatas viśeṣya dhīra parā sādhyāḥ bhavet na hi tadā eva gṛhyamāṇam tad grāhaka buddhi janita grāhaka grāhyam tad kālepi viśeṣaṇasya pratibhāsanam iti ced pūrvvantat grahaṇam vyartham pūrvvam api viśeṣyam pratibhāsate iti na yuktam sādhana tva abhāva prasaṃgāt eva kiñca viśeṣaṇa buddhiḥ viśeṣaṇe viśeṣye tad vuddhiḥ iti viṣaya bhedaḥ kriyā sādhanayoḥ prāptaḥ bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,82–2.1.2.6.1,87	 na iṣṭaḥ viṣaya= chedopi kriyā sādhanayoḥ dvayoḥ eka artha tve dvayam vyartham na ca syāt krama bhāvitā na khalu palāśe paraśu ādi karaṇa pravartanam nyagrodhe cchidā nirvarttate eka artha tāyām pūrvva vat prasaṃgaḥ vyartha tā ca dvayoḥ krama bhāvaḥ ca sarvāsām tad artha hetūnām dhiyām viruddhaḥ ekatve krama ayogāt āvṛtti bhedāt kramaḥ iti ced na āvṛtti bhedasya pratyakṣeṇa pratipattum aśakya tvāt yadi tat eva jñānam āvartate iti sadā evā vṛtti saṃpratyayaḥ syāt na ca tad abhinna svarūpa grāhiṇām parasparam kriyā sādhana bhāvaḥ krama bhāvepi pūrvveṇa uttarasya jani kriyā eva kriyate na adhigatiḥ pūrvva aviśeṣāt janikriyā api na aparā tad svarūpāt iti pratipāditam anyatra sādhya sādhana tā bhāvaḥ sakṛt bhāve dhiyā uṅśayoḥ tad vyavasthā āśraya tvena sādhya sādhana saṃsthitiḥ iti antaraślokaḥ na api sannikarṣaḥ pramāṇam yatas sarvvātmanā api sambaddham kaiścid eva avagamyate dharmaiḥ sa niyamaḥ na syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣataḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,88	 yadi indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ pramāṇam tasya phalam artha adhigatiḥ sa sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ samaveta samavāyaḥ saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ ca iti indriyasya ghaṭa ādinā saṃyogaḥ ghaṭa samavetena guṇena saṃyukta samavāyaḥ guṇa tvena sita tva ādinā saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ śrotrasya ākāśa ātmanaḥ śabdena samavāyaḥ śabda tvena samaveta samavāyaḥ pradeśe ghaṭa abhāvena indriyasya saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ tatra yadi nāma saṃyuktena sambandhaḥ tasya grahaṇam iti kutas anyathā dhūma sambaddhasya vahni ādeḥ api pratipattiḥ syāt atha samavāya sambandhāt pratipattiḥ evantarhi ekārya samavāyinaḥ sparśa deḥ api cakṣuṣā pratipattiḥ syāt samāna deśa tvam ena pratyuktam yathā santānasya eka artha samavāyinaḥ pratipattiḥ tathā sparśa ādeḥ api acākṣuṣa tvāt apratipattiḥ iti ced tat eva idam eka artha samavāyi tvāt na katham iti cintyate 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,90–2.1.2.6.1,91	 tasmāt na sarvu ātmanā api sambaddham kaiścid eva dharmaiḥ pratīyate iti na yuktam yadi hi cakṣuḥ ādi paramāṇavaḥ bahis nirgatya anya deśa saṃkrāntyā artha grahaṇa nimittam tad saṃyoge tathā sati sarva ātmanā sambandhāt aśeṣa rūpa pratipattiḥ iti cakraśas ghaṭādayopi dharmāḥ parisphuṭam pratibhāseran varṇṇaśas ca na saṃsthāna mātrasya tathā śeṣa jāti ādi abhivyaktiḥ dūra ādau karaṇasya asāmarthyam iti ced yadi asām arthyam agrahaṇam eva sarvu adāḥ tu evambhūtā sāmagrī yena evambhūtā pratipattiḥ iti ced na abhinna tvāt saṃsthānasya varṇataḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,92	 na hi varṇṇataḥ saṃsthānam bhedena avadhāryate avadhāryate varṇṇa vyatirekeṇa api samartha ākāraḥ iti ced tatra api śyāma varṇṇasya upalabhya upalabdheḥ andhakārasya avastu tvāt na varṇṇasya upalabdhiḥ tat api ayuktam upalabhyamānasya avastu tva ayogāt ālokepi nimīlita locanasya pratipatteḥ iti ced na tasya bhrānta tvāt na ca ekasya bhrāntattve sarvu atra bhrāntiḥ iti ati prasaṅgāt bāhya artha abhāva prasaṅgāt tatas punar idam eva vaktavyam kaścid pratyayaḥ bhrāntaḥ kaścid na iti tena ālokaḥ eva saṃsthāna grahaṇam na andhakāre nikaṭaḥ eva na dūre 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,93–2.1.2.6.1,95	 tad abhede api bhedoyam yasmāt tasya pramāṇatā tena sarva ātmanā grahaṇam agrahaṇam vā yuktam tasya ca arthasya abhedepi bhadaḥ yaḥ jñānasya samyaga nīla ādi ākārāt eva na bāhya ākārāt iti tasmāt ākāraḥ eva pramāṇam atha saṃsthānāt anākāram api vijñānam pratiniyata artha vyavasthā kāri bhavet atra āha saṃskārāt ced atādrūpye na tasya api avyavasthiteḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,96–2.1.2.6.1,98	 saṃskāraḥ hi pratiniyata vyavasthā pūrvvakaḥ pratiniyatam artha viṣayam jñānasya kuryāt svayam pratiniyataḥ tat yathā yaḥ arthonubhūtaḥ tathābhūtā smṛtiḥ bhavati na ca artha pratiniyata unubhavaḥ ākāram vinā kutas tat katham tatas saṃskāra pratiniyamaḥ yena tatas niyata artha vyavasthā itaretara āśrayaṇa doṣa prasaṅgāt sati pratiniyama inubhavasya saṃskāra niyamaḥ saṃskāra niyame ca anumāna niyamaḥ iti na ekopi syāt yadi sa ākāram jñānam pramāṇam tat eva phalam iti kriyā karaṇayoḥ aikyam prasaktam ākārasya adhigama avyatirekāt atra api ucyate kriyā karaṇayoḥ aikya virodhaḥ iti ced asat dharma bheda abhyupagamāt vastu abhinnam ītiṣyate evaṃprakārā sarvvā eva kriyā kāraka saṃsthatiḥ bhāve hi abhinna abhimateṣu adhyāropeṇa vṛttitaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,99–2.1.2.6.1,100	 yadi paramārthataḥ kriyā karaṇayoḥ aikyat na yuktam iti ucyate tat ayuktam nahi kāraka ātmikā kriyā kāraka ātmanām viruṇaddhi na hi vyāpāraḥ padārthataḥ bhidyate na utpatana nipatane parśutaḥ vyatiricyete tasya eva aparāpara deśa saṃginī utpattiḥ tathā vyapadeśavatī na ca sā sva rūpāt aparā na ca sā sva rūpeṇa tat aikyam virudhyate atha vyāvahārikī kriyā virodhinī kāraka ekattvena tat etat iṣyate eva dharma bheda abhyupagamāt vikalpa pariniṣṭhitaḥ hi dharma bhedaḥ abhyupagamyate eva evam prakāra eva tu kalpita bhedavatī kriyā kāraka bheda vyavasthā tathā hi anvaya vyatirekābhyām ekattva anaikya kalpane kriyā kāraka bhedena vyavahāraḥ vyavasthitaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.6.1,101–2.1.2.6.1,103	 devadattaḥ tāvat ekaḥ eva pratyabhijñā balāt vyavasthāpyate tasya sthāna gamane pradeśa bṛttinī tatas tatra kriyayoḥ bhedaḥ kalpyate yaḥ hi yasmin= abhinne bhidyate sa tasmāt vyatiricyate paramārthataḥ tu devadattaḥ eva avasthā bhedāt vyatirekī bhidyate tena bhāveṣu bhinna abhimateṣu api loke ekattva āropeṇa pravarttate iti tad anurodhāt kriyā kāraka vyavasthā na paramārthataḥ evam ākāropi na phala adhigati vyāpakaḥ adhigatiḥ tu sakala ākāra vyāpikā tatas bheda vyavasthā pramiti pramāṇayoḥ paramārtha taḥ tu ākāraḥ eva prakāśamānaḥ pramitiḥ tasmāt ākāraḥ pramāṇam artha samvedanam phalam avyatiriktam eva phalam pramāṇāt tatas vā pramāṇam iti tathā ca uktam savyāpāra pratītattvāt pramāṇam phalam eva sat 
PVA_2.1.2.6.2,1–2.1.2.7.1.1,6	 athavā sva samvittiḥ phalañca atra ubhaya ābhāsasya vijñānasya sva saṃvedanam eva phalam nanu artha samvedanam phalam artha arthī lotaḥ iti atra ucyate lokasya artha arthitā ayuktāḥ yadāna arthasya vedanam na jātu cit adṛṣṭerthe lokasya arthittva sambhavaḥ śrutaḥ hi paramparayā dṛṣṭaḥ eva nanu nīlādiḥ arthaḥ samvedyate eva katham asamvid arthasya atra paryanuyogaḥ kā artha saṃmvid yat eva idam pratyakṣam prativedanam tad artha vedanam kena tādrūpyāt vyabhicāri tat yadi pratiniyatam vedanam pratividitam vā tadā sa ākāra jñānam eva artha vedanam iti vyapadeśa mātram eva kevalam na tu arthasya vedanam sidhyati atha tādrūpyāt eva arthasya vedanan tathābhūtam artham antareṇa tādrūpyasya abhāvāt na vyabhicārāt keśa maśaka ādiṣu atha sonubhavaḥ kva asya tat eva idam vicāryate yadi artha sambandhaḥ na asti tadā kosau= anubhavaḥ anubhūyamāna niṣṭha tvāt anubhavasya katham keśa ādi anubhavaḥ taimirikasya 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.1,7–2.1.2.7.1.1,9	 nanu kaścid artha niṣṭhaḥ eva dṛśyate tat eva idam vicāryate dṛśyatām arthasya iti ca na dṛśyate arthasya adarśanāt yadi ca udaya mātrāt artha samvedanam cakṣuṣā upi vedanam tat iti prāptam tatas utpatteḥ tathā eva anumānāt kārya darśanāt anumīyaterthaḥ tathā cakṣuḥ api tad vedanam tat eva tat ākāram kalpyatām bahis deśa ākāreṇa bahis eva kalpyate iti ced kindarpaṇa mukha ākāreṇa tad deśasya mukhasya kalpanā tatas sakalam eva ātma stham mukha vat prativimba rūpeṇa pratibhāti iti kalpanīyam sarūpayanti tat kena sthūla ābhāsañca teṇavaḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.1,10	 aṇavaḥ eva yadi viṣayaḥ tatas sthūla ābhāsa vijñānam iti sārūpya abhāvāt kathambiṣayaḥ vijñānasya vṛkṣa ādi piṇḍa grahaṇa vat bhrāntam eva bhavet varṇṇa ākāra tayā sarūpayanti iti ced na varṇṇa vyatirekeṇa saṃsthāna abhāvāt varṇṇa ātmaka saṃsthāna vat tve sthūla tā eva prāptā atha sthūla tā grahaṇa dharmaḥ varṇṇaḥ tu grāhya dharmaḥ bahuṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu sthūlam iti bhavati vyapadeśaḥ na sa pratyekam paramāṇuṣu nīla ādi tā tu pratyekam atas asau grāhya dharmaḥ yadi evan tathā sāntarāṇām anantaratva grahāṇat bhrāntiḥ eva na aviṣaya tayā antarasya api pratibhāsanāt iti ced yadi evam sarvva sāmarthya upākhyā viraha lakṣaṇam nirupākhyam iti bhāvaḥ eva antarasya tatas nirantaram eva vastu parikalpanīyam nirantarasya ayogāt iti ced na hi vastu sa avayavam yuktam vijñāna vat niravayavam eva vastu iti paramāṇu prasiddhaḥ na pratibandha abhāvāt pratyakṣa bādhita tvāt ca pratijñāyai etat ayuktam pratyakṣam antareṇa ca anumāna abhāvāt sthūlam sūkṣma upacaya rūpam eva iti ced 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.1,11–2.1.2.7.1.1,14	 dattam atra uttaram prāk iti na punar ucyate tat na artha rūpa tā tasya sattya artha avyabhicāriṇā tad saṃvedana bhāvasya na samarthā prasādhane artha rūpa tā sati api vyabhicāriṇī tatas na bhāvanā artha samvedanam iti sidhyati na hi vyabhicaran= eva sādhayati avyabhicāra artha tvāt sādhana arthasya vyabhicāriṇopi sādhana tve sarvvaḥ saru u asya sādhanam bhavet astitvena vyavasthānam sādhanam vyabhicāraḥ tu kadācid asau na asti api iti nāstitvam pākṣikam ākṣipati tat idam astittvam itarat ca ekadakatra viruddham tasmāt nīla ādi rūpa tā mātrāt eva vijñānasya artha sādhana tā na iti ekāntaḥ api ca samvedanānām artha anāñca sārūpyan na ca teṣām parasparam samvedana bhāvaḥ na hi santāna antara samvedana sarūpam api vedakam vedyam vā tat sārūpya tad utpattī yadi saṃvedya lakṣaṇam saṃvedyam syāt samāna artham vijñānam samanantaram 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.1,15^1	 yadi yatas utpadyate sarūpam ca tena tasya vedanam tarhi anantara vijñānam tulya viṣayam viṣayaḥ syāt yadā pūrvvakam api nīla ākāram uttaram api tatas samanantarāt udaya vat tadā pūrvvakasya sarūpaka tvāt udaya kāraṇa tvāt ca viṣayavat tvam prasaktam atha yatas utpattimān nīlā ādika ākāraḥ sa tasya ākāravān viṣayaḥ samāna viṣaya vijñāne tu yaḥ ākāraḥ sa na samanantarāt anyathā nīla ākāra samanantarāt pīta vijñānam na syāt tatas labhyate bhavati nīla ādi ākāraḥ samanantara pratyaya kṛtaḥ iti na tasya viṣaya tvam apare vyācakṣate nīla samanantara adya dā sa vikalpakam nīla ākāram udayam āsādayati tasya sa pūrvvakaḥ viṣayaḥ syāt ākāra kāri tvāt tasya tat api asat iṣyate eva smaraṇasya samvedana viṣayat tvam eva vijñāyate ca tathā hi sakalaḥ lokaḥ smaraṇāt artha vedanam lakṣyate anusaran= asmāt sākṣāt arthān nirīkṣate 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.1,15^2	 sakalam eva smaraṇam artha anubhave pravarttamānam upalakṣyate yadā na smṛti vipramoṣaḥ tatas ca anubhava viṣayat tvam asya iṣyate eva na ca abhyupagamaḥ eva doṣāya kim ca nirvviṣayam etat smaraṇam asya kim viṣaya cintayā atra kramaḥ yad bhāvānābala asya iṣṭā tam upajāyate pūrvvakān nīla anubhavāt tasya sa pūrvvakaḥ viṣayaḥ prāptaḥ kathantasya samanantaram iti ced tādṛśa sya aparasya samāna jātīyasya samvedanasya antarāla bhāvinaḥ abhāvāt kathantad janakam iti ced dattam atra uttaram vyavahitam api janakam iti pratipāditam etat athavā vikalpa ākāraḥ eva bhāvanātaḥ spaṣṭa ākāraḥ eva bhāvanātaḥ spaṣṭa ākāra janakaḥ viṣayaḥ syāt tatas tatas ākārāt na arthasya vyavasthā bhāvanā balāt eva samāna jātīyāt ayam artha ākāraḥ yat jātīyaḥ iti nyāyāt avatiṣṭhata iti na artha parikalpanāyām nyāyaḥ tasmāt samanantara vijñānam eva viṣayaḥ evantarhi 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.2,1–2.1.2.7.1.2,3	 idam dṛṣṭam śrutam vedam iti yatra avasāya dhīḥ sa tasya anubhavaḥ sā eva pratyāsattiḥ vvicāryate dṛśya darśanayoḥ yena tasya tad sādhanam matam tayoḥ sambandham āśritya draṣṭuḥ eṣa viniścayaḥ yadi niścayāt artha vyavasthā niścayaḥ kila na arthāt anyatra na hi samanantara pratyaya āt ayam iti niścayaḥ api tu aviṣayaḥ ayam mama anubhavaḥ na samanantara pratyaya viṣayaḥ iti na hi artha anubhavam antareṇa arthaḥ iti niścayaḥ yuktaḥ anubhava anusāri tvāt niścayasya 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.2,4–2.1.2.7.1.2,7	 atra ucyate anubhavān na artha vyavasthā kintahi tad anusāriṇaḥ niścayāt iti tat etat āyātam arthaḥ ekaḥ panyānam na pratipadyate tena ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ iti mahat adbhūtam tathā hi sākṣāt utpattimān arthāt pratyayaḥ yaḥ sa na īkṣate tam artham aparaḥ tasmāt nyūna upīti ati sāhasam anubhava anusārī niścayaḥ tatas niścayāt eva avagamya tām artha anubhava ūsau na sva rūpa mātrasya iti anyathā tathā eva niścayaḥ bhavet iti ced tat etat asat nanu anubhavaḥ eva na jñāyate kasya iti katham anubhava anusārit tvam prasidhyati kutas tarhi niścayaḥ iti ced abhyāsāt eva iti pratipāditam sa upyabhyāsaḥ anubhavāt eva iti kutas viparīta niścayaḥ ayam api aparihāraḥ yatas evam sati na kasyacid viparita niścayaḥ syāt dṛśyate ca tasmāt ayuktam etat 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.2,8	 nanu ālocana mātram aviveka kāri tatas niścayāt eva artha anartha vivekaḥ yadi evam niścayopi na viveka kārī syāt na hi dvi candra pratyayaḥ eka candra niścaya kārī atha abhyāsāt niścayaḥ viveka sādhanam na abhyāsasya ahetuka tvāt pratiniyata anubhave hi tat niyataḥ abhyāsaḥ sattya tām yāyāt arthaḥ iti api niścaya urtha kriyā kāritva abhiprāyaḥ eva sā ca artha kriyā pratibhāsā antaram eva na ca pratibhāsāt pratibhāsa antarasya anudayaḥ tasmāt na niścayāt artha vyavasthā 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.2,9–2.1.2.7.1.2,12	 yat api uktam atha saḥ anubhavaḥ kva asya iti tatra api ucyate ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya kasya cit pratyakṣa prativedyat tvam api tasya tad ātmatā svarūpasya hi padārthānām kāraṇam antareṇa na utpattiḥ iti kāraṇa praśnaḥ yuktimān tatas etat iti kva ayam iti tu kaḥ praśna arthaḥ tathā hi kva ayam anubhavaḥ iti ukte yadā pratyucyate punar arthetadā api praśnaḥ syāt sorthaḥ kva iti anavasthitiḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.2,13–2.1.2.7.1.2,14	 krīḍanaka praśnaḥ evamvidhaḥ iti ced kasmāt paryavasānasya darśanāt tathā hi sorthaḥ kvāḥ bhūmau sā kva evam eva dṛśyate iti na punar paryanuyogaḥ yadi evam arthasya adarśanāt anubhavopi svarūpā ivasthitaḥ evam eva dṛśyatām iti kimādhāra kalpanayā anena ṣaṣṭhī artha paryanuyoga upi pratyuktaḥ tat āha sa ca na anyasya kasyacid 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.2,15	 katham tarhi pratyakṣa prativedya ūrthaḥ nirākartum śakyaḥ tathā hi pratyakṣeṇa nīlam paśyanti tadvantaḥ na arthasya adarśanāt iti uktam tad ākāra tā eva pratyakṣa vedyā na vyatirikta ūrthaḥ tad ākāraḥ evam nīlaḥ iti vyavahriyate na anyaḥ tasmāt nīla ātmakaḥ anubhavaḥ nīla anubhavaḥ śilā putrakasya śarīram iti yathā na hi ṣaṣṭhī arthaḥ iti eva bhedaḥ yathā kathañcid asya bhāvāt athavā sa katham pratyakṣa unubhavaḥ yadi tasya aparonubhavaḥ na asti na svarūpa gatena eva anubhavena sutarām pratyakṣatā para rūpe pratyakṣa tā ayogāt na hi tad rūpam anyasya tathā ced anyaḥ eva bhavet athavā aparokṣam vijñānam yasya anubhavaḥ saḥ arthaḥ bhaviṣyati yadi evam ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ anyatra āvedya māna tvāt bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced sa ca na anyasya yadi ātmā arthasya syāt anyasya api tathā eva bhavet iti sarvvaḥ tad darśī bhavet na ca anyasya tathā 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.2,16	 nanu pratyakṣeṇa vedyate na ātmanā na tat eva rūpam pṛthak vyavasthāpya kalpanayā tathā vyapadeśaḥ tasmāt ananya samvedyaḥ nīla ādi ātmā eva anubhavaḥ athavā yadi arthaḥ na anubhūyate kim idam bahis deśa sambaddha tayā anabhava gocaraḥ ātmā eva anubhūyate cittam eva anubhūyate katham bahis deśa tā sa ca na anyasya tatosau kutas bahirbhūtaḥ athavā aatmā saḥ ātmā eva idam artham iti bhavatā upyabhyupagamāt tasya ca anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya api tu ātmanaḥ eva tad vyatirikta bhāvāt athavā tat saḥ iti ced na pratyakṣa prativedya tvāt yatas tad ātmanā eva pratyakṣa prativedya tvam na anyathā 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.2,17–2.1.2.7.1.2,20	 nanu ātma vādaḥ prasaktaḥ na citra ākāra samvedanāt avidyā vaśena utpattiḥ samvedanam eva tat na ātma vādaḥ upayogī nirātmakattvantu vā rāga ādi praśama anukūlam iti na doṣaḥ etat eva uttareṇa darśayati na anyonubhāvyaḥ tena asti tasya na anubhavaḥ paraḥ tasya api tulya codya tvāt svayam sā eva prakāśate buddhyā yonubhūyate sa na asti paraḥ yathā anyonubhāvyaḥ na asti tathā niveditam tasyāḥ tarhi paraḥ anubhavaḥ buddheḥ astu na tatra api grāhya grāhaka lakṣaṇa abhāvaḥ param hi samvedana svarūpe avasthitam katham parasya anubhavaḥ sākṣātkaraṇa ādikam pratyākhyātam tad samvedana anupraveśe ca tayoḥ ekattvam eva syāt tathā ca svayam sā eva prakāśate na tatas paraḥ iti sthitam kathantarhi yoginām para citta pratipattiḥ etat uttaratra pratividhāsyate tasmāt svayam eva svarūpa prakāśaka tvāt tathā bhavati evantarhi svarūpa anubhavaḥ iti astu katham nīlānubhavaḥ iti khyātiḥ atra āha 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.3,1–2.1.2.7.1.3,3	 nīla ādi rūpaḥ tasya asau svabhāva unubhavaḥ ca saḥ nīla ādi anubhavāt khyātaḥ svarūpa anubhavopi san nīla rūpa tvāt nīlānubhava na tu nīlasya aparonubhavaḥ śuddhasya anubhavasya abhāvāt yaḥ hi yat avyatiriktaḥ sa tad rūpeṇa eva vyavahāra viṣayaḥ tathā hi yadi śuddhaḥ syāt tathā eva adhyavasīyate vyatirekaḥ svarūpā ipi dṛśyate na tatas tathā 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.3,4–2.1.2.7.1.3,8	 nīla anubhavaḥ iti yathā khyātiḥ tathā eva asau nīla svarūpa tayā anubhava rūpa tayā bhavati iti yuktam na ca vyatireka vyapadeśa mātrakāt eva bhedaḥ vyatireka vyapadeśaḥ hi yathā kathañcid vāsanā balāt api bhavan= upalabhyate iti prāc pratipāditam nanu nīlam katham ātma rūpam prakāśayati na hi prakāśyāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ pradīpa ādinā sva prakāśakāḥ ātmani kriyā virudhyate na hi sā eva asi dhārā tayā eva cchidyate atra parihāraḥ prakāśamānaḥ tādātmyāt svarūpasya prakāśakaḥ yathā prakāśa ubhimataḥ tathā dhīra ātma vodinī avedyevedaka ākārāḥ 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.3,9	 sva ātmani kriyā virodhaḥ iti kutas pramāṇāt avagatam na hi dṛṣṭānta mātrāt arthasya prasiddhiḥ samīhitasya viparyayepi dṛṣṭāntasya pradīpasya sambhavāt yadi ghaṭaḥ pradīpena bāhya ātmanā prakāśyate pradīpopi tathābhūtena apareṇa iti na paryanuyogaḥ na ca ghaṭopi pradīpena prakāśyate api tu tathābhūtasya eva tatas utpattiḥ atha pradīpopyapareṇa cakṣuḥ ādinā prakāśyate na cakṣuḥ ādeḥ sakala ghaṭa ādi sādhāraṇattva ipi cakṣuṣi ca sati api pradīpam apekṣate prakāśakam ghataḥ tathā pradīpopi syāta atha ghaṭaḥ utpadyate eva tathā prakāśanantu tasya cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ evantarhi 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.3,10–2.1.2.7.1.3,14	 aprakāśa īpi bāhyerthe yathā dīpāt prakāśanam vyapadeśasya viṣayaḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ apīṣyatām yathā tatas tathā bhūta rūpa utpattau= api pradīpāt pradīpa abhivyaktaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti vyapadeśaḥ tathā cakṣuḥ ādikāt api tathā utpattyā eva vyapadeśaḥ atha dvayam api prakāśakam ghaṭa ādeḥ pradīpa ādeḥ tu ekam eva evantarhi ekam kasyacid anyasya dvayam eva prakāśakam yathā sambhavatā unyasya na ekam api astu kā kṣatiḥ atyantam aśaktasya dvayam aparasya ekam anyasya na ekam api iti vastu svabhāvaḥ eṣaḥ iti kā vā atra kṣatiḥ atha sva ātmani kriyā virodhaḥ iti ucyate yadā svarūpantattasya tadā kā eva virodhitā sva rūpeṇa virodhe hi sarvam eva pralīyate 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.3,15	 na hi svena eva rūpeṇa kasyacid virodhaḥ tathā ced na kiñcid bhavet svena rūpeṇa iti sakalam astaṃgatam bhavet chedaḥ tu punar viśiṣṭa utpādanam na ca tena eva tasya utpādanam ayam eva arthaḥ sva ātmani kriyā virodhaḥ iti sva prakāśa rūpantu tasya svarūpam na tena eva virudhyate kutas tat iti vaktavyam sva hetoḥ tathābhūtāt iti yadi sa hetuḥ nna asti tadā yuktam bhavet na anyathā iti nyāyaḥ tatas idampareṇa vaktavyam sva prakāśakattvam eva na dṛśyate tatra ca uttaram uktam eva saru u asya sva rūpeṇa prakāśanāt iti punar api ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.3,16–2.1.2.7.1.3,17	 tasyāḥ ca artha antare vedye durghaṭau vedya vedakau artha antara bhūtā buddhiḥ sva prakāśānyathā vā bhavet yadi sva prakāśā svarūpeṇa prakāśate tatonyarthaḥ tayā prakāśyate iti na aprakāśe tasmin vyapadeśaḥ tathā bhavet prakāśate ced sā upi tathā eva prakāśate tadā eva iti katham tasya pareṇa prakāśanam na hi tadā viśeṣaḥ prakāśya prakāśakayoḥ krameṇa tad vyāpārāt pratipatti viśeṣaḥ tasya iti ced tathā hi 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.3,18–2.1.2.7.1.3,19	 ḍhaukyamāne pradīpa ādau viśeṣaḥ tasya gamyate tatas tayoḥ dvayoḥ tattvam tathā utpādaḥ na kimmataḥ viśeṣaḥ prakāśate iti svena eva rūpeṇa tasya prakāśanam tatas svarūpasya eva tathā prakāśanam tatas sva prakāśanam eva antepi atha svayam prakāśate iti na pratīyate vyavahāraḥ evambhūtaḥ na bhavati tatas eva ucyate 
PVA_2.1.2.7.1.3,20–2.1.2.7.1.3,21	 nanu anubhava anurūpaḥ vyavahāraḥ pramāṇayitavyaḥ na sarvvaḥ atha sarvvaḥ eva vyavahāraḥ pramāṇam tathā sati na kiñcid prativādi bodhanāya vaktavyam tasmāt yathā pratīyate tathā abhyupagamaḥ nanu samvedana nāma na parokṣam yuktam tathā samvedyam na sarvvadā tathā iti nyāyaḥ samvedyasya parokṣatā api yuktāḥ yadi tu sarvvadā samviditam eva jñāna arthayoḥ bhedaḥ na gamyate
