PVA_3.1.1.2.3,85–3.1.1.2.3,87	 atha anya apoha lakṣaṇam sāmānyam siddham saugatānām tathā asati parasya iṣṭam eva para abhyupagatasya tena api dūṣayitum abhipreta tvāt api ca anya apoha lakṣaṇasya sāmānyasya vyāpitā iṣyate eva tathā hi vyāvṛttyā api samāna tā asti eva vastu na anveti pravṛtti ādi prasaṅgataḥ atha sāmānyasya avidyamānasya api viraha lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ asti eva iti 
PVA_3.1.1.2.3,88–3.1.1.2.3,89	 tat api asat avidyamānasya hetu tva ayogāt avidyamāne sādhye yogaḥ eva iti ced na pratibandhe sati eka abhāva unya abhāvam gamayet pratibandhaḥ ca anvayena gṛhyate atas tad sāmarthyāt yatra vyāpakaḥ na asti tatra vyāpya abhāvaḥ iti vipakṣe abhāva mātram ādarśyate na sa maulaḥ hetuḥ atha vyāpaka tā anupalabdhiḥ api pratiniyata vastu viṣaya abhāva sādhanāya upādīyate tathā sati na atra śiṃśapā iti nyāyāt anyena dharmiṇā bhavitavyam pramāṇa prasiddhena atha atra api bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇam dharmīṃti upādīyate 
PVA_3.1.1.2.3,90–3.1.1.2.3,93	 tat api ayuktam bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇasya aparasya abhāvāt vikalpa pratibhāsaḥ eva ubhaya dharmaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ iti ced evam tarhi tasmin bhāva anupādāne sādhye asya anupalambhanam anyaḥ eva hetuḥ iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt na atra maulaḥ hetuḥ sāmānyasya dharmiṇaḥ siddheḥ abhāvāt rūpa ādayaḥ eva sāmānyam iti pakṣe na idam prasaṅga sādhanam pratyakṣeṇa teṣām avyāpita apratīteḥ tasmāt ubhaya vādi siddhi eva hetuḥ nna tu anyatarasya prativādinaḥ eva 
PVA_3.1.1.3,1–3.1.1.3,5	 nanu yaḥ ubhaya siddhaḥ saḥ arthaḥ eva kimartham artha grahaṇam na etat asti yatas kalpanānā mātrataḥ siddhaḥ yathā ekasya ubhayoḥ api kalpanā hi na na nāma etāḥ niyata udaya saṅgamāḥ tatas ubhaya siddha tvepi pakṣa sa pakṣa anyatara tva ādeḥ artha tva abhāvāt ahetu tvam yatas tad artha grahaṇam śabda kalpanā āropita ātmanām aliṅga tva prasidhi artham arthāt artha prasiddhitaḥ yad artha grahaṇam sva dṛṣṭa grahaṇa viśeṣyam tad chadbakalpanā mātra ghaṭita ātma nām ahetutā pratipādana arthaḥ arthasya eva gamaka tva sambhavāt 
PVA_3.1.1.3,6	 nanu asiddha viruddha anaikāntika lakṣaṇaḥ eva hetuḥ apratinna artha pratipādane yadi ca asya traiḥ upyam asti katham ahetuḥ atha trairūpya abhāvaḥ tadā sva artha anumāna lakṣaṇāt eva nivṛttiḥ kim artha grahaṇena trirūpa liṅga ākhyānam hi para artha anumānam na sva artha anumānepi kalpanā āropitam trairūpyam prāptam eva hetu lakṣaṇam kathantataḥ nivṛttiḥ na atra tarhi tad artha grahaṇam karttavyam sva artha anumānaḥ eva karttavyatā prāpteḥ 
PVA_3.1.1.3,7–3.1.1.3,9	 atra ucyate sva niścaya vat anyeṣām iti vacanāt atra kṛtam tatrāmi bhaviṣyati iti adoṣaḥ tatra eva kasmāt na iti ced tatra vā kriyatā amātrava iti kaḥ virodhaḥ asti ca atra prayojanam tathā hi kalpanā ādi kṛtam hetum sva arthe kaścid na kalpayet ātmānam eva kim kaścid visamvāda yatī hitāt kiñca para arthaḥ eva yatna paraḥ kāryaḥ iti ca atra eva mahān yatnaḥ vidheyaḥ mahātmanā iti artha grahaṇam atra paramārthataḥ tu kalpanā āropitaḥ hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ eva tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.1.3,10–3.1.1.3,11	 kalpanā āgamayoḥ karttuḥ icchā mātra anurodhataḥ vastunaḥ ca anyathā bhāvāt tad kṛtāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ na khalu kalpanā samāropitasya sādhya vastu pratibandhaḥ vāsanā mātra pravarttita tvāt yadi evam apratibandhāt eva na hetuḥ na pratibandhasya atas eva ākṣepāt na hi sākṣāt pratibandha pratipādanam asti tata urtha grahaṇam na hi pakṣa sapakṣa antara tvam nittya anittyayoḥ ekatra niyatam yaḥ yaḥ pakṣīkriyate tad apekṣayā tatra tatra sañcārāt na ca īdṛśī vastu siddhiḥ vivakṣa antarenyasya sādhanāt 
PVA_3.1.2.1.1,1–3.1.2.1.1,3	 nanu pakṣaḥ sādhyaḥ eva tad apekṣayā anyasya sa pakṣa tvāt tatra pakṣa sama pakṣa anyatara tvam nāma dharmaḥ tad vipakṣāt vyāvarttate tatas kathat na hetuḥ na hi pakṣa sa pakṣa niyataḥ dharmaḥ sādhya vyabhicārī tat asat yatas na pakṣasya sa pakṣasya bhāvasya niyamaḥ kvacid na pakṣaḥ nitya tā mātram aparasya api sambhavāt 
PVA_3.1.2.1.1,4–3.1.2.1.1,6	 yadi ayam arthaḥ pakṣa sa pakṣa anyatara tvāt iti śabda ghaṭa anitya tā sāmānya avyabhicarita dharma yogāt iti tadā sa dharmaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ eva avyabhicaritasya sādharmyasya anyatara śabdena pratipādanāt na tva vyabhicārī dharmaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ eva evam ca sati sa hetuḥ arthaḥ eva na kalpitaḥ atha pakṣīkṛta itara tvena vivakṣita tvāt tat asat yadi api nāma anitya tayā pakṣatva vivakṣā tathā api na tāvatā anitya tā sidhyati nitya tayā vivakṣita tve tadā eva apagamāt vāstavañcet anityatayā pakṣa tvam prasidhyet siddham eva sādhitam bhavet tasmāt na kalpitaḥ dharmaḥ sādhanam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.1,7–3.1.2.1.1,8	 sa ca sva siddhaḥ arthaḥ sādhanam trirūpam eva liṅgam atas trirūpa liṅga ākhyānam para artham anumānam tatas yaiḥ pakṣa vacanam api sādhanam iṣyate ayukta vādinaḥ te iti pratipāditam bhavati tasya asiddha tvāt sādhanam hi sādhyam sādhayet na sādhyam eva vādhyam sādhanāt vacanam sādhanam iti ced na vacanasya sākṣāt asādhana tvāt sādhya apratibandhāt na vacanasya arthe pratibandhaḥ tasmāt arthāt artha gateḥ śaktiḥ pakṣa hetu abhidhānayoḥ na arthe tena tayoḥ nna asti svatas sādhana saṃsthitiḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.1.1,9–3.1.2.1.1,10	 anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti trirūpam kṛtaka tvam eva anitya tām gamayati tasya tatra avyabhicārāt na pakṣa vacanam hetu vacanam vā anyathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāk iti sādhya siddhiḥ bhavet atra api hetu pakṣa vacanam asti tad arthasya tatra apratibandhāt ahetuḥ iti ced arthāt eva tarhi arthasya gatiḥ pratibandhāt na vacanam sākṣāt sādhanam iti prāptam vacanasya artham antareṇa api bhāvāt yatra ca hetu vacanam asādhana tatra pakṣa vacanasya asādhana tvam anukta siddhim eva atha sādhya vacanam sādhya arthaṃpratipādanāt sādhanam na hetu vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt atha pratijñā mātram na sādhanam iti hetuḥ upādīyate katham asādhanam sādhanam sahitam sādhanam iti ced katham anupayogi sāhityam vidadhyāt na anupayoginā kaścid sāhityam vāñchati tasmāt na vacanam sādhanam api ca 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,1–3.1.2.1.2,2	 tat pakṣa vacanam vaktuḥ abhiprāya nivedane pramāṇam saṃśaya utpatteḥ tatas sākṣāt na sādhanam na hi saṃśaya hetuḥ eva tatra hetuḥ artha apratibaddha tvena ca saṃśaya hetu tvam anyathā hetu pādānam anarthakam yathā tarhi vacanam sādhya artha asādhanam tathā sādhana artha upi na eva tasmāt pratipattavyaḥ tatra api na eva tasya pratibandhaḥ pratibandhe vā sādhyepi kaḥ pratibandhaḥ prativandhasya 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,3	 sattyam etat sādhana artham api na eva vacanam pratipādayati tatra abhiprāya nivedane pramāṇa tvāt atas sākṣāt na sādhanam sādhanepi pramāṇam eva vacanena ākṣipyate sādhyepi pramāṇam ākṣipyatām iti ced na tadānīm eva tatra pramāṇa sadbhāvāt pūrvva vṛttam hi pramāṇam ākṣipyate vacanena tatra vismaraṇa sambhavāt varttamāne tu pramāṇam pratyakṣam eva kintatra vacanena na hi pratyakṣe arthe para upadeśaḥ garīyān yasmāt vacanam asādhanam pāramparyeṇa tarhi sādhanam pakṣasya vacanam yathā sādhanasya etat api asat 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,5–3.1.2.1.2,9	 sādhyasya eva abhidhānena pāramparyaiṇa na api asam śaktasya sūcakam hetu vacaḥ aśaktam api svayam yathā sādhana vacanam sādhanam tathā pakṣa vacanam api bhavet yadi śaktasya sūcakam bhavet pramāṇa siddhasya asiddhasya tu sūcanam katham sādhanam na hi svayam aśaktam aśaktam āśritya śaktimat tathā hi na patantam āśritya patat sthirībhavati kvacid tathā asiddham asiddhena na tena eva prasādhyate sādhyasya pakṣa vacanena asiddhatayā abhidhānāt katham sādhanam pakṣa vacanam hetu vacanantu svayam aśaktam api śaktasya vācakam iti sādhanam uktam pratibaddhasya sādhyerthe sādhanasya abhidhānataḥ vacanam sādhanam proktam sādhanam tat svatas na tu 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,10	 tatas yat uktam parārthañca anumānañca iti vyāhatam tathā hi pratipādya apekṣayā sva artham eva pratipādaka apekṣayā tu anuvāda mātrakam tad nirākṛtam yatas anumānantat anu māna kāraṇa tvena upacārataḥ uktam na svatas tatas prativādi apekṣayā tat sva artham iti yat kiñcana vādi tā eva tasya hi tri rūpam eva liṅgam pratipādaka tvāt sva artha na vacanam tatorthasya apratipatteḥ smaraṇena tasya api upakāraka tvāt pratipādakam eva iti ced na arthavāda mātrakasya vacanena vidhānāt tatas ubhaya apekṣayā api vacanam anuvādaḥ eva parārtha tā tasya pratipādaka apekṣayā na pratipādakasya tena kakcit upakāraḥ anumāna kāraṇa tvena tu anumānantat pratipādya apekṣayā eva 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,11	 nanu artha apekṣayā para artha m anyapekṣayā anumānam iti prāptam tat katham etat nanu guṇaḥ eva hi doṣa tayā adhyāropyate yena eva tasya pratipādakasya tad anumānan na bhavati pratipādyasya vātaḥ eva tat pratipādakasya para artham anyathā sva artham api bhavet svayam api tena tasya artha karaṇāt upacāre ca prayojanam uktam vacanasya anyena prakāreṇa artha sādhana abhāvāt nanu smaraṇepi vacanam pramāṇam apramāṇam vā pramāṇañcet kinna arthe atha apramāṇam katham tatas smaraṇam atas eva anyathā tatas pramāṇam eva bhavet na smaraṇam smaraṇe ca tad kārakam na jñāpakam iti pramāṇa svabhāvaḥ smaraṇam eva tatas katham arthe pratibandha abhāvāt ghamaḥ hi pāvake pratibaddhaḥ iti janayati smaraṇam tat yadi śabdopi pratibaddhaḥ tathā smaraṇam janayet 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,12–3.1.2.1.2,15	 tathā hi yat yat smaraṇam tat asti pratibandhataḥ yathā asti dhūmāt smaraṇam parokṣe kṛṣṇava atmani tat asat na smaraṇa mātrakam pratibaddha tvāt iti pratibandhaḥ smaraṇañca bhaviṣyati apratibaddha tvāt ca iti konayoḥ vvirodhaḥ tathā hi ābhogat api dṛṣṭerthe smaraṇam kinna jāyate yatas kutaścid arthāt vā prāyeṇa sahacāriṇaḥ atha niścita rūpam smaraṇam sambaddhāt eva na anyatas 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,16	 tat yuktam na hi asati pratibandhe tasya niścayaḥ tatra kintu śabdāt niścita rūpam smaraṇam iti asiddham atas na sambandha siddhiḥ tathā hi sambandham anālocayataḥ saṃdehaḥ eva bhavati śabdāt ca sandehaḥ upajāyamānaḥ upalabhyate eva kathantarhi niścayaḥ evam eva etat yathā āha ayam iti na pramāṇāt eva tad niścayāt yatas pūrvva pravṛtta pramāṇa paryālocanāt eva niścayaḥ na vacana mātrāt pramāṇe tarhi niścayaḥ na vacanāt tathā api vacanam pramāṇam eva atra ucyate 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,17–3.1.2.1.2,18	 etat iṣyate eva atra pramāṇe tad svatas na hi asmin= arthe prasiddhepi na kācid naḥ kṣatiḥ yatas arthe hi vacanam apramā pramāṇe tu pramāṇam iti na eva kiñcid kṣīyate na ca pramāṇam api vacanāt sidhyati tasya sva samvedanena siddheḥ smaraṇa mātram eva tatra bhavati niścayaḥ tu sva samvedanāt eva kin na vacana mātreṇa bhavati eva ābhoga mātrāt api smaraṇa darśanāt atha yadābhogataḥ na bhavati tadā vacane pramāṇam iti ced na sat etat yatas 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,19–3.1.2.1.2,21	 mithyā smaraṇam api arthe vacanāt jātam īkṣyate vacanasya viśeṣaḥ na sattyāsattyatayā īkṣyate īkṣaṇerthonumā anantatsva artham eva tadā bhavet ābhogāt api jāyante mithyā smaraṇa vṛttayaḥ tasmāt pūrvva pramāṇa svarūpa avadhāraṇam atyanta paryālocanataḥ eva kutaścid liṅgāt iti na vacanam pramāṇam pramāṇena api arthena api ābhogaḥ iti anumānam eva parokṣe arthe pramāṇam tad dvāreṇa vacanam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,22–3.1.2.1.2,24	 nanu pramāṇam pratibandha grāhi idānīm atītam iti katham pratibandha niścayaḥ smaraṇam idānīn na ca tad pramāṇam tena pramāṇena janita tvāt pramāṇam eva tatas ca pramāṇāt smaraṇam jātam upacārāt pramā na kim apramāṇāt tu yat jātam apramāṇanta diṣyate nanu pramāṇāt etat smaraṇam iti smṛtiḥ eva atra api nibandhanam tat api smaraṇam anyatas smaraṇāt pariśuddhi bhāj iti kutas niścayaḥ jāyatām 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,25–3.1.2.1.2,27	 dṛḍham smaraṇam etat ced mithyā dāḍharyan na kim matam artha prāpteḥ nna mithyā ced siddha upasthānam eva tat atra api ucyate uktam eva ādau= etat svarūpasya svatas gatiḥ prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa vyavahāraḥ ca artha prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ eva upalabhyate na anyaḥ upayogī nanu svatas eva kiñcid dṛḍham smaraṇam tatoyam pramāṇat iti niścayaḥ na vyavahārāt iti ced 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,28–3.1.2.1.2,36	 tat asat yatas abhyāsāt eva dṛḍha tā sā asti prāpti samāśrayāt anyat abhyastam anyatra dṛḍha tā na eva jāyate yadi ayam artha prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ na abhaviṣyat abhyastaḥ tat katham prāpti upayogi dāḍharī am bhavet anyat abhyastam anyatra dāḍharyam iti saḥ eva vyavahāra ucchedaḥ lokasya syāt tasmāt etāvatī gatiḥ saṃsāriṇām iti sāṃvyavahārikam pramāṇam avicalitam iti na doṣaḥ tasmāt vacanam anumāna kāraṇa tvāt anumānam iti sthitam etat nanu ācāryasya pakṣa vacanam abhimatam eva yat āha sva niścaya vat anyeṣām niścaya utpādana icchayā pakṣa dharma tva sambandha sādhya ukteḥ anya varjanam na etat asti yatas hetu artha viṣaya tvena tad aśakta uktiḥ īritā yat āha asmākantu tatra anumeya nirdeśaḥ hetu artha vipayaḥ mataḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.1.2,37–3.1.2.1.2,39	 asmākantu yonu meya nirddeśaḥ sa hetu artha viṣaya tvena na sādhana tvena atas sākṣāt sādhana tva pratikṣepāt tasya sādhyasya ukteḥ aśakta tā kathitāḥ kathantarhi pakṣa dharma tvam sambandha sa adhya ukti nirddeśa abhyupagamaḥ na asya ayam arthaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ ca sambandhaḥ ca sādhya uktiḥ ca iti api tu sambandha ukti saṅga tā sādhya uktiḥ sambaḥ dhasādhyoktiḥ yat kṛtakam tat anittyam iti vyāpti antargatā sādhya uktiḥ nna pratijñā rūpeṇa avaśyam hi sādhane vyāpaka tvam sādhyasya upadarśanīyam atas avayava dvayam eva darśanīyam sambandhena rūpa dvaya ākṣepāt eva tri rūpa tā hetoḥ tasmāt anittyaḥ śabdaḥ iti na ādau= antevā darśanīyam rūpa dvaya mātrakāt eva sādhyasya siddheḥ śaktiḥ tasya api ced hetu vacanasya pravartanāt tad saṃśayena jijñāsoḥ bhavet prakāraṇa āśrayaḥ vipakṣa upagamepi etat tulyam iti anavasthitiḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.1,1	 atha api syāt yadi pakṣa vacana abhāve hetu vacanamata kiṃtam udgura pātāyamānam asambaddham iti na pravarttate tatas hetu vacana pravṛtteḥ tat api sādhanam eva iti na saṃśaya jijñāsā prakaraṇa tad avabodhaḥ icchānām api sādhana tva prāptau daśa avayava tā vākyasya syāt idam atra sandigdham bhavataḥ idam eva jijñāsitam idam eva bhavatā prastutam idam mayā avagatam atra mama icchā iti evam kūrcca śobhāmāra cayatā daśa avayavam vākyam prayoktavyam tathā vipakṣa upagama ipi sādhanam pravarttate tatas tasya api sādhana tva prasaṅgaḥ tena saha vipakṣasya atha sādhya niścaya mātram saṃdeha ādi pratipādanam antareṇa api bhavati iti na taiḥ śabda prapañca mātra upayogibhiḥ kaścid artha gata urthaḥ tatas saṃśaya ādi parityāgaḥ tad anuvādasya akiñcat kara tvat yadi evam pratijñā vacanam api anuvāda mātram eva vādinaḥ na antaraṅga tā tasya 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.1,2–3.1.2.1.3.1,3	 attaraṅgam tu sāmarthyam triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam tatra smṛti samādhānam tad vacasi ā iva saṃsthitam trirūpāt eva tāvat svārtha anumāne sorthaḥ sādhyaḥ pratīyate na hi sva artha anumāne sādhya arthaḥ prathamam āyāti hetoḥ tena adhyavasitena bhavitavyam tatas sva niścaya vat eva na prathamam sādhya upādānam paścāt rūpa ādānam iti ced paścāt api na upādānam sva artha anumāna vat eva parasya api yadā tri rūpāt upajāyate pratītiḥ tadā tasyāḥ sva artha anumānāt kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tasmāt pratijñā nigamanayoḥ anuktiḥ eva upanayopi na vaktavyaḥ dṛṣṭa sāmarthya darśana paratvāt na ca tasya tatra sattā mātrāt aparam sāmarthyam tat ca sattā mātram śabde pakṣa dharma tvāt eva gatam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.1,5–3.1.2.1.3.1,8	 atha api syāt āgamaḥ pratijñā hetuḥ anumānam pratyakṣam dṛṣṭāntaḥ upanayaḥ upamānam sarvu apramāṇa vyāpāra viṣaya pradarśana param nigamanam tat etat asat yatas anumānāt prasiddhiḥ ced pramāṇaiḥ atra kim paraiḥ na anumānāt prasiddhiḥ ced pramāṇaiḥ atra kimparaiḥ hetu sāmarthyāt eva yadi asau= arthaḥ pratīyate kim apara pramāṇa vyāpāreṇa kim atra kurmaḥ yat sarvva pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ na khalu hetu paratantraḥ kāraka grāmaḥ tathā bhavan paryanuyoga bhāgī kim ayam evam bhavati iti sattyam etat yadi evam syāt na khalu pratijñā pramāṇantataḥ saṃśaya utpatteḥ iti pratipādanāt 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.2,1–3.1.2.1.3.2,3	 upamānam pramāṇam na khalu tathā ca ayami tyupamānam antareṇa hetoḥ sādhya siddhiḥ na idam asti yatas pakṣa dharma tvam eva idam upamānena darśyate tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti evam upadarśitaḥ sāmānyena hi pratibandha grahaṇe katham viśeṣa ādhāra tā anitya tā ādi prasiddhiḥ viśeṣa ādhāra tayā kṛtaka tva ādeḥ prasiddheḥ sā eva ca viśeṣa ādhāra tā tathā ca ayam iti upamāna prasiddhyā kutas ca ayam iti pakṣa dharma tayā pradarśyate upamānam pramāṇam aparam prasaktam iti ced na anumāna antargata tvāt go sādṛśyāt ayam sa gavayaḥ iti viśeṣa sambandha sādhanam śabdasya upamāna viṣayāt aparaḥ na bhavati iti anumānam eva tatra pramāṇam na anumānam aparam upamāna vādibhiḥ apīṣyate kṛtaka tvena sādṛśyam tasya viṣayaḥ iti ced na kṛtaka tva dvaya vyatirekeṇa sādṛśya bhāvāt na daṇḍa ādhāra dvaya vyatirekeṇa aparandaṇḍi tva sādṛśyam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.2,4–3.1.2.1.3.2,9	 sādṛśyam yadi na asti atra vyatireke gatiḥ katham sadṛśoyam iti prāptam anya kāraṇa kalpanam tat asat kāraṇam kalpyate kāryāt dṛṣṭi sambandhataḥ yadi kāraṇena tadā prāptam kāraṇasya api darśanam api ca yadi sādṛśyam atra asti kasmāt na pratibhāsate sūkṣma tvāt iti ced tattvam adṛṣṭe kalpyatām katham bhāva rūpa atirekeṇa vikalpepi na bhāsate nija ābhāsa viviktasya vyavasthā iti mahā adbhutam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.2,10–3.1.2.1.3.2,13	 anādi vāsanāsā aṅgi kalpanā āropita ātmakam sādṛśyan na parīkṣāyām tat tvam asya iti na asti tat vastu sambandha ta ūnena vyavahāraḥ ca sidhyati artha kriyā kutorthaḥ ca sadṛśāt eva na īkṣyate avāntara viśeṣaḥ ceta tatra api na kim īkṣyate na khalu sadṛśa abhimatāt eva artha kriyā avāptiḥ yena tad artha kriyā kāri sādṛśyambhavet mahiṣī āditopi kṣīra ādi artha kriyā avāpteḥ atha avāntara bhedaḥ tatra vidyate tena visadṛśī visadṛśān na tu sā eva artha kriyā yadi evam avāntara bhedaḥ gavām api parasparatā usti eva tatas sādṛśya anurūpa artha kriyā na asti eva iti na samvādaḥ kiñca vilakṣaṇa pratyaya utpatteḥ aparatra vailakṣaṇyam api asti iti prāptam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.2,14–3.1.2.1.3.2,15	 bha kriyā asti yena sādṛśya abhāva mātreṇa tat iti ced sādṛśyam api vailakṣaṇya abhāva mātreṇa iti prāptam sādṛśyam eva bailakṣaṇya abhāvaḥ iti ced na kathambhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ vailakṣaṇya abhāvam eva sādṛśyam iti kinna bhavati baila kṣaṇī añca ubha yava ādi prasiddham na tat abhāva mātreṇa sādṛśya vyavahāra parisamāpteḥ anarthakam aparam sādṛśya parikalpanam tasmāt na upamānam aparam pramāṇam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.3,1–3.1.2.1.3.3,7	 atha pratijñā arthaḥ āgama siddhaḥ iti pratijñā āgamaḥ ucyate evam api kinna pratijñāyāḥ prayojanam tathā hi āgamāt eva siddhoyam yadi arthaḥ kim pratijñayā āgamāt na prasiddhoyam yadi arthaḥ kim pratijñayā anāgama pramāṇena kimarthaḥ na prasādhyate na pratijñāna mātreṇa sa āgama artha tva sādhanam atha api atyantam abhyāsāt pratijñā hetu mātrataḥ pratīti siddhiḥ tatra asti pratijñā padam arthavat tadā api pañca avayavam abhyasta tvāt kutas vacaḥ pratijñā api tadā na asau pañca dharma tva darśanāt kathantarhi idam uktam asmākam tu pakṣa nirddeśaḥ yaḥ sa na sādhana tvena api tu hetu artha viṣaya tvena iti etat eva āha akhyāpite hi viṣaye hetu vṛtteḥ asambhavāt viṣaya khyāpanāt eva sāmarthyam iti ced matam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.3,8	 kṛtaka tvāt iti etāvat mātrakāt anityaḥ iti uktena jñāyate kasya anitya tā sādhyāḥ tatas sa śabdaḥ anityaḥ iti pratijñā padam upādeyam tat idānīm hetu viṣaya tvena na upādīyatām anyathā vā sarvu atha asyām bāhya vyavasthāyāma khyāpite viṣaye hetu vṛtteḥ asambhavāt avaśyam viṣayaḥ khyāpayitavyaḥ tatas sādhya siddheḥ prāc avaśyam bhāvaḥ pratijñāyāḥ sādhanasya sādhana tā anyathā sādhana tvasya abhāvāt pramāṇa phala upanyāsaḥ iti ced nirddeśe pramāṇa phalam pratijñā pakṣaḥ iti na nāma antara karaṇāt parihāraḥ sa ca ayam nyāyaḥ śūlam cakram iti āha iti atas viṣaya khyāpanāt eva tasya śakta tā siddhāḥ uktam atra saṃśaya ādīnām api sādhana tva prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.3,9–3.1.2.1.3.3,12	 viṣayādarśanañca idam vyāpti pūrvvaka vācakam anyathā vā vidhīyeta tat idam dvayam api asat viṣayaḥ pratijñayā nidarśanīyaḥ iti atra vicāryate kim vyāptita pūrvvaka prayoge atha hetoḥ pañcamyāḥ nirddeśe kiñca atas vyāptiḥ vve vinā api asmāt kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ īdṛśaḥ sarvve anityāḥ iti proktā ipi arthāt tad nāśa dhīḥ bhaveta 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.3,13–3.1.2.1.3.3,14	 yat kṛtakam tat sarvvam anityam iti sarva upasaṃhāreṇa vyāpti darśane tat vyaptam kṛtaka tvam tatra upadarśitam tathābhūtam eva iti anitya tā śabdasya iti jñāyate eva kim pratijñā pādena viṣaya upadarśana arthena iti anyathā eva viṣayasya prasiddheḥ atha pratijñāpadam antareṇa katham viruddha hetu niścayaḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ prativādī viruddhasya parijñātā bhavet iti pratijñā kriyate na eva sva badhāya kim udyamaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.3,15–3.1.2.1.3.3,16^1	 yadi pratijñāpada anupādānam katham viruddha uyam hetuḥ iti jñāyate pareṇa iti kasya ayam paryanuyogaḥ vādinaḥ iti ced na samyak etat bhadram eva apatitam mā jñāsīt prativādī kim mayā tasya saurkyaḥ karaṇīyam vyāpti pūrvvake prayoge śāstra kāreṇa karttavyatayā abhihite vihitaḥ viruddhasya asambhavāt vādinaḥ mahān umapakāraḥ iti ca śāstra kārasya api na doṣaḥ na hi asau vādi badhāya śāstra kṛt prativādinā unugrahaḥ karttavyam eva iti ced kaḥ pradveṣaḥ anyatra iti yat kiñcid etat yadi nittyaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt yad kṛta kantat anittyam iti atra viruddha hetu codanam 
PVA_3.1.2.1.3.3,15–3.1.2.1.3.3,16^2	 tadā na kaścid anunmattaḥ tadā eva nittya tvam pratijñāya anittya tvena vyāptim upadarśayet atha nittya tvena vyāptim upadarśayet tadā vyāpti viparyayāt eva viruddha tva pratītiḥ api ca yasya pratijñāpada prayogaḥ tad apekṣayā viruddha abhidhānam nittyaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti ca avasare atha pratijñā padam antareṇa adṛṣṭa mudgara pātāyamānam sādhana vākyam uddhegāya bhavet atas tad upādānam yatas prakaraṇa artha nivedanāya pratijñā atra ucyate prastāvam antareṇa pratijñā vacanam api adṛṣṭa mudgara āyate eva prativādinā prastāvaḥ kṛtaḥ iti ced kṛtam pratijñāpadena iti alam prasaṅgena 
PVA_3.1.2.2,1–3.1.2.2,4	 nanu pratijñāpadam antareṇa sādhana nyūna tā bhavet tathā ca āha hīnam anyatamena api avayavena pratijña ādīnām nyūnam sādhana avayava tve hi siddhe tat nayūna tā bhavet sādhana avayava tvañca pratijñāyāḥ nirākṛtam sādhana avayavena nyūnam sādhanam nyūnam bhavet pratijñāyāḥ ca na sādhana avayava tvam yatas anuktau= api pakṣasya siddheḥ apratibandhataḥ triṣu anyatama rūpasya eva anuktinnaryūna toditā 
PVA_3.1.2.2,5	 na hi tad asambaddham tad avayavaḥ na api tena nyūnam nyūnam anupayoginā api nyūna tvena anupayoginām anaṅgan tattvāt anyūna tā eva na bhavet atha anupayogi abhāvepi na nyūnam pratijñāpadena api tathā satya satā samānam iti acodyam yadi ca pratijñā sādhane sati upagamyate tadā sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti pratijñā lakṣaṇam ati vyāpi bhavet sādhyam asiddham api sādhanam bhavati iti asiddha hetu abhidhānam api pratijñā bhavet yasya tu na pratijñāsādhanantasya sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti api pratijñā lakṣaṇena hetvābhāsasya pratijñā tvam asādhana bhūtasya sādhya nirddeśasya pratijñā tvāt 
PVA_3.1.2.2,7–3.1.2.2,11	 atas sādhya uktim vā pratijñām sa vadan doṣaiḥ nna yujyate sādhana adhikṛteḥ eva hetvābhāsā prasaṅgataḥ na khalu sādhanam asādhanam bhavati tatas sādhana tvāt tatra aprasaṅga sādhana tvena hetvābhāsasya adhikṛta tvāt sādhya nirddeśa tva abhāvāt pratijñā lakṣaṇasya abhāvāt sādhana ābhāsa nirddeśaḥ na pratijñā nanu sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā na sādhana nirddeśaḥ iti kutas sādhana ābhāsasya pratijñātva prasaṅgaḥ atra ucyate sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti atra yadi sādhya tvena nirddeśaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ tadā na bhavati sādhana ābhāsaḥ pratijñā asādhya tvena anirddeśāt kintu nirddeśyam anirddiṣṭam bhavet sādhya tvena nirddeśaḥ iti na jñāyate kasya nirddeśaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.2,12	 atha sādhanam arhati yaḥ tasya nirddeśaḥ tadā api katham nirddeśaḥ iti prakāra anirddeśāt sādhana tvena sādhya tvena vā iti viśeṣa abhāvāt sādhana ābhāsasya api syāt pratijñātvam kathañca sādhana tvena sādhya tvena ca nirddeśaḥ iti vaktavyam pañcamyā parayā vā aprathamayā nirddeśaḥ sa sādhana tvena prathamayā sādhya tvena kutas etat tathā śabda artha prasiddheḥ yadi evam sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti pratijñā lakṣaṇan na vidhātavyam sādhya tayā nirddeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti loke prasiddhaḥ śabda arthaḥ pakṣasya tu lakṣaṇam vipratipatti nirāsa artham iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt sādhya nirddeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti lakṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti sādhana ābhāsasya api prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.2,13–3.1.2.2,16	 nanu bhavat pakṣepi sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti katham na hetvābhāsaḥ pratijñā nanu asādhana bhūtaḥ yaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti parihṛtam etat nanu sādhana bhūta upi syāt kadācid iti kaḥ saṃdeha nivṛtti hetuḥ vijātīya tvam eva iti brūmaḥ tathā hi aviśeṣa uktiḥ api eka jātīye saṃśaya āvahā anyathā sarvu asādhya ukteḥ pratijñātvam prasajyate 
PVA_3.1.2.2,17–3.1.2.2,18	 ayantāvat idam codya cañcuḥ codayitavyaḥ kriyate ghaṭaḥ iti sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā prasaktā jñāpaka hetu adhikārāt tu tad apekṣaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ eva pratijñā yadi evam asādhana bhūtaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti sādhana ābhāsaḥ na pratijñā iti siddham etat siddha ukteḥ sādhana tvāt ced parasya api na duṣyati idānīm sādhya nirddeśaḥ sādhana aviyavaḥ katham 
PVA_3.1.2.2,19	 nanu paropi etat bruyāt sādhana bhūtaḥ sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā sādhana ābhāsaḥ tu na sādhanam asiddha tvāt asādhana tvāt na pratijñā pratijñāyā sādhana tvāt yadi asiddha tvena sādhana ābhāsaḥ na sādhanam pratijñā api a siddhārthā katham sādhanam asiddha tvena eva sādhana tvam pratijñāyāḥ yadi siddhārthā syāt viṣaya upadarśana tvam eva na bhavet yadi evam sādhana ābhāsā upi pratijñā tvena sādhanam anivāritam eva bhavatu pratijñā tvena sādhanam kaḥ iva atra doṣaḥ iti ced hetoḥ asiddha tva doṣaḥ na syāt hetvābhāsakhyā pratijñā sādhya rūpāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ na sādhanam tatas doṣaḥ eva iti ced sādhana tve kathat na sādhanam sva artha apekṣayā sādhanam ced na artha sahitasya sādhana tvāt na ca saḥ eva tasya sādhanam sa ca śabda gaḍu mātrasya sādhana tvam sarvu atra abhidheyasya sādhana tvāt abhiprāya nivedane tu pramāṇa tā uktā eva 
PVA_3.1.2.2,21–3.1.2.2,25	 atha arthaḥ eva sādhanam sarvvā tarhi pratijñā bahis artha pratyāyana samartha iti tatas eva sādhya prasiddhiḥ syāt tasmāt sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca tatas siddheḥ anutpatteḥ nna pratijñā sādhanam anyaḥ punar āha pratijñā sādhanam sābhāsa tvena ukteḥ sābhāsa tvasya sādhana tvena saha darśanāt dūṣaṇa vādi āha pratyakṣeṇa anekāntaḥ vacana ātmaka tvena viśeṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ iti parihāraḥ dūṣaṇena anekāntaḥ iti ced adūṣaṇa tve sati iti parihāraḥ tat etat sakalam asat tathā hi sa ābhāsa ukti ādi upekṣā pa parihāra viḍambanā asambaddhā tathā hi eṣa na nyāyaḥ iti sūcitam 
PVA_3.1.2.2,26	 na khalu a darśana mātreṇa vipakṣe hetoḥ gamaka tvam na ca asti na eka parihāraḥ yathā kathañcit viśeṣaṇena vipakṣa viruddhena tad parihārāt etat ca uktam prāk adhyayanam adhyayana antara pūrvvakam iti bhārata adhyayanena akānta paricodane vedena viśeṣaṇāt iti parihāraḥ ukteḥ kaḥ pūnarvvede viśeṣaḥ yadi anyathādhyetum na śakyate na bhavati eva parihāraḥ na hi viśeṣaṇam aviruddham vipakṣeṇa asmāt hetum vyāvarttaḥ iyatum alam anyathā aneka tve satī iti kaḥ vaktum na śaknuṃyāt tasmāt asat etad upakṣepa parihāra ādikam iti pūrvvakam eva dūṣaṇam pratijñāyāḥ sādhana tvasya 
PVA_3.1.2.3.0,1–3.1.2.3.0,4	 yadi tarhi pratijñāyāḥ na avaśyam niddaśaḥ kim artham tarhi pakṣa lakṣaṇam hetu sāmarthyāt gamyamānaḥ eva sādhya arthaḥ sa ca pakṣaḥ bhavati anyathā vā kim anena vicāreṇa yathā pratīyate tathā bhaviṣyati sattyam etat gamya artha tvepi sa adhya ukteḥ asaṃmohāya lakṣaṇam tat catur llakṣaṇam rūpa nipāteṣu svayam padaiḥ asiddha asādhana artha ukta vādi abhyupagama grahaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.3.0,5^1	 lakṣaṇam hi nāma sakalam eva vyāmoha dhvastaye prakāśanīyam aparimapi ca vacaḥ tatra ca sādhya itara viparyaya viṣayā mahatām api mahatyaḥ vipratipattayaḥ a napanīyamānāḥ ca mahāntam anartha pratha prasthān anayam upanayanti na khalu a nirākṛtaḥ doṣa samāgamaḥ śreyase tathā hi para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti paratva mātram asādhyam api sādhyam iti āhuḥ sādhyam api ātma artham asādhyam siddham api śāstrāt sādhyam āhuḥ śāstra prāmāṇya vādinaḥ sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti anena lakṣaṇena sādhana tvena nirdiṣṭasya api pakṣa tvam prāptim iti ca vipratipattiḥ śāstra kāreṇa iṣṭam asādhyam api anabhyupagama ipi sādhyam tatas tad nirākaraṇāya caturbhiḥ svarūpa nipātaḥ iṣṭaḥ svayam padaiḥ asiddhaḥ asādhana artha ukta vādya bhyupagama grahaḥ veditavyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.3.0,5^2	 asiddhaḥ eva sādhyaḥ evam anyat api tatas avadhāraṇāt etad viparyaya nirāsaḥ veditavyaḥ tatra nyāyaḥ yadi śāstrāt eva pramāṇa bhūtāt asau= arthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kim punar pramāṇena apareṇa sādhyate param prati pramāṇan na śāstram iti tad artham iti ced ātmanaḥ katham pramāṇam abhyupagamāt eva iti ced para upi abhyupagamayitavyaḥ tathā yadi tat sādhyam kim iti sādhana tvena nirddeśaḥ artha uktasya tu asādhya tve vākya artha jña tā eva na syāt anyatra ca siddha sādhya tā prakaraṇa sāmarthya śabda antara sannidhānebhyaḥ śabda artha niścayāt aprakaraṇa jñaḥ punar nna vivakṣitam artham pratyeti iti kaḥ tena saha vyavahāra mārga avatāraḥ tathā ca pravājaḥ udīrita ūrthaḥ paśunā api gṛhyeta kaḥ tatra sāmarthya atiśayaḥ atas eva āha 
PVA_3.1.2.3.0,6–3.1.2.3.0,8	 anuktā upīcchayā vyāptaḥ sādhye ātma arthavat mataḥ tat yathā saṃghātānām parārthye sādhye ātma artha tvantat anuktam api icchayā vyāptam sādhyam iti tad pradarśana artham iṣṭa grahaṇam icchayā vyāptantat iti eva kutas iti ced prakaraṇāt prakaraṇa anurūpā hi vāñchā bhavati anyathā aprekṣāva tva prasaṅgāt tathā hi anyat prakṛtam anyat ca sādhyate yadi vādyasau na bhavati eva doṣaḥ ayam eva tasya añca sobhavet yadi asau= ātmanā eva brūyāt aprastuta abhidhāna dvāreṇa ātmanaḥ doṣaḥ eva tena udbhāvitaḥ syāt bhavatu tasya doṣaḥ prativādinā upi na bhūta doṣa udbhāvanam iti bhavet eva doṣaḥ na yadi artha pratipādanena doṣa abhāvāt yat āha ātmā paraḥ ced saḥ asiddhaḥ iti 
PVA_3.1.2.3.1,1	 yadi ātmā paraḥ sa dṛṣṭāntena siddhaḥ yadi tu para mātra sādhanam tadā na prastuta sādhanam siddha sādhanam vā evañca vadataḥ kaḥ prativādinaḥ doṣaḥ yadi tarhi iṣṭa grahaṇam icchayā vyāptasya anuktasya api sādhya tva pratipādana artham tathā niṣṭa nivṛtti artham api vyavaccheda phalam vākyam yatas na ca aniṣṭat nāma kiñcid kasyacid kenacid iṣṭa tvāt atas iṣṭa grahaṇam vādinaḥ iṣṭaḥ iti pratipādana artham tatra svayam iti arthaḥ labhyate eva śāstra kāra iṣṭam api yadi tasya iṣṭam iṣṭam eva tat iti na tad nivṛttiḥ aniṣṭa tve nivṛttiḥ ita ced na iṣṭa grahaṇena eva nivṛtteḥ yathā prativādi prāśnikānām iṣṭat na sādhyam iti iṣṭa grahaṇena sādhyate tathā śāstra kāra iṣṭasya api nivṛttiḥ tatas eva svayaṃgrahaṇena sarvu asya anyeṣṭasya nivṛttiḥ iti kim śāstra mātram eva prayojanam uktam ācāryeṇa svayam iti śāstra anapekṣam abhyupagaman darśayati iti 
PVA_3.1.2.3.1,3–3.1.2.3.1,5	 atra parihāraḥ sarvvā anyeṣṭā nivṛttau= avyāśaṃka āsthāna vāraṇam vṛttau svayam śruteḥ prāha kṛtā ca eṣā tad arathikāḥ yadi api nāma iṣṭa grahaṇena eva vādi apekṣayā sarvvā anyeṣṭa nirākaraṇam tathā api śāstra kāreṣṭe bhavati eva sādhya tā āśaṃkāḥ śāstra kāra iṣṭam hi bhavati avaśyam vādinā api iti kasyacid asti matiḥ anyathā na śāstra viruddhaḥ hetuḥ gamakaḥ iti tatas āśaṃkā sthāna vāraṇa artham svayam grahaṇam atas eva svayam grahaṇasya śāstra nivṛttiḥ eva prayojanam uktam yatas eṣā svayam śrutiḥ śāstra iṣṭa nivṛttaye kṛtā anya iṣṭa nivṛttiḥ tu ayatnatas eva siddhāḥ tasmāt iṣṭa grahaṇasya etat eva prayojanam anuktam api icchayā vyāptam sādhyam para arthāḥ iti asaṃhata para artha tvam sādhyam iṣṭa grahaṇāt 
PVA_3.1.2.3.2,1–3.1.2.3.2,4	 nanu sa viśeṣaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ nna sādhyaḥ sādhya tve viśeṣa tā katham na sādhya viśeṣayoḥ eka tā uktañca ācāryeṇa dharma viśeṣa viparyaya sādhanāt hi viruddhaḥ ityādi tat āha viśeṣaḥ tad vyapekṣātaḥ kathitaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ saḥ eva vāñchayā viṣayīkṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ para vyapekṣayā uktam eva sādhyam iti sukumāra prajñaḥ paraḥ tathā hi para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti 
PVA_3.1.2.4.0,1–3.1.2.4.0,3	 pareṇa ukte dūṣaṇa vādi āha ātmā na siddhaḥ dṛṣṭānte tad arya tvam na sidhyati sādhyam tat na iti ced tarhi sa viśeṣoḥ tu tasya vaḥ na ātma artha tvam sādhyam asmākam para artha tva mātrasya sādhanāt yadi na sādhyam tasya eva sa viśeṣaḥ iti bhavatu viśeṣa viruddhaḥ iti sādhyatām eva kasmāt na pratipādayati na para apekṣayā parihārā bhiprāyāt tāvat mātreṇā para nirākaraṇe kaḥ sva pakṣa sādhana prayāsam vidadhīta katham idānīm anukta mapi sādhyam ukta tvāt uktam eva sādhyam anyathā atiprasaṅgat anukta tva aviśeṣāt sarvvam eva sādhyam na ca dṛṣṭānte sarvvam upadarśayitum śakyam tathā ca viparyaya sādhanāt sarvvaḥ eva na hetuḥ bhavet atra āha 
PVA_3.1.2.4.0,4–3.1.2.4.0,7	 anuktau= api vāñchāyā bhavet prakaraṇāt gatiḥ ananvayaḥ hi dṛṣṭānte doṣaḥ tasya yathā uditaḥ ātmā paraḥ ced saḥ asiddhaḥ iti tatra iṣṭa ghāta kṛt yadi api nāma idam eva anena uktam tathā api prakaraṇa āt ayam atra arthaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ na khalu sakalam vacanam prakaraṇa nirapekṣam artha pratyāyana samartha tasmāt vicāryam kaimparyam ārya maryādayā sthitiḥ vākya artha niścayam karttum pravarttante jagat gatāḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.4.0,8	 iyam eva sakala vidagdha jana vyavasthitiḥ atra ca para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti ātma arthāḥ iti vākya arthaḥ atas ca ananvayopi tad apekṣayā dṛṣṭa antarasya tasya sādhya tvāt ā cā ryeṇa api tathā eva darśitaḥ ātma paraḥ ced saḥ asiddhaḥ iti dṛṣṭāntena siddhaḥ iti draṣṭavyam tatas tasya iṣṭasya viparyaya siddhyā ayam iṣṭa vighāta kṛt 
PVA_3.1.2.4.0,9–3.1.2.4.0,12	 nanu katham etat jñāte prākaraṇikaḥ eva sādhye ātmā iti tat āha sādhanam yat vivāde na nyastam tat ced na sādhyate kim sādhyam anyathā niṣṭambhavet vai phalyam eva vā yadi yatra vivādaḥ tat eva na sādhyate ātma artha tvam yatas ātmani siddhaḥ tadā anya sādhanam api asambaddham iti na kiñcid sādhyam tathā ca ubhaya pakṣa sādhanam apekṣya aniṣṭam vā viruddha sādhanāt tad parityāge vā sādhana vaiphalyam siddha sādhana tā prāpteḥ atha ātmā asādhyepi sidhyati sādhane paratva mātrasya api na ca asādhya viṣayaḥ ananvaya doṣaḥ prativādinā udbhāvayitavyaḥ sādhya apekṣa tvāt ananvaya ādi doṣasya 
PVA_3.1.2.4.0,13–3.1.2.4.0,15^1	 na etat asti yasmāt yadi asmin sādhyamānepi a sādhyam sidhyet iṣṭam sarvu asiddhiḥ tathā syāt pratyāsatteḥ tāratamyam vinā hi sidhyet kiṃcid na anyat etatat kutas syāt yadi sādhyamānenyasmin= anyat sidhyati tadā iṣṭa vat viparyayopi sidhyet tathā ca sarvvaḥ eva hetuḥ vviruddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sādhya vikalaḥ syāt paraspara viruddhasya sakala dharma kalāpasya kvacid ananvayāt iṣṭa tvāt tat eva sādhvam sidhyati na anyat iti ced na icchā vaśena hetu vyāpāra vibhāga ayogāt tadā ca parasya viparyayasya iṣṭa tvāt dvi paryaya siddhiḥ anivāryāḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.4.0,13–3.1.2.4.0,15^2	 icchāyāḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt na ca pratibandha viśeṣa usti yena vādī abhimatasya siddhiḥ nna prativādinaḥ vivakṣita dharmān anvaya doṣaḥ iti ced yadi evam na kaścid iṣṭa vidhāta kṛt viruddhaḥ bhavet uktena sarvu atrān anvaya sadbhāvāt uktena ananvaye sādhya viparyaya sādhanāt eva viruddhaḥ viśeṣa viruddhaḥ tu anukta apekṣayā eva anyathā bhāvāt sa dvitīya prayogeṣu niranvaya viruddhate etena kathite sādhyam sāmānyena atha sammatam tat eva artha antara abhāvāt dehān āptau na sidhyati vācyam śūnyam pralapatām tat etat jāḍya cintitam 
PVA_3.1.2.4.1,1–3.1.2.4.1,5	 sa dvitīya sādhanāya prayogeṣu niranvaya doṣaḥ viruddha tā vā anena eva nyāyena pratipāditā yathā vibhakta caitanya śarīra lakṣaṇa puruṣa ghaṭā anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ anutpanna tvāt kuḍya vat iti ca aru vākāḥ āhuḥ āvirbhūta caitanya viśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣaḥ na anyaḥ ātma ādiḥ para lokī tatra ca pratyakṣa aviṣaya tvāt anumānam eva sādhanam iti hetum āhuḥ abhiprāyaḥ na puruṣaḥ tathābhūtaḥ sādhayitum śakyaḥ śrṛṅga grāhikayā dṛṣṭānte asiddha tvāt iti sāmānyena anyatarasa dvitīya tvam sādhyate upāyāḥ sādhya sādhakāḥ atra ucyate sāmānyam vā viśeṣaḥ vā yaḥ sa vā sādhyatām iha vivakṣitena sādhyena bhāvyam itya eka niścayaḥ tātparya arthaḥ tathā hi puruṣaḥ eva śabde na upāttaḥ tad apekṣayā vā ananvayaḥ iti pūrvvakaḥ nyāyaḥ atha sidhyati kevalam na tu tat sādhyam tadā api atiprasaṅgaḥ iti pratipāditam 
PVA_3.1.2.4.1,6	 nanu na atra viśeṣa ākṣepaḥ tat asat yatas dehasya asiddhau vyakti abhāvāt kutas sāmānyam na hi go vyakti abhāve sāmānyam vyakti vināśepi sāmānyam na vinaśyati nitya tvāt vyañjaka abhāvāt na vyavahāra gocaraḥ vyakti sambhave punar tathā bhāvāt ced na atra sambhava abhāvāt na hi tathābhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ pramāṇam antareṇa sambhavī yathā vā vyakti abhāve sāmānyam na vyavahāra gocaraḥ tathā anyatara sāmānyam api pramāṇadataḥ eva siddhiḥ iti ced na itaretara āśraya doṣa prasaṅgat pramāṇe anumāne sati sāmānyam sāmānyenumānam na hi asiddhasya sāmānya ākāra tvam iti tasmāt anyatara tvāt iti yathā na hetuḥ tathā sādhyam asti tathā hi pakṣa sa pakṣa anyatara tvāt iti pakṣa tvam eva śabdena pakṣa sa pakṣa anyatara tvam dvayoḥ śabde avirodha abhāvāt vikalpa viṣaya tvāt anyatara śabdasya na ca niyata dharma sambhave apara upakṣepaḥ na ca upakṣepam antareṇa aparasya anyatara śruteḥ avatāraḥ tasmāt asat etat 
PVA_3.1.2.4.1,7	 api ca yadi tathābhūta puruṣasya eva atra na pratipādanam tadā puruṣa ghaṭa anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti eva uktambhavet kimartham ubhayatra ghaṭaḥ eva upāttaḥ tatra ayam abhiprāyaḥ sādhana vādinaḥ yadi dharmī ghaṭaḥ upādīyeta sa ghaṭena sa dvitīyaḥ iti siddha sādhanam syāt sāmānyena api sa dvitīya tve ayam eva doṣaḥ iti pratipāditam tad anākṣepe kim sādhana phalam aniṣṭam vā tasmāt ubhayatra ghaṭa jāteḥ pratipādanam sāmarthyāt puruṣeṇa eva sa dvitīya tva pratipattiḥ bhavet iti arthaḥ tathā ca niyamena puruṣaḥ eva atra abhidhātum iṣṭaḥ iti vyartham anyatara grahaṇam tat ayam sva vacana virodhaḥ mātā vandhyā iti vacana vat tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.2.4.1,8–3.1.2.4.1,9	 sāmānyāt niyamaḥ prāptau vikalpa unyatara uktitaḥ niyamaḥ ca vikalpaḥ ca dvayam ekatra durlabham sa hi ubhayatra ghaṭa upādānāt ghaṭa jāteḥ svena sa dvitīya tva ayogāt sāmarthyāt puruṣaḥ eva sādhyaḥ katham anyatara uktiḥ tad viparyaya pratipattaye na anyatara ukteḥ anvaya artha tvāt na kuḍyasya puruṣeṇa anvayosti nanu anyena anvaye katham anyasya puruṣasya siddhiḥ sāmarthyāt iti ced kasya idam sāmarthyam kim hetoḥ atha vacanasya na tāvat hetoḥ nna anutpala tvam puruṣa sa dvitīya tve pratibaddham anaikāntika tvāt tathā hi para loki puruṣa ghaṭā anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti api sādhanāt bhavatu vivakṣā antare anyasya api sādhanam iti ced na vivakṣā apekṣayā sādhana tva asambhavāt iti pratipāditam 
PVA_3.1.2.4.1,10	 atha vacana sāmarthyāt tat etat vilakṣa īkṣitam na ca vacana sāmarthyāt arthāḥ sidhyanti tatra pratibandha abhāvāt tathā hi pīnaḥ divā na bhuṅkte ca iti evamādi ukti sambhave naktam bhujiḥ avaśyam na mithyā ukteḥ api sambhavāt yadi tathābhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ pramāṇa prāpita santataḥ syāt ghaṭa vat tadā pramāṇa mūla vivakṣā prayuktam vacanam para artha anumānam bhavet sva dṛṣṭa artha prakāśanasya para artha anumāna tvāt anena eva pramāṇena siddhaḥ iti ced na itaretāra āśraya doṣāt iti pratipāditam pramāṇe sati sādhanam sādhane sati pramāṇam iti 
PVA_3.1.2.4.2,1–3.1.2.4.2,3	 nanu na āśepi sādhye samānaḥ nyāyaḥ tathā hi kim śabda gatam anitya tvam sādhyam atha ghaṭa gatam yadi śabda gatam na tat sapakṣaḥ atha ghaṭa gatam na tad śabdaḥ iti virodhaḥ tathā kṛtaka tvam api atha etat vikalpa samam sādharmya ipi viśeṣa uktiḥ vikalpa samam tathā sati puruṣepī iti samānam atra parihāraḥ tulyam na aśopi ced śabda ghaṭa bhedena kalpane na siddhena vināśena tadvatas sādhanāt dhvaneḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.4.2,4–3.1.2.4.2,5	 tathā artha antara bhāve syā tadvān kumbhopi yathā puruṣaḥ na siddhaḥ vākya sāmarthyā prāpitaḥ tathā anitya tvat na siddham iti na asti etat tathā yathā pakṣa sapakṣa anyatara tvam tathā kṛtaka tvam iti api ghaṭe hi anitya tā prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāva madhya sthā svabhāva aprasiddhāḥ yadi nāma prasiddhā sā anyā eva tatas śabdaḥ katham anityaḥ na khalu sā eva anitya tā śabde tad sadṛśī bhaviṣyati 
PVA_3.1.2.4.2,6–3.1.2.4.2,9	 sādṛśyam sidhyati katham anyena anvaya sambhave tathā ced puruṣopi syāt siddhi bhāj uttaram vṛthā tat asat anyat tvaḥ eva sādṛśyam anyathā bhāj katham bhavet eka tve hi na sādṛśyam pratiyogi vyapekṣaṇāt tathā hi yādṛśi anitya tā ghaṭe prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāva upalakṣitā śabdepi tathā eva prāc abhāva ādi sambhavāt uccarita pradhvaṃsinaḥ hi varṇṇāḥ iti na vivādaḥ tathā ghaṭopi dharmī yadi tadvān kuḍya sādṛśyāt bhavet syāt idam sādhanam na ca puruṣa sa dvitīya tva sādṛśyam kuḍya dharmi ghaṭayoḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.4.2,10–3.1.2.4.2,14	 nanu ātṛ api yadi nāma anitya tā sāmānyam vacana upāttam aidaṃparyāya arthaḥ tu viśeṣaḥ eva śabda gataḥ tena ca na anvayaḥ iti kathantad siddhiḥ atra brūmaḥ anitya tā viśiṣṭāḥ dhvaninā anveti no ced na ayoga vāraṇāt dvividhaḥ hi vyavacchedaḥ viyoga apara yogayoḥ vyavacchedāt ayoge tu vārye na ananvaya āgamaḥ yadi api nāma anitya tā viśiṣṭā na anveti anvitā viśiṣṭā bhaviṣyati samudāyaḥ hi sādhyaḥ sa ced prāk eva prasiddhaḥ kim artham sādhanam tasmāt kevalena anvaye śabde sidhyat anitya tvam samudāyatām viśiṣṭāñca ātmanaḥ prakaṭayati 
PVA_3.1.2.4.2,15	 nanu kevalena anvaye viśiṣṭā nityatā katham sidhyet anyena anvaye anya sādhana iti prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca sarvvaḥ hetuḥ vviruddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sādhya vikalaḥ syāt ukta dharma anvayaḥ eṣa doṣaḥ na anyatra iti ced na sādhya tva aviśeṣāt adoṣe ca iṣṭa vighātaḥ kasyacid api na syāt iti sarvvaḥ sva abhimatam sādhayet na ayoga vyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt ayoga anya yoga vyavacchedena hi dvividham viśeṣaṇam na hi evam kriyate śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti api tu śabdopi sadṛśa tvāt anitya tāyāḥ na ca puruṣa sādhane tathā saṃbhavati na hi ghaṭa sa dvitīya tvam kuḍya ghaṭayoḥ samānam anyatarasa dvitīya tvam samānam iti ced na tena api abhāvāt anyatarasa dvitīya tvena hi sādṛśyam evam bhavati yadi niyamasya abhāvaḥ atra ca niyamaḥ eva ghaṭena evam sa dvitīya tvam kuḍyasya tathā bhūta puruṣeṇa eva ghaṭasya iti para abhiprāyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.4.2,16–3.1.2.4.2,18	 nanu pratiniyamepi anyatara śrutiḥ prayujyate eva tad kathat niyamenyatara tva abhāvaḥ tatas na vikalpa eka pratiniyamayoḥ virodhaḥ tathā hi deva datta yajñadattayoḥ anyataraḥ bhojanīyaḥ iti niyamataḥ ekatra eva bhojanam vyavatiṣṭhate tathā atra api puruṣeṇa sa dvitīya tva niyamaḥ na atra vacana prāpitaḥ niyamaḥ kākatālīya nyāyena niyama sambhavāt sa ca pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate na ca atra puruṣa ghaṭa anyatarasa dvitīya tva uktau puruṣa niyamaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ bhojanam hi vastu sāmarthyāt eka niyatam na vacana sāmarthyāt sva rucyā preṣyasya pravarttanāt bhoktuḥ ddātuḥ vvā yadi hi asau= uktaḥ na bhojayet na tu bhañjīta bhavān aniyamaḥ vyavatiṣṭheta atra api sādhana sāmarthya prāpitaḥ niyamaḥ iti ced na viparyayepi sambhavāt iti pratipāditam etena idam api nirākṛtam viśeṣenugama abhāvaḥ sāmānye siddha sādhya tā yadi anitya tā sāmānyam sādhyate tasya kvacid vidyut ādau siddha tvāt siddha sādhya tā atha śabda viśiṣṭam anitya tvam tadā tasya ghaṭe abhāvāt anvayā bhāvaḥ yatas sāmānyam eva śabde asiddhatvāt sādhyate tat āha 
PVA_3.1.2.4.3,1–3.1.2.4.3,5	 sāmānyam eva tat sādhyam na ca siddha prasādhanam viśiṣṭam dharmiṇā tat ca na niranvapa doṣavat yadi ādhāra viśeṣa anapekṣam anitya tvam sādhyam syāt siddha sādhanam śabde tu sādhyate sāmānyam atas na siddha sādhya tā nanu śabde sādhyate sāmānyañca iti vyāhatam śabda viśiṣṭa tvam eva viśeṣaḥ yadi ca sāmānyam katham viśeṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ ced katham sāmānyam na etat asti sāmānyena anvaye siddhe pakṣa dharma tva yogataḥ viśeṣa niṣṭatā tasya sambandha grahaṇa ātmanā 
PVA_3.1.2.4.3,6	 na hi śabda viśiṣṭena anvaya pradarśane śabda viśiṣṭa tva siddhiḥ kevalena api anvaya darśane tad viśiṣṭa tva siddhiḥ sādṛśyena eka tvasya vivakṣita tvāt tadvat eva iti pratipādayatā hi param dhūma ugninā antarīyakaḥ darśanīyaḥ sa tathā agninā vyāptaḥ siddhaḥ yatra ovopadanīyate tatra eva agni buddhi janayati sambandhasya tathā eva grahaṇāt yad deśaḥ hi pāvakaḥ tad deśam eva dhūmam janayati aparāpara deśa sañcāraṇena sambandha pratīteḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.4.3,7	 nanu sāmānyena pratītau katham viśeṣa pratītiḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣam antareṇa abhāvāt iti pratīteḥ adoṣaḥ na hi deśa kāla avasthā pratiniyama pratipattyā kasyacid vyavahāra siddhiḥ etat ca prāmāṇya nirūpaṇe prāk eva pratyapādi iti na āvarttanīyam punar tasmāt dharmi viśiṣṭa sāmānya prasādhanāt na siddha sādhya tā na ananvaya doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.4.3,8–3.1.2.4.3,10	 nanu sādhyena saha sāmānyam pratyetavyam sādhyañca anumāna sāmarthyāt pratyeṣyate na ca tat bahis vyāpti mātreṇa prasidhyati na hi evam vyāptiḥ ādarśyate sarvvā apekṣaḥ kṛtakaḥ anityaḥ iti tatas antarvyopteḥ aprasiddhiḥ bbahis ced vyāptiḥ tasyām sādhya siddhiḥ nna jātu anya vyāptyā asya siddhiḥ yadi syāt saru u asya syāt sarvu asiddhi prasaṅgaḥ tat api yat kiñcat tathā hi uktam etat yatas dharmi sāhityāt vyāptiḥ īyate yaḥ yaḥ pradeśaḥ evam syāt sa sa sādhyāvinākṛtaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.4.3,11	 agni mānayam pradeśaḥ dhūmavat tvāt mahānasa pradeśa vat tathābhūta pratyaya sāmarthyāt pūrvvam eva gṛhītaḥ iti ucyate anyathā hi yadi sādhya upi svabhāvaḥ parigṛhītaḥ kim anumāna pūrvvadhūma pratītau= eva asya api dhūmasya pratīteḥ agni pratītiḥ na ca avidyamānam bhāvi śakyam pratyetum tasmāt tad rupapratyaya sambhavāt eva pratītam iti vyavahāram ātrataḥ ucyate vyavahāra mātreṇa grahaṇena parama artha grahaṇam iti kathat na visamvādaḥ tathābhūta artha kriyā kāriṇi ā iva sa parāmarśaḥ iti avisamvādaḥ

PVA_3.1.2.4.3,14^1	 anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāyām yadi anityaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ śabda viśiṣṭam anitya tvam śabde sādhyam iti prāptam anitya tva viśiṣṭaḥ vā śabdam iti tatas tad viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ yathā ayam hetuḥ śabde anitya tvam prasādhayati tathā śabda viśiṣṭa anitya tva abhāvam api iti viruddhaḥ iti yaḥ āha sa upyanena iṣṭa sādhya vacanena nirākṛtaḥ na hi śabdaḥ anitya śabda tvam prasādhyate anitya tā mātrasya prasādhanāt anitya tā mātra sādhane katham samudāya sādhanam iti ced na tathā eva samudāyasya sādhanāt dharmiṇā saha samudāya sādhanāt na hi dharmiṇī aparaḥ śabda anitya tva samudāyaḥ śabde sādhyaḥ tatas tasya nirākaraṇa ipi na doṣaḥ anitya tā mātra nirākaraṇe hi doṣaḥ katham samudāya viparyāsanam iti ced 
PVA_3.1.2.4.3,14^2–3.1.2.4.3,18	 dvayoḥ eka abhāve samudāyasya nirākaraṇāt na eka śeṣa tve samudāya sambhavaḥ tasmāt kevalaḥ eva dharmaḥ dharmiṇi sādhyaḥ tathā eva samudāya sādhanāt ekatra dvitīya sādhane samudāya sampatteḥ katham tarhi dharma dharmi tat samudāya viśeṣa nirākaraṇa bhedaḥ tad dvāreṇa nirākaraṇāt yad dvāreṇa hi samudāyaḥ nirākriyate tena vyapadiśyate paramārthataḥ samudāya nirākaraṇam eva anityaḥ śabdaḥ śabda anitya tvavān vā śabdaḥ iti samudāya nirākaraṇañced na evam pratijñā yāḥ saṃbhavāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tu pratijñāyām na samudāya sādhanatva pratītiḥ aparatra dharmiṇi tasmāt anyathā samudāya sādhana asambhavāt kevala dharmī ādi nirākaraṇena eva samudāya nirākaraṇam na tu śabde anitya śabda tva nirākaraṇāt evam sādhyasya anabhipreta tvāt anabhipreta nirākaṇe na doṣaḥ samudāya apavādaḥ hi na dharmiṇi virudhyate sādhanam yatasyatha aneṣṭam sādhyaḥ dharmotra kevalaḥ iti saṃgrahaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.5.0,1–3.1.2.5.0,3	 yadi tarhi iṣṭa grahaṇam anabhipreta sādhya nirākaraṇa īpya doṣa pratipādana param tatra yathā śabda niviṣṭā nitya tā bādhane dharmiṇi na doṣaḥ tathā akāśa guṇa tva viśiṣṭa anitya tva vādhana īpya doṣaḥ eva sattyam etat tathā api vipratipatti nirākaraṇa artham svayam grahaṇam tathā hi ekasya dharmiṇaḥ śāstre nānā dharma sthitau= api sādhyaḥ syāt ātmanā eveṣṭaḥ iti upāttā svayam śrutiḥ

PVA_3.1.2.5.1,3–3.1.2.5.1,11	 guru tvāt patane na asti vyomnaḥ sandhāraṇa ātma tā laghavaḥ na patanti eva dhārakaḥ kiṅkariṣyati vāyunā pahṛtau śabdaḥ tena asau dhāryatām patan vināśaḥ eva tasya syāt yasya ākāśam abādhakam svabhāvaḥ hi sa tasya ittham apekṣya eva vinaśyati yāvat vināśakaḥ na asti sthānāt anyā na tad gatiḥ iti āśrayam vinā eva asya sthānam iti eva niścayaḥ yadi kṣaṇa sthiteḥ nna asti na api kāla antara sthiteḥ nityānām api na eva asti sa āśraya tvam anarthakam sattyam etat tathā api eṣa svabhāvaḥ sahaja ssadā na hi paryanuyojyosau= iti syāt api kalpanā tasmāt anityasya padārtha ātmanaḥ na āśrayaḥ iti anitya tvasya sādhakaḥ āśraya tvasya bādhakaḥ iti hetu doṣaḥ pratijñā doṣaḥ ca iti 
PVA_3.1.2.5.2,1–3.1.2.5.2,4	 atra ucyate śāstra abhyupagamāt eva sarvu ādānāt prabādhane tatra ekasya api doṣaḥ syāt yadi hetu pratijñayoḥ śabda nāśe prasādhye syāt gandhe bhū guṇa tā kṣateḥ hetuḥ vviruddhaḥ aprakṛteḥ no ced anyatra sā samāḥ yadi śāstram abhyupagatam iti eva śāstra bādhane doṣaḥ pratijñā hetvoḥ tadā śabda ākāśa guṇa tva bādhana vat gandhe pṛthivī guṇa tva viparyāsanepi tatas yathā tad paripaṭhita tad dharma ākāśa guṇa tva saṃsargga sambhavi tad anitya tvam sādhyam tathā tad śāstra kāra iṣṭa gandha dharmī antara saṅgata pṛthivī guṇa tva saṅgata śāstra pratipādita tvam api tad bādhanepi tad śāstra sambandha tvam ayuktam iti syāt eva pratijñā doṣaḥ aprakaraṇa āpanna tvāt gandhasya katham iti api na vācyam ākāśa guṇa tvasya api na prakaraṇa āpannatā iti api na ubhayatra viśeṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.2.5.2,5–3.1.2.5.2,7	 atha atra dharmī prakṛtaḥ tatra śāstra artha bādhanam dharmi antarepi prakṛtaḥ śāstra artha upagamāt na kim yadi nāma atra dharmī prakṛtaḥ sa tu tad dharma ādhāra tayā eva atha śāstra dvāreṇa dharma antara ādhāra tayā api evantarhi tad eka śāstra paripaṭhita dharmī antara gata dharma saṅgata tvam api iti samānaḥ doṣaḥ atha api syāt tad dharma ādhāraḥ dharmī prakṛtaḥ iti dharma antaram api sādhya pakṣa nikṣiptam eva vādinā upi tathā iṣṭa tvāt tat āha 
PVA_3.1.2.5.2,8–3.1.2.5.2,10	 atha vādīṣṭatām brūyāt dharmi dharma ādi sādhanaiḥ ākāśa guṇa tvam api vādinaḥ iṣṭam eva upātta sādhya dharmi dharmi tvāt anitya vat tathā sādhya samudāya eka deśa viśeṣa tvāt ityādi tat āha na sādhya samudāya eka deśa viśeṣaḥ iti eva aprakaraṇa icchā bhavati tathā hi kaiścid prakaraṇaiḥ icchā bhavet sā gamyate ca taiḥ balāt tava iccheyam iti vyaktam īśvara ceṣṭitam

PVA_3.1.2.5.2,12–3.1.2.5.2,14	 nanu prakaraṇāt icchā bhavati prakaraṇañca tasyāḥ kāraṇam tad kathaṅkāraṇāt kārya siddhiḥ apratibaddham kāraṇam kāryam gamayati iti ced kathantathā avagantavyam vacanasya tad kāryasya dṛṣṭeḥ vacanāt eva tahi gatiḥ kāryāt na prakaraṇāt iti katham taiḥ eva gamyate iti ucyate atra ucyate sāmarthyam vacanāt gamyam tasya eva iti tatas gatiḥ icchāyāḥ niyata tvena prakaraṇāt gatiḥ ucyate

PVA_3.1.3.1.0,1–3.1.3.1.0,3	 nanu śāstram abhyupagamya eva vādaḥ pravarttate tatas sva śāstra vyavasthitasya tad artha bādhane niyamena doṣaḥ na ukta uttara tvāt gandhe pṛthivī guṇa tva viparyāsanepi doṣaḥ iti uktañca na āgama apekṣam anumānam sva gocare siddham tena su siddhantan na tadā śāstram īkṣyate anumānam hi sva viṣaye pratibandha balam avalambamānam śāstram apekṣate pratyakṣa vat pramāṇa tvāt yat kim api dṛśyate tat kim āgama apekṣam sakalam tathā anumānam api kim āgamam apekṣate tathā asmad ādi pratyakṣam niyamena āgama apekṣam āgama bādhita tvena bhrāntiḥ eva na khalu divya cakṣuṣām bacanam asmad ādi pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate na taimirika darśanam itara darśanam bādhate

PVA_3.1.3.1.0,23–3.1.3.1.0,29	 kena iyam sarvu acintāsu śāstram grāhyam iti sthitiḥ kṛta idānīm asiddhāntaiḥ grāhyaḥ dhūmena na analaḥ yadi siddhāntam abhyugamya eva sarvu apramāṇa pravarttanam pāvakopi loke gopālaka ādinā dhūmataḥ na pratipattavyaḥ atha api syāt para loka upayogī yaḥ arthaḥ saḥ ena śāstra abhyupagama puraḥsaraḥ na anyaḥ iti tat asat anabhyupagate śāstre yadi tasya viniścayaḥ pramāṇataḥ tadā śāstram kva upayogi puras saram yadi na abhyupagamyate śāstreṇa bādhā śaṅkyate abhyupagame tu jñāyate śāstra bādhā tena tat na sādhyate eva na pramāṇa prasiddhasya anicchataḥ bhāvāt śāstrantu tadā parityajyate ātmīyam katham parityāga arham iti ced na sambandha abhāvāt sa guṇa tvena tasya tat tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,1–3.1.3.1.1,3	 riktasya jantoḥ jātasya guṇa doṣam apaśyataḥ vilabdhāḥ vata kena amī siddhānta viṣamagrahāḥ yadi nyāya bādhita upi siddhāntaḥ parityaktum aśakyaḥ tadā na asau siddhāntaḥ siddhānta vyājena viṣamagrahaḥ bālānām tatas mocayitum aśakyatvāt sambandhāt saha jāteḥ ca parityakunna śakyate riktasya jantoḥ jātasya tad yogaḥ sahajaḥ katham 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,4–3.1.3.1.1,8	 guṇa doṣa viveka upi pramāṇam tyajataḥ kutas tasmāt na śāstra abhyupagama pūrvvakam anumānam nanu śāstra virodhi katham anumānam niścāyakam tasmāt śāstra virodhaḥ pariharttavyaḥ tad anukūla nidarśanena tat asat yatas yadi sādhanaḥ ekatra sarvam śāstram nidarśane darśayet sādhanam syāt iti eṣā lokottarā sthitiḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,9	 śāstra virodhaḥ hi pariharttum aśakyaḥ eva śāstrāṇām eva paraspara virodhāt sarvu eṣām pramāṇa tvam apramāṇa tvam vā na tāvat pramāṇa tve sarvu avirodha parihāraḥ paraspara viruddha tvāt na api apramāṇa tve sakala jana vacasām virodhasya sadā bhāvāt na hi aparimitaḥ virodhaḥ śakya parihāraḥ evañca sādhanam bhavati iti loka atikrānta uyam mārgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,10–3.1.3.1.1,12	 nanu yadi tad dharmi dharmaḥ eva bādhyate uktepi kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ na hi bādhakasya sādhaka tva sambhavaḥ na idam api yuktam evam hi sādhanam eva kiñcid na syāt evam hi sādhayatā niyamataḥ param bādhitavyam api ca asambaddhasya dharmasya kim asiddhau na sidhyati hetuḥ tad sādhanāya uktaḥ kim duṣṭaḥ tatra sidhyati 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,13–3.1.3.1.1,14	 asambaddhasya hi dharmasya yadi bādhanam pariharttavyam na hetuḥ eva syāt yadi ca anyaḥ bādhyate kasmāt anyat na sidhyati ekopi hi dhūmaḥ pāvaka śīta sparśayoḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ sādhakaḥ upalabdhaḥ virodhāt sādhanam aviruddham iti ced ākāśa guṇa tvepi samānaḥ virodhaḥ atha bhavatu sa hetuḥ sādhakaḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ pratipādyasya tu katham śāstra viruddha artha pratipattiḥ tatas śāstra artha anugamopi dṛṣṭānte darśanīyaḥ na hi tad dharmān upanaye hetutaḥ sādhya pratipattiḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,15–3.1.3.1.1,17	 na etat asti yatas dharmān anupanīya eva dṛṣṭānte dharmiṇaḥ akhalān vāgdhūma ādeḥ janonvā iti caitanya dahana ādikam āstām tāvat śāstra prasiddhaḥ asambandhaḥ dharmaḥ tad dharmi dharmasya api kasyacid dṛṣṭāntenupanaye vāc dhūma ādikāt hetoḥ ayam lokaḥ caitanya dahana ādikam pratyeti na hi tad aparaḥ dharmaḥ bādhitaḥ iti pāvaka aprasiddhiḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,18–3.1.3.1.1,20	 na ca na pratyeti pratipādyaḥ api ca anicchata upi pratipādyasya svabhāvam kāraṇam vā arthaḥ avyabhicāreṇa sādhayan kasyacid vāda bādhāyām svabhāvāt na nivarttate na khalu sva kāraṇa āyattaḥ svabhāvaḥ padārthānām puruṣa icchayā vyāvarttate avyabhicāraḥ ca hetoḥ sādhya sādhane nimittam sa ca asti kin na sādhakaḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,21–3.1.3.1.1,23	 atha bhavatu asau sādhakaḥ sa tu pratipādyaḥ katham pratipadyate tat āha svabhāvam prapadyamānaḥ ca anyaḥ tam na antarīyakam īpsitaiḥ sādhya arthaiḥ hetunā tena katham apratipāditaḥ kāraṇam hi kārya jananāya pravṛttam apratibaddha sāmarthyāt itarat nivārayitum śakyam jñāpakantu pratibandha balāt pratītim upajanayat pratipanna rūpa trayasya na tena eva nivārayitum śakyamaḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,24–3.1.3.1.1,27	 dahyamānaḥ hi puruṣaḥ pāvakena vinā icchayā dāha duḥkham tiraḥkuryāt yadi hetoḥ nna niścayaḥ na hi tat avyabhicāritām pratipadyamānaḥ eva tat na pratīyāt viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa viśeṣya pratipatte ru viśeṣa pratītinā antarīyaka tvāt sarvvam asti kintu vādya yukta kārī bhavet atra ucyate ukta unuktā upi ced hetuḥ vviruddhaḥ vādinotra kim na hi tasya ukti doṣeṇa sa jātaḥ śāstra bādhanaḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,28	 vacana guṇa doṣau hi para arthe anumāne adhikriyete na arthasya na vaktra atra kiñcid doṣa jātam akāri śāstram bādhitam iti ced na hetuḥ eva śāstrasya bādhaka unuktā upi evambhūtam eva hetum kasmāt upādatte iti ced anyasya asambhavāt na hi kaścid anitya tva sādhakaḥ sambhavati yaḥ ākāśa guṇa tva ādikam na bādhate tūṣṇīm eva kasmāt na aste iti ced na asādhana aṅga vacanasya sutarām eva nigraha sthāna tvāt avaśyam hi prativādi avavodhayitavyaḥ tasmāt atra na vādinaḥ doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,29–3.1.3.1.1,34	 bādhakasya abhidhānāt ced doṣaḥ yadi vadet na saḥ kin na bādheta saḥ akurvvan= a yuktam kena duṣyati iti antaraślokaḥ evam tarhi hetvābhāsa vacanepi na doṣaḥ hetvābhāsopi svayam eva tathābhūtaḥ iti kimvādinaḥ doṣaḥ na hi asau= api tad ukta doṣeṇa eva duṣyati svayam eva doṣāt ukta unukta upi ced hetuḥ asiddhaḥ vādinotra kim na hi tasya ukti doṣeṇa tasya asiddha viruddhate tat asat anyeṣu hetvābhāseṣu sveṣṭasya eva aprasādhanāt duṣyet vyartha abhidhānena na atra tasya prasādhanāt 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,35	 atra sādhya sādhanāya sādhane vaktavye tat asādhanasya vacane doṣaḥ vyarthaka tvāt abhidhānasya sārthaka abhidhāna adhikāre vyarthaka vacanam hi vyartham atra tu sādhya sādha nāt adoṣaḥ avacanaḥ eva atra doṣaḥ iti atra api ākāśa guṇa tvasya avacane doṣaḥ iti ced na sādhakasya api sambhavāt vādi iṣṭa sādhye avacanam doṣaḥ yuktaḥ na tu atra śāstra artha ākāśa guṇa tva ābādhakasya sambhavaḥ atas na avacanam doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,36–3.1.3.1.1,40	 nanu yadi hetuḥ śāstra artham bādhate anitya tvam api katham sādhayet tena eva anaikāntika tvāt atra ucyate yadi kiñcat kvacid śāstre na yuktam pratiṣidhyate bruvāṇaḥ yuktam api anyat iti rāja kula sthitiḥ na hi sakala śāstra artha virodhaḥ kvacid eva śāstre tasya bhāvāt sambandha bhāva abhāvābhyām sādhanam asādhanañca iti kaḥ iva atra virodhaḥ ayuktasya pratiṣedhe yuktasya api pratiṣedhaḥ iti rāja śāsanam etat api ca sarvvān arthān samīkṛtya vaktum śakyam na sādhanam sarvu atra tena utsannā iyam sādhya sādhana saṃsthitiḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,41	 sarvva artha avirodhena na kiñcid sādhanam śakyam vaktum prakṛta sādhya sambandha mātram eva apekṣyate anyathā asambhavāt śāstra artha avirodhaḥ eva karttavyaḥ iti ced na aviśeṣāt aparasya api prāpteḥ atha śāstrasya api virodhaḥ pariharttavyaḥ tathā sati sādhanam eva kiñcid na syāt iti utsīdet sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ sarvu atra śāstram tarhi kasmāt aṅgīkṛtam iti ced etat eva atra upapādayitavyam abhipretam na prathamam śāstra abhyupagamaḥ karttavyaḥ kṛte sati pramāṇa virodhe paścāt api varam parityāgaḥ pareṣām punar matam śāstra abhyupagamaḥ pratijñā tatas śāstram abhyupagamya na virodhayitavyam abhyupagama siddhānte sati vāda vidhāna vṛtteḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,42–3.1.3.1.1,45	 yadi tarhi ākāśa guṇa tva bādhanepi na hetu doṣaḥ katham viruddha avi abhicārī sādhana doṣaḥ tatra api sādhana antara prasiddha artha virodhataḥ doṣaḥ iha api śāstra prasiddha artha virodhaḥ eva doṣaḥ na sat etat yatas viruddhayoḥ eka dharmiṇī ayogāt aḥ tu bādhanam viruddha aikāntikena atra tadvat asti virodhitā viruddha avyabhicāriṇoḥ iha paraspara viruddha artha avi abhicāritāḥ dvayoḥ api samāna balā eva dvayoḥ api āgam āśrita tvāt vastu bala pravṛttantu anumānam śāstrañca na tathābhūtam tatas tayoḥ na paraspara bādhanam viruddha avyabhicāri vat na ca dvayoḥ api sādhanam viruddhayoḥ ekatra dharmiṇya yogāt śāstrasya tu viruddha anumāna apekṣayā pramāṇa tva abhāvāt tad arthaḥ bādhyataḥ eva na bādhakaḥ viruddha avyabhicāri vat śāstrasya ca pramāṇa balān anugṛhītasya pratiṣiddham eva prāmāṇyam tasmāt na viruddha avyabhicāri pakṣa upakṣepa pakṣaḥ kṣamaḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,46–3.1.3.1.1,49	 atha api śāstram atīndriya artha darśinā pravarttitam kathantasya anumānena bādhā tatas tena pratibaddham apramāṇam eva anumānam api tatas tulya bala tvāt viruddha avyabhicāri vat atra api doṣaḥ eva iti ced tat asat yatas śāstreṇa bādhanam syāt ced anumāne virodhini pramāṇam nikhilan= aṣṭam āgamaḥ pariśiṣyate yadi sakalam anumānam śāstreṇa bādhyate tadā na anumānena śāstra arthaḥ sādhyate param prati iti katham āgamaḥ pratijñā bhavet nahi kiñcid anumānam anyat vā pramāṇam yat na śāstreṇa bādhyate anitya nitya tā ādi anumānasya apara apara śāstreṇa bādhanāt asti agniḥ iti ādikam api śūnyatā śāstreṇa bādhyate atha tad apramāṇam katham apramāṇam anumānasya bādhakam anumānena bādhitam apramāṇam na sarvvam iti ced nanu tat eva anumānam śāstreṇa bādhitam apramāṇam iti bhavataḥ pakṣaḥ tatas na bhavataḥ pakṣa parityāgaḥ yuktaḥ atha parīkṣitam pramāṇantena bādhanam 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,50	 nanu anumānam eva parīkṣā tatas katham śāstreṇa tena bādhitā parīkṣā śāstrasya prāmāṇya hetuḥ na khalu tatra asambhavi tat sambhāvayati tasmāt anumānam eva pratyakṣa pūrvvakam dṛḍha mūla tvāt pramāṇam tena bādhitam śāstram na pramāṇam eva iti na tad pratipakṣaḥ iti na viruddha avyabhicāri vat atra api doṣaḥ tena ākāśa guṇa tva abhāvena saha anitya tva sādhanāt sādhanam eva na tu doṣavat viruddha avyabhicārī tu nitya tvam tad abhāvan ca sādhayan= ahetuḥ eva asambhavāt tat abhāva tad bhāvayoḥ ekatra ākāśa guṇa tva abhāvasya tu anitya tvena na virodhaḥ iti kutas doṣaḥ ekatra dharmiṇi sādhane 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,51–3.1.3.1.1,54	 abādhya bādhaka tvepi tayoḥ śāsra artha viplavāt asambandha ipi bādhā ced syāt sarvvam sarvu abādhanam gandhepi pṛthivī guṇa tva viparyāsanāt anyena tena ca prakṛtena hetunā iti sambandhaḥ tena tatra eva bādhanāt asti ced asat hetoḥ saru u asya cintya tvāt sva sādhye guṇa doṣayoḥ yadi nāma tatra dharmiṇi tasya ākāśa guṇa tvasya sadbhāvaḥ iti sambandhaḥ tathā api na tad sādhyam aprakṛta tvāt aprakaraṇepi na bādhanam doṣaḥ sarvu asya hetoḥ sva sādhya apekṣayā doṣasya cintayitum abhisamīhita tvāt 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,55–3.1.3.1.1,57	 tasya sva asādhyān uparodha īpi tad apara asambandha bādhane yadi doṣaḥ śāstra pīḍā lakṣaṇaḥ tadā anyena api hetunā anyatra api dharmiṇi samā eva doṣa kāriṇī pīḍā iti pratipādayan= āha na antarīyaka tā sādhye sambandhaḥ sā iha na īkṣate kevalam śāstra pīḍā iha doṣaḥ sa anya kṛte samāḥ vyāpakasya hi sādhyasya abhāva sādhanam pariharttavyam yaḥ sādhya sādhanana āntarīyakasyadvādhane hi tad abhāve vyāpyasya api nivṛtteḥ na ca ākāśa guṇa tvasya sādhyana antarīyaka tā tatas tad abhāvepi na sādhya uparodhaḥ api ca 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,58–3.1.3.1.1,60	 śāstra abhyupagamāt sādhyaḥ śāsra dṛṣṭokhilaḥ yadi pratijñā asiddha dṛṣṭānta hetuvādaḥ prasajyate pramāṇa samuccayasya vyākhyātā prāha śāstra abhyupagamāt sādhya tā sakalasya śāstra dṛṣṭasya anyathā śāstra abhyupagamasya vyartha tā na hi tad artha asādhya tāyām śāstra upagamaḥ kvacid upayogī abhyupagamam vā arhati svātantreṇa pramāṇena na kiñcid tasmāt upagamya śāstram tad arthaḥ sādhanīyaḥ tatas tad virodhe doṣaḥ eva atra ucyate asiddha hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ pratijñātvam bhavet nirddeśasya tayoḥ api śāstra artha tvasya kadācid bhāvāt bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced pratijñā eva sakalā prāptā tatas siddha tā ādi doṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,61	 nanu yaḥ śāstra arthaḥ na bhavati sa hetuḥ vvaktavyaḥ tatra asiddha tā ādi doṣaḥ sa avakāśaḥ na tasya api sva mukhena abhyupagamāt atha sva mukhena abhyupagatam na pratijñā para mukhena abhyupagatam nitarām eva parasya api vaiśeṣika ādeḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti asiddha sādha na niddaśā upi bhavet tasya api yadi nāma anirddiṣṭaḥ śāstra arthaḥ pratijñā na bhavet nirddiṣṭaḥ tu bhavati eva tathā hi bhāṣya uktam āgamaḥ pratijñā na tu pratijñā yā saḥ āgamaḥ nanvā gamaḥ pratijñā eva na āgama artha nirddeśāt āgamaḥ pratijñāna svarūpataḥ tatas sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti syāt pratijñā asiddha hetu ādiḥ tasya api āgama artha tvāt 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,62	 sattyam etat sakalaḥ eva śāstra arthaḥ sādhyaḥ tathā api na sādhana tvena uktasya pratijñātvam sādhya tvena anīpsita tvāt nyāya mukha prakaraṇe tatra tu svayam sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ viruddha arthaḥ nirākṛtaḥ iti pāṭhāt na ca sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasye psitatama tvam sādhya tā ca karmaṇaḥ na ca sādhana tvena iṣṭam karmma tat yathā odanam payasā bhuṅkte iti payaḥ pramāṇa samuccaye na sva rūpeṇa eva iti avadhāraṇāt naiyāyikasya ca sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti sādhya tvena eva iti bhāva pradhāna tva sya avadhāraṇāt na sādhana nirddeśaḥ pratijñā atra ucyate 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,63–3.1.3.1.1,64	 uktayoḥ sādhana tvena no ced īpsita vādataḥ nyāya prāptam na sādhya tvam vacanāt vinivarttate śāstra abhyupagamāt iti nyāyaḥ eṣa yadi tat katham nyāya prāptasya vacanena nivarttanam nyāya sūcakam hi vacanam na nyāyam eva viruṇaddhi atha vacana saṃsūcitopi nyāyaḥ sādhakaḥ eva sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya asādhya tvasya 
PVA_3.1.3.1.1,66–3.1.3.1.1,70	 na etat asti viruddha avyabhicāri syāt dvayam etat tathā sati śāstra abhyupagamāt etat īpsita ādi vacaḥ tathā yadi īpsita vacana ādi nyāyena asādhya tvam sādhanasya sādhyate tathā śāstra abhyupagamāt iti anena sādhya tvam tathā sati ekatra paraspara viruddha artha sādhana āde tau saṃśasam janayetām tathā ca śāstra abhyupagamāt iti na sādhakaḥ iti kutas śāstra dṛṣṭasya asādhana tvena iṣṭasya api sādhya tā atha śāstra abhyupagamāt iti na nyāyaḥ tathā sati īpsitam vādinā sādhyam na sādhana tvena iṣṭam atra āha anīpsitam asādhyañcet vādinā nyopya nīpsitaḥ dharmaḥ asādhyaḥ tadā asādhyam bādhamānam virodhi kim 
PVA_3.1.3.1.2,1–3.1.3.1.2,2	 na hi ākāśa guṇa tvam api vādinā īpsitam atas na sādhyam prakṛta parityāgena hi kaḥ prekṣāvān aprakṛtam īpsitatamam kuryāt nanu śāstram abhyupagamya tad artha virodhe svayam uktena hetunā avaśyam eva doṣa duṣṭaḥ na prativādi iṣṭasya svayañca sādhanāt na duṣṭaḥ iti pratipāditam etat atha pramāṇa virodhopi yadi ākāśa guṇa tā śabdasya na syāt utpatti sthānaḥ eva śrūyeta ākāśa guṇa tve tu tad yogāt anyatra api śrutiḥ na etat asti tatra eva tasya grahaṇāt rūpavat dūra sthitena kasmāt gṛhyate rūpasya api tarhi tad ākāśa guṇa tva prāptiḥ api ca tat ākāśam ekam anekam iti vā syāt iti yadi ekam yojana sahastrāt api tad guṇasya śrutiḥ syāt aneka tve vadana deśaḥ eva tasmāt na ākāśa guṇa tvasya śabde kutaścid pratītiḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.2,3^1	 nanu ākāśa guṇa tvam antareṇa avasthānam eva na syāt avaśyam hi padārthena sthitimataḥ ābhāvyam tatra rūpa sparśa rasa gandhānām pṛthivī ādi mahābhūta catuṣṭayam āśrayaḥ śabdasya tu ākāśam anāśrita tva ayogāt pṛthivī ādīnām api tarhi ākāśa āśrita tvam eva tatas eva hetoḥ na guṇa tva abhāvāt tat eva aguṇa tvam āśrita tvena sidhyati guṇa tvañca śabdasya āśrita tve pṛthivī ādīnām guṇa āśrita tvāt aguṇa tvañced tat eva na sidhyati āśrayasya ākāśasya sambhave ākāśa āśritam hi rūpa ādi pṛthivī ādi ca bhavet pṛthivī āde rūpa ādeḥ ca ākāśa asamavāyi tvāt 
PVA_3.1.3.1.2,3^2	 pṛthivī samavetam hi rūpa ādikam koyam samavāyaḥ nāma ekalolībhāvena avasthānam iti ced na tarhi śabdasya ākāśa guṇa tvam tena saha eka lolībhāvena apratipatteḥ gandhasya ca pṛthivyāḥ atha ākāśaḥ upalabhyamāna tvāt tad āśritaḥ śabdaḥ tat eva ca tasya sthānam tūlaka ādeḥ api tarhi tatra upalabhyamāna tvāt ākāśa āśrita tvam tena dhāraṇāt svayam eva laghu tvāt avasthānam iti ced śabdasya api tathā syāt iti anākāśa guṇa tvam atha tūlaka ādeḥ pṛthivī api sthānam ākāśe tu sthānan= ākāśa kṛtam vāyunā sandhāri tvāt śabdasya api evam iti na ākāśa guṇa tā tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.3.1.2,5–3.1.3.1.2,12	 vāyunā preryamāṇasya śabdasya anyatra na śrutiḥ vāyuḥ eva āśrayaḥ tasya kā iyam anyasya kalpanā yathā hi vāyunā dhāryamāṇasya tūlaka ādeḥ nna vāyu guṇa tā tathā śabdasya api yathā ca preryate tūlam ākāśe mātariśvanāḥ tathā śabdopi kim vāyoḥ pratīpam śabda vid kvacid atha śabdaḥ prerayitum aśakyaḥ eva mātariśvanāḥ guṇena saṃyoga abhāvāt tūlakasya tu pṛthivī tvāt na virodhaḥ anyathā acchāya ātapa ādiḥ api preryeta kathantasya preraṇam dravyasya eva tad āśritasya preraṇāt saṃyukta samavāyena vāyunā preryate yadi na eṣā api kalpanā śabde preraṇam viyadaḥ kutas atha api preryate vyoma tathā sati na niṣkriyam vyāpinaḥ preraṇā ca asya sambhavati ati durghaṭam api ca saṃyukta samavāyena yadi preraṇam iṣyate samavāyena kinna asti samavetasya vāyunā 
PVA_3.1.3.1.2,13	 vāyu guṇa tā eva śabdasya astu tad dvāreṇa tasya deśa antara gamanāt vāyoḥ sparśaḥ eva guṇaḥ iti ced na eka guṇa tvam eva dravyasya iti niyamaḥ rūpa rasa gandha sparśavatī pṛthivī ityādi para siddhāntāt dṛṣṭaḥ ca guṇasya api gandhasya vāyunā preraṇam tatra api saṃyukta pṛthivī samavāyāt eva preraṇam iti ced na tad upalambhe pṛthivī upalambha abhāvāt tatas utpannasya kevalasya vāyunā preraṇe kaḥ virodhaḥ guṇasya niṣkriya tvāt iti ced tat eva niṣkriyayatvam kevala preraṇāyām na sidhyati sa kriya tvam api sahita preraṇāyām a siddham iti ced na sahita preraṇāyāḥ asiddheḥ guṇasya sa kriya tvam katham iti ced ayam aparosyaya doṣaḥ tu 
PVA_3.1.3.1.2,14–3.1.3.1.2,19	 yadi ayuktam kvacid śāstre guṇa tva ādi niṣidhyate yuktam api atra neṣyeta tat etat rāja śāsanam kiñca na preraṇam nāma nija sthāna vināśinām sa kriya tvam na nāma asti padārthasya vināśinaḥ deśa antare tad sadṛśa kṣaṇa utpatti guṇena kim jalakallola gamanaḥ paraiḥ śabdaḥ na kim mataḥ api ca na guṇa vyatirekeṇa guṇavān māna saṅgataḥ sparśa ādi vyatirekeṇa kim anyat upalabhyate yadi ca gandhaḥ saṃyukta samavāyena vāyunā bhuvā saha ākṛṣyate śabdopi pṛthivī ādi guṇaḥ eva tatas pṛthivī ādinā saha eva ākṛṣyatām kim ākāśa kalpanayā

PVA_3.1.3.1.3,6–3.1.3.1.3,13	 loṣṭhasya katham ādhāraḥ na ākāśam patataḥ kvacid vāyau gatimati vyomnaḥ katham ādhāra tā gatiḥ vāyoḥ gati avibandhaḥ ced ākāśāt na idam uttaram gateḥ vvibandha abhāvohi vibandhaka vinākṛtaḥ atha ākāśam vyāpi nityañca dhāryatenyena tat katham tena anādhāra tā tasya param prati tu dhārakam vyāpi tvam ātmanā upi etat tad avastham arūpi ca tasya eva ādhāra bhāvaḥ kim param prati na kalpyate yasya ātmā na asti tādṛkṣaḥ tasya ākāśena kā kriyā diśopi vyāpita ākāśa kṛtyam tābhiḥ prakaltyatām paraspara vyāpitāyām eka tvam vyāpinām na kim 
PVA_3.1.3.1.3,14–3.1.3.1.3,16	 nanu ākāśaḥ ālokaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ na ātma ādiṣu katham ekatā nanu yadi vtha vahāronurudhyate yathāvyavahāraḥ tathā padārtha kalpanā tad anurūpā eva yuktāḥ chidram eva ākāśam acchidra kāraka abhāve ca tad vyavahāraḥ yadā ca acchidra kāriṇaḥ bhāvaḥ tad ākāśam kva gata vat na hi pārśva āpada saraṇam ucyate vyomnaḥ tad abhāve ca tatra ca anyatra vā kva gatam ākāśam vinaṣṭañcet sādhvī nityatā tatra eva astu iti ced acchidram ākāśam iti ca vyāhatam tatrā pyasti avānyathā tasya padārthasya sthitiḥ eva na syāt atha kā iyam sthitiḥ kim dhāryamāṇa tā atha avihanyamāna tā yadi dhāryatā tat asat na ākāśena ghaṭa ādayaḥ dhāryante api tu bhuvā atha anupaghātaḥ tat api asattyam yatas upaghātaḥ yatas tasya tasya abhāvena tasya saḥ ākāśāt na upaghātaḥ tu vyaktam ākāśa carvvaṇam tasmāt abhāvaḥ bhūtānām caturṇṇām vyoma kathyate tat anyatra mahābhūte vyavahāra usti na pramā 
PVA_3.1.3.1.4,1–3.1.3.1.4,4	 anena diś api vyākhyātāḥ tasyāḥ api vyāpitāyām na avakāśa dāna ādikam tathā hi vyāpi tvena pratīcyādi pratyayaḥ na itara tvataḥ gatiḥ nna asti aparā tasyāḥ tad abhāva prasaṅgataḥ yadi vyāpi tvam diśaḥ sā eva pūrvvā tatonyatra vyavasthitasya katham parā atha tatra ubhaya rūpa tā tathā sati ubhaya pratyaya prasaṅga atha pratiniyata vyañjaka abhāvāt kā api avasthā diśobhi vyajyatena īṃka avasthāyāḥ thāya pitṛ putra ādi rūpasya svarūpasya api pitṛ ādi tva abhivyaktiḥ putra ādi tva apekṣayā 
PVA_3.1.3.1.4,5–3.1.3.1.4,7	 tat api asat yatas avasthāyāḥ diśaḥ vyaktiḥ nniyatāyāḥ yatonyatas tatas eva hi bhāvānām avasthā pūrvvata ādi vat yatas eva pūrvva apara deśa vyavasthita puruṣa apekṣayā itarasya parāditā digbhāgasya tatas eva bhāvānām eva sā iti kinnābhyupeyate pūrvvadeśa avasthita tvāt puruṣa ādīnām pūrvvatā deśasya deśa antara apekṣayā tasya api punar āt ityādi apekṣayā iti kim anya diś parikalpanena āditya ādinā diś abhivyajyate tena ca ādityasya pūrvvata āditā tat idam itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ tāvat mātreṇa ca vyavahāraḥ prasiddhaḥ kim anya apekṣā parikalpanā prayāsena 
PVA_3.1.3.1.4,8–3.1.3.1.4,11	 nanu apekṣām antareṇa api ṛju etat iti bhavati vyavahārāt padārtha antaram eva diś tat api asattyam yatas apekṣā bhedataḥ tatra api asti darśanam ṛju iti atyanta abhyāsa tonyena vinā paścāt tathā gatiḥ tathā hi tava praguṇam etat iti loke upalabhyate vyavahāraḥ tata utyanta abhyāsāt paścāt tad anusaraṇena apekṣām vinā api kutas etat tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt anyatra api nimitta naimittika bhāva gatiḥ tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.3.1.4,12–3.1.3.1.4,15	 samudra madhyam adhyāsya jāyate vibhramaḥ nṛṇām graha nakṣatra dṛṣṭyā tu diś vibhāga viniścayaḥ na nakṣatra ādi sambandha mātrāt diś a para īkṣyate svarūpa apratibhāse hi kathantad gatiḥ ucyate tathā hi pūrvvādigiti bhāskara udaya saṅgamaḥ eva manasi nilīyate nanu ādityasya anyathā darśanepi diś vyā moha vāhi mānasānām sā eva purvva upalakṣitā diś pratibhāti nādittya udaya vaśena tathā hi āditti odayopi paścima diś avalambyavabhāsate 
PVA_3.1.3.1.4,16–3.1.3.1.4,18	 atra api ucyate abhra anta mānasa āsaṅgī yatra astamayaḥ īkṣitaḥ su abhyastā sā eva diś tatra grāma ārāma ādi lakṣitā yaḥ eva ārāma grāma ādiḥ uttara ādi diś upalakṣaṇam āditya udaya ādi apekṣayā prāktana avasthāyām sātatyena upalabdhaḥ tad abhyāsa aparānnā dityā udayonurudhyate api tu tad upalakṣitā sā eva diś iti dṛḍha vāsanā saṅgamāt vyavahāraḥ tasmāt

PVA_3.1.3.1.5,1	 saḥ eva ca svabhāvaḥ bhedena nirddiśmānaḥ kāla ādi ākhyām bhajati tathā hi āsīt asti bhaviṣyati iti pratyayebhyaḥ devadatta ādeḥ atītānānāgata kāla vyavasthānam āsīt sakālaḥ iti āditas ca kālasya api kāla antar evasthānam prasaktam iti anavasthā atha sva rūpeṇa eva kālaḥ pūrvvaḥ na kāla antara apekṣayā tathā diś api iti svabhāva bhūta dharma bhedena tathā vyapadeśa aindrī diś pūrvva iti evantarhi padārthānām api vṛkṣa ādīnām svayam eva pūrvvatā na apara kāla ādi pūrvvatva apekṣayā atha kāla ādeḥ svatas na pūrvvāditā api tu tad saṃsa rggi padārtha apekṣayā tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.3.1.5,2–3.1.3.1.5,7	 rājānaḥ ye cira atītāḥ tad saṃsarga vyapekṣayā kāla upyasau cira atītaḥ iti tatra vyavasthitiḥ atra ucyate atīta bhāva saṃsargāt kālasya atīta tā yadi bhāvasya tat atīta tvam tad kāla apekṣayā apatet anyonya saṃśraya tvena na syāt anyatara sthiteḥ yaugapadyāt atīta tvam yadi syāt anavasthitiḥ na paraspara hetu tvam yugapad bhāvinoḥ dvayoḥ tayoḥ atha parasmāt ced tasya api iti anavasthitiḥ 
PVA_3.1.3.1.5,8	 anyat ca yadi ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ vāyu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ tejaḥ guṇaḥ rūpam abguṇaḥ rasaḥ pṛthivī guṇaḥ gandhaḥ kala guṇaḥ kaḥ iti vaktavyam eva tathā ātma ādeḥ atha kālasya mahatva ādikam tad ātma ādīnām api tatas prātisvikaḥ kaścid vaktavyaḥ atha padārthānām pratibandha abhyanujñe te ca kāraṇa vaśāt eva anvaya vyatirekataḥ tasya api sva kāraṇāt iti anādiḥ kāla paraṃparā api ca

PVA_3.1.3.1.5,14–3.1.3.1.5,18	 ākāśa vāyu prabhavaḥ hi śabdaḥ katham na vāyoḥ guṇaḥ uktaḥ eṣaḥ ākāśaḥ eva śrutiḥ asya tena vyomnaḥ guṇa tvam pratipannaḥ eṣaḥ jvālā ādiḥ ākāśa gataḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ kintadguṇa tvam kathitan na tasya anyopi tasya āśrayaḥ iti ayuktam dhvaneḥ api syāt paṭaha ādiḥ anyaḥ yadi yaḥ yatrastha tayā pratīyate sa tad guṇaḥ jvālā ādikam api kinna ākāśa guṇaḥ tasya anyopi kuḍya kāṣṭha ādikaḥ āśrayaḥ iti tatrastha tayā pratīyamānaḥ na ākāśa guṇaḥ

PVA_3.1.3.2.0,1–3.1.3.2.0,4	 api ca pakṣa lakṣaṇa bāhya arthaḥ svayam śabda upyanarthakaḥ svayam śabdaḥ hi śāstra kāreṣṭasya śāstra abhyupagamāt sādhya tā prāptiḥ iti tat nivṛti arthaḥ eva na anyat asya prayojanam yadi punar tasya api sādhya tā vyartha tā eva tasya syāt tathā sati pakṣa lakṣaṇā saṅgata tvāt śāstreṣu icchā pravṛtti arthaḥ yadi śaṅkā kutas nu iyam 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,5–3.1.3.2.0,7	 saḥ aniṣiddhaḥ pramāṇena gṛhṇan kena nivāryate niṣiddhaḥ ced pramāṇena vāvā kena pravarttyate pūrvvam api eṣa siddhāntam sva icchayā eva gṛhītavān kathañcid anyam na punar grahītum labhate na kim yadi prekṣā pūrvva kārī prapattā parīkṣā eva tasya nimittam śāstra abhyupagamasya tatas katham śāstreṣu icchā pravṛtti artham svayam grahaṇam na ca sarvvam eva śāstram parīkṣā kṣamam tatas pramāṇa bādhitā pariśuddhena pravṛtteḥ eva iti kutas icchā pravarttanasya sambhavaḥ yatas 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,8–3.1.3.2.0,12	 na icchā mātrāt pravarttante prekṣā pūrvva kriyā kṛtaḥ vimṛśya kāritā puṃsām sudhiyām prathamam padam aprekṣā pūrvva kārī ced tasya icchā eva nibandhanam prathama upagamaḥ tasya tāvat mātra pravarttitaḥ tatas tadvat dvitīyopi tṛtīyā upi bhaviṣyati tad artham eṣā śikṣā ced na iccha iti eva sa śikṣyatām yadi śāstram icchayā grahītavyam iti ayam eva nyāyaḥ sva vacanena kathyate pūrvva vat idam api tvayā icchayā eva grāhyam tadā parīkṣya yuktam grahaṇam na icchā mātram atra trāṇa miti nyāya darśanam yuktam icchā pravarttana virodhi tasmāt svayam grahaṇam ayuktam eva yadi śāstra dṛṣṭam sādhyam evantarhi svayam iṣṭa artha sādhana īpi śāstra artham parityajya yadi pramāṇa bādhā na tatra pravartteta kaścid abādhanam ced icchayā svayam eva pravarttate kim svayaṃgrahaṇena 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,13–3.1.3.2.0,15	 parihāraḥ dṛṣṭeḥ vvipratipattīnām atra akārṣīt svayam śrutim iṣṭa akṣatim asādhya tvam anavasthāñca darśayan vipratipatti nirākaraṇa artham sakalam eva śāstram tatotrā api śāstra dṛṣṭam sādhyam iti vipratipatti nirākaraṇam kena nyāyena iti ced iṣṭa akṣati asādhya tā anavasthā darśanena na hi śāstra dṛṣṭa bādhanepa uṣṭasya kṣatiḥ anāntarīyaka tayā api na sādhyam anāntarīyaka tvepi tad sādhane anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ iti nyāyaḥ svayaṃgrahaṇena darśyate 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,16–3.1.3.2.0,18	 tasmāt asat etat samayā ahita bhedasya parihāreṇa dharmiṇaḥ prasiddhasya gṛhi iti artham jagāda anyaḥ svayam śrutim śāstreṇa racitaḥ bhedaḥ ākāśa guṇa tva lakṣaṇaḥ yasya dharmiṇaḥ tad parihāreṇa svayam eva prasiddhaḥ na śāstra kāreṇa sādhitaḥ yaḥ dharmī tasya parigrahaḥ yathā syāt iti svayaṃgrahaṇam tathā hi svayam eva yaḥ dharmī vyavasthitaḥ na anyena vyavasthāpitaḥ sa dharmī bhavati na anyaḥ iti arthāt upapannam etat 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,19–3.1.3.2.0,22	 tat asat yatas vicāra prastuteḥ eva prasiddhaḥ siddhaḥ āśrayaḥ sva icchā kalpita bhedeṣu padārtheṣu avivādataḥ vicāraḥ hi nityān ityādi rūpa tayā kvacid dharmiṇi kriyamāṇaḥ siddha rūpe kriyate yasya tu yat eva rūpam sādhayitavyam tatra tat eva tāvat vicāryatām asiddhe dharmiṇi sādhana asambhavāt atha śabda rūpam siddham eva tat eva tarhi dharmi tvena upādātavyam kim asiddha viśeṣaṇa upādānena atha tathā bhūtaḥ eva icchāvādinaḥ anitya tām sādhayitum 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,23–3.1.3.2.0,25	 asat etat yatas śrotuḥ tatra anabhiprāyāt tasmāt tasya aprasiddhitaḥ ākāśa guṇa yuktasya sādhyasya vacanam vṛthā na hi prekṣā pūrvva kāriṇām anarthikā vacanānām vṛttiḥ na tāvat prativādinām ākāśa gaṇa tva viśeṣaṇam anitya tvam abhipretam na api anabhipretam eva pratijñā mātrāt sidhyati evam hi anākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti api sidhyet anyaḥ vā yathā īpsitorthaḥ atha evam eva vādinobhiḥ ucitam tathā sati tathābhūtaḥ viveka rahitobhi ruci mātra preritaḥ kena nivāryatām 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,26–3.1.3.2.0,30	 tasmāt asat etat asādhyatām atha prāha siddhādeśena dharmiṇaḥ sva rūpeṇa eva nirddeśyaḥ iti anena eva tad gatam yatas siddha sādhana rūpeṇa nirddeśasya hi sambhave sādhya tvena eva nirddeśyaḥ iti idam phalavat bhavet atha evam vyākhyāyeta na sva rūpeṇa dharmī sādhyaḥ svayam eva siddhaḥ bhavati iti vacanāt anyathā svayam vacanena tasya viśeṣaṇam kim artha jātam janayati iti tathā hi na tāvat dharmiṇaḥ siddha tā mātra pratipādana artha vacanam vicāra prastāvataḥ eva prasiddha tvāt tasmāt prasiddhaḥ eva bhavati na sādhyaḥ iti asya sādhya tva niṣedha artham svayam vacanam tatas sādhya tā na dharmiṇaḥ iti uktam 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,31–3.1.3.2.0,37	 tat api ayuktam yatas prekṣāvān nā asti asau kaścid yaḥsiddham api sādhayet tam tadā pratipannā iva sādhya tām gamayet kathamaḥ evantarhi sva rūpeṇa eva iti vacanam anarthakam vicāra prastuteḥ eva asiddhasya sādhya tvāt na khalva siddham vivāda āspadībhavati tathā sandigdhe hetu vacanāt vyastaḥ hetoḥ anāśrayaḥ tathā vicārasya apa tathā siddhopi atra ucyate svarūpa grahaṇam hi na siddha nivṛtti artham sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya asiddhasya nirākaraṇa artha tvāt atas eva sva rūpeṇa eva iti avadhāraṇam eva ekam phalavat pratipāditam 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,38	 anyathā dvayam api pratipādanīyam bhedena kimarthantarhi siddha sādhana rūpeṇa iti uktam siddha rūpeṇa dharmiṇaḥ asiddhasya tathā dharmasya sādhana rūpeṇa iti vyākhyātavyam sa ca siddha rūpeṇa nirddeśaḥ dharmiṇaḥ kevalasya yathā samavāyi kāraṇam ātmā tathā ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ iti dharmi viśeṣaṇa tvena atha yatra dharmi viśeṣaṇam tatra ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ iti vacanāt katham avagatam anitya tvam na ākāśa guṇa tvam iti kim anityaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ saḥ ākāśa guṇaḥ atha ākāśa guṇaḥ yaḥ yaḥ anityaḥ iti tat etat api prakaraṇāt avagantavyam śabdasya sādhāraṇa tvepi ca tathā ca pratipāditam kathantarhi śrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti svarūpa grahaṇasya vyavacchedyam darśitam avadhāraṇa artha tve hi tat ayuktam 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,39–3.1.3.2.0,40	 sattyam etat tathā api tad anya artham kṛtam anya artham api bhavati iti abhyupagamya tat uktam atha api kuryāt sādhyam tathā api svarūpa grahaṇasya vyāvarttaka tvāt adoṣaḥ nirākṛtasya katham prāptiḥ tatra vivāda darśanāt tat ca paścāt pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ anumānasya sāmānya viṣaya tvam ca varṇṇitam iha evam na hi anuktepi kiñcid pakṣe virudhyate 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,41–3.1.3.2.0,46	 sāmānya viṣayam anumānam iti pratipāditamā cā rye ṇa na ca dharmī siddhaḥ tad anyaḥ vā sādhyamānaḥ sāmānyam tatas svayaṃgrahaṇena yadi nāma na dharmī sādhya tve na parihṛtaḥ tathā api na doṣaḥ sva lakṣaṇa tvena eva parihārāt api ca kuryāt ced dharmiṇam sādhyam tatas kim tat na śakyate kasmāt hetu anvaya abhāvāt nanu doṣaḥ tayoḥ ayam uttara avayava apekṣaḥ na doṣaḥ pakṣaḥ iṣyate tathā hetu ādi doṣa upi pakṣa doṣaḥ prasajyate sarvaiḥ pakṣasya bādhātaḥ tasmāt tanmātra liṅginaḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ matāḥ na anye pratyakṣa ādi virodha vat nanu 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,47	 sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ viruddha artha anirākṛtaḥ iti pakṣa lakṣaṇam tatra yadi dharmiṇam eva sādhyam kuryāt kaḥ doṣaḥ atha dharmī sādhayitum aśakyaḥ sva lakṣaṇasya asādhya tvāt dharmi sattāyām hi sādhyāyām sva lakṣaṇasya sādhanam bhavet hetoḥ viśeṣeṇa anvaya abhāvāt hetoḥ eva tarhi tatra āśaktiḥ adṛṣṭānta tvāt tatonyasya doṣonyasya doṣaḥ iti na yuktam 
PVA_3.1.3.2.0,48	 atha pakṣasya api asau doṣaḥ eva asiddhi arha tvāt evantarhi sarvvaḥ hetu doṣaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ bhavet tad doṣeṇa pakṣasya eva asiddhi arhat tvāt atha yatra pakṣe hetuḥ anyaḥ sādhakaḥ saṃbhavati yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tatra hetu doṣaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt itya ādau tathā hi na pakṣasya asādhana arhatā doṣaḥ anyena hetunā sādhanāt yatra tu kaścid api na hetuḥ sa pakṣasya doṣaḥ sambhavī hi sva abhiprāyaḥ sa pakṣa vacanena nidarśanīyaḥ sa yathā pramāṇa va ādhāyāt na sambhavati tathā sva lakṣaṇa tvepi tatas pakṣa doṣaḥ eva ayam iti nyāyaḥ
