PVA_3.1.4.2.1,4	 yatra vibhuḥ ātmā iti yadi kaścid vibhu tva yuktam ātmānam sādhyam kuryāt kaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ dharmya bhāvena hetoḥ āśraya asiddha tvāt iti ced hetoḥ tarhi doṣaḥ na sādhyasya tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt tathā vināśī śabdaḥ iti kva viśeṣaṇam asiddham yadi śabde tat ayam adoṣaḥ yayaḥ atas eva sādhyate anyathā kaḥ sādhyatā arthaḥ atha viparyaya sidhyā asiddhaḥ ucyate yadi nāma mūḍhasya viparyaya siddhiḥ tathā api na tāvatā pakṣa doṣaḥ yadi ca pramāṇena viparyaya siddhiḥ tadā tad pramāṇa bādhitaḥ eva pakṣaḥ iti sa doṣaḥ māna viruddha tā lakṣaṇaḥ na tu doṣa antaram atha dṛṣṭāntena siddhaḥ tadā sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti tasya eva doṣaḥ na pakṣasya aprisiddha ubhayasya tu bhayathāḥ doṣaḥ iti sarvvemī hetu doṣaḥ eva atha hetu doṣāt eva pakṣa doṣaḥ yam yatas sarvu athā pakṣaḥ eva na sidhyati tathā ca sarvve hetu ādi doṣāḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ bhaveyuḥ na sa kaścid hetu doṣaḥ yaḥ na pakṣa uparodhī yatas 
PVA_3.1.4.2.1,5–3.1.4.2.1,6	 sarvu asādhana doṣeṇa pakṣaḥ eva uparudhyate tathā api pakṣa doṣa tvam pratijñā mātra saṃjñinaḥ na hi tad uparodha mātrakāt eva tasya pakṣasya doṣaḥ sādhana doṣasya api pakṣa doṣa tā prasaṅgāt atha sādhana doṣaḥ tat uparodhi api na pakṣa doṣaḥ tat amat atra nyāya abhāvāt atha pakṣa svarūpam tat kālañca atikramya pakṣa vyatirikta sādhana kāla svarūpa upanipāti tvāt pakṣasya na doṣaḥ api tu hetoḥ eva ananvaya ādikaḥ doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.1,7	 tat api asat samāna tvāt ananvasya ananvayaḥ hi asambandhaḥ sa ca dviṣṭa tvāt ubhayasya api atha api syāt āśraya asiddha tā hi sādhya apekṣā pakṣa doṣaḥ na sādhana apekṣā sādhana apekṣā tu sādhana doṣaḥ eva uktam atra yadi dvyam api paraspara apekṣam sādhayet katham sa pakṣa doṣaḥ na ca ayam niyamaḥ siddhe dharmiṇi sādhya sambandha mātra saṅgamaḥ eva sādhanīyaḥ iti sva rūpeṇa eva nirddeśyaḥ iti vacanāt kathantarhi uktam asiddhe dharmiṇi sādhana asambhavāt āśraya asiddha tvena hetoḥ eva tatra asambhavaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ tasmāt asiddha dharmi dharma samudāya upi pakṣaḥ eva tasmāt hetu nirapekṣaḥ eva doṣaḥ pakṣaḥ iti tatas 
PVA_3.1.4.2.1,8–3.1.4.2.1,13	 uttara avayava apekṣaḥ yaḥ doṣaḥ sonubadhyate tena iti uktam atas apakṣa doṣaḥ asiddha āśraya ādikaḥ uktam etat uttara avayava apekṣaḥ na doṣaḥ pakṣaḥ iṣyate tathā hetu ādi doṣa upi pakṣa doṣaḥ prasajyate sarvvaiḥ pakṣasya bādhātaḥ tasmāt tanmātra saṅginaḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ matāḥ na anye pratyakṣa ādi virodha vat tasmāt asiddha āśraya ādikaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ na iti nyāyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.1,14–3.1.4.2.1,15	 nanu aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti na anumānam pramāṇam acandraḥ śaśī iti dharma svarūpa viparīta vat vidhānena upadarśitā na dharmi dharma viśeṣa dharmi rūpa bādhā na ca udāharaṇam apradarśitam su jñānam tat kim atra kāraṇam iti na vidmaḥ atra ucyate dharmi dharma viśeṣāṇām svarūpasya ca dharmiṇaḥ bādhā sādhya aṅga bhūtānām anena eva upadarśitā 
PVA_3.1.4.2.1,16	 anena eva ca udāharaṇena dharma svarūpa nirākaraṇa pradarśana pareṇa sarvu eṣām eva sva rūpa viśeṣāṇām upadarśitāḥ bādhā katham anyena anyasya darśanam iti ced sādhya tva aviśeṣāt tatra prativyakti na udāharaṇam śakyam upadarśayitum na ca tad upadarśane prayojanam eka udāharaṇa pradarśanena eva tad dharmaṇaḥ su jñāna tvāt upalakṣaṇa mātrakam hi udāharaṇam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.2,1–3.1.4.2.2,6	 nanu viśeṣaḥ kathandharma dharmiṇoḥ tad dharmā na ukta apekṣayā tasya viśeṣa tvam sādhyanta devānyathā sādhana vaiphalyam tatra udāhṛti diś mātram ucyaterthasya dṛṣṭaye dravya lakṣaṇa yuktonyaḥ saṃyogerthosti dṛṣṭi bhāj adṛśyasya aviśiṣṭasya pratijñā niṣprayojanā etāni udāharaṇāni na anyaḥ avayavi avayavebhyaḥ tulān ati viśeṣa agrahaṇāt na anyeva yavāḥ avayavinaḥ vā apratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt na asti dravyam guṇa dravyāṇām dravya adravya tva prasaṅgāt dharmi svarūpa nirākaraṇena pāścātyam ekam dharmi dharma viśeṣa nirākaraṇena na ca udāharaṇa dvyam yathākramam ādyam yat rūpa vyatiriktam yat tat tathā eva upalabhyate tad rūpa anupalambhe ca vyatirekaḥ na sidhyati na hi vyatirekeṇa anupalabhyamānam vyatirekeṇa pratyakṣam bhavati avyatirekeṇa upalabhyate vyatiriktañca upagamyate atas eṣa virodhaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.3,1–3.1.4.2.3,3	 yadi tu avayavāḥ na anye pratyakṣa tvam avāritam pratyakṣaḥ vayavī yatra tad rūpāḥ tepi tādṛśāḥ anyathā avayavānām avayavi pratyakṣat tve pi apratyakṣatāyām anyata eva na syāt athavā na anye avayavāḥ avayavinaḥ tasyāḥ pratvakṣa tva prasaṅgāt anyat tve hi teṣām apratyakṣatāyām avayavinopya pratyakṣata aprasaṅgāt na hi apratyakṣa avayavaḥ vayavī pratyakṣaḥ bhavitum yuktaḥ prathama avayavi vat eva atha sthūlaḥ vayavī pratyakṣaḥ na anyaḥ iti matiḥ ekasya sthūla tā viruddha iti pratipāditam atas avayava samāhāra mātram avayavī na aparaḥ tasmātra anye avayavāḥ iti sthitam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.3,4–3.1.4.2.3,7	 tathā na asti dravyam iti guṇa vyatiriktam iti sambandhaḥ guṇa dravyāṇām dravya adravya tva prasaṅgāt iti guṇasya vā dravya tvam dravyasya vā guṇa tvam iti arthaḥ tathā hi vyatireke sati paraspara vyāvṛtta tvāt rūpam sat tayā adhiṣṭhitam dravyasya grāhyam guṇānām api tathā eva iti nyāyaḥ tatas dvyos paraspara parihāreṇa sthita tayoḥ ekaḥ guṇaḥ anyat dravyam iti kutas vivekaḥ aparaspara parihārā ipi kutas vivekaḥ atha guṇasya guṇa tvam dravyasya dravya tvam iti vivekaḥ iti matiḥ tat api ayuktam svarūpa vyatirekeṇa guṇa tva ādiḥ nna vidyate guṇa tvasya anyatāyāñca sattā tatra api vidyate tatas dravya aviśeṣaḥ sa prāk prasaṅgaḥ anivāritaḥ sattve samastam syāt dravyam vyatireka itara tvayoḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.3,8	 paraspara parihāreṇa avasthita tve na dravya itaratvayaḥ rvvivekaḥ iti siddham eva etat vyatireke tu dravya tva yogāt dravyam guṇa tva yogāt guṇaḥ iti syāt viveka āśaṅkā tat api na samyak paraspara parihāreṇa sthitayaḥ rūpa rasayoḥ iva kutas dravya itarate guṇa tva ādi yogāt iti ced na guṇa vyaktyā vyajyamāne guṇa tvam na anyathā samāna ākāra tā mātram guṇa tvam dravya tvañca tasya viśeṣaḥ tat vijātīya vyakti vyakta tvam nāma vijātīya vyakti tvañca vijātyā dhyāsita tvam itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.3,9	 atha jātīnām svatas eva vilakṣaṇa tvam parasparataḥ iti ucyate tatra api vijāti a dhyāsita tvam eva vyāvṛtti kāraṇam svarūpeṇa vyāvṛtta tve vyaktīnām api tathā iti vyarthikā parā jātiḥ guṇaḥ iti samāna ākāra pratyaya anibandhana tvāt guṇa tva ādeḥ guṇa tvam iti ced kim idānīm antar gaḍunā sāmānyena sāmānya ākāra pratyaya nibandhana tvasya pratiniyamena eva prasiddha tvāt svaka prayojanasya tathā ca na dravya adravyayoḥ svarūpataḥ viśeṣaḥ kaścid tasmāt dravya astitve dravya at ravyayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ eva na astitve tu bhavati viśeṣaḥ iti yuktam samvṛti sat dravyam tatonye guṇāḥ iti ubhaya sva rūpa viśeṣa nirākaraṇa mukhena udāharaṇam tat yathā sarvvam vākyam anṛtārtham 
PVA_3.1.4.2.3,10–3.1.4.2.3,11	 anṛta artham vacaḥ sarvvam iti vākya anṛta tvayoḥ tad svarūpa viśeṣasya kṣepe doṣaḥ vivakṣite vākya tvam anṛta tvañca sāmānyena yadā nirākarttum abhipretam tadā ubhaya svarūpa nirākaraṇam yadā tu vākyasya dharmiṇaḥ dharma unitya tvañca anṛta abhidheya tvam tadā ubhaya viśeṣa nirākaraṇam sarvu asya vākyasya viśeṣasya anṛta abhidheya tvasya ca nirākaraṇāt prāmāṇyam hi vacana sāmarthyāt atas tena vākya tva anṛta abhidheyatka abhāva nirākaraṇam dharmi viśeṣaḥ ca atra kaścid anitya tva ādikaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ yadi hi ānitya tvam na sādhyate vyarthakam eva vaktṛ prāmāṇya aṅgīkaraṇam yadi nityatā syāt na vaktā kiñcid kriyeta iti vyarthaḥ eva vaktā syāt atas sva vacana viruddham etat 
PVA_3.1.4.2.3,13–3.1.4.2.3,16	 yadi nityam bhavet vākyam vaktuḥ vyartha tvam āpatet avākya rūpa upakṛtau siddha upasthāyitā patet vaktuḥ hi vākya svarūpam anupakurvvāṇasya na vākya upakāritā atad kṛta upakāre na tasya kiñcid iti anupakārī na vākyena vaktā pekṣyate apekṣyate ca tasmāt anitya tā tasya sādhanīyāḥ tatas tad viśeṣa nirākaraṇa mukhena ayam pakṣa ābhāsaḥ iti kathitam tatra vārttikakāraḥ udāharaṇa diś mātram eva nidarśayati anayā diśā śeṣa udāharaṇa vyākhyā pratipatti artha na avaya vi anyat tva mātram sādhyate api tu dravya lakṣaṇa yogena kriyāvat guṇavat samavāyi kāraṇam dravyam iti tathā dṛṣṭi bhāva tvena anyat tvam ātrantu yadi avayavinaḥ sādhyate tadā samvṛti sat mātram tat siddham eva parama artha santova yavā samvṛti sannavayavī iti siddha sādhanam anyat tva mātre sādhye 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,1–3.1.4.2.4,2	 iṣṭaḥ hi avayavī kāryam dṛṣṭyā adṛśyeṣu asambhavi aviśiṣṭasya ca anyasya sādhane siddha sādhanam avayava paramāṇu ādi vyatireka mātra tayā prasiddhaḥ eva bhrānta buddhi ākāraḥ tasya eva sādhane niyamena eva siddha sādhya tā dṛṣṭaḥ eva ca na ati dūra vartti paraspara sāmīpya vyavasthitānām saṃsakta keśa viṣaya eka ghana ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ tatas na tāvat mātreṇa vijñāna ākāra vyatirikta a= ayavi prasiddhiḥ atas dravya lakṣaṇa yogaḥ eva tatra sādhanīyaḥ tatra ca guru tvam guṇaḥ adhas gatiḥ ca kriyā tayoḥ ca samavāyikāraṇa tvam iti lakṣaṇa yoge vijñāna ākāra vyatireka siddhiḥ tathā ca 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,3–3.1.4.2.4,6	 guru tva adhas gatī syātām yadi asau syāt tulānatiḥ avaśyam hi guru tva prayukta adhas gamane tadā ākṛṣyamāṇasya tulā śirasopi natiḥ na ca asau= asti avayava adhikā tatosau na dravya lakṣaṇa yuktaḥ iti āha tad nirguṇa kriyaḥ tasmāt samavāyi na kāraṇam yayoḥ guṇa kriyayā urasau samavāyi kāraṇam tad abhāvena na tathā bhavati iti upasaṃhāraḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,7–3.1.4.2.4,9	 tatas eva na dṛśyosa avadṛṣṭeḥ kārya rūpayoḥ dṛśya tvam api tasya na asti eva tasya hi dvyī gatiḥ upacārataḥ mukhyataḥ ca na tāvat upacārataḥ tad kāryasya gaurava ādeḥ adṛṣṭeḥ na api upacāra itarataḥ rūpasya avayava vyatirekeṇa adṛṣṭeḥ vvijñān a ākāra yaḥ sthūla tayā upalambhāt na dhikasya ca adarśanāt tad bādhāni aviśeṣasya na antarīyaka bhāvinaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,10–3.1.4.2.4,14	 anyaḥ viśeṣasya ukta anya tā mātra apekṣayā dravya lakṣaṇa yogena tasya sādhya tvam na antarīyaka tvena anyathā anyat tva mātrasya asādhya tvāt tathā hi guru tva adhas gati tyāge pratibhāsosya kevalaḥ pratibhāsaḥ ca vijñāna avyatirekepya durghaṭaḥ timira viparītīkṛta darśana śakti nayanānām api keśa daṃśa maśaka makṣika ādayaḥ sa dadhi mokṣa pakṣa nikṣiptāḥ pratyakṣa īkṣitāḥ iva avabhāsante na ca te tad avabhāsāt eva asantaḥ na bhavanti atra āsūkṣmāt dravya mālāyāḥ tolya tvāt aṃśu pāta vat dravya antara guru tvasya gatiḥ nna itya parobravīt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,15	 sūkṣma dvi aṇuka ādi pratidravyamālāyāḥ tulā māna saṅgamāt aneka dravya madhyam adhyāsīnam dravya antara guru tvam na śakyam upalakṣayitum iti tulānati viśeṣa agrahaṇam dvayoḥ hi hema piṇḍayoḥ saṃyoge yadi api avayavi antaram utpannam guṇa kriyā vat tathā api dvi aṇukāva antara dravya mālā api tatra āste eva tatas tad anantara guru tvam adhya pāti na lakṣyate karpāsa bhāra madhya śatitadaṅśu pāta guru tvam iva na ca alakṣyamāṇam api tasya guru tvam adhas gamanañca na asti tatas tad nirguṇa kriyaḥ tasmāt iti asiddham etat 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,16–3.1.4.2.4,20	 tat asat yatas na upalakṣyam guru tvam ced kutas tasya adhikam gatiḥ iyam eva hi tad vitti pratyāśā tad kṛtiḥ katham gurutva adhas gati viśeṣam antareṇa pratibhāsa mātram eva sidhyati na ca tena siddhena siddha sādhya tā vyatikramaḥ api ca tasya krameṇa saṃyukte pāṃśu rāśau sakṛt yute bhedaḥ syāt gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,21–3.1.4.2.4,22	 krameṇa saṃyukte hi pāṃśu rāśau guru tva yuktān ekau= avaya vi bhāra sadbhāvāt mahat gauravam sakṛt yute tu ekaḥ eva avayavī iti na mahat gauravam atas bheda prasaktiḥ na ca upalambhaḥ bhedasya aneka aṃśu ni caya nipāte tu upalakṣyate tatas asau na dṛṣṭāntaḥ atha pūrvvasakalā vaya vivināśe paryanta vartī ekaḥ eva avayavī tatas neka avayavinām abhāve samānam eva gauḥ evam akrameṇa anyathā ca saṃyukte pāṃśu rāśau= iti na doṣaḥ tathā sati dravya mālā tolyate iti na yuktam syāt antyasya tu gaurava anumāpa lakṣaṇam na yuktam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,23–3.1.4.2.4,24	 athavā yāvat ārambhakayoḥ guru tvam pṛthak bhūtayoḥ avayavayoḥ avayavinopi tad ārabdhasya tāvat eva tatas na bhavati tulānati viśeṣaḥ evantarhi sarvu āvayavi nāśe satya vayavinaḥ utpattiḥ iti paramāṇūnām api vināśaḥ iti nityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ iti virodhaḥ siddhāntasya atha vibhāgena vināśaḥ paramāṇūnām tu na vibhāgaḥ anavaya tvāt iti ced na anavayava tvasya ayogāt avaśyam hi pūrvva apara digbhāgena bhāvyam mūrttimatām tasmāt na avaya vi nāśaḥ iti yuktam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,25–3.1.4.2.4,27	 atha api syāt bhavatu paramāṇūnām vināśaḥ iti na kācid naḥ kṣatiḥ evantarhi krameṇa māṣaka ādīnām saṃkhyā sāmyan na yujyate pañcamāṣakaḥ piṇḍaḥ na syāt eka tvāt avayavinaḥ māṣaka avayavinām vinaṣṭa tvāt ekam eva suvarṇṇām ityādi bhavet aneka gaurava sambhave hi pañca ityādi saṃkhyā sambhavaḥ eka tvetu eka saṃkhyā eveka tvāt avayavinaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,28–3.1.4.2.4,29	 atha ekatvepi gauravasya tathā vyapadeśaḥ tathā sati na parama arthaḥ saṃkhyā tasmāt avayavānām avināśe tad gatām saṃkhyā upapadyate māṣaka ādi sāmya nibandhanam tatas neka dravya sambhave krameṇa avayavinām utpatteḥ gauravasya niyamena viśeṣataḥ atha sarṣapāt uttarottaram sakalam eva na upalakṣyate eka anupalakṣaṇa vat sarvu eṣām aviśeṣāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,30–3.1.4.2.4,34	 na etat asti ekasya anupalakṣa tvepi aṃśoḥ nna anupalakṣya tā tad aṃśu ni cayasya api tatas na idam samañjasam na hi enām upalakṣaṇe tat saṃhātasya api eka aṃśu gaurava anupalakṣaṇa ipi bhāra gaurava upalakṣaṇāt aṃśa nicayaḥ ca karpāsa bhāra vyapadeśa bhāgī kiñca sarṣapādāmahā rāśeḥ uttaraḥ vṛttimat guru tvam kārya mālāyāḥ yadi na eva upalakṣyate āsarṣapāt gurutvanta dvaṇa rṇa kṣatam analpakam tolyantad kāraṇaṅkārya gaurava anupalakṣaṇāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,35	 raktikā catur bhāgaḥ sarṣapaḥ tasmāt sarṣapāt prabhṛtyā mahā rāśe uttarottara kārya mālā nibandhanam bṛddhimat gauravam na upalabhyate āsarṣapāt tu guru tvam apacaya vat pūrvva pūrvvam sutarām eva na upalabhyate iti prāptam atas kārya gaurava anupalakṣaṇāt kāraṇam eva tolyam pāriśeṣyāt tasya iti nyāyaḥ parisphuṭaḥ eva gaurava viśeṣa upayogitaya upalabhyam eva tolyat na anyat uttarottarasya hi kāryasya gaurava anupakṣaṇe tat gauravam kāraṇasya api taula tve tad kāraṇasya tasya api tad kāraṇasya iti eṃva yāvat kāraṇam paramāṇavaḥ tolyāḥ teṣām parasya kāraṇa bhūtasya avayavasya abhāvāt tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,36–3.1.4.2.4,42	 paryanta a= ayavi dhvaṃse guru tvantu tayoḥ api punar tat eva paśyāmaḥ bhūyas dhvaṃse tayoḥ api tatonumānataḥ vidmaḥ guru tvam paramāṇuṣu tatas nāvayati dravyam dravya lakṣaṇa yuktimat api ca aṃśoḥ gaurava anupalakṣaṇa ipi bhāraḥ eva tasya dṛṣṭa tvāt na tvayavī dṛśyaḥ kevalam kārya darśanāt eva tasya sattā vyavasthāpyate tat ca sakalam asat yatas na ca dṛṣṭa uṅśu vat sorthaḥ na ca tat kāryam īkṣyate gurutva āgati vat sarvu atat tulā anu palakṣaṇāt māṣaka ādeḥ anādhikyam anatiḥ sa upalakṣaṇam yathā sva makṣeṇa adṛṣṭe rūpa ādau= adhika adhike pratyakṣa anumānābhyām apratītam katham asti iti gamyatām 
PVA_3.1.4.2.4,43–3.1.4.2.4,45	 nanu gurutva āgatau= api prakāra antareṇa api gateḥ sambhavāt katham asat na anyasya api rūpa ādeḥ anupalakṣaṇa tvāt māṣakādeḥ avayivinaḥ na adhikam aparam avayavebhyaḥ kathat na tarhi tulā anati viśiṣa agrahaṇāt iti a ācāryeṇa pratiniyamaḥ uktaḥ na upalakṣaṇa tvāt sā natiḥ kevala ucyamānā apyarasya api nidarśikāḥ katham sarvvam eva na upalakṣyate iti jñānavyam kim atra jñātavyam yathāyatham cakṣuḥ ādinā rūpa ādeḥ adhika adhikasya anavagamāt na hi rūpa rasa ādīnām avayavebhyaḥ viśeṣa gatiḥ avayavi sambhavepi tasmāt guṇa kriyā vat dṛśya avayavi abhāvaḥ eva iti dharma viśeṣa bādha dvāreṇa pakṣa doṣaḥ ayañca pakṣaḥ abhyupagama sva vacanaanu māna pratītivādhitaḥ abhyupāyaḥ sva vāc ādi bādhāyāḥ sambhavena tu udāharaṇam api anyat diśā gamyam yathā uktayā rūpa bādha ādi vat avayavi bādhaka nyāya upadarśanam atonyat api ācārya nidarśitam udāharaṇam avagantavyam tat ca prāk upadarśitam eva 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,1–3.1.4.2.5.1,4	 nanu sādhya nirddeśaḥ pakṣa pratijñā iti etat pakṣa lakṣaṇam naiyāyikānām asya kaḥ doṣaḥ asiddha hetu dṛṣṭāntasya api tattva prasaṅgaḥ nanu sādhyate iti sādhyam asiddha hetu dṛṣṭāntau tu sādhayiṣyete tat kathantayoḥ pratijñātva prasaṅgaḥ sattyam etat yadi varttamāna sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti labhyeta tri kāla viṣaya tvāt tu kṛtyānām atathā ātmakam tathā param pratinyastam sādhyanna iṣṭam tadā api tat 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,5	 tri kāla viṣayaḥ hi sarvvaḥ eva kṛtya pratyayāḥ tatas bhāvi sādhya tvam api pratijñā syāt katham sādhyasya bhāvi tvam tadā atathā ātmaka tvena nirddeśāt sādhyam api tat tadā sādhana tvena niddiṣṭam tena tadā asādhyam na ca asiddham sādhanam sādhyam prati tatas tasya paścāt sādhana tvam tatas paścāt tana sādhya tayā eva tasya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,6–3.1.4.2.5.1,8	 nanu yathā sādhya śabda kāraka apekṣayā sādhyat na pratipādayati kriyate ghaṭaḥ iti tathā sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭam api na pratyāyayiṣyati iti kutosiddha sādhanasya pratijñātva prasaṅgaḥ sattyam etat yadi nibandhanam atra pratyāyana adhikāraḥ na syāt pratyāyana adhikāre tu sarvu ā asiddhāvarodhinī tasmāt sādhya śrutiḥ nneṣṭam viśeṣam avalambate 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,9	 pratyāyana adhikāreṇa nivartti akāraka apekṣayā sādhyam apara sarvu asādhya saṃgrahārikā eva sādhya śrutiḥ atas na sādhya antara vyavaccheda samarthāḥ kāraka sādhya vyavacchedaḥ tu jñāpaka hetu adhikārāt na ca sa hetukam kiñcid bhavati iti ahetukena api bhavitavyam sarvu asya sarvu atra bhāva prasaṅgāt na ca asādhana tvena nirddiṣṭam sādhyampakṣaḥ iti nibandhanam asti tatas sādhya śrutiḥ nneṣṭam viśeṣam avalam vitumalam kāraka sādhya vyāvṛttiḥ tu pratyāyana adhikārāt iti na tayā sāmyam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,10–3.1.4.2.5.1,12	 tena aprasiddha sandigdha hetu dāharaṇa kṛtam anyathā śaśaśrṛṅga ādau sarvu āsiddhepi sādhya tā tathā ca asiddha dṛṣṭānta hetuvādaḥ prasajyate iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāta ghaṭa vat iti sāṃkhyam prati cākṣuṣa tvāt ākāśa vat iti vā yadi tu prakaraṇa anapekṣā bhavet pratilakṣaṇa kṛtaḥ tathā śaśaśrṛṅga ādau= api sādhya tā prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,13	 atha api syāt atra api sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti na saru u asya pratyāyana adhikārepi sādhyasya pratijñātvam api tu sādhyam iti karmaṇi kṛtya pratyaya vidhānāt karma ca karttuḥ īpsitatamam karme ti viśiṣṭam eva yatra prakarṣaḥ na ca sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭam karaṇa tva adīptitatamam anyathā payasā odanam bhuṃkte iti na payasaḥ karaṇa tvena vivakṣitasya karma tvam bhojana kriyayā apyamānasya api tathā īpsitam na īpsiṣyam āṇaṅkarma api ca pañcasu ava yaveṣu lakṣya tayā prakṛteṣu avayava antara lakṣaṇa viṣaya parihāreṇa pratijñā lakṣaṇam vyavatiṣṭhate iti asādhana bhūta sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti pratīyate tathā caturvvidham sarvu atantra pratitantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama siddhānta prakrame lakṣaṇa vidhānāt abhyupagama siddhānta lakṣaṇaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti pratīteḥ nna ati prasaṅgaḥ iti na doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,14–3.1.4.2.5.1,17	 tat etat sakalam asat yatas sarvu asya ca aprasiddha tvam kathañcid tena na kṣamāḥ karma ādi bheda upakṣepa parihārā vivecane prāc asiddha svarūpa tvāt sādhyaḥ vayavaḥ iti asat tulya siddhānta tā te hi yena upagama lakṣaṇaḥ na khalu siddhāntaḥ siddha hetu dṛṣṭānta vyavaccheda kṛt saru u asya asiddhasya abhyupagamāt śāstra dṛṣṭasya hi abhyupagatasya abhyupagama siddhānta tvāt tasya ca hetu tvena abhyupagamepi sādhyatā abhyupagamaḥ avaśyaṃbhāvī na asiddhasya hetu tā iti tri kāla viṣaya tvantu kṛtya pratyayānām pratipāditam abhyupagama śabdopi tri kāla viṣaya pratyayaḥ eva kṛtya grahaṇasya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt tatas sakalasya siddhānta tā tulyā tatas na siddhānta upakramaḥ parihāraḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,18–3.1.4.2.5.1,19	 atha sādhanasya sādhyasya ca lakṣaṇe prakṛte sādhana lakṣaṇa parihāreṇa sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti sādhyaḥ eva pratijñā na sādhana nirddeśaḥ tat api asat saru veṣām asiddha tvāt avayava lakṣaṇānām arthasya asiddha tvāt prāk lakṣaṇa abhidhānāt tatas sādhyarnirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti saru u asya sādhyasya nirddeśaḥ iti syāt tad vinirmuktasya ca sādhana tvam athavā sādhana tvena nirmuktasya sādhya nirddeśya pratijñātvam iti kaḥ imam vivekam vidhātum alam sandehaḥ eva tarhi iti ced na atra uttarasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,20–3.1.4.2.5.1,21	 nanu sādhyam iti karmaṇi kṛtya pratyayaḥ karma ca karttuḥ īpsitatamam na ca sādhana tvena upāyatayā abhīṣṭasya īpsitamatvam tat kathantasya sādhya tā natat asti sādhanasya eva upāyatayā sādhya tvena īpsitatama tvāt na ca atiśaya pratyayaḥ tatra aṅgīkṛtaḥ yoga vibhāgasya kaiścid abhyupagamāt daparaiḥ ātiśāyikasya pratyākhyāta tvāt na ca bhūta pratyayaḥ tatra tantram eka bacanam vākariṣyati kaṭau kaṭān iti ceṣṭa tvāt abhyupagama siddhānta tā ca asti eva tasmāt sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti asat etat atra ca dharmī dharmaḥ samudāyaḥ vā sādhyaḥ bhavet 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,22–3.1.4.2.5.1,26	 tatra dharme sādhyena sādharmyam hetuḥ dharmiṇi anarthakaḥ yadi dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ tasya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti anikya tvam iti bhaven pratijñā tathā sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭānte udāharaṇam iti dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam virudhyate na hi sādhya dharmasya anitya tvasya autpatti matvā ādi dharmau vidyate yena tad dharma bhāvi tvam syāt ghaṭa ādeḥ dharmiṇaḥ tu siddha tvāt tādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti na saṅgatam atha ubhayam sādhyam ubhaya pakṣa bhāvī doṣaḥ nanu samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ na samudāyaḥ siddhaḥ na api tad dharmaḥ utpattimatvam na bhavati atra ucyate samudāyasya sādhya tva ipi anyonyasya viśeṣaṇam sādhyam dvyam tadā asiddham hetu dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,27	 udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti hetu lakṣaṇam sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāham miti udāharaṇa lakṣaṇam tat etat samudāya sādhya tve vidhaṭeta tathā hi samudāyasya samudāyi vyatirekeṇa abhāvāt tat eva dvayam sādhyam bhavet na ca sādhya dharma viśiṣṭa dharmi dharmeṇa utpattimatu ā ādinā udāharaṇasya sadharmyam asti tathāvidhe dharmiṇī a siddhaḥ hetuḥ parasya iti na hetu lakṣaṇam na apya nitya tā viśiṣṭena dharmiṇā udāharaṇasya ghaṭa ādeḥ sādharmyam asti iti na dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam iti na sidhyati hetu dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam asambhavāt samudāyasya sādhya śabdaḥ dharmi vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati samudāyeṣu hi pravṛttāḥ śabda aavayaveṣu api vartante iti nyāyāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,28–3.1.4.2.5.1,30	 tat api asat asaṃbhavāt sādhya śabdaḥ dharmi vṛttiḥ yat i iṣyate śāstreṇa alam yathāyogam lokaḥ eva pravarttatām kim hi tadā lakṣaṇa vacanena yathā durvvihita lakṣaṇam asambhavāt arthasya anyathā vyācaṣṭe tathā hetu ādi svarūpam api anyathā parikalpayiṣyati yathā sa gamakaḥ tathā dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam api vyarthakam śāstram 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,31–3.1.4.2.5.1,35	 nanu pakṣa dharmaḥ tad aṅśena vyāptaḥ hetuḥ iti bhavadbhiḥ api upacārāt pakṣa śabdaḥ dharmi vṛttiḥ iṣṭaḥ eva tathā ca pakṣaḥ dharmī avayave samudāya upacārāt atra api hi saḥ eva doṣaḥ na idam asti yatas jijñāsita viśeṣasya dharmiṇaḥ pakṣa rūpa tā tasya dharmaḥ yadā hetuḥ katham atra upacāra tā yaḥ eva hi jijñāsita sādhya dharma lakṣaṇa viśeṣaḥ dharmī pakṣaḥ tasya mukhyasya eva pakṣasya grahaṇam tasya dharmaḥ hetuḥ tatas na doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,36–3.1.4.2.5.1,38	 nanu samudāyasya asiddhatve kathantasya dharmaḥ iti sidhyati na idam api yuktam yasmāt samudāya prasiddhiḥ ced kathampakṣaḥ bhavet asau sandigdhe sādhya dharme hi dharmi mātrasya pakṣatā yadāhi samudāyaḥ prasiddhaḥ tadā asyāḥ jijñāsita viśeṣa tvāt apakṣatā eva tathā ca āha tatra tu svayam sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ iti siddhaḥ ced katham sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ tasmāt pakṣa dharmaḥ iti korthaḥ sandigdha sādhya dharma dharmi dharmaḥ iti tadā atra katham samudāya asiddhau tad dharmatā na sidhyati kathantarhi avayave samudāya upacārāt iti uktam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,39–3.1.4.2.5.1,41	 atra ucyate codyasya parihāra artham upacāra pravarttanam dharmi dharmaḥ iti prokte lakṣaṇa atiprasaṅgitā tatra hi codayanti pakṣa dharmaḥ iti na sat etat na hi hetu svarūpa nirūpaṇa kāle pakṣasya sambhavaḥ pradeśa ādi dharmi mātreṇa hetum upalabhya vyāpti smaraṇe paścāt nitya tattva ādi sādhya dharma buddhiḥ prāk tu tad buddheḥ abhāvāt dharmi mātram eva samviditam avaśiṣyate sandigdhaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ iti ced na 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,42–3.1.4.2.5.1,44	 niyama abhāvāt nanu sandigdhe hetuḥ pravarttate kathat na niyamaḥ na siddha pratikṣipta mātrasya nirācikīrṣita tvāt niścite nirākṛte ca hetuḥ pravarttate prayojana abhāvāt aśakteḥ ca tasmāt dharmi dharmaḥ iti eva vācyam atra ucyate dharmi dharmaḥ iti vacane dṛṣṭānta dharmi dharmasya api hetu tve cākṣuṣa tvam api hetuḥ syāt atas pakṣa bhūtaḥ dharmī gṛhyeta iti pakṣa grahaṇam kathandharmyā iva pakṣaḥ bhavet iti āha avayave samudāya upacārāt yadi api hetu grahaṇa kāle samudāyaḥ na bhavati baddhi sthaḥ tathā api paścāt bhaviṣyati 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,45	 nanu yaḥ paścāt bhaviṣyati sa katham prathame sannihitaḥ atas eva upacāraḥ nyathā mukhya tā buddhyā vyāraḥ paḥ upacāraḥ katham asat nihite buddhiḥ iti ced kim manorathepi dāridryam na hi asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti na dṛśyate tatra hi yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ yadi vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ śāṭakaḥ ca vātavyaḥ ca iti vyāhatam tatra ayam abhiprāyaḥ vaktuḥ yaḥ śāṭakaḥ bhaviṣyati sa vātavyaḥ atra api kim prayojanam iti ced asti prayojanam sūtram iti ukte śāṭaka paṭaka ādeḥ api prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt anya nirāsa artham evam vacanam evam atra api yaḥ pakṣaḥ bhaviṣyati yatra sādhya siddhiḥ bhāvinī tasya dharmaḥ iti na dṛṣṭānta dharmi dharma prasaṅgaḥ tatoyam arthaḥ sandigdha sādhya dharma dharmi dharmaḥ iti kathantarhi tad aṅśaḥ tad dharmaḥ vaktṛ abhiprāya vaśāt na tat eka deśaḥ pakṣa śabdena samudāyā vacanāt iti vacanam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,46–3.1.4.2.5.1,48	 tat asat anya doṣaḥ kathat nāma paratra upanipātyate vyākhyātuḥ eva doṣaḥ durātmanaḥ na khalu anyena karkaṭikā bhakṣyate anyasya nāsā āccheda kriyā sādhya dharma dharmi samudāyaḥ pakṣaḥ tatra yadi tad aṅśena vyāptaḥ iti sāmānyena ākhyāyate tadā dharmī api tad aṅśaḥ eva tena vyāptaḥ iti na sādhya dharma vyāpta tā lakṣaṇam bhavet atas āha tad aṅśaḥ tad dharmaḥ aṃśa śabdasya sāmānya vacana tvepi dharmaḥ eva aṃśaḥ gṛhyate vaktṛ abhiprāyāt pakṣa dharmasya anyena dharmiṇā vyāpti asiddheḥ na tat eka deśaḥ iti asya arthaḥ na eka deśa mātram pakṣa śabdena samudāyā vacanāt pakṣa śabdena hi dharmī sandigdha sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ ucyate tena samudāya vācakaḥ na pakṣa śabdaḥ samudāya artha pratītiḥ tu sāmarthyāt tasya dharmiṇoṃśaḥ sāmarthyāt dharmaḥ eva na hi saḥ eva tasya dharmaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,49	 yadi tu pakṣa śabdena samudāyaḥ ucyate samāna pradhāna bhāva avayavaḥ tadā tad aṅśena vyāptaḥ iti dharmi lakṣaṇena aṅśena vyāptaḥ iti api syāt aniṣṭañcā idam iti tena evam vyākhyāyate tasmāt na kvacid asmābhiḥ asambhavāt anya śabdonyatra parikalpitaḥ api ca mata anujñā nāma idam nigraha sthānam sva pakṣe doṣam anuddhṛtya para pakṣe doṣa todanam mata anujñā athavā asmākam prayojanam asti upacāra yogya dharmi parigrahaḥ bhavatu na idam iti na upacāraḥ yuktaḥ na ca mukhya sambhave upacāra kalpanā yogaḥ api ca sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti atra pūrvva avadhāraṇam vā syāt para avadhāraṇam vā sādhya nirddeśaḥ eva pratijñā na sādhana nirddeśaḥ athavā sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva na anyathā tatra 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,50	 pūrvva avadhāraṇam vyartham aniṣṭam itaratra tu yadi pūrvva avadhāraṇam vyartha tā bhavet tat nivartti asya sādhana nirddeśasya hetu lakṣaṇena dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇena ca pratijñātvasya viśeṣa vihitena bādhanāt prakalpya apavāda viṣayam utsargasya pravṛtteḥ uttara avadhāraṇe tu sādhya hetu udāharaṇa nirddeśasya api pratijñātvam iti aniṣṭam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,51–3.1.4.2.5.1,55	 nanu sādhyasya eva nirddeśaḥ pratijñā na siddhasya iti avadhāraṇe kaḥ doṣaḥ na hi tasya sādhana ādibhiḥ ākṣepaḥ atra idam ucyate sādhana ākhyāna sāmarthyāt tad arthe sādhya tā matā sādhanam hi sarvvam asiddha sādhanāya upādīyate siddhe kim sādhanena iti sādhanasya lakṣaṇa ākhyāna sāmarthyā deva asiddha arthe sādhya bhāva gatā eva na prasaṅgaḥ siddhasya iti na tad nivṛtti artham avadhāraṇam hetu ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ rvyāpteḥ anāśaṅkyañca sādhanam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.5.1,56	 syāt etat sādhya tvena eva nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti śabda vyāpāra apekṣayā asiddhasya sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya nirākaraṇa artham pūrvva avadhāraṇam na hi tatra na sādhana sāmarthyam atra āha hetu ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ vyāpteḥ anāśaṅkyam sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭam yathā eva hi śabda vyāra apekṣayā asiddhasya sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya pratikṣepaḥ sādhya tvena eva nirddeśaḥ iti tathā udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti ādinā hetu ādi lakṣaṇena sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti sādhya sādhana tva bhaṅgyā hetuḥ eva tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva iti śakyam vyākhyātum iti hetu ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ vyāptiḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.6,1–3.1.4.2.6,2	 pūrvva avadhāraṇe tena pratijñā lakṣaṇa abhidhā vyarthā vyāptiphalā soktiḥ sāmarthyāt gamyate tatas pūrvdha avadhāraṇe vyarthatāyām pariśeṣyāt uttara avadhāraṇam tasya ca vyāpteḥ phalam tathā hi sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti anya lakṣaṇena api yadi vyāptiḥ tathā api pratijñā eva na apratijñā iti ayoga vyavaccheda phalam vākyam iti sādhana tvena api nirddiṣṭasya sādhyasya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti vākya arthaḥ anyathā vyartha tā 
PVA_3.1.4.2.6,3–3.1.4.2.6,6	 nanu svayam eva ucyate tathā ca asiddha dṛṣṭānta hetuvādaḥ prasajyate iti hetu ādi lakṣaṇa vyāptyā pareṇa parihāra abhidhāne prāc asiddha svarūpa tva ādi parihāraḥ tathā saru u asya ca aprasiddha tvāt iti ādikaḥ na eṣā upi doṣaḥ paraspara virodhena prasaṅgasya upapādanam kṛtam evam anena eva na tu sva iṣṭa prasādhanam paraspara virodha pradarśana mātram eva etat na tu anena hetunā sādhya artha prasiddhiḥ para pakṣa nirākaraṇa mātrasya eva iṣṭa tvāt tasmāt uttara avadhāraṇam eva etat tathā ca ayoga vyavacchedāt yāvatī kācid aprāptiḥ pratijñātu asya sarvvā asau nirākriyate pratijñā eva na apratijñā iti sādhana tvena yat apratijñātvam tat api nivarttyate 
PVA_3.1.4.2.6,7–3.1.4.2.6,9	 nirākṛtantāvat pratijñā lakṣaṇam pratijña ābhāsa lakṣaṇam idānīm nirākarttum āha hetu pratijñā vyāghāte pratijñā doṣaḥ iti asat sa hi dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva uktaḥ vaidhamyaṇa asu śikṣitaiḥ yat āha paraḥ pratijñā hetvā uḥ vvirodhaḥ nāma pratijñā doṣaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ saru u asya anitya tvāt iti nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā saru u asya anitya tvāt iti hetuḥ yadi sarvvam anityam katham śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdena vinā sarvva tva abhāvāt atha śabdasya api anitya tvam katham nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti 
PVA_3.1.4.2.6,11–3.1.4.2.6,13	 atra āha na ayam pratijñā doṣaḥ yatas viruddha teṣṭa asambandhaḥ anupakāra saha āsthitī evam sarvu a aṅga doṣāṇām pratijñādoṣa tā bhavet virodhe sati pratijñā hetvā uḥ vvirodhaḥ nāma pratijñā doṣaḥ sa ca virodhaḥ iṣṭa asambandhaḥ sa ceṣṭā sambandha unupakārakaḥ saha āsthitiḥ ca yadi tāvat hetuḥ tam artham na upakaroti duṣṭa tvāt sādhya virodhī tadā sarvu a aṅga doṣāṇām eva pratijñā doṣa tvasya prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.6,14–3.1.4.2.6,16	 na hi kaścid api hetu ādi aṅga doṣaḥ sādhya anupakāra lakṣaṇena virodhena virodhī tatas saru u asya liṅga doṣasya pratijñāt boṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ na ca bhavati yatas pakṣa doṣaḥ para apekṣaḥ na iti ca pratipāditam param apekṣya api yadi pakṣa doṣaḥ tadā sādhana doṣaḥ eva kaścid na syāt pratijña artha uparodhena pratijñā doṣa tva intarbhāvāt apṛthak vacanam eva sādhana doṣāṇām bhavet kaḥ hi amūḍha cetanaḥ ekatra antarbhūtam pṛthak brūyāt tasmāt asan= evaṃbhūtaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ atha saha asthiti svabhāvaḥ virodhaḥ tadā 
PVA_3.1.4.2.6,17–3.1.4.2.6,19	 iṣṭa asambhavya siddhaḥ ca iṣṭe pakṣe yadi asambhavī hetuḥ tadā asau= asiddhaḥ iti asiddha tayā eva nirākṛtaḥ syāt na pratijñā virodhaḥ atha tena pratijñātasya nirākaraṇam tathā sati yena pramāṇena sa sādhyate tad pramāṇa nirākṛtaḥ pratijñā doṣaḥ iti na virodhaḥ nāma kiñca saḥ eva syāt nirākṛtaḥ anitya tva sahetu tve śabdaḥ evam prakīrttayet 
PVA_3.1.4.2.6,20–3.1.4.2.6,26	 yadi anitya tvena sa hetu tve evam śabde prakīrtayet yāvatā dṛṣṭānta ākhyān atonyat kim atra asti artha anudarśanam na etat ākhyānam hetoḥ api tu vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya nityaḥ śabdaḥ sarvu asya anitya tvāt atra api evam vaktavyam anityasya sarvva tvāt aśikṣita tvāt tu evam abhidhānam tathā ca uktam sa hi dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva uktaḥ vaidharmyeṇa asu śikṣitaiḥ na hi dṛṣṭānta ākhyānāt aparam artham atra paśyāmaḥ etat eva kutas iti ced yatas evam hi hetuḥ ayam bhavet yadi śabdaḥ eva anitya tvam pratipādayet na ca idam yuktam yatas 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,1–3.1.4.2.7.0,2	 viśeṣe bhinnam ākhyāya sāmānyasya anuvarttane na tad vyāptiḥ phalam vā kim sāmānyasya anuvarttane sarvvaḥ eva hi prayogāḥ śābda nyāya anugatyā pratīyante śābdaḥ ca nyāyaḥ vidhiḥ nniṣedhaḥ niyamaḥ ca vidhiḥ api bādhakaḥ bādhyaḥ ca tathā niyamopi tatra bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa vidhānayoḥ tatra kadācid prathamam bādhyam kadācid bādhakam sarvu athāḥ viśeṣaḥ bādhakaḥ bādhyam sāmānya vidhānam iti vyavasthā evam eva vyavahārasya dṛṣṭa tvāt atra ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti viśeṣe śabde bhinnasya viśeṣasya vidhānam nitya tvasya anitya tvasya ca sāmānye dharmiṇi vidhānam iti bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ yathā takram kauṇḍinyāya brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadhi dīyatām iti dadhi dānam sāmānyena vṛttam takra dānena viśeṣa vihitena bādhyate prakalpya apavāda viṣaya mutsargobhi nivaśate iti tasmāt sāmānya anuvarttanena tasya viśeṣasya vyāptiḥ na ca sāmānya anuvarttanasya phalam etat vacana sāmarthyāt vacanasya sa avakāśa tvāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,3	 yadi tu ayam arthobhipretaḥ tadā nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya tvāt iti brūyāt bhavet viśeṣayoḥ anyatra akṛtārthayoḥ eka viṣaya upanipātaḥ tathā ca sati virodhaḥ ca mūḍha tvāt evam api syāt iti ced na kaścid evam sambhavī na hi tatra eva nitya tvam vidhāya punar anitya tva vidhāyī tadā eva mūḍhaḥ sambhavati yasya ca vākya artha vyutpattiḥ api na asti na tasya vādedhikāraḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,4–3.1.4.2.7.0,5	 atha pratijñā hetu virodha udāharaṇam yathā kathañcid kalpanīyam yadi kaścid evam brūyāt tadā pratijñā hetvā uḥ u virodhāt pratijñā virodhaḥ doṣa eti tat eṣyate eva prayogaḥ tu nityaḥ śabdaḥ anittya tvāt iti evam hi niyamāt śabdaḥ eva anittya tvam bhavet tatas nittya tva nirākaraṇe virodhaḥ atas eva āha syāt nirākaraṇam śabdaḥ sthitena eva iti atas bravīt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,6–3.1.4.2.7.0,7	 ācāryaḥ āha syāt atra pratijñā arthasya nirākaraṇam hetunā yadi śabdaḥ sthitaḥ syāt śabda sthitena eva nirākaraṇam bhavet saha anavasthānāt virodhinoḥ anyatra ca pratipādanam etat iti na nirākaraṇam etat iti tasya vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta upadarśanam eva etat hetuḥ idānīm na asti iti ced āha yatra sādhya vipakṣasya varṇyate vyabhicāritā pañcamyā tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ hetuḥ tu upanayāt mataḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,8–3.1.4.2.7.0,10	 yat anityantat sarvvam asarvvaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti katham etat gamyate iti ced āha viruddha viṣayeni asmin badan= āha anyatām śruteḥ sā ca bheda apratikṣepāt sāmānyānām na yujyate nittya tva viruddham anittya tvam śabdāt anyasmin viṣaye pratipādayan= eva anya tām śabdasya āha sarvvam anitya tvena vyāptam śabdaḥ ca anitya tvāt tatonyaḥ iti asarvva tvam tadā asya hetoḥ anyat tva pratipādanāt sā ca anyatā asiddhaḥ hetuḥ śabdasya api sarvva tvāt iti āha 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,11–3.1.4.2.7.0,17	 sā ca bheda apratikṣepāt sāmānyānām na yujyate na hi bhedam pratyākhyāya sāmānyasya ātma lābhaḥ bhedānām eva avāntara bheda pratyākhyāna viṣaye niyata tvāt atha api syāt sarvva śabdena samudāyaḥ ucyate na ca śabdaḥ eka deśaḥ samudāyaḥ tat asat evam hi pratyekam apoddhāre na kaścid sarvvaḥ syāt vṛkṣaḥ na śiṃśapā eva iti dṛśyate bheda pratikṣepaḥ tat asat vṛkṣaḥ na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacid sarvu aśruteḥ eka vṛttiḥ nniṣedhaḥ syāt na tāvatā saḥ sarvvaḥ sarvu abhedānām atattve tad asambhavāt atha vivakṣātaḥ śabdaḥ eva ekaḥ sarvvaḥ tathā sati śabda paryāyaḥ asarvva śabdaḥ iti pratijñā artheka deśa asiddha tā bhavet anittyaḥ śabda udhvani tvāt itya ādi vat 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,18	 nanu śabdasya dhvani tvam katham asiddham na hi sva rūpa abhāve kaścid sambhavati na sva rūpeṇa dharmi tvena asiddhaḥ hetu tvena asiddha tvāda siddhaḥ ucyate hetu tvam hi bhede sati bhavati na anyathā kutas jñāpya jñāpakayoḥ bhedasya avaśyambhāvi tvāt na hi śabdaḥ śabdena jñāpyate asiddhatvāt jñāpyasya na ca asiddham asiddhena sādhyate atha siddhaḥ śabdaḥ tathā api na sādhyate na hi siddham siddhena sādhyate 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,19–3.1.4.2.7.0,20	 nanu sādhya sādhanayoḥ ekatvam na iṣyate dharmi sādhanayoḥ punar abhede kaḥ virodhaḥ asti virodhaḥ śabda tvāt anittyaḥ iti ukte na samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ syāt nanu sāmarthyāt śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti na samudāya tva vyāghātaḥ na hi śabda tvāt anittyaḥ iti vacane anyatra anittya tā pratīyate kevalāḥ vā na hi dhūma tvāt agnimān dhūmaḥ na bhavati bhavati tatra sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena bheda bhāvāt iha api yadi evam kriyate nityaḥ śabda tvāt ayam go śabda vat iti tadā bhavati eva hetuḥ iha punar sarvvaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ śabda tvāt iti na sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,21–3.1.4.2.7.0,22	 nanu kim śabda tvasya dharmi tve sādhana tvam virudhyate yadi pratibandhaḥ katham na sādhana tvam atha api na asti tathā asatyanaikāntika tvam eva atas ca na asiddha tā nāma doṣaḥ asādhāraṇa tvena anaikāntika tvāt tasmāt dharmiṇaḥ hetu bhāvinaḥ na aikāntika tā eva doṣaḥ na asiddha tā atha punar nnirddiśyamāna tā yogaḥ na siddhaḥ iti āsiddhaḥ ucyate nahi kiñcid bhinnam asti yat punar pratipādyam tatra śabdaḥ nittyaḥ śabda tvāt anittyaḥ iti vā vaktavyam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,23–3.1.4.2.7.0,26	 nanu ubhayam na etat asti anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti ukte hetu antaram apekṣyate tad nirāsāya śabda tvāt iti etat punar ucyate śabda tvāt nāśitā iti atra dharmi antara nirākṛtau śabda śabda prayogasya punar sāmarthya saṅgatiḥ yadi śabda tvāt anittyaḥ iti ucyeta dharmmantara apekṣā syāt anittyaḥ śabdaḥ iti ca hetu antara apekṣā tad nirākaraṇāya ubhayatra upādānam iti na doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,27–3.1.4.2.7.0,30	 atra ucyate yadi śabda tva sāmarthyam hetu antaram anarthakam atha āsāmarthyam asya asti punar uktena tena kim tasmāt punar nnirddeśe yat vivakṣitam tat atra na asti iti asiddha tā eva doṣaḥ ananvaya doṣaḥ eva kasmāt atra na ucyate bhavatu samuccayena asau= api doṣaḥ aniyata kathāyām niyata kathā āyāntu parājita parājaya abhāvāt paryanuyojya apekṣaṇāt ca na yuktaḥ tasmāt ayuktaḥ eva dharmī svadharma sādhane na śaktaḥ ced avivāda prasaṅa gaḥ tathā ca hetu vaiyarthyam syāt tena 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,31–3.1.4.2.7.0,32	 jñāpya jñāpakayoḥ bhedāt dharmiṇaḥ hetu bhāvinaḥ asiddheḥ jñāpaka tvasya dharmya siddhiḥ sva sādhane jñāpya jñāpakayoḥ hi bhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tad abhāve hetu tvam asiddham na hi prakāśa tayā pradīpaḥ prakāśayan tad rūpa apratipattau sva artha kriyā nirvarttana samarthaḥ bhede ca jñāpakaḥ jñāpya jñāpanam vidhatte na ca atra bhedaḥ dharmi rūpāt tatas jñāpaka tva asiddheḥ asiddhaḥ anvaya asiddheḥ api jñāpakatva asiddhiḥ iti ced na bhede sati anvaya cintā syāt atra tu bhedaḥ eva na asti iti tāvatā doṣavat tve konvaya cintāyām vyāpāraḥ tasmāt dharmī sva sādhane asiddhaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,33–3.1.4.2.7.0,34	 nanu dīpa ādayaḥ sva sādhane siddhāḥ eva sattyam siddhāḥ na tu parokṣam aparokṣāḥ sādhayanti iti viṣama aupanyāsaḥ na hi pradīpa darśane svarūpe vivādaḥ atra tu śabda darśanepya nittya tāyām vivādaḥ eva yaditva vivādaḥ pratyakṣa siddha tā eva śabda tva vat eva bhavet dharma dharmi vivekasya sarvu abhāveṣu asiddhitaḥ sarvu atra doṣaḥ tulyaḥ ced na samvṛtyāḥ viśeṣataḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,35	 nanu kṛtaka tva śabda tvayoḥ api pradīpa vat eva pratyakṣa siddha tvam atha dharma bheda kalpanena bhedāt sādhya sādhana abhāvaḥ pradīpepi samānam etat tatra api pradīpasya svarūpam iti kalpanābheda usti eva na samvṛtyāḥ bhedāt pradīpasya svarūpam iti atra api yathā bheda kalpanā tathā na sādhanam sa vyapāra nirvyāpāra avasthāyām pradīpa vyapadeśaḥ svarūpam iti tu svarūpa mātram eva tatra artha kriyā kāri tvāt svarūpam svarūpāt artha kriyā iti pradīpaḥ tu dharmī nirvyāpārasya tu svarūpam eva na asti vivakṣita artha kriyāya abhāvāt avyāpāra tā iti na yuktam atiprasaṅgāt na ca evam vacanena kaścid arśa ssidhyati bheda kalpanā ced na sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena api tad siddheḥ tasmāt na dharmī svarūpasya sādhanam bheda abhāvāt kṛtaka tvānittya tva śabdānām tu vyāvṛtti kṛtosya iva bhedaḥ tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,36–3.1.4.2.7.0,39	 ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam konyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate ekaḥ hi artha ātmā sa pratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkṛtaḥ tatas kim aparamasya parīkṣyam nanu dharmi mātram pratyakṣa siddham nānittya tva ādi kaḥ dharmaḥ iti ced na anittya tvena saha ekatvāt na hi anittya tvam nāma tasmāt aparam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,40–3.1.4.2.7.0,43	 anittya tva paratve hi śabda dharmi grahaḥ katham kāla antara vyāpitayā ita rathā ced asat dvayam kāla antara vyāpi yadi nittya tvena parigrahaḥ pramā antara sahasrepi na anityat tva grahaḥ tathā pratyakṣa pratipanne hi pramāṇa antarataḥ katham nirākriyā syāt pratyakṣa mūlam sarvvam pramāṇa antaram karkaṭaka sadharmāṇaḥ hi janaka bhakṣāḥ rāja putrāḥ eva na pramāṇa bhūtāḥ pratyayāḥ pratyakṣañca pramāṇam pradhānam sarvu apramāṇānām tat kim mahākālaḥ eva ḍākinībhiḥ bhakṣyate 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,44–3.1.4.2.7.0,46	 atha pratyakṣeṇa na nittya tvam na anittya tvam pratīyate sva rūpa mātra kantena mīyate sarvu avastunaḥ nittya tvam anittya tvam vā pāścātya pramāṇa avalambanam nanu anittya tvam svabhāva bhūtam katham agṛhītam nāma nittya tvam hi vitata kāla kalā vyāpi tvam viparyayeṇa anittya tvam nittya tva grahaṇam tatra bhāvasya vyāpita agrahe sā ced na gṛhyate prāptam anittya tvasya vedanam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,47	 yadā eva bhāvānām kāla antara vyāpitā na pratīyate tadā eva anittya tā pratītiḥ parisphuṭāḥ sā vyāpitā eva na pratīyate na tu anittya tvam iti ced kim idam anittya tvam nāma tasya evo pādhi bhūtam nāma antaram tadā eva tat asti atha vā paścāt tadā eva tat asti iti ced kasmāt adhyakṣeṇa na pratīyate apratīyamānam kathantadātma bhūtantat tādātmyena pratīyamānam hi tad ātma bhūtam sambandhi tayā hi pratīyamānam tat avaśyam eva bhavet apratīyamānam tu tad samānam ayuktam tathā api paścāt tad sambandhi tayā pratīyate iti ced 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,48–3.1.4.2.7.0,51	 upalabdhi lakṣaṇa āptam yat na pratyakṣeṇa mīyate tadā tat asti iti katham abhāvaḥ na anyathā gatiḥ yatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptena upalambhaḥ tat eva asat iti vyavasthāpyate na aparaḥ prakāraḥ abhāva sādhane tathā ca uktam siddham pramāṇaiḥ vvadatām arthāt eva viparyayāt iti atha bhrāntiḥ asau tena anupalambhepya doṣaḥ sarvu atra dharmi grahaṇe yadi bhrāntiḥ pravarttate dharmi pramāṇa abhāve hi pramāṇam anumā katham 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,52–3.1.4.2.7.0,55	 asiddha dharmi sambandhaḥ katham hetuḥ prasiddhi bhāj pratyakṣam anumānañca pramāṇam na bhavet yadā tadā prameya sidghiḥ syāt iti vijñaptimātrakam yadā pratyakṣataḥ bhāvi bhūta rūpa aparigrahasḥ tadā pratyakṣatas siddha dharmi sambandha sambhave hetoḥ anumiteḥ siddhiḥ bhāvi bhūtasya vastunaḥ tadā adhyakṣa itara arthasya prasiddhiḥ sa nibandhanāḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,56	 yadi tu bhāvi bhūta rūpayoḥ ekatā iṣyate tadā pratyakṣa pramāṇa siddheḥ anumāna vaiyarthya bhrānti sadbhāve sarvva apahāri lopaḥ eva iti na kiñcat bhavet tasmāt anittya tvat nittya tvam vā pratyakṣa siddham eva atha na pratyakṣa siddha tā dharma tvāt dharmi mātram eva hi pratyakṣa siddham anyathā anumāna abhāvāt sarvu adharma prasiddheḥ pratyakṣatas eva 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,57–3.1.4.2.7.0,60	 tat asat yatas pratyakṣataḥ hi dharmasya prasiddhau dharmi siddha tā na śuddha dharmi mātrasya pratyakṣam api sādhanam na khalu dharma vinākṛtaḥ kvacid dharmī prasiddhi bhāj śabda tvena padārtha tvena ca avaśyam parigrahāt tatas yathā śabda tva ādi grahaṇan tathā nittya tva ādeḥ api na tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ nanu kasyacid vyabhicāriṇaḥ dharmasya yadi na pratyakṣeṇa kaḥ iva atra doṣaḥ tat yathā sthāṇu puruṣa tvayoḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,61–3.1.4.2.7.0,64	 sthāṇu tvam puruṣa tvañca vinā draṣṭum hi śakyate ūrdhva tā mātrakam vyāpi itara tvāt na vinā artha dhīḥ na hi vyāpītarattvam parityajya grahītum śakyam tat eva tasya rūpam tat ced na gṛhītam agṛhītam eva tat nanu dīrgham dīrgha tvenā parigṛhyamāṇam api dṛśyate eva na tatra avayayasya eva dṛṣṭeḥ tasya ca na sā dīrgha tā avayavinaḥ hi sā dīrgha tā sa ca anumāna gamya stathā hi calati ekatra calati samastam iti gamyate tat ekam iti tena idam eka tvam anumānataḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,65	 ekasmin= ākṛṣyamāṇe avayave sarvvā avayava samāhāraḥ eva ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ upalabhyate tad anyena saha ekam iti na ca tad anumānam paraspara sambandhaḥ eva tathā anumīyate na eka tvam na ca asau= anumāna viṣayaḥ pratyakṣa apravarttane hi na para pramāṇa viṣayaḥ bhavet na khalu tat eva dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭañca ghaṭate tasmāt kāla vyāpya vyāpi vā tat pratyakṣeṇa eva gṛhyate na asau= anumāna viṣayaḥ tatra yadi asya tena rūpeṇa na pratyakṣa viṣaya tā na tasya tada rūpam na khalu nīlatvena viṣayīkṛtam adhya kṣataḥ pīta ādikam kāla antara avyāpitayā gṛhītam tathā eva tat iti mantavyam anyathā sakala kāla kalā kalāpa saṃkalane tadā eva sakalam parisamāptam iti tadā eva sakala kāla karttavya artha kriyā prasaṅgaḥ kāla kalānām bhāvi bhūtānām agrahaṇena tathā iti ced tad grahaṇe tat vyāpitā api na gṛhyate eva iti tad kāla mātra sambandhi tā eva gṛhyate iti prāptam tathā ca vidyut ādi vat anittyaḥ eva 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.0,66	 nanu viduda ādīnām vināśe satya nittya tā na tad kāla sambandhi tā mātreṇa nanu vināśakasya kasyacid abhāvāt katham vināśaḥ megha avaṣṭambhāt eva vināśaḥ iti ced iha api samāna asamāna jātīya avaṣṭambhaḥ iti kinneṣyate tasmāt vidyut a upyuttara kālānupalambhaḥ eva vināśaḥ sa ca sarvu apadārthānām iti na nittya tā grahītum śakyāḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.1,1	 nanu uttara kālam api ghaṭa ādīnām grahaṇe katham agrahaṇam ucyate na tasya eva agrahaṇāt na khalu pūrvva kālopi gṛhyate kim punar tad kāla bhāva abhāvaḥ na khalu kaścid muhūrtta diva samāsa ādikaḥ kālaḥ pratyakṣa pramāṇa prasiddhau rūpa ādi padārtha vyatirekī na prathama divase māsa pratītiḥ nna prathama yāme divasa ādi pratītiḥ na dvitīye tadā pūrvvasya uttarasya ca apratīteḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.1,2–3.1.4.2.7.1,5	 smaraṇena pratyeṣyate eva kālaḥ divasādiḥ iti ced na smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvāt na hi smaraṇam apūrvva artha vidhāyi pratyakṣa pūrvvakam smārttanna apratyakṣa artha gocaram pratyakṣeṇa ca māsa ādeḥ na kālasya parigrahaḥ tad samahāra rūpa tvam kālasya yadi bhaṇyate samāhāra grahena asti pramāṇam iti sādhitam aneka adhyakṣa siddha tva at na asiddhiḥ iti ced matam aneka adhyakṣa siddhiḥ kim kenacid śakya sādhanāḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.1,6–3.1.4.2.7.1,9	 smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvam prāk eva pratipāditam sāṃvṛtam smaraṇa āyātam na tu tad pāramārthikam kālasya sāṃvṛta tve ca tat byāptiḥ sāṃvṛtī sphuṭam tasmāt anitya tā bhāva svabhāvaḥ iti gamyatām yadi svabhāvaḥ eva asau bhedaḥ syāt sāṃvṛtaḥ katham saṃvṛtiḥ nirupādānāḥ na sādhyam na ca sādhanam sambandha sambhavāt eva sādhya sādhanayoḥ sthitiḥ na hi sambandha sadbhāva virahe sādhya sādhane 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.1,10–3.1.4.2.7.1,17	 atra ucyate vyāvṛttam ekatonekam eka rūpeṇa kalpanā viṣayīkurute tena dharmi dharma vyavasthitiḥ vyāvṛttiḥ sarvu abhāvānām sajātīya itara arthataḥ pratyakṣa pratyaya grāhyā kalpanā mātra tonvayaḥ sa vikalpam adhyakṣam akṣa vyāparataḥ yadi pūrvva apara tvena adhyakṣam sahabhāvepi na anvayaḥ yena prathamatas dṛṣṭam ekam eva tad anvaye na tasya bhāsate aśeṣa vyakti bhāsa prasaṅgataḥ dūra tāditayā vyakteḥ abhāsanam iti sthitau vyakti agrahe na tat vyāpi sāmānya grahaṇam bhavet pūrvva vyakti grahaṇa saṃskārāt vyaktyātare tathā grahaṇam iti ced na etat asti yatas saṃskāra smaraṇe hetuḥ tad vastu grahaṇa āhitaḥ vyakti grahaṇa saṃskārāt katham artha antare vidaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.1,18–3.1.4.2.7.1,19	 vyakti grahaṇa kṛtaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ tatra eva smaraṇa vijñāna hetuḥ nna apūrvva artha darśanasya na ca pūrvva artha darśanasya na api adṛṣṭa smaraṇasya artha antarañca sāmānyam vyaktibhyaḥ tat katham adṛṣṭasya tasya smaraṇam api na ca pūrvva apara artha smaraṇa darśanāt spaṣṭa itara ākāra vyakti rūpam antareṇa aparam vibhāvayāmaḥ darśane hi dvayoḥ parisphuṭa ākāra vyatirekeṇa na apara ākāra pratītiḥ vyakti dvayam eva hi tatra pratibhāsate samāna ākāra pratyaya sambhavāt pratibhāsate iti ced tat asattyam pratibhāsā unumānena sādhyaḥ iti abhibhāṣitam kuḍya ādi pratibhāsaḥ kim anumānena sādhyate 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.1,20^1	 yadi pratibhāsaḥ prāgbhāvī vismṛtaḥ tadā tad smaraṇāya anumānamucyeta anyaḥ vā yatnaḥ kriyeta na tu pratibhāsana kālaḥ eva na hi kuḍya ādi pratibhā sonumānena sādhyaḥ kuḍya ādayaḥ vā na hi yatas kuḍya ākāraḥ pratibhāsaḥ tatas kuḍyam asti pratibhāsate vā iti loka pratītiḥ api tu para rūpa viviktena svena rūpeṇa yatas paśyāmi iti tatosti pratibhāsate vā na ca vyakti rūpa vivekinā rūpeṇa sāmānyavabhāsanam na khalu sāmānyasya varṇṇa saṃsthāna antara tvam upalakṣayāmaḥ varṇṇa saṃsthāna bāhyam eva sāmānyasya rūpam iti ced na tarhi sāmānyam asti varṇṇa saṃsthāna bāhyasya bāhyasya abhāvāt vyāpitā eva tasya rūpam iti ced yat tarhi varṇṇa saṃsthāne na asamānam asamānam eva tat na hi vyāpitā varṇṇa saṃsthānavatī varṇṇa saṃsthānasya eva vyāpitā iti ced yadi vyāpitā vyāpitayā eva pratīyeta kāla antare pratīyate eva iti ced na 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.1,20^2–3.1.4.2.7.1,22	 vyakti sattva asattvayoḥ vviśeṣa abhāvāt vinaṣṭepi pūrvva viśeṣe tathā eva pratīteḥ na ca avināśaḥ pūrvvasya tatra upalabdheḥ katham vināśaḥ iti ced yadi naṣṭam katham pūrvvatra na upalabhyate pareṇa tena vā vyāpitāyāḥ abhāvāt iti ced upalabhyate eva tat rūpam deśa vyāpti mātrakam eva apratītam tirodhānāt kim idam tirodhānam adṛśya ātma tā kathandṛśyasya adṛśya ātma tā deśa antare dṛśya ātma tā eva atītau na padārthaḥ iti ced dṛśya ātma tā vyatirekeṇa na padārthaḥ iti nirṇṇītam etat kiñca deśa antare dṛśyamāna tā vināśe vyāpitā eva vinaṣṭā bhavet tathā ca na nittyam sāmānyam tathā ca vyakti rūpam eva na sāmānyam iti āyātam vyakti vyatiriktasya samāna ākārasya pratyaya mātra tvena avastu tvāt pratyayaḥ tarhi samānāḥ ete iti katham varṇṇa saṃsthāna kriyā kṛtena samāna tvena samāna tvāt evam iti adoṣaḥ rāṣṭra kūṭa ādi samāna tāvat api ca yaḥ evam āha samāna kāra pratyaya nibandhanam sāmānyam iti eka artha kriyā kṛtaḥ samāne pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati tad eka kāraṇa kṛtaḥ vā na samāna rūpa kṛtaḥ brāhmaṇa ādi samāna tāvat 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.2,1	 nanu brāhmaṇa ādi jātīm antareṇa katham puṇya pāpa vyavasthā jāti sadbhāvepi katham na hi jātiḥ hanyate na api pivati madyam na ca puṇya pāpa vyavasthā āgamāt anyatas pramāṇa dasti saḥ eva āgamaḥ katham pratipādayet iti na hi brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ iti jātim antareṇa śakyam pratipādayitum prativyakti pratipādanā sambhavāt upadeśāt samāna kāra parāmarśāt vā iti na doṣaḥ samāna para amarṣaḥ ca anādi vāsanā upadeśāt eva na tad vyatirekeṇa aparam atra pramāṇa prasiddham api ca 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.2,2–3.1.4.2.7.2,4	 samāna pratyayaḥ vyakti vyatirikta śarīra vat atha anyathā iti jñātavyam anyathā andha viceṣṭitam viśeṣa vyatirikta ātma vedanat na prasiddhi bhāj tat anyathā tu samvittau na prameya astitā satī yadi vyakti vyatirikta ākāra saṅgataḥ samāna pratyayaḥ sa tathā na siddhaḥ iti katham tatas prasiddhiḥ sāmānyasya atha pratyaya mātram tadā na sidhyati sāmānyam na hi pratyaya mātrāt artha viśeṣa siddhiḥ yat ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ saḥ eva tatas sidhyati anyathā atiprasaṅga bhinna abhinnam sāmānyam iti ced na paraspara virodhāt tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.2,5–3.1.4.2.7.2,12	 bhinnāt anyat abhinnañcet bhinna tā asya punar katham bheda avabhāsane bhinnam abheda usya katham punar kenacid bhedaḥ iṣṭaḥ ced sāmānyam syāt tat eva hi ananyatā punar tasya na syāt atyanta bhedataḥ anyena abhedaḥ iṣṭaḥ ced bhinna abhinnat na tat tadā tena eva abhedita āyāntu tat punar syāt sahasradhā tata upakṛṣyam āṇan tan na syāt eva kṣayam gatam bhinna abhinnam yadi bhavet dṛśya adṛśyam prasajyate dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭam bhavet ekam iti jātam mahā dbhūtam dṛśya adṛśya tayā vastu sat asattva prasiddhitaḥ tathā hi eka tvam prāptam evam hi mṛtasya api amṛta ātma tā tasmāt kalpita rūpa tvam sāmānyasya iti gṛhyatām tatas vyāvṛtti bhedena bhinna tvam dharma dharmiṇoḥ sa yatra na asti tatra eva pratijñā artha eka deśa tā 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,1–3.1.4.2.7.3,4	 parama artha vicāreṣu tathābhūtā aprasiddhitaḥ tattva anyat tvam padārtheṣu sāmvṛteṣu niṣedhyate samvṛti sat sāmānyam vyaktitaḥ bhinnam eva anvaya vyatirekābhyām vibhāvanāt tat ca varṇṇa ādi rūpam eva tathā hi yadi vyakti atirekeṇa na varṇṇa ādi vyavasthitam vyakti antara gatan na syāt iti bheda vyavasthitiḥ vyāvṛttam anuvṛttañca na abhinnam iti yuktimat tatas kalpanāya asiddha bheda tā dharma dharmiṇoḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,5–3.1.4.2.7.3,9	 akṣataḥ tu na bhedasya grahaṇantena tattvataḥ pratyakṣataḥ ca siddhasya pāramārthika tā yatas pratyakṣa pūrvvakam yatra anumānañca pravarttate tatas sādhana rūpasya saṃvṛti sthita bhāvanā tattvena tu na tasya staḥ tattva anyat tve pramā anvite kalpanā mātrataḥ bhede tattvataḥ vyakti rūpa tā tena pratyakṣatas siddhā vyaktiḥ eva pratīyatām pratyakṣa pūrvvaka tvāt ca anumānataḥ vyakti sādhanam tasmāt parantu sāmānyam yadi siddhyet na bheda vid tatas na bhede vṛttiḥ syāt bhedānām asamāptitaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,10	 tathā hi yadi sāmānyam pratīyate tadā bheda an ullekhe bhedena syāt eva vṛttiḥ nānirūpite kaścid pravarttate atha vyakti darśana puraḥsara sāmānya grahaṇe tad sambandha grahaṇam iti yatra sāmānyam tatra vyaktyā bhavitavyam iti bhede vṛttiḥ tat eva bhedam pratiyataḥ katham bhavati tatas sāmānyāt anumāna pratītiḥ vyakti pratipattiḥ iti prāptam tathā ca anumita anumānataḥ vyakti pratītiḥ iti punar tatra api sāmānya pratītiḥ tata upi sāmānyāt apara avyakti sāmānya pratītiḥ iti anavasthā atha api ante vyaktim pratyeti tathā sati viśeṣa abhāvāt ādau= eva pratyetu kim paramparā pariśrameṇa vyakti pratipattau ca sarvva artha kriyā prasiddhiḥ iti na pravaratteta eva tasmāt buddhi viracitam eva sāmānyam na bāhyam iti yuktam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,11–3.1.4.2.7.3,13	 nanu buddhi rūpa pratipattau= api katham bāhyaḥ vṛttiḥ evam eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva dṛṣṭeḥ asmākam api tarhi sāmānya pratīteḥ vyaktau vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya atra api tulya tvāt tat etata prāpya harītakīm devatā virecayati iti prāptam yadi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva kim antargarḍunā sāmānyena tasmāt saṃvṛtisat sarvva sāmānyam iti gṛhyatām vastu sāmānya bhāve hi na vṛttiḥ nna nivarttanam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,14–3.1.4.2.7.3,17	 sāmānyam abhyupagacchatā vyakti pratītiḥ abhyupagantavyā anyathā pravṛtti abhāvāt vyakti pratītau tatas eva liṅgāt dhūma ādikādaḥ tu kim sāmānyena sāmānyatopi liṅga bhūtāt eva tasya pratītiḥ atha vyakti antareṇa saha na sambandhaḥ liṅga vyakteḥ sāmānyasya tu vyāpi tvāt asti iti sāmānya abhyupagamaḥ tat etat asat vyāpi tvā ipi hi sāmānyam tathā eva grahaṇe sati vyakti antarasya gamakam katham iṣyeta tattvataḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,18	 yadi api vyāpi sāmānyam tathā api tasya anumāna kāla bhāvinaḥ vyāpyasya agrahaṇe kathantasya vyāpakam iti gṛhyeta agṛhīta sambandhāt ca pratītau= atiprasaṅgaḥ sāmānya antara vyakteḥ api pratīti prasaṅgāt atha tayā na sambandhaddham iti pratyucyeta agra hīta sambandhasya api tarhi pratītiḥ syāt api ca katham idam jñātavyam iti prāk pratipāditam api ca yadi sāmānyāt vyakti pratītiḥ śabdāt api sāmānyam pratīyate tatas kim vyakti avāptiḥ nna bhavet asattyā asau pratītiḥ iti ced sarvvā tarhi sāmānya pratītiḥ asattyeti kim sāmānyena 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,19–3.1.4.2.7.3,23	 nanu sarvu atra sāmānyam asti eva vyakti apratīteḥ tu na samvādaḥ vyaktīnām eva artha kriyā sāmarthyāt sāmānyena tu vinā na śakyā pratyetum iti sāmānya abhyupagamaḥ vyakti apratītiḥ tu tad sambandhaddha liṅga abhāvāt nanu liṅgatopi sāmānyam eva pratyeyam tatra ced vyakti pratītiḥ kin na sarvu atra sāmānya mātram eva śabdena pratyāyyate liṅgāt tarhi vyaktiḥ api pratīyate iti prāptam tathā ca prāktanaḥ doṣaḥ atha api syāt vyatiriktam sāmānyam doṣavat ubhaya rūpa tve hi adoṣaḥ tat api asat vyaktaiḥ pratīti doṣaḥ kim pakṣetra api na sambhavī tata upi hi na sāmānyāt vyakteḥ asparśataḥ gatiḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,24	 sāmānyam hi yadi vyakti vyatirikta avyatiriktam iṣyata tadā api vyakteḥ pratītiḥ anyathā vā iti dvayīm gatim na ativarttante pratipattāraḥ pratītiḥ ced sakala anubhava sambhavāt kim iti pravarttate na ced pratītiḥ katham pravarttanam pratītam api apratītim iti pravarttanam iti ced tat eva tena eva rūpeṇa pratipanna apratipannam iti vyāhatam vidhi niṣedhayoḥ eka niṣparyāye dvayoḥ ātma lābha abhāvāt atas eva paryāyāṇām bhedaḥ iti ced kenacid paryāyeṇa bhinnam pratītam apareṇa na iti samayaḥ yena na pratītam tad artham katham pravarttanam tasya eva paryāyaḥ iti ced apratīta tve katham tasya eva iti pratītiḥ pratīte pi na pravarttate iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ tatas samvṛti sat eva dharmi dharma lakṣaṇam evantarhi anittyaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvāt iti atra api syāt yasya vyatiriktam sāmānyam tasya kasmāt na bhavati apratijñā artha eka deśa tvam tad sāmānya yogasya dharmi śabdena eva pratipādanāt iha api tarhi vyāvṛtteḥ pratipādanāt na bhaviṣyati 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,25–3.1.4.2.7.3,27	 sāmānya yogaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ anyasmāt tasya vā gatiḥ sāmānya yogaḥ tad bittim vinā na eva pravarttate tad rūpasya pratītiḥ tu prāk eva vinivāritā tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva atra śabdataḥ saṃpratīyate yadi sāmānya yogaḥ śabdataḥ viśeṣāṇām pratīyate iti abhyupagamaḥ sa tarhi katham vyakti apratītau pratīyate yasya eva bhojanam tasya eva bhagna bhāṇaḍa bāgitā svarūpantu viśeṣāṇām na pratipādana arham iti prāk eva nirṇṇīta tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti sthitiḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,28–3.1.4.2.7.3,30	 nanu vyāvṛttiḥ api vyāvṛtta vastu pratītim antareṇa katham pratīyate yadi pratīyate kim vyāvṛttyā anyathā anupapattyā tarhi vyāvṛtti kalpanā iti kin na sāmānya abhyupagamaḥ prati iti anusāreṇa abhyupagamaḥ iti na sāmānyasya nanu kim aham vyāvṛttim pratipadye iti lokasya pratītiḥ vilakṣaṇa tva pratīteḥ pratītiḥ eva iti na doṣaḥ tathā hi yadi anīpsita bhedena na pratīyeta śabdataḥ tat vastu na vibhāgena pravarttana samāgamaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,31	 avaśyam hi vijātīya vilakṣaṇena rūpeṇa pratipattyā bhāvyam anyathā anabhipreta parihāreṇa na pravartteta sāmānya lakṣaṇāt eva tasya anabhipreta vilakṣaṇa tā iti ced svayam atathā bhūte katham dharma antara yogepi tathā abhāvaḥ tad yogāt asya tathā pratītiḥ iti ced atadbhūtasya anya yoge sva rūpeṇa apratīyamānasya pratītiḥ eva na yuktāḥ sva rūpeṇa ced vilakṣaṇa tva gatiḥ vyarthakaḥ tarhi sāmānya yogaḥ saḥ eva bhedaḥ na lakṣyeta yadi sāmānyat na bhavet sāmānyānām tarhi kutas bheda upalakṣaṇam sāmānya antara yoge avasthā svarūpataḥ eva upalakṣaṇe vyaktīnām api saḥ eva prasaṅgaḥ iti vyarthakam sāmānyam dvayoḥ ca yadā bheda pratītiḥ tadā katam na hi akatra sāmānyam varttate tasmāt avaśyam anena vyaktīnām bhedaḥ pratyetavyaḥ sa ca vijātīyāt bhedaḥ sarveṣām eva iti tat eva sāmānyam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,32–3.1.4.2.7.3,39	 nanu jātim antareṇa saḥ eva sajātīya vijātīya bhedaḥ katham tathā hi vyakteḥ parasparam bhede sāmānyam na parasparam vyakti bhedaḥ bhavet eva tasya na asti pratīta tā vyakti apekṣayā bhede yathā śāvaleya vāhuleyayoḥ karkāt bhedaḥ tathā karkaśa āvaleyayoḥ api vā āhuleyāt iti tayoḥ api samāna jātita aprasaṅgaḥ na sarvu adarśanam yena sa pvvadarśī karaṇena saṃketa vyaktīkaraṇe vibhāgaḥ bhavet tat etat api na yuktam na ayuktam yatas sāmānyasya api sadbhāve na doṣoyat nivāritaḥ vyakti vyaṅgyam hi sāmānyam iṣyate na svarūpataḥ vyakti śūnya pradeśa ādau tasya vyakteḥ adarśanāt vyaktiḥ eva tata upekṣyā sā ca sarvvā na dṛśyate tatas tatra api saṃketa kriyā vyāptiḥ nna sidhyati 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,40^1	 sāmānyam api upalakṣya eva saṃketaḥ vidhātavyaḥ vyavaharttavyam vā na ca sāmānyam upalakṣyate vyaktim antareṇa sakala vyakti darśane hi niyata sāmānya darśanāt anākulaḥ saṃketaḥ bhavet tadā api vyaktīnām eva darśanāt vyarthakam eva sāmānyam tathā hi eka vyakti darśanena saṃketoyam gauḥ iti katham pratiniyata sāmānya pratītiḥ na hi paśutva ādi sāmānyeṣu kasyacid sāmānya vivekena upalakṣaṇam go tvam atra saṃketa biṣayaḥ iti ced kintadgo tvam iti na vivekaḥ katham kriyatām yat evaṃbhūta vyakti abhivyaṅgyam iti tena vyaktīnām evam bhūta tvam iti itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ tad sāmānya upalakṣaṇe vyaktīnām eka tvam vyakti ekatve ca pratīniyata sāmānya upalakṣaṇam gauḥ gauḥ iti svayam eva vivekaḥ iti ced na gauḥ iti sāmānyasya karkādiṣu avṛttyā eva upalakṣaṇāt yatra gauḥ iti buddhiḥ tat eva go tvam iti pratītiḥ iti ced nanu avibhāvita prameya rūpā buddhiḥ katham prameyam upalakṣayet na hi varṇṇa saṃsthāna vyatiriktam asyām prameyam upalakṣayāmaḥ tat eva sāmānyam anugata tvāt iti ced na anugamasya asambhavāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,40^2	 na hi varṇṇasya anya vyakti anugatam rūpam eka vyakti darśanepi tad anugama pratīti prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca sarvu avyakti pratipattiḥ syāt vyakti vyaṅgya tvāt na sāmānyam tathā pratīyate iti ced sarvu athā tarhi na pratītiḥ yāvat vyakti darśanam pratīyate iti ced na sāmānyasya tāvat mātra tva abhāvāt tathā ced sāmānyam vyaktayaḥ eva iti na sāmānyam aparam tathābhūta ajñāna jananam eva sāmānyam iti prativacane tad anya vyāvṛttiḥ eva sāmānyam iti syāt bahūnānta danya vyāvṛttiḥ eva sāmānyam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,40^3	 na hi tat vijātīya vyāvṛtti mātrāt aparam sāmānyam upadarśayitum śakyam vijātīyatā api tad itara vyāvṛttiḥ eva yathā eva tasmāt ekaḥ bhinnaḥ tathā parāparopī iti nidarśanat na anyathā sāmānyantum na śakyam nidarśayitum idantat iti abhinna tvāt na eva nidarśanam iti na pratyuttaram tad abhāva prasaṅgāt na hi vyaktīḥ nnirasya sāmānyam vyavasthāpayitum śakyam vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgāt sāmānya nirāsepi evam eva iti na yuktam vyavahārasya anya vyāvṛtti nibandhanasya api sambhavāt akarma adravya vat sāmānyānām api vyāvṛttiḥ eva parasparam vyavahāra hetuḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,42–3.1.4.2.7.3,45	 atha vyakti yogaḥ bheda vyavahāra hetuḥ parasparam sāmānyānām tathā api doṣaḥ eva yatas sva rūpeṇa na bhinnañcet anyasmāt bhidyatām katham śukla yogāt paraḥ śuklaḥ iti bhedaḥ pratīyate na khalu anyasya bhedaḥ anyatra samavaiti samavaityeva vyakti sāmānyayoḥ samavāya sambandhāt iti ced sāmānyasya abhedaḥ vyaktau samavetaḥ iti vyaktīnām eva abhinna tā tatas sarvu asāmānya yogāt gauḥ api syāt aśva ādikaḥ api ca goḥ sāmānyam go tvam vyaktīnāñca svarūpam sajātīya vijātīyānām na bhidyate parasparam tatas katham vyaktayaḥ sāmānyasya bhedikāḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.3,46–3.1.4.2.7.3,48	 atha svarūpāt eva bhinnāḥ vyaktayaḥ vijātīyābhyaḥ saḥ eva tarhi bhedaḥ sāmānyam astu kim apareṇa sāmānyasya abhyupagamepi saḥ eva vyakti bhedaḥ sāmānyasya bhedakaḥ sāmānya antarebhyaḥ sa tarhi siddha upasthāyī sāmānya viśeṣaḥ atha sva rūpeṇa eva sāmānyam bhinnam sāmānya antarāt tad yogāt bhedaḥ sāmānyavatām yathā śuklam rūpam svayam eva paṭaḥ tu tad yogāt iti tat api na saṅgatam yatas varṇṇa rūpam sitam na eva kvacid kevalam īyate tatas tasya svayam śukla rūpa tā katham īyate dravya stham eva sarvvadā sita ādikam tatas pṛthak aparidṛśyamānam svayam eva tad rūpam iti katham pratīyate kena cit dravyāt eva sā tasya śuddha tā iti na kim matam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.4,1	 nanu tasya yadi dravyāt cuklatā svarūpam tarhi kintasya dravyasya api tarhi kim rūpam iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ dravyam iti eva pratīyamānam iti ced dravyam iti api varṇṇa saṃsthāna saṃsparśinī na pratītiḥ varṇṇa saṃsthānañca guṇaḥ eva iti tad aparam dravyam katham bhūtam pratīti viṣayaḥ na ca saṃsthānam api varṇṇa ādi atirikta tām svīkaroti varṇṇaḥ eva tathā varttula tva ādi rūpeṇa pratibhāsate 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.4,3	 nanu dravyam api pratibhāsate eva tathā hi sparśana jñānena api saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ iti ekatayā avabhāsanam na ca guṇa mātre pratyabhijñānam anyathā rūpam sparśaḥ iti syāt na ca sparśana grāhyam rūpam yuktam tasmāt dravyaḥ eva pratyabhijñānam yuktimat tasmāt yadi atas bhinna viṣaya jñāna grāhyam tatas tat bhinnam tat yathā ghaṭāt paṭaḥ bhinna viṣaya jñāna grāhyañca dravyam iti svabhāva hetuḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.4,4–3.1.4.2.7.4,6	 atra ucyate na rūpa ādi vivikterthe pratyabhijñāna darśanam na hi asmarataḥ eva asti pūrvva pratyaya gocaram na tāvat darśane ghaṭa ādikasya pratibhāsaḥ na api sparśa vijñāne prathamam prathamam hi avayava mātrakam eva pratibhāti tat ca para avayava abhāvepi tathā eva avabhāsate na ca asau ghaṭaḥ nikhila diś vibhāga avayava vyāpinaḥ ghaṭa avayavi tvāt na api rūpa mātram ghaṭaḥ rūpa samavāyi kāraṇasya tathā vyapadeśāt pratyabhijñānasya ca tadā abhāvāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.4,7–3.1.4.2.7.4,11	 atha apara apara avayava guṇa antara ādi pratibhāsane avayavi grahaṇam iti matiḥ tat api na asti yatas eka deśa antarasya eva tadā grahaṇa sambhave na saṃsthānau= ayavinaḥ grahaṇasya asti sambhavaḥ tathā guṇa antarasya api naṣṭepi smaraṇa udayaḥ anumānāt gatiḥ yātu na apratyakṣa puraḥsarāḥ yadā ghaṭa ādau= avaya guṇa antarāṇām upalabdhiḥ tadā guṇa avayava antarāṇāḥ manupalambhe katham avayavinām na tāvat mātram ghaṭaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,1	 atha smaraṇa sahāya pratyabhijñānataḥ ghaṭa ādi avayavi parijñānam tad ā avayavi guṇa antara apa uddhāre kaḥ tatra ghaṭaḥ iti api syāt aviyogaḥ tu parasparam ekasāmagrya ghīna tvāt na ca aviyoga grāhakam pramāṇam asti paraspara parihāreṇa upalambhāt aviyogaḥ tu smaraṇa pratyabhijñāna pratyaya grāhyaḥ na ca smaraṇa pratyabhijñānayoḥ pṛthak aprāmāṇye samudāyaḥ prāmāṇyam prāpnuyāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,2	 nanu śivikā udvahane pṛthak aśaktānām anyathā śaktiḥ upalabhyate na tatra teṣām kārya jananāt tathābhūta pūrvva kāraṇa janya svarūpam eva śaktiḥ na vyatiriktā iha tu smaraṇa pratyabhijñayoḥ kim kāryaḥ avayavi pratītiḥ iti ced na tad vyatirekeṇa apara pratīti abhāvāt atha prati iti antaram udeti niścaya rūpam tat asat apramāṇat niścayaḥ aniścayaḥ eva na khalvapramāṇat niścayaḥ pramāṇasya vyarthaka tā prāpteḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,3–3.1.4.2.7.5,5	 atha tadā anumānena avayava antara niścaye pratyabhijñāna deka tā pratīteḥ avayavi pratītiḥ na hi avayavasya avayava antareṇa eka tā guṇa antarasya vā tad antareṇa iti tat api ayuktam anumānasya pratyakṣa puraḥsara tvāt yathābhūtam tad pratyakṣeṇa pratipannam kevalan tathā bhūtam eva anumānena pratyeyam tatas kevalasya apṛthak bhūtaṃsya pratyakṣeṇa pratīteḥ tathā bhūtasya eva anumānāt api pratītiḥ tatas ca eka tvam pratyabhijñānāt anyathā dṛṣṭa vastuni pratyakṣeṇa katham yāyāt yati iti pathamāñjasam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,6	 na hi pratyakṣeṇa anyathā pratipannam pratyabhijñāna sahasreṇa api pratyetum anyathā śakyam pratyabhijñānam api pratyakṣam eva iti ced na anumāna viṣaye pravṛtteḥ tat ca anumānam aneka viṣayam pratyabhijñānam katham vyavahāra hetuḥ iti ced pramaṇa tvena eva iti vadāmahe pramāṇa tā ca anumāna tvena anumānena eva tarhi tat eka tvam tatas vayavī sattya tā bhāj prasidhyati iti naḥ pakṣa siddhiḥ na pāramārthikasya eka tvasya aprasādhanāt tad artha kriyā kāritayā eka tvam tatra iti na parama arthaḥ na ca tena eva sārtha kriyā karttavyā iti niyamaḥ agni antareṇa api dāhakasya kriyā dṛṣṭeḥ mukhya abhāvāt katham upācaritam ekatvam iti ced anādi vāsanātaḥ upacāra para paraṃpara eva eṣā iti na doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,7–3.1.4.2.7.5,8	 athavā prathamam dṛṣṭau mukhyam ekatvam ucyate tat adhyāropataḥ paścāt bhaktitortha kriyā kṛtaḥ tasmāt dharma dharmiṇoḥ apa uddhāra parikalpanātaḥ tattva anyat tve bhavataḥ na tu vāstave tattvataḥ na bhedaḥ bhedaḥ tu buddhi parikalpita apoddhārataḥ na cā sauvapa uddhāraḥ pratyakṣataḥ na api tad pūrvvaka anumānataḥ api ttu anādi vāsanā akṛta anumāna paraṃpara āgataḥ iti na parama arthaḥ asti tarhi tattva anyat tvam kasmāt pratiṣidhyate iti ced na 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,9–3.1.4.2.7.5,12	 parama artha vicāreṣu tathābhūta aprasiddhitaḥ tattva anyat tvam padārtheṣu sāṃvṛtteṣu niṣidhyate iti uktam na hi paramārtha tvena abhedaḥ samvṛtya eva bhedaḥ iti digamvara dararśanam api tu ubhayam parama arthaḥ iti atas eva āha anumāna anumeya artha vyavahāra sthitiḥ tu iyam bhedam pratyaya saṃsiddham avalambya prakalpyate 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,13–3.1.4.2.7.5,16	 syāt etat yadi na bhedaḥ katham anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ āpa uddhārika bheda bhāvāt sāṃvṛta bheda āśraya tā na hi sāṃvṛtaḥ bhedaḥ na āśrīyate paramārthikaḥ ca abhedaḥ iti kevalam samvṛti bhedena avisamvādaḥ parama arthe ca na vyavahāraḥ iti ubhābhyām prayojanam tasmāt yadā yathāsvam bheda niṣṭheṣu pratyayeṣu vivekinaḥ dharmaḥ dharmāḥ ca bhāsante vyavahāraḥ tad āśrayaḥ na anyathā anumāna ādi vyavahāraḥ tathā ca āha sarvvaḥ eva ayam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhena dharma dharmi nyāyena iti vyāvṛtti bhedataḥ bhedaḥ eva śaraṇam vyavahāra upanītotra saḥ eva āśliṣṭa bheda dhīḥ sādhyaḥ sādhana tām nītaḥ tena asiddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,17^1	 na hi vyāvarttamāna bhedena vyāvṛttīnām bhedaḥ eka tvāt tasya yatas tu vyāvarttate tad bhedāt tatra aśabda vyāvṛttyā śabdaḥ dharmī akṛtaka vya āvṛttyā tu kṛtaka tvam dharmaḥ sādhāraṇā sādhāraṇa tvena bhedāt na śabda aśabdātvayoḥ tathā tat katham bhāva pratyayaḥ bheda abhāve bhavet bhavatu vā paryāyaḥ eva syāt bhāva pratyaya vācya tvāt eva bhedaḥ iti ced na itaretara āśraya tvena doṣāt ṣaṣṭhī samarthāt bhāva pratyayaḥ bhāva pratyayāt bhede ṣaṣṭhī sambandha tā iti api ca artha nimittakena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam na śabda nimittakena arthena iti evambhūtaḥ eva asau= arthaḥ yatas śabda pramāṇakāḥ vayam 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,17^2–3.1.4.2.7.5,18	 yat śabdāḥ prāhuḥ tat asmākam pramāṇam śabda antareṇa ca pratipādyamāna usau= arthonyaḥ eva evantarhi paryāyata abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt anittyaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvāt iti saḥ eva śabdaḥ avidya māna bheda dhīḥ sādhya dharmī san sādhana tām nītaḥ iti asiddhaḥ api ca śabda tvāt anittya tā yadi tat tarhi śabda tvam śabdaḥ iti eva pratītam kim punar uccaryate punar uccāraṇam dharma prādhāni artham iti ced na phala abhāvāt dharmi prādhānya īpi bhavati eva hetuḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ yatas kṛtakaḥ iti pradīpa nyāyena tu na anumāna vyavahāraḥ tatas punaruktam nāma nigraha sthānam bheda vivakṣāyām asiddham eva iti sthitam etat bheda sāmānyayorddharma bhedāt aṅgaṅgitā tatas yathā anityaḥ prayatna utthaḥ prayatna uttha tayā dhvaniḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,19	 yatoyam abhede sādhya sādhanayoḥ abhinna vyāvṛttika tayā doṣaḥ tatas bheda sāmānyayoḥ vyāvṛtti bhedāt aṅga aṅgitā sādhya sādhana bhāvena na virudhyate na hi abheda bhāvī doṣaḥ saṃbhavati bheda bhāve na hi badhira doṣaḥ sa karṇṇakasya tasmāt anityaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka śabdaḥ prayatnāna tarīyaka tvāt iti na asiddhatā doṣaḥ śabda gatam hi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam dharmi śabdā śabda gatam hetuḥ iti pratipannaḥ sādhya sādhana bhedaḥ śabda gatam hi prayatna anantarīyaka tvam prayatna ānantarīyaka tva antarāt api bhidyate sāmānya rūpeṇa tu vivakṣyamāṇam na tad antarāt bhidyate api tu aprayatna anantarīka tvāt eva tatas vyāpi tvā avyāpitayā bhedaḥ eva yathā vṛkṣa tva śiṃśapā tvayoḥ na hi avyāpya iva vyāpi bhavati tena śabda viśeṣaṇam avyāpi dharmi tad atad gatam hetuḥ vyāpi tvena bhedāt vyāpitvā abhāvena tarhi na asti śabda tvasya bhedaḥ iti soyam ananvaya doṣaḥ eva prāptaḥ atas śabda tvāt iti atra hetau= ananvaya doṣaḥ eva parisphuṭaḥ na tu asiddha tā ādi doṣaḥ asiddha tāyām api ananvayi tvam eva kāraṇam iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ parisphuṭaḥ yuktaḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,20–3.1.4.2.7.5,22	 na etat asti yatas na eṣān anvayitā doṣaḥ na asti iti etena bhaṇyate asiddha tā api doṣotra bhavati eva parisphuṭaḥ na khalu bheda abhāvāt asiddha tā abhāvaḥ tatosiddha tāyām satyām tām avakalpya para doṣa udbhāvanam na nyāyam anudhāvati hetu sambhave hi sati tad anvayāditā paricodanā gocaraḥ iti uktam tasmāt asiddha tā doṣaḥ bheda abhāve bheda tva doṣaḥ eva iti sāṃpratam manyāmahe tatas 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,23–3.1.4.2.7.5,24	 pakṣa aṅga tvepi a bādha tva at na asiddhiḥ bhinna dharmiṇi yathā aśvaḥ na viṣāṇi tvāt eṣa piṇḍaḥ viṣāṇavān yadi nāma pakṣa viśeṣaṇam viṣāṇi tvam piṇḍa antara vyavacchedāya tathā api hetu tvam na virudhyate sādhya pratibaddhaḥ hi hetuḥ tathā pratīyamānaḥ sādhya sādhakaḥ sa ca pratibandhaḥ sādhya aṅga tvepi na virudhyate tatas hetuḥ eva bhinna dharmiṇi dharmi viśeṣaṇam sādhya kāla aṅgatāyām api 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,25–3.1.4.2.7.5,27	 sādhya kāla aṅga tā vā na nivṛtteḥ upalakṣya tat na khalu viśeṣaṇam viśeṣa kāla bhāvi ā iva aṅgam tat upalakṣya prāk eva nivṛtteḥ yathā katarat devadattasya gṛham yatra kākaḥ parirāraṭī iti saḥ idānīm devadatta ādi gṛham upalakṣya nivṛttopi tad upalakṣayati eva kāla antaropi nanu avidyamānaḥ katham upalakṣaṇam tad phalāyāḥ viśeṣa niṣṭāyāḥ buddheḥ sambhavāt tasmāt upalakṣaṇan na pratijñā artha eka deśa tayā asiddha tā doṣa bhāgī yadi tarhi bhinna dharmiṇi sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena bhedāt na pratijñā artha eka deśa asiddha tā doṣaḥ a bhinna dharmiṇī eva doṣaḥ iti prāptā śrāvaṇa tva ādeḥ api pratijñā artha eka deśa tā kṛtaka tvānittya tvayoḥ ca samāna vyāptikayoḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,28–3.1.4.2.7.5,33	 na sat etat yatateḥ viśeṣa upa pratijñā arthaḥ dharma bhedāt na yujyate na kevalam viṣāṇi tvāt iti evam ādikaḥ viśeṣa upya sādhāraṇa upi śrāvaṇa tva ādikaḥ na bhavati dharma bhedāt eva nanu yatas eva aśabdāt vyāvṛttyā śabda tvam tāvat mātrakāt eva śrāvaṇa tvam tathā ca āha śrotra grahaṇa lakṣaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti tat katham asati vyāvṛtti bhede dharma bhedaḥ iti tat asata yasmāt paraspara antarbhāve hi dharma bhedaḥ na yukti bhāj artha antara abhisaṃvaṃdhā sambandhe hi viveki tāḥ 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,34	 śravaṇa jñāna sambandhāt asambandhāt eva vyāvarttanam śrāvaṇa tvam śabda tvantu aśabda sāmānyāt eva vyāvṛttiḥ yadi api śābdaḥ na asti aśrāvaṇaḥ tathā api sāmagrya bhāvāt aśrāvaṇopi puruṣa antara apekṣayā bhavet aśabdaḥ tu na puruṣa antara apekṣayā api iti na aśrāvaṇa tva vyāvṛttiḥ śabda tvam śrāvaṇa tvam eva tathā bhavet na śabda tvam tasya śrāvaṇa aśrāvaṇa asādhāraṇa tvāt 
PVA_3.1.4.2.7.5,35	 etena yat ācārya vacanam nanu dṛṣṭaḥ saṃghātānām pārārthyam saṃghāta tvāt saṃskṛtam anittyam saṃskṛta tvāt iti pratijñā artheka deśaḥ hetuḥ na atra sarvve saṃghātāḥ saṃskṛtam vā pratijñā artha upi tu cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ tat eka deśaḥ ca dṛṣṭānta abhāva prasaṅgāt atha punar śabda tvam asādhāraṇam syāt śakyam evam bhavitum pratijñā arthasya hi asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ śrāvaṇa tvam asādhāraṇam yuktam na tu śabdasya anyat śabda tvam asti iti asiddha tvam eva hetu doṣam tat uktam uktam pakṣa lakṣaṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,1–3.1.5.1.0,4	 hetu lakṣaṇam ucyate tatra ca pakṣa dharmaḥ yatas heteuḥ tad ābhāsāsāḥ ca bhūyasā tasmāt tat vistaraḥ pūrvva hetu ādi arthāta pradarśyate sa pakṣe san= asat dvedhā pakṣa dharmaḥ punar tridhā pratyekam asapakṣepi sat asat dvividha tvataḥ nanu hetu lakṣaṇam eva vaktavyam yaḥ san sajātīyaḥ iti ādikam hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇañca kimartham pakṣa dharma vistara nirddeśaḥ hetuḥ hetvābhāsaḥ vā prāyaśas pakṣa dharmaḥ eva tatas vivekena hetu hetu ābhāsa lakṣaṇasya spaṣṭa nirdeśa artham ādau prabheda nirddeśaḥ tathā sati ayam pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ ayam viruddhaḥ ayam anaikāntikaḥ iti sukhena ākhyāyate gṛhyate ca atas eva āha 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,5–3.1.5.1.0,6	 pakṣa dharma prabhedena sukha grahaṇa siddhaye hetu prakāraṇa arthasya sūtra saṃkṣepa aucyate pakṣa dharma prabhedena yaḥ saṃkṣepaḥ ucyate sa sukha grahaṇa artham hetu prakaraṇa arthasya eva hetu prakaraṇa arthaḥ hetu hetu ābhāsa lakṣaṇa nirddeśaḥ tad arthaḥ hetu hetvābhāsa tvam atas eva hetvābhāsāt pūrvvam iti uktam hetuḥ ca ābhāsaḥ ca hetvābhāsam ābhāsaḥ ca pratyāsatteḥ hetvābhāsaḥ eva nābhāsa mātram 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,7–3.1.5.1.0,9	 nanu ca dharmi dharma mātra tayā upasaṃhriyamāṇaḥ dharmaḥ sādhanam na pakṣa dharma tayā asti ca atra pradeśe vana gahana ādau dhūmaḥ iti dharmi mātre pradarśanāt na ca dharmi mātram pakṣaḥ na hi dharmī sādhyaḥ tasya siddha tvāt dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī anumeyaḥ iti vacanāt sa yam etat samudāya artha sādhya tvāt dharma mātretha dharmiṇi amukhyepi eka deśa tvāt sādhya tvam upacaryate 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,10	 hetu vyāpāra viṣayaḥ samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ sa ca na pakṣaḥ siddha tvāt tasmāt asiddha sādhya dharmā dharmī tad viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ katham asiddham viśeṣaṇam upacārāt prayojana abhāvāt anupacāraḥ iti na saṃgatam sarvu adharmi dharma pratiṣedha artha tva ādikam prāk eva pratyayāt iti na ucyate punar tathā ca cākṣuṣa tva ādi parihāraḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,11	 nanu cākṣuṣa tvam sajātīyaḥ eva sat na dharmi dharmaḥ tatra dharmi dharma grahaṇāt eva tasya nirāsaḥ na upacāra rahitena dharmi dharma grahaṇena sādhya dharmi dharma tā labhyate vaidharmya dṛṣṭā tadharmiṇā upi dharmaḥ iti syāt na asan= tad atyayaḥ iti vacanāt katham hi tatra eva āsantatra eva ca san= iti tatas sādhya dharmi parigraha artham upacāraḥ sādhya dharmi dharma grahaṇam eva tarhi karttavyam na tatra api upacāraḥ eva śaraṇam na hi asiddham anadhyāropitam viśeṣaṇam sambhavati pakṣaḥ iti anena api tat eva ucyate iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipādane prayāsāt gaurava doṣaḥ iti ced na pakṣa śabdasya api sādhya paryāya tvāt tathā ca jana vyavahāraḥ ayam mamapakṣaḥ idam mama abhipretam iti tathā ca ācāryaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,12–3.1.5.1.0,16	 samudāya artha sādhya tvāt dharma mātretha dharmiṇi amukhyepi eka deśa tvāt sādhya tvam upacaryate na hi anupacaritaḥ kevalaḥ dharmī pakṣaḥ nanu dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī anumeyaḥ na ca tatra upacāra sambhavaḥ na jijñāsita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ iti tatra abhiprāyāt tathā anumānam arhati anumeyaḥ iti arthartha bhāvāt yaḥ ca anumānam arhati yaḥ ca jijñāsita viśeṣaḥ tatra sādhyam asiddha tvāt upacaritam eva tasmāt upacarita arthaḥ eva pakṣaḥ upacarita sādhya aṅga viśiṣṭaḥ eva dharmī iti yāvat nanu upacarita dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ iti api syāt pakṣa grahaṇam sādhya dharmi parigraha artham sādhya dharmiṇaḥ yaḥ dharmaḥ saḥ eva hetuḥ na viruddha unaikāntikaḥ vā tasya pakṣasya dharmaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,17	 nanu etasmin viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāve viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedaka tvāt anya dharmitā niṣedhāt asādhāraṇa tā saru u asya syāt na hi viśeṣaṇam avyavacchedakam śabda viśiṣṭañca kṛtaka tvam śabda ātmakam katham paṭa ādi ātmakam tatra vā yāyāt vyatireke kadācid bhavet api na ca vyatirekaḥ dharmiṇaḥ dharmāṇām iṣyate na ca vyatiriktasya kāraṇāt anyat viśeṣaṇam tathā ca sati sarvvaḥ kārya hetuḥ eva bhavet tasmāt viśeṣaṇe asādhāraṇa tā aviśeṣaṇe tu apakṣa dharma tvāt asiddha tā doṣa prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,18–3.1.5.1.0,20	 na etat asti yatas ayogam yogam aparaiḥ atyanta ayogam eva ca vyavacchinatti dharmasya nipātaḥ vyatirecakaḥ yadi eka prakāraḥ eva vyavacchedya vyavacchedaka bhāvaḥ syāt ayam doṣaḥ aneka prakāraḥ tu sa dṛśyate kvacid ayogam vyavacchinatti kvacid aparaiḥ yogam kvacid atyanta ayogam iti prabhedāḥ vyatirecakena hi nipātena vyavacchedaḥ vidhātavyaḥ na anya yoga vyavaccheda aniyamena avadhāraṇa mātram eva hi tasya arthaḥ na ca anyathā avadhāraṇe doṣaḥ katham ayam vibhāgaḥ eka ākāra tve abhidhānasya artha bheda abhāvāt na kevalasya artha bheda upi tu saṃsargi bhedāt saṃsargi bhedaḥ tu 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,21–3.1.5.1.0,24	 viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyābhyām kriyayā ca saha uditaḥ saṃsargiṇaḥ eva ca pradhānam yatas vivakṣāta uprayogepi tasya arthoyam pratīyate yathākramam abhisambandhaḥ viśeṣaṇena saha uditaḥ ayogam vyavacchinatti viśeṣyeṇa anya yogam kriyayā tu atyanta ayogam iti viśeṣaṇa ādi padāni eva ca avadhāraṇam pratipādayanti nipātāḥ tu dyotakāḥ taiḥ tasya eva spaṣṭīkaraṇāt tathā hi ghaṭena udakam ānaya iti yadi kāraṇa viśeṣa apekṣā na syāt karaṇa viśeṣa prayogaḥ vyarthakaḥ bhavet tathā karma ādeḥ api iti avadhāraṇam ghaṭa ādi pada pratipādyam eva tāni ca bhinnāni iti artha bhedaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,25–3.1.5.1.0,28	 nanu teṣām bhedāt artha bhedaḥ eva prāptaḥ sādhāraṇañcau= ādhāraṇam pratīmaḥ ta tonvaya vyatirekābhyām apoddhāra parikalpanayā avadhāraṇa nipāta vācyam eva na tad aprayoge apratīti prasaṅgāt yohi yena vinā api pratīyate sa kathantasya arthaḥ kathantarhi bheda abhidhāyinām abhinnam abhidheyam na ca śabdānām vyavacchedaḥ eva abhidheyaḥ tasya vastu abhidhāyi tvāt vyavacchedasya ca abhāva rūpa tvāt na etat asti vyavaccheda phalam vākyam yatas caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ pārthaḥ dhanurdharaḥ nīlam sarojam iti vā yathā 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,29–3.1.5.1.0,33	 paraspara sambaddha arthaḥ pada samudāyaḥ vākyam atra tu vākyapūrakam padam eva vākya śabdena uktam teṣām eva vyavaccheda phala tvāt tad anyasya vākyasya abhāvāt ca yasya ca vākyasya yat phalantadeva tasya pratipādyam saḥ eva rthaḥ na ca vyavacchidyamāna vyatirekeṇa anyaḥ vyavacchedaḥ tatas vyavacchidyamāna artha pratīteḥ vyavacchedyopi tad anya vyatirekāt pratīyate eva iti vyavacchedaḥ eva pratipādyaḥ atha vastu pratipādyate vyavacchedaḥ tu pramāṇa antara pratipādyaḥ abhāva rūpaḥ ākṣipyate sa ca ākṣiptaḥ eva kāra ādinā dyotyate tat api asat yatas katham anya abhidhāne anyaḥ ākṣipyeta anvayamvinā asambandha ipi ca ākṣepe ati prasaṅgaḥ anivāritaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.0,34	 yadi hi vyatirekaḥ vyatireka vat a vyatirekī tādātmyāt ākṣipyeta vyatirekepi sambandhāt ākṣipyate iti ced na vyatireke padārthasya pratyakṣeṇa aparasmāt avyatirekeṇa pratīti prasaṅgāt tatas abhāva pramāṇantarāt vyatireka pratītau= api tad asambaddha tayā eva pratītiḥ syāt na hi avyatirekiṇā vyatireka sambandhaḥ pratyetum śakyaḥ atha eka sāmagrī adhīna tvāt vyatirekeṇa eva saha padārthaḥ utpadyate avyatirekepi 
PVA_3.1.5.1.1,1–3.1.5.1.1,4^1	 tat ayuktam yatas vyatirekeṇa tasya asau padārthasya anvayāt svayam na hi bhinnasya sadbhāve abhinnaḥ asau bhedam arhati na hi viṣāṇasya iṃdam viṣāṇam iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ dvayoḥ api paraspara vyavacchedena samāna kāla bhāvi tvena pratīteḥ samuccayaḥ eva bhavet na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ paraspara upakāri tvena samāna kālatā ādhāra ādheya abhāvaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya nibandhanam iti ced na auttara adharyeṇa apratīteḥ vyatireka madhye padārthaḥ pratīyate iti ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ iti ced yadi evat na sambandha pratītiḥ na hi yasya madhye yaḥ vyavasthitaḥ sa tasya iti vyapadiśyate na hi ghaṭasya ālokaḥ andhakāraḥ iti vāci apadiśyate ghaṭa madhye vā vyavasthitaḥ ghaṭasya ghaṭaḥ iti
