PVA_3.1.5.1.1,4^2	 abhāva madhya avasthitiḥ avaśyambhāvinī na abhāvam antareṇa paṭa ādi vyavasthitiḥ tad vyāpita aprasaṅgāt abhāvam adhyepi tarhi na sthitiḥ apara abhāvam antareṇa vyāpi tva prasaṅgāt eva na sva rūpeṇa eva hi asau padārthaḥ abhāvam adhyepi tiṣṭhet yā yā madhya sthitiḥ sā adhāra vyatiriktā abhāvam antareṇa na bhavati yathā paṭa madhya sthitiḥ abhāva madhya sthitiḥ api sthitiḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ abhāva madhya sthitiḥ svayam eva tad svabhāva tvāt abhāvasya na hi jatunaḥ kāṣṭa saṃyogaḥ iti tasya api kāṣṭena saṃyoge apareṇa saṃyojakena bhāvyam svayam eva tathā abhāvāt 
PVA_3.1.5.1.1,6–3.1.5.1.1,11	 tat etat asat yatas jatu svabhāvataḥ vahneḥ kāṣṭa yogam avāpnuyāt abhāvaḥ na sva rūpeṇa vyāpi madhya kriyā kṣamaḥ avyāpī sa padārśaḥ ced abhāvaḥ syāt anarthakaḥ abhāvasya api vyāpi tve tad madhye anya sthitiḥ katham svabhāva mātreṇa na vyāpinaḥ madhyasthayati abhāvaḥ avyāpi tva prasaṅgāt avyāpinaḥ eva iṣyante iti ced kim idānīm abhāvena abhāvaḥ hi sāṃkaryam mā bhūt iti iṣyate tat ca svayam avyāpi tvena eva padārthānām prasiddham iti vyartha tā anivāryāḥ abhāvena vyāpī kutas abhāva sahitena vā svākāraṇena iti kaḥ virodhaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.1,12–3.1.5.1.1,15	 tat api asat abhāvaḥ avyāpinam kuryāt padārtham vyāpinam yadi sāṃkaryam pūrvvamasya syāt anyathātvam katham punar na khalu vyāpya vyāpī vidhātum śakyaḥ pūrvvam hi vyāpi tve padārtha saṃkaraḥ atha pūrvvat na asti eva svarūpam eva asya tarhi tathā anyathā adṛṣṭeḥ atha svarūpeṇa na vyāpī na api avyāpī vyāpti prayogāt vyāpī tad abhāva yogāt avyāpī tathā ca āha 
PVA_3.1.5.1.1,16–3.1.5.1.1,21	 bhinnāḥ iti para upādhiḥ abhinnāḥ iti vā punar bhāva ātmasu prapañca uyam saṃsṛṣṭeṣu eva lakṣyate tat api asat yatas anyathā yadi tasya asti pratītiḥ dvaya varjanī tadā anya yogāt tad vastu dvaya bhāj iti gamyate anyathā tu etat syāt sa ca bhāvaḥ tad anyau ca tayoḥ ca tathā paraḥ sva rūpeṇa pratīyante upādhīnām aniśritāḥ tat miśraṇa pratītiḥ ced bhrāntiḥ eva bhavet tathā tathā padārtha abhāvaḥ syāt avidyā sādhakam bhavet 
PVA_3.1.5.1.1,22	 sa ca api upādhimān bhinnaḥ svayam eva upādhibhyaḥ iti vyarthakam apara upādhi kalpanam upādheḥ svayam eva bhidyate upādhimat antarāt upādhitaḥ iti na pramāṇam atra kiñcid yadi ca svarūpeṇa eva bhinnaḥ tat eva bhinna tvam upādhimat antara apekṣāyām api pratyapekṣyam anya deva bhinna tvam iti ced na tāvatā bhinna tvānām upayoga abhāvāt 
PVA_3.1.5.1.1,23–3.1.5.1.1,24	 svarūpa bhedāt bhedena sarvu ebhyaḥ vinivṛttitaḥ apareṇa api bhedena kalpitena atra kaḥ guṇaḥ atha asmāt api bheda usmāt api iti mateḥ bheda kalpanā na hi pramāṇa prasiddham anarthakam api śakyam parikalpayitum parityāga viṣayam yadi evam upādheḥ api bhinnaḥ iti pratīteḥ aparaḥ bhedaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ tasmāt api bhedaḥ iti anavasthā bhedānām sva rūpeṇa bheda abhāvaḥ eva prasaktaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.1,25–3.1.5.1.1,30	 svāgatam bhavatu doṣaḥ nanu ayam eva abhyupagamaḥ na etat asti sva rūpeṇa hi bhedasya abhāvepi para rūpataḥ na bhedaḥ para tā tasya bheda abhāve bhavet katham na hi sva rūpeṇa abhidyamānam para rūpeṇa bhidyate tasya aparatvam eva āgatam bheda abhāve tasya hi svarūpeṇa abhede paraḥ eva na asti tad abhāvāt kathantataḥ bhedaḥ atha bhedakam sva rūpeṇa bhinnam tatas abhinnam api dharmi rūpam bhetsyate tat api ayuktam yatas yadi tasya sva rūpeṇa bhedonyasya api asau bhavet apasarppataḥ hi dūreṇa na śakyam upasarppaṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.1.1,31	 yadā eva tasmāt aparaḥ bhedakaḥ svarūpeṇa bhidyate tadā tad anyasya daiva raktāḥ kiṃśukā stavaka avataṃsakāḥ na bhinna abhinnena bhavitum śakyam na khalu bhedaḥ param abhindan bhedaḥ bhavati tasmāt ekasya svarūpa bhede bhedasya bhedavatā upi tathā saḥ iti na parasmāt bhedaḥ tasmāt sva rūpam eva apara asaṃsargi svabhāvataḥ bhedaḥ iti tādātmyam eva bheda artha svabhāvayoḥ iti bhedaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ saḥ eva tātparyeṇa abhighātavyaḥ anyathā padārtha abhidhānam api na bhavet ākulasya padārtha tva ayogāt artha kriyā kāri hi vastu na ca sakala saṃsarge artha kriyā sambhavinī sa ca padārtha antarāt bhedaḥ svarūpataḥ pratyakṣa gamyaḥ tatra saṃketa karaṇe saḥ eva śabda gamyaḥ iti vyavacchedaḥ eva śabdasya abhidheyaḥ na hi vyāvṛttam avyāvṛttayā abhidhātum śakyam 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,1–3.1.5.1.2,3	 nanu svarūpa gatā sā vyāvṛttiḥ tatra svarūpa an abhidhāne kathantada vyatirikta vyāvṛtti abhidhānam atha vyatiriktā vyāvṛttiḥ tadā asau sva vyakti anugata tvāt jātiḥ eva bhaṅgi antareṇa pratipāditā bhavet tathā ca anugatam eva rūpam pratipādyam na vyāvṛttiḥ iti katham vyavaccheda phalam vākyam na asti etat yatas saḥ eva hi tad anyasmāt vyāvṛttaḥ ghaṭaḥ ucyate na tu sāmānya yogena avyāvṛttasya eva bhinna tā 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,4–3.1.5.1.2,7	 pratipāditam etat na avyāvṛttam svayanta t apara yogāt vyāvṛttam sāmānya yoge hi sāmānam eva syāt tat vā na bhavet asamānasya samāna tā para yogepi na yuktāḥ svayam eva samānañcet vṛthā sāmānya kalpanā asamānasya sāmānyam abhāvepi na tad ātmatā yadi nāma sāmānya vat syāt na tu samānam eva tasya svena rūpeṇa pratibhāsanāt bheda avabhāsane hi sāmānya vat iti yuktam abheda avabhāsane sāmānyam iti eva yadi na bheda grahaṇam sāmānyam iti eva syāt viśeṣaḥ iti vā atha bhedena api pratibhāsanam abhedena api 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,8–3.1.5.1.2,11	 tat asat yasmāt bhedena pratibhāsaḥ ced tena sāmānya vat bhavet abhedena avabhāsaḥ ced sāmānyam tena tat bhavet na hi ekasya rūpa dvayam yuktam bhinnam abhinnañca na tat sāmānyantena eva rūpeṇa vyakteḥ bhinnam tena eva rūpeṇa abhinnam kintu kenacid rūpeṇa bhinnam kenacid rūpeṇa abhinnam iti vyavasthā tat sattya itarat yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,12–3.1.5.1.2,14	 na ca dvi rūpam sāmānyam paraspara vibhedataḥ syātām dve vastunī tatra sāmānyam aparam bhavet sāmānya rūpayoḥ bhedāt vyakti tā eva prasajyate vyakti sāmānya tāpyasya rūpa bhedāt na yujyate yadi sāmānyasya dve rūpe kenacid bhinnam abhinnam apareṇa iti tathā paraspara vibhinna tvāt tayoḥ vyakti rūpa tā bhavet na hi bhinna svarūpāt aparā vyaktiḥ vyakti tva yogāt vyaktiḥ iti ced 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,15–3.1.5.1.2,19	 vyakti tvam nanu sāmānyam tad yogāt syāt samāna tā tasya vyakteḥ abhinna tve vyāpitā na prasajyate rūpa dvayasya kalpe ca prasaṅgaḥ pūrvva vat bhavet tasmāt bhinna tā eva vyaktīnām rūpam tatas vyakti tvena tat sāmānyam atha sāmānya yogāt sāmānyam tatra aparam sāmānyam tatas tat dvayam sāmānya vat na sāmānyam nahi sāmānya vat eva sāmānyam tatas sāmānya rūpa dvaye samānam iti buddhiḥ sā na vyaktau nahi sāmānya yuktā sāmānya rūpeṇa bhinnena vyavasthānāt 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,20–3.1.5.1.2,21	 atha bheda sāmānyayoḥ bhinnayoḥ api kenacid rūpeṇa vibhinna tā apareṇa abhinnatā iti tayoḥ api bhede param sāmānyam upaplavate tathā sati sāmānya sāmānya rūpayoḥ vyakti tāḥ tatas pūrvvasāmānya samāna tā na syāt sāmānya ayogāt anya sāmānyena vyavadhānāt na ekasya api tatas sāmānya yogaḥ iti asamāna tā tatas samāna ākārā iyam pratipattiḥ avastukāḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,22	 nahi sāmānyānām syāt vādinām parisamāptiḥ iti sarvva avyaktaḥ eva pratipatti gocaraḥ parisamāptau= api vyaktaḥ eva na hi tatra sāmānyam anicchatām sāmānya sambhavaḥ pūrvvatra api antya samāna tve hi pūrvvakam sāmānyam tad abhedāt pūrvvakam api iti tatas sāmānya buddhiḥ sa ālambanā syāt na ca evam iti yat kiñcid etat evambhedānām api yadi bhedaḥ bhinnaḥ sarvu abheda vyāpī tatas abhinnānām parasparam bheda yogepi tad yukta tā nābheda bādhani iti sakalam abhinnam eva bhavet sāmānya tadvatām bhedaḥ iti ced na 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,23–3.1.5.1.2,30	 vyakti abhede na sāmānyam vyaktiḥ eva tu tat bhavet sā ca svatas na bhinnā iti tatas advaitam prasajyate tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva sāmānyam nanu avyatiriktā vyāvṛttiḥ yathā vijātīyāt tathā sajātīya abhimatāt api tat katham sā vijātīyāt eva nirbhakṣya śakyā pratyetum sattyam etat yadi svarūpa saṃgrāhī sakalaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet abhinnaḥ na vibhedena śakyaḥ bhettum kathañcana yadā tu punar bhrānti mātrāt api prāptiḥ vyaḥ vahāra jagat gatiḥ tadā nirbhakṣyate abhinnam bhinna saṃsṛṣṭi sambhavi 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,31	 sthāṇau hi davīyaḥ deśa vyavasthitena na bhedaḥ san= api pratyetum śakyaḥ saṃsthāna mātrakasya tatra pratipatteḥ na saṃsthāna mātram viśeṣa rahitam sambhavati dūra deśa tayā tu tasya apratibhāsane pratibhāsa mātrakam samānam sarvu atra utpadyate iti vyakti vyatiriktam tat eva sāmānyam dṛśya vikalpya artha ekīkaraṇena tat eva abhinnam iti samvṛ yā bhavati bhinnaḥ bhinna tā na paramārthataḥ paramārthataḥ eva abhedaḥ kasmāt na bhavati ekīkaraṇa kalpanāyām dvayoḥ apratibhāsanāt astu tarhi bhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ sāmānyasya eva pratibhāsanāt yat ca vyatiriktam pratibhāsate tat vyatiriktam eva 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,32–3.1.5.1.2,36	 tat api asat yatas vyakti asaṃsargi rūpasya pratibhāsena tat bhavet sāmānyam na hi sāmānyam kevalam vyakti rūpavat atha kevalam api samāna tā yogāt sāmānyam tat api asat bhinna sāmānya yoge hi sāmānyānām samāna tā tatas parantu sāmānyam vyaktiḥ eva parisphuṭāḥ bhrānta apratipattiḥ eva tarhi sāmānyam tad vyaktīnām samāna tvāt vyaktau tarhi pratipattiḥ pravṛttiḥ ca na syāt na hi bhrānta buddhi svarūpa pratipattau vyakti pratipati pravarttane yukte ati prasaṅgāt bhrāntyā pravṛttiḥ iti ced na aparasya abhrānteḥ abhāvāt tadā api vā svarūpa pratipattiḥ eva iti na vyakti pratipattiḥ tatas para apara bhrānti abhyupagame anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ eva iti yat kiñcid etat yadi tarhi na sāmānya yogaḥ vyatiriktā itara tayā na api ubhaya rūpa tayā na bhrānti rūpa tāya na api vyakti pratipattiḥ kaḥ tarhi śabda liṅgābhyām artha pratipattau= upāyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,37–3.1.5.1.2,41	 vyavaccheda phala tvena pāriśeṣyāt upāya tā śabdāt artha gatau nyāyaḥ kaḥ iva anyaḥ bhaviṣyati nanu pāriśeṣyāt vastu vyavasthā api tu pramāṇena na ca vyavaccheda pratīti grāhi pramāṇam upalabhyate atra ucyate tad anya vyatirekeṇa pravṛtteḥ upalabdhitaḥ vyavaccheda phalam vākyam iti kinna avadhāryate tad anya vyavacchedena hi vyavahāriṇām pravarttanam upalabdham na ca apratīti pravarttanam tatas vyavaccheda pratītiḥ ākṛṣyate tat hi para asaṃsargeṇa pratīyate pratyakṣeṇa vikalpena ca tatra pratyakṣeṇa vastu svabhāva līnaḥ eva vyatirekaḥ pratyaya viṣayaḥ kalpanānām tu na vastu viṣaya tā tatas vyatireka mātram eva śabda kalpanā viṣayaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,42–3.1.5.1.2,48	 nanu vastu pratipattau vyatirekasya khaṇḍaśas katham pratipattiḥ atra idam ucyate vastu asti vyatireka yoga viṣayaḥ yaḥ kalpanā gocaraḥ sattya asattyatayā tu bhedam aparam kaḥ kalpyet dhī dhanaḥ yat mātrāt vyatireka saṅgama gatiḥ tanmātram eva astu vaḥ sāmānyena yadi prayojana vidhiḥ kaḥ tad viśeṣe guṇaḥ yāvatā vinā vastunā vyavacchedaḥ pratyetum aśakyaḥ tāvat mātram vyavahāriṇām prayojana prasiddhaye prabhavati na ca sattya vastu saṃgatam eva vyavacchedanam pratyetum śakyam asatti asaṅgamena api tasya pratīti darśanāt tasmāt vyavaccheda viṣayam eva vākyam vastunaḥ tatra asattya tvāt 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,49–3.1.5.1.2,52	 nanu vastu sattve vyatirekasya api tat avyatireke tad līnasya katham sattya tā atra ucyate pratīyamānam api etat asattyam iti kaḥ kramaḥ visamvādāt asatti añcet bhedaḥ sattyaḥ na kimmataḥ ayanta avat avyavaccheda vādi anuyoktavyaḥ kim idam pratīti viṣayasya asattya tvam nāma yadi tena pratīyamānena rūpeṇa tat asti eva katham asattyatā atha apratīyamānena tadā tarhi sarvvam asattyam iti asattyam eva sattyam eva kiñcid nā asti iti garddha bhīkṣīrāyitam para pakṣeṇa atha prāpya rūpa tā na asti tena visamvādāt asattyam na svarūpataḥ svarūpa sattya tvepi prāpya rūpa tā arthinaḥ tad abhāve dasattyam eva viparyaya pratītiḥ asattya tvam aprāpya rūpasya yata prāpya rūpa tayā grahaṇam viparyaya pratyayāt aparam evantarhi prāptam idam vyavacchedaḥ sattyaḥ iti yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,53–3.1.5.1.2,55	 prāpyatenya vyavacchinnam pravṛttaiḥ vyavahāribhiḥ vastu avastu vyavaccheda bhedaḥ tatra aparaḥ vṛthā yadi yat prāptam tat sattyam āyātam vyavacchedasya sattya tvam tasya prāpteḥ nanu asatti avastu vyavacchedaḥ tena pratipannaḥ na ca asau prāptaḥ sattya vastu vyavaccheda prāpteḥ na ca anya pratītau= anya prāptau= avisamvādaḥ tatas kutas vyavacchedasya sattya tā koyama sthāna abhiniveśinaḥ asthāna gataḥ paryanuyogaḥ bhedaḥ tāvat prāptaḥ tāvat mātreṇa vyavahāri paritoṣaḥ na ca prāpta paritoṣāḥ vyavahāriṇaḥ para apara bhedam niścetum kṣamā yena vyavaccheda bheda avadhāraṇayā visamvāda samvedana saṅgamaḥ tasmāt vyavahāri jana prītyā avisamvāda uyam ucyate na tattvam avisamvādaḥ parama artha vicāraṇe uktam etat sāṃvyavahārikam eva vyatireka viṣayam pramāṇam prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa iti vacanāt yadi pramāṇena pramāṇam pratīyate anavasthā pramāṇam antareṇa pratipattau prameyasya api iti na pramāṇa adhīnaḥ prameya adhigamaḥ syāt tatas uktam 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,56–3.1.5.1.2,60	 prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa gamyate na tu tattvataḥ pramāṇena matiḥ tattvam anavasthā tathā uditā yatas tatra api vicāraṇā vyavahāraḥ pramāṇañcet anavasthā niveditā apramāṇāt gatau sā eva prameyepi bhaviṣyati pramāṇa lakṣaṇam prāptam vyarthakam sarvu asiddhitaḥ pramāṇena vinā eva iti tat idam na samañcasam tasmāt avicārita sūkṣma tattvam vyavahāra mātram āśritya sarvu atra avisaṃvādaḥ na paramārthataḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,61–3.1.5.1.2,63	 tathā hi itas taṭa mitas vyāghraḥ kena astu prāṇinaḥ gatiḥ bheda abhede avisamvādaḥ dvayepi hi na yujyate yadi pratīyamānāt prāpyam vastu bhinnam katham anya prāptau visamvāda abhāvaḥ avisaṃvādaḥ ca atha abhinnam sarvu ātmanā tathā sati tat api tadā eva pratipannam kim artham pravarttate kim vā prāpsyati tatas na avisamvādaḥ soyamitas taṭa mitaḥ vyāghraḥ iti nyāyaḥ tasmāt 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,64–3.1.5.1.2,66	 vyavaccheda phalam vākyan na vastu viṣayam kvacid evakāra aprayogepi yadā ībhyoḥ tipratīyate āstām tāvat etat kim evam kvacid dṛśyate dṛśyate eva pārthaḥ dhanuḥ dharaḥ caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ nīlam sarojam iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya kriyāṇām prayoge viśeṣaṇa avadhāraṇe ayogasya vyavacchedaḥ viśeṣya avadhāraṇe anya yogasya kriyā avadhāraṇe atyanta ayogyasya iti vibhāgaḥ katham aprayoge niyama viśeṣa avadhāraṇam prakaraṇa vivakṣā viśeṣa ādibhyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,67–3.1.5.1.2,70	 nanu yathā pārthaḥ eva dhanurdharaḥ iti viśeṣya sannidhāne nā avadhāraṇāt viśeṣya antaram vyavacchinatti tathā viśeṣaṇa sannidhāne viśeṣaṇa antaram iti prāptam tatas caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ eva iti sakala guṇa antara vyavacchedaḥ na ca upapattim at etat na ca ayoga ani ayoga vyavacchedayoḥ viśeṣaḥ satyam etat pratiyogi vyavacchedaḥ tatra api artheṣu gamyate tathā prasiddheḥ sāmarthyāt vivakṣā anugamāda dhvaneḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,71	 tatra yadi dhanuḥ dharoyam na vā iti dhānuḥ dvayam sandeha prakaraṇe prasajyate caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ iti tadā tasya eva sandeha vyavacchet aṅkaroti iti adhānuḥ dvayam eva vyavacchidyate anyathā aśrotṛ saṃskārakam bruvāṇaḥ pravaktā na bhavet tatas pratiyogi vyavacchedaḥ eva gamyate na anyaḥ tathā tatra api anya yoga vyavaccheda vākye yadi pratiniyataḥ pratiyogī prakṛtaḥ pārtha rādheyayoḥ kaḥ kodaṇḍa dharaḥ tatas karṇṇaḥ eva vyavacchidyate pārthaḥ eva dhanurdharaḥ iti na rāma ādi vyavacchedaḥ tathā yoga vyavacchedepi yadi prakriyate kim anya upyasya guṇaḥ saṃvi dyate tada sakala guṇa vyavacchedaḥ eva avyabhicāri varjyam caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ eva na paṇḍita ādiḥ pārtha vicāra ipi yadi kim anyopi jagati dhanurdharaḥ iti sandeha prakaraṇam tadā sarvva viśeṣya antara vyavacchedaḥ eva saru u asya tadā pratiyogi tayā prakramāt 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,72–3.1.5.1.2,73	 tad ayoga vyavacchedāt dharmī dharma viśeṣaṇam tad viśiṣṭa tayā dharme na niranvaya doṣa bhāj tasya dharmasya anyena yoge prasiddhe tad ayogaḥ eva aśaṃkyate tatas tasya pratipādanena anya vyavacchedaḥ iti na anvaya doṣaḥ yatas pakṣasya dharmaḥ eva ayam iti prasiddheḥ eva iyam eva asat bhūtāḥ ayogasya pratiyogi tvāt anya yogasya ca viparyāt sāmarthyāt ca ayam arthaḥ pratīyate 
PVA_3.1.5.1.2,74	 na hi anya yoge labdhe tatra avadhāraṇam tatra eva patati virodhāt sandigdham hi nirākriyate vidhīyate vā na siddham pratiṣiddham vā vivakṣā anurūpaḥ ca pratiyogī tathā śabda upīti evam eva pratipattiḥ na hi vivakṣitam anyathā anyathā śabda pratipādana sāmarthyam na hi svabhāvataḥ pradīpa vat pratipādakāḥ dhvanayaḥ iti pratipāditam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.0,1–3.1.5.2.0,4^1	 nanu pārthasya eva dhanurdhara tvam iti viśeṣaṇena api saha avadhāraṇam anya yogam eva vyavacchinatti na ayogam iti prakṛta virodhaḥ na virodhaḥ yatas viśeṣaṇa tvam pārthasya yadi api pratipādyate śabdena na tu tat tasya parama arthena vidyate viśeṣaṇam atra guṇa bhāvāt āśritam dharma bhūtam ucyate pārthaḥ tu dhanurdhara tvasya āśraya tvāt viśeṣyaḥ eva anyaḥ hi vāstavaḥ nyāyonyaḥ śabda nayaḥ iti atra ca prakaraṇāt vastu dharmasya grahaṇam iti adoṣaḥ eva atra avadhāraṇa arthaḥ vyavaccheda rūpaḥ pratyakṣa tonumānāt ca pratīyate vibhāgena iti nā pratīti doṣaḥ anya yoga vyavacchedena hi viśeṣaṇaḥ ekasya tad bhāve anyasya atattvam syāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya yoginaḥ ca nipātasya aviśeṣaḥ yadi pakṣasya eva dharmaḥ kṛtaka tvanta dā anyat sakalam akṛtakam bhavet anyaḥ pradeśaḥ ca na dhūmavān tat etat pratyakṣa anumāna virodhi 
PVA_3.1.5.2.0,4^2	 pratyakṣataḥ hi dhūmaḥ anyatra pratipannaḥ anumānataḥ pratyaya bheda bhedi tva ādeḥ pratyakṣāt vā pratipannam kṛtaka tvam loka pratītyā ca anumāna lakṣaṇayā viśeṣaṇa ādi sahacarita avadhāraṇa artha nipātasya tad arthasya ca ayoga vyavaccheda ādeḥ vvācya vācaka bhāvasya anyasya vā pratītiḥ iti kaḥ tatra anyathā bhāvaḥ tat etat pakṣa dharmaḥ iti samāsa artha vyākhyānam bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ bheda saṃsargau vā samāsa vākya arthaḥ iti vibhāgena pratīteḥ bhavatu pakṣasya dharmaḥ sa tu navadhā kim iti ācāryeṇa nirddiṣṭaḥ asiddha viruddhānai kāntika samyak hetu pratipādana artham hi tāvantaḥ eva nirddeśyāḥ na navabhiḥ prayojanam iti āha 
PVA_3.1.5.2.0,5–3.1.5.2.0,6	 svabhāva kārya siddhi artham dvau dvau hetu viparyayau vivādāt bheda sāmānye śeṣaḥ vyāvṛtti sādhanaḥ navānām api upayoga usti iti navadhāniḥ ddeśaḥ svabhāva kāryayoḥ tādātmya tad utpatti pratibandhāt hetu tāḥ na anyeṣām iti dvayasya nirddeśaḥ tayoḥ eva ca viparyaya sādhane viruddha tā iti aparam dvayam darśana adarśana mātrakāt ana ekāntikasya api paraiḥ aikāntika tvam pratipāditam iti tad vyavaccheda artham aparam dvayam śeṣāṇān tu trayāṇān nirdeśaḥ vyāvṛtti prādhānya pradarśana artham vyāvṛtti dvāreṇa hetuḥ gamakaḥ tatas anumānena vyavacchedaḥ eva sādhyaḥ iti arthaḥ pradarśitaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.1,1–3.1.5.2.1,6	 tatra te nava pakṣa dharmāḥ prameya kṛtaka anitya kṛta śrāvaṇa yatna jāḥ anityayanta jāḥ sparśa anittya tva ādiṣu te nava nanu kṛtaka tva prayatna anantarīyaka tvayoḥ eka tvāt āvṛttau= api aneka tā katham hetu tā viruddha tā ca kathañca nava tvam na hi saḥ eva āvarttamānaḥ saṃkhyā bhedasya āśrayaḥ atra ucyate yasmāt nittya anittya prayatna utthāḥ madhyama trika śāśvatāḥ ayatna aniti anityāḥ ca prameya tva ādi sādhanāḥ tasmāt sarvvam upapannam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.1,7–3.1.5.2.1,8	 na khalu sādhanam nāma sva rūpeṇa kiñcid sādhya apekṣayā sādhana tva lābhāt sādhye ca bheda saṃsparśini saḥ eva ekaḥ samyak hetuḥ vviruddhaḥ ca iti na kiñcat upapannam tena dvau hetū anittyaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti svabhāva hetuḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti ca kāryam katham idam vyajñāyi svabhāva hetuḥ kṛtaka tvam kārya hetuḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavati tad lakṣaṇa yogāt anya lakṣaṇa abhāvāt tu na viparyayaḥ na hi svabhāvāt anyena vyāptiḥ gamyasya kāraṇe sambhavāt vyabhicārasya dvidhā vṛtti phalantataḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.1,9	 samāna vyāptika tvāt kṛtaka tvasya na ca samāna vyāptikam kāryam kāraṇe vyabhicārāt kāryasya na avaśyam kāraṇāni tadvanti bhavanti iti tatas sakalam kāryam dbidhāvṛtti dvidhā āvṛtti ca prayatnāna tarīyaka tvam tatas kārya hetuḥ na hi anityāḥ iti eva prayatna anantara bhāvi jñāna kārī a ārambhiṇaḥ tena tad sa pakṣe dvidhā varttate hetu antara jñāna kārya ārambhiṇaḥ tu sarvu atre eva anityāḥ tena vyāpi tvāt kāryam api jñānam svabhāva hetuḥ eva vastutas tathā ca upalambhe eva sattā ucyate na ca prayatna anantarīyaka jñāna lakṣaṇa sattā tad anyeṣām asattva prasaṅgāt tatas tu jñānam anvaya vyatireka bhāva upakalpita bhedam kārya koṭi viṭaṅkam ārohati tatas kārya hetuḥ tat jñānam prayatna anantarīyaka śabda vyapadeśyam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.1,10	 katham punar gamyate prayatna antaram jñānam anittya kāryam iti tathā ca āha prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kārya samaḥ vyaktiḥ api prayatna kārya abhāva upi tat yathā pradīpa sannidhāpana prayatnaḥ na ghaṭasya kārya tām upapādayati cakra ādi bhramaṇa prayatnaḥ tu tathā iti ubhayathāḥ darśanāt katham ekāntaḥ tathā ca āha bhāṣya kāraḥ yadi nityam śabdam upapādayiṣyāmaḥ tadā vyajyate śabdaḥ atha anyathā tadā kriyate iti na ca śabdam karoti iti karaṇa vyavahārāt kriyate śabdaḥ iti pratīmaḥ prayoga artha tvāt karoteḥ yathā pādau me kuru pṛṣṭham vā iti pratyabhijñā ca śabda nitya tve hetuḥ tatas nityasya sataḥ vyaktiḥ eva ghaṭa vat chavdasya api pradīpataḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.1,11–3.1.5.2.1,15	 tat atad kālayoḥ yasya siddhiḥ asti pramā anvitā upalambhaḥ punar vyaktiḥ vyakteḥ anyat na lakṣaṇam tathā prāk vidyamānasya kutaścid upalambhanam na kārya tvam sataḥ pūrvvamakāri antadāḥ vidi atra ucyate prayatna anantaram jñānam prāk sataḥ niyamena na tasya āvṛtti akṣa śabdeṣu sarvu atha anupayogataḥ yathā khalu prayatna anantara bhāvī ghaṭaḥ prayatna kāryaḥ na kulāla prayatna vyaṅgyaḥ sakala kāraka grāmasya vyartha tā prasaṅgāt sarvvam saru u asyā asti iti na kenacid kiñcid īhitavyam iti anīhitam jagat syāt niyamaḥ kārakaiḥ kriyate anyathā asamañjasā bhāvaḥ iti koyat niyamaḥ nāma yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.2.1,16–3.1.5.2.1,20	 na anya vyāvarttanam vyasya niyamaḥ nāma vidyate tatas vyāvarttanam na asti kāraṇānām śataiḥ api vyāvarttanam abhāvaḥ ca punar tasya kathaṅgatiḥ avidyamānasya punar gatau= udaye e saḥ api ca asti eva niyamaḥ sarvvaḥ satkārya vādinaḥ tatosataḥ na tasya api kṛtiḥ yuktimatī kvacid atha api asya vibhāgena sataḥ vyaktiḥ vvidhīyate 
PVA_3.1.5.2.1,21–3.1.5.2.1,24	 sā api kāryā yadi bhavet tatra syāt kalpanā dvayam yadi asattvam kriyā aśakyā sattva ipi kāraṇam katham sattva asattvantu na ekasya vidyate māna saṃgatam bhāvepi tat sadā asti eva kārakaiḥ tatra kim kṛtam abhāvena kriyāśaktiḥ iti kāraka tā vṛthā tasmāt prayatna anantara bhāvī kulāla ādi kāryaḥ ghaṭaḥ na vyaṅgyaḥ yathā tarhi pradīpa vyaṅgyaḥ saḥ eva kāla antara upalabdhaḥ tathā prayatna vyaṅgyaḥ śabdopi bhaviṣyati na ghaṭasya prāk pramāṇa sadbhāvāt śabdasya tu prayatnāt prāk pramāṇa abhāvaḥ sattve pratyabhijñātaḥ atra api sattvam prāk iti ced na 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,1–3.1.5.2.2,2	 pratyabhijñā pratyayasya śataśas nirāsāt na hi nirastam punar āyāti na mṛtaḥ pratyujjīvati api ca pratyabhijñā kim jñātam sādhayati sattvam atha jñātayoḥ madhya bhāvi yadi jñātam sādhayati tat idānīm jñānena eva prāktanena sādhita smaraṇena vyavahṛtam kaḥ tatra pratyabhijñāyai upayogaḥ pratyabhijñayā idānīm api tat asti iti sādhyate smaraṇantu tad kālam eva sādhayati yathā dṛṣṭasya smaraṇātaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,4–3.1.5.2.2,7	 tat asat yatas yadi smaraṇa sadbhāvāt pratyabhijñā pravarttate smṛterthe pratyabhijñānam anindriya jam eva tat na ca akṣaja smṛtīm uktvā pratyayaḥ paraḥ iṣyate tena akṣajatva abhāvena smaraṇasya apramāṇa tā na hi smaryamāṇerthe pravarttanam akṣāṇām anyathā kānyakubja ādīnām api pratyakṣatā bhavet tatas mṛtānām api pratyakṣata aprasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,8–3.1.5.2.2,11	 atha dṛśyamāna tāyām akṣa vṛttiḥ dṛśyamānā ipi kim pratyabhijñayā smaryamāṇena saha ekatva pratītiḥ prayojanam iti ced tat asat smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvāt tat prameya ekatā katham asattya tve hi dharmasya asattya tvam dharmiṇaḥ sphuṭam na pūrvva kāla sambandhaḥ smaraṇena vineyate rūpa mātra avabhāsaḥ tu vinā api pratyabhijñayā 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,12–3.1.5.2.2,14	 sita pīta avabhāsa mātrakam hi na nittya rūpa avabhāsanam prathama avabhāsanepi tasya bhāvāt atha tatra api nittya tā kāla antara sthāyitā lakṣaṇa pratibhāsate eva na hi tasyāḥ niṣedhakam pratyakṣame āhuḥ vvidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣedha artha vastunaḥ yadi kāla kalā vyāpi vastu grahaṇam akṣataḥ sarvu akāla kalā ālambe grahaḥ syāt maraṇa avadheḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,15–3.1.5.2.2,17	 tasmāt smaraṇena pūrvva kāla avalambanam na adhyakṣataḥ tatas smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvāt tad pratīta vastu eka tā asattyā dharmiṇaḥ asatti a tve asatti a tvāt dharmasya atha varttamānasya sattya tve pūrvvasyā sat tyata āsthitau sattyā satti atayā ālīḍhā tayoḥ syāt ekatā dhruvam dvayoḥ sattyāsattyatāyām tat eka tā api sattya asattyā eva yuktā na asattyā eva tat api yat kiñcit yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,18–3.1.5.2.2,21	 yadi dharmi vaśena asyāḥ sattyā satti atayā sthitiḥ varttamāna tayā sattyā avarttamāna tayā mṛṣā varttamāna rūpasya sattya tvāt tad gata eka tvam api sattyam dharmi rūpā anuvṛtteḥ smaryamāṇa eka tā tu tatas eva asattyā iti prāptam atas vastunaḥ ekatā na sidhyati ekaikatā kathat nāma sattyā ced pratyayaḥ na kim ātmani eva ātmanaḥ kasmāda vyāhatiḥ sva vacasi api 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,22–3.1.5.2.2,25	 atha idam pratyabhijñānam bhinne dṛṣṭena dṛśyate dṛśyamānam tatas abhinne bhavati iti avasīyate tat ayam pratyabhijñā pratyayaḥ bhinnāt nivarttamānaḥ abhinne vyavatiṣṭhate etāvat eva vastu yat uta bhinnam abhinnañca tatas bhinnāt vyāvarttamānam abhedam sādhayati anyathā na syāt eva na khalu sarvvatas vyāvarttitum śakyam tat etasat yatas bhedepi anyaḥ viśeṣa usti tatas yena nivarttate varam viśeṣaḥ tasya eva na tu artha antara kalpanam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,26	 pratyabhijñā pratyaya udaya mātreṇa varam bheda viśeṣaḥ eva asau= iti kalpanam natu abhedasya bheda vijātīyasya adṛṣṭaḥ ca ayam pratyabhijñā udayaḥ samāna ākāra parāmarśa vidhāyiṣu lūna punar prasūta darbha arbhaka ādiṣu tatas paratra api tathā kalpanam eva nyāyyam tatra lūnatā upalabhyate madhyam adhyāsīnāḥ tena na tatra bheda īpya bheda kalpanā na punar atra tathā iti viṣamaḥ khalu keśa pāśa upanyāsaḥ tat etat sattyam eva patataḥ kāśa kuśa avalambanam sthavīyasaḥ sampannam tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,27–3.1.5.2.2,30	 lūna tā nāma vicchedaḥ parāsaṃghaṭanam sa ca tatas pūrvva parityāgāt vittiḥ saṃghaṭate kutas asaṃghaṭita dṛṣṭiḥ ca samā dārṣṭa antika itare aparaḥ truṭayatāyām api mṛtaḥ pratyabhijñānam āsthitaḥ sā upi durātma ātmanā eva ātmānam āhanti vinaṣṭe pūrvvake rūpevinaṣṭena ekatā saha nānā tvepa tathā eka tvam bhavati pratipāditam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,31–3.1.5.2.2,36	 api ca vinaṣṭam akṣasya na gocaraḥ kvacid tatas smṛteḥ eva sa gocare careta smṛteḥ pramāṇa tvam apākṛtam puras tatas pramāṇa anumatā eva nitya tā atas prakāśam smṛtiḥ artha saṃgrahe na vastu idānīm yadi nāma sādhayet tadātanam vastu tu gamyate tayā tatas pramāṇa avagatā hi pūrvvatā tayā saha ekatva viniścayaḥ dṛḍhaḥ katham pramāṇāt aparaḥ bhaviṣyati 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,37–3.1.5.2.2,44	 dṛḍhopi saṃpratyayaḥ utthitaḥ satām parākriyeta iti virodhitā svatas avicalita niścaya pratyaya pratyaya protsāhyamāna mānasopi yadi niścayam eva parākuryāt tadā anyat vacasi anyat asya manasi syāt idam tad bodha sarvvasvam pratyabhijñāna vādinām ati dūram samārūḍhā patanti eva jhaṭiti api ati viṣamam sthānam dūram ārūḍhasya pratyāsannataraḥ pātaḥ nirvvāpa nimnaḥ hi puras pradīpaḥ su dūram ujjvālya vināśam eti tathā hi anubhūta artha viṣayā smṛtiḥ ced naṣṭa tā katham na anubhūta artha viṣayā yadi sā smṛti tā katham 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,45	 yadi anubhūta artha viṣaya tā smṛteḥ svarūpat na atīta smaraṇam syāt na atītā pratyakṣataḥ avagatā atha anavagatam eva smṛtyā avadhāryate tathā sati na smṛtiḥ hi smṛtiḥ apūrvvā artha viṣayā bhavatu tathā api na pratyabhijñānam pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa vastu viṣayam hi pratyabhijñānam iṣyate anyathā pramāṇa tā abhāvaḥ tat eva atītam sat pūrvvam ucyate iti ced tat api paraspara virodhi 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,46–3.1.5.2.2,50	 yadā atītam na tada grāhyam yadā grāhyam na tat tathā smaryamāṇena rūpeṇa tat atītam na vastu tat niścayasya dṛḍha tvāt ca prāmāṇyam upapattimat pratyabhijña nam api evam akṣa yogaḥ tu apārthakaḥ yadi dāḍharyam niścayasya vinā api akṣa sambandham pramāṇam eva tat etat durātmanaḥ vicāra akṣam asya akṣin tamātrakam tathā hi avisamvāda sadbhāvāt pramāṇam jñānam iṣyate varttamāne avisamvādaḥ na tu pūrvva vināśini na syāt yadi tat eka tvam kintatā urtha kriyā na sā 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,51	 apareṇa api dahane na artha kriyā sampādyate eva tad artha kriyā karaṇāt eka tvam tu tat akāri vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam sāmvṛtam iṣyate eva ekam iti hi vyapadeśa vikalpāḥ tad artha sāmarthya mātreṇa samañjasa jātayaḥ na khalu artha kriyā virahita artha viṣayāḥ vyapadeśa niścayāḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ ādriyante tatas tad artha kriyā kāritayā eka tvam pratyabhijñāna viṣayaḥ tatas numānam na tad rūpa liṅgam rūpasya aneka tā tad anya kalpita dharma yogāt iti na pratyabhijñā tattvataḥ eka tve pramāṇam ghaṭa ādiṣu tarhi tad artha kriyā karaṇa pravaṇeṣu kasmāt na pratyabhijñā saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ iti tad samānaḥ iti pratyayaḥ eva pratyabhijñā api ca saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ ānītaḥ tat eva idam śītam udakam iti tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,53–3.1.5.2.2,55	 yadā anyam ānayā iti ukte tad vyakti antaram ānayet tat eva punar ānītam iti syāt niścaya udayaḥ yadā ghaṭāt anyaḥ piṭharikā ādikaḥ āneya tvena vivakṣitaḥ tadā anyamānayā iti uktau yadā tad ghaṭa vyakteḥ vyakti antarānayanam tadā saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ ānītaḥ iti vyavahāra darśanam atyanta rūḍha tvāt tu vyavahārasya anādi va āsanā saṅgateḥ na bhākta bhāva abhimānaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.2,56–3.1.5.2.2,60	 tasmāt na pratyabhijñātaḥ śabdasya ekatva niścayaḥ pratipādana śakteḥ tu samāna tvāt tathā bhramaḥ yadi anyaḥ katham anyatra viśvāsasya pravarttanam na hi anyatra aparijñāte kaścid viśvasiti kvacid ekatvepi na viśvāsaḥ vyabhicārasya darśanāt tad samāne tathā anyatra viśvasiti eva kaścana samāna saṃskāra sambhāvanām avyabhicāriṇīm avalambya viśvāsaḥ yathā tad putra ādau tathā tad upādāna santānepi 
PVA_3.1.5.2.3,1–3.1.5.2.3,6	 atha kṣaṇika tva katham pratidāna icchā eka tve punar sutarām eva na ghaṭate tathā hi bhayena lajjayā yuktam dattasya pratipādanam bhaya lajjā adhikāḥ yasya bhaya lañje tu kiṃkṛte atha tad sannidheḥ asya tat grastasya ātmanaḥ gatiḥ atad grāsepi tad grāsaḥ tasya ātmani api vibhramaḥ kṣaṇa prabandhepi saḥ eva vibhramaḥ kim asya na etat vyavahāra kāraṇam na nittyatāyām api kāraṇa udayāt paraḥ parasya api abhimāna kāraṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.3,7	 ātmānam nittyam abhyupagacchata upi na kārya kāraṇa bhāva kṛta abhimānataḥ yuktiḥ tathā hyātnā na eka svabhāva tāyāḥ pauru vāparyeṇa pracyavate tatas tasya bhaya lajjā ādi vikāra sambhavāt kathambhaya āditas bhayam atha tasya bhayam utpadyate tad yogāt bhītaḥ na asvarūpeṇa abhīta tayā tasya kācid pīḍā kārya kāraṇa bhāva mātram eva kevalam tathā vyavahāra hetuḥ na ca vyavahāra mātreṇa pīḍā pīḍā bhavati putra pīḍayā vyatiriktayā api sambandhāt pīḍitaḥ eva iti ced na sva gata āsya aparā pīḍā iti tena pīḍitaḥ anyathā śatru pīḍayā api pīḍitaḥ syāt tena api upaghātyaḥ paghātaka lakṣaṇaḥ asya asti eva sambandhaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.3,8–3.1.5.2.3,12	 putropi yadi śatruḥ syāt na tad pīḍā kṛtā kṣatiḥ tasmāt pīḍita rūpeṇa pīḍā na para pīḍanāt tatas kṣaṇikatā eva iti na santānāt viśiṣyate ātmā iti tena sarvvoyam vyavahāraḥ tathāvidhaḥ santāna mātrakeṇa hi sakalaḥ saḥ eva ayam iti vyavahāraḥ tena śabdasya na nittya tā tatas katham prayatna anantaram asya vyaktiḥ utpatteḥ eva tu pramāṇa viṣayaḥ tad lakṣaṇa yogāt 
PVA_3.1.5.2.3,13–3.1.5.2.3,15	 bhedāt pratyaya bhedena kārya tā nadhvaneḥ satī na pradīpa ādi bhedena vibhidyante ghaṭa ādayaḥ na khalu vyañjaka alpa mahat tvena bhidyate vyaṅgyam atha pradīpa abhivyaktam nīlotpalam raktam dṛśyate candra ātapa abhivyaktam pītam sitam khaḍga bhivyaktam vadanam gauram api śyāmam iti evamādi tat api asat yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.2.3,16–3.1.5.2.3,17	 vyañjakāt anya rūpa tvam bhāvānām yadi vidyate tad anya rūpa kāra tvāt vyañjakam kārakam bhavet vyañjakena hi tad rūpam hāpayatā sva rūpa viparītam prakāśayitavyam tat tu tasya rūpam avidyamānam katham prakāśayitum śakyam anyathā śaśa viṣāṇa ādinām api prakāśanam bhavet tat api viparīta ākhyātitaḥ prakāśataḥ eva iti ced dattam atra utraram 
PVA_3.1.5.2.3,18–3.1.5.2.3,24	 atha bhrāntiḥ asau tena ayam adoṣaḥ iti ced tat asat yatas vyañjakam janakam bhrānteḥ yadi tat vyañjakam katham prakāśayat hi kiñcid syāt vyañjakam vyañjakam sphuṭam anyathā timira ādīnām api syāt vyañjaka ātma tā na hi teṣām api bhrānti kāri tvāt dūṣaṇam param atha bhramepi tad rūpam aparam parigṛhyate dhvaneḥ tena prayatna ādi vyañjakosya mataḥ satām 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,1–3.1.5.2.4,5	 yadi api nāmālya mahat tva ādikaḥ dhvani saṃsargāt śabdasya bhedaḥ tathā api asau bhrānti kṛtaḥ eva na tattvataḥ bhrāntau= api śabdasya aparam tattvam pratibhāsate eva sphoṭa ātmanaḥ tat api pratyucyate bhrānta rūpāt param rūpam yadi śabdasya vidyate bhedena eva avabhāseta na anyathā bhrānta tā gatiḥ na hi bhinnam abhinnena rūpeṇa pratibhāsitam bhinnam iti eva gami eta abhinnam eva anyathā bhavet bhrāntau= api yadi bhrāntiḥ bhrāntiḥ eva viśīryate bhrāntau= abhra anta tā vittau bhrāntiḥ sā iti pratīyate 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,6	 na hi vibhrama avabhāsi rūpāt apara satti a śabda rūpa sadbhāve bhedena anavabhāsanam upapattimat bhrāntyā na bhedaḥ vabhāsate iti ced bheda upi bhrānta rūpāt aparam śabdasya rūpam tatas tasya bhedena avabhāsana prasaṅge punar bhrāntiḥ eva upakṣeptavyā punar tad rūpa bhedaḥ iti anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ eva sattya śabda ātmanaḥ bhrāntau= api na bhrāntau sattya rūpam eva śabdasya kevalam avasthitam tatas tat eva pratibhāseta iti na bhrāntiḥ nnāma bhavet 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,7–3.1.5.2.4,10	 tasmāt tattva avabhāsi tve na bhrāntiḥ nnāma vidyate sarvu ameya parityāge bhrāntiḥ bhrāntiḥ iti sthitam nanu śabda mātra janita artha pratipatti lakṣaṇa artha kriyā vidyate na tu mahat tva ādi kṛtaḥ kaścid artha pratyaya bhedaḥ tatortha kriyā kāritayā sphoṭa mātram eva sattyam itarada sattyam viparyayāt tat api asattyam yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,11–3.1.5.2.4,14	 na artha pratyāyanam śabdasya artha kāri tvam iṣyate saṃketa bhāvanātaḥ tu tad artha pratibhā udayaḥ vāsanāyāḥ prabodhasya śabda vid kāraṇam matam pāraṃparyeṇa janakam na ca bhedakam iṣyate upādānasya bhedena bhedaḥ na sahakāriṇaḥ tatra api sahakāri tvāt na dhvaniḥ bhedakaḥ mataḥ sa bhāga vāsanā samāgamāt eva artha pratyayaḥ tad artha ākāra vikalpa rūpaḥ upajāyate śabdaḥ tu tatra sahakārī vāsanā prabodvāreṇa pāramparyeṇa janakaḥ tatosya na bhedaka tā śabdasya tu sākṣāt artha kriyā tat jñāna jananam tat ca dūrāt ūra bhedena sphuṭa asphuṭatayā udvegān udvega sahabhāvitayā bhidyate eva 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,15–3.1.5.2.4,21	 tat kathat na bhedaḥ sva artha kriyā kārī tathā ca vastu eva bhedaḥ na bhrānti mātrakam yadi ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ syāt prayatna anantaram jñānam niyamena na syāt prāk api artham kasmāt na pratipādayati śrutasya pratipādana sāmarthyāt anyathā apratipādanañced nanu śrutaḥ evam saṃketa kāle sodyā api anuvarttate tatas pratītiḥ eva bhavet na paścātna prayatnāt prāc apratītiḥ tadā vyañjaka abhāvāt na iti ced samāna kāla vyakti kārī hi vyañjakaḥ tat etat asat yatas yathā samāna kālasya vyañjakaḥ vyañjakaḥ bhavet tathā sarvu ātmanā vyaṅgya vyañjakaḥ vyañjakaḥ bhavet tathā kāla antara sthāyī sa tena vyajyate yadi tadā kāla antare tasye vyañjaka apekṣitā katham 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,22	 na hi vyañjakam aviparīta rūpa avyaktau vyañjakam bhavati na ca kāla antara sthāyi rūpa vyaktau kāla antare vyañjakena kiñcid kṛtam avyaktasya vyañjaka apekṣā anyathā tadā api apara vyañjakam punar aparam iti vyaktiḥ eva na syāt anavasthā duḥsthitāḥ yat api paścāttana jñānāt prāk api anupalambhanam tat api ayukta prayatnāt prāk sataḥ prayatna anantaram yat rūpam tatra niyamena jñāna ayogāt na hi prāk api tat eva rūpam tasmin= eva upalabhyamāne anupalabdham yuktam tasya ca prāgbhāvinaḥ prayatnasya tatra sarvu atha anupayogāt pareṇa eva sarvu ātmanā vyakta tvāt sva kāla saṅgatam eva rūpam vyanakti iti ced kim va etat anyena anyasya vyavacchedaḥ pūrvva apara jñāna eka tve prayatna bhedaḥ pi na vibhedakaḥ aneka tve jñāna kālāt bhidyate jñeyam api 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,23–3.1.5.2.4,26	 atha āvaraṇa abhāvaḥ yadā tadā upalabdhiḥ nna vidyamānasya api āvaraṇa tiraskṛta tvāt kuḍya antaritaḥ na eva kaṭaḥ san= api dṛśyate tad abhāve kṛte anyena punar dṛṣṭeḥ sa gocaraḥ idam pratyakṣatas siddham pramāṇena avadhāritam śabdepya āvaraṇa abhāvaḥ prayatnena vidhīyate satām api āvaraṇa bhāve anupalambhāt tad abhāve punar upalambhāt anvayavi atirekābhyām āvaraṇa abhāva kṛtaḥ upalambha vyāghātaḥ natu āvaraṇe svayam eva na bhavati vikāraḥ vā paraḥ pratyakṣeṇa upalambhāt tad avasthasya eva 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,27–3.1.5.2.4,31	 tat etat anālocita parāparasya parasya vacanam yatas pratibhijñā udayāt eva tatra api avikṛtaiḥ gatiḥ abhāvepi upalambhasya katham pratyakṣataḥ gatiḥ upalambha nivṛttiḥ hi tad rupābhāva sādhatī upalabdhiḥ parasya iti na pramāṇam iha īkṣyate pratyabhijñānataḥ tasya madhyepi yadi sādhanam pratyabhijñā anumānam syāt na pratyakṣa puraḥsaram pratyakṣa apūrvvaka tve hi bhavet andha paraṃparā anumānasya tasya api tathābhūta aprasiddhitaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,32	 na hi āvaraṇa vyavahita anupalambhe tadā eva pratyakṣataḥ upalambhaḥ avikṛtasya paścāt upalambhaḥ nirāvaraṇasya iti ced tadā eva bhāvaḥ avikṛtiḥ vvā syāt madhya bhāvaḥ tu pratyabhijñayā parokṣaḥ pratīyate tathā ca anumānam yatas idānīm avikṛtam tasmāt prāc api iti anumāna lakṣaṇa yogāt tatra ca pratyakṣa abhāve kathantad anu mānam pratyakṣa pūrvvakam sarvu atra ca pūrvva apara bhāvaḥ pratyabhijñā pramāṇakaḥ eva anumāna pūrvvaka tāyām anumānasya tat api anumānam anumānāt eva iti aparyavasānāt andha paraṃparā pareṇa pratyakṣatas pratīyate tena pratyakṣa pūrvvakata iti ced tatra api na pratyakṣatā na hi pareṇa pratyakṣatas pratipannam iti parasya pratītiḥ atha asau kathayet na vacanasya prāmāṇya abhāvāt sattya vādi tvañca na ātmanā upi pratipattum samarthaḥ paraḥ yat anena pratipannam tat eva mayā pratipannam iti na hi para pratipasyā miśritam pratīyamānam tathā pratyetum śakyam tat eva idam iti tatas itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ paraspara kathanena eka tā pratipatteḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.4,33–3.1.5.2.4,34	 atha anumānena pratītiḥ tathā bhū vikāra darśanāt tena api saḥ eva pratipannaḥ iti tathābhūta tā eva tarhi sidhyati na ekatā iti na idam yuktimat na khalu anumānam sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam na hi dhūmāt agniḥ saḥ eva sidhyati yadi romāṃca sambhava ādinā samāna vyavahāreṇa ekatā sukha ādīnām ātmanaḥ ca na kim atha sukha ādīnām paraspara vyāvṛta tayā pratīteḥ nna ekatā tathā sati pratīyamānayoḥ api sva parābhyām amiśrita pratīteḥ bhedaḥ eva yuktaḥ samāna deśa tā api tad pratītyabhāvena pratīyate eva na hi bhāva svabhāvāt aparaḥ deśaḥ tasmāt satām api āvaraṇa sadbhāvena upalambhaḥ iti na siddham etat 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,1–3.1.5.2.5,5	 nanu pratītiḥ asti tat eva para pratipannam mayā pratipannam iti na ca bādhakam asti na ca atra sūkṣma īkṣikayā bādhakamānā iyam yatas utprekṣyeta hi yaḥ mohāt ajātam api bādhakam sa sarvu avyavahāreṣu saṃśaya ātmā kṣayam vrajet na hi sūkṣma īkṣikayā nirūpyamāṇam kiñcid avasthāpanām arhati tat asa tathā hi sūkṣmokṣikā niṣedhena pramāṇasya niṣedhanam nahi pramāṇāt aparā paraiḥ sūkṣma īkṣikeṣyate 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,6–3.1.5.2.5,7	 sūkṣma īkṣikā loka vyavahāra bādhanī na avatārayitavyā iti pramāṇa nirapekṣaṇā eva vyavaharttavyam iti syāt tathā ca vyarthakaḥ śāstra ārambhaḥ na hi sthūla buddhi vyavahāra saṃbarddhana artham śāstra vyāpāraḥ śāstra moha nivarttam iti sarvu ā abhyupagamāt nirūpaṇe bādha kañcet na nivārayitum kṣamam na hi vajram patan mūrdhni pallavena nivāryate 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,8–3.1.5.2.5,11	 saṃsāra vyavahāraḥ ca na anucchedyaḥ vipaścitā yathā dṛṣṭa vidhānāt vā vyavahārasya kā kṣatiḥ andha paraṃparayā eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva rūpaḥ vyavahāraḥ vyavahāriṇām anuparate eva atas eva asya bhāva nirūpaṇena nivarttanam nirvvāṇa mārga ābha niviṣṭaiḥ na hi samvṛti mātra tvāt saṃsāraḥ paraḥ īkṣyate tattvam eve ca nirvvāṇam evam sati avatiṣṭhataḥ na tattva atattvayoḥ bhedaḥ iti eṣā paramārtha tā atattvam iti manvīta tattvam eva avicāritam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,12	 tattvam hi nirūpyamāṇam sakalam advaitībhavati atannirūpeṇa tu tat eva prapañca rūpam atattvam saṃsāraḥ tatas vinirūpaṇāt saṃsāra ucchedaḥ iṣṭaḥ eva āpatitaḥ iti katham hi apavrajyā yā varttana tattva dṛṣṭiḥ tāvat vyavahāraḥ na bādhyataḥ eva tasmāt iṣṭam eva āpatita mayam eva tu vidvat jana vyavahāraḥ tatra śanais śanais avidyā apanaya artham anityat tvam tāvat prasādhyate yatra viparyastaḥ lokaḥ tasmāt yat yadā dṛśyate tadā tat pūrvva apara kāla vyavacchedena grahaṇāt yat yathā dṛśyate tathā tat iti avagantavyam anyathā padārtha vyavasthā bhāvaḥ eva syāt 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,13–3.1.5.2.5,14	 atra paraḥ prāha yadi nāma asat nihitam pūrvva aparam rūpam madhya grahaṇe anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam na gṛhyate sannihita pratyakṣeṇa tathā api na anupalambha mātrāt abhāvaḥ kāla antarem tat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam tadā ca upalabhyate eva tathā hi yatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇam yasya tatra upalambhanam na hi anyatra ghaṭaḥ tādṛś anyatra api upalabhyate 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,15–3.1.5.2.5,19	 tathā yadā upalabhya rūpa tvam tadā tasya upalambhanam na anyadā tasya tādṛś tvam na anyat ā api upalambhanam tat api anālocanam yatas eka tve tasya rūpasya tattva atattvam katham bhavet aneka tve tu tad paścāt upalabhyate iti asat nahi kālaḥ nāma aparaḥ yena tad abhāvāt tatrastha rūpa abhāve tadā anupalambhaḥ tat eva rūpam pūrvva apara bhāvena upalabhyamānam kāla ākhyām labhate tathā hi eṣa kālaḥ varttate asmākam iti śīta pīḍita avasthā śīta kālaḥ na anyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,20–3.1.5.2.5,24	 eka tve tasya bhāvasya kālasya api ekatā bhavet tad kāla abhāvataḥ tasya tatas na anupalambhanam tasmin= tiṣṭhati kāla abhāva asiddheḥ anya tve vā kālasya api nitya tvāt sopyupalabhyate eva pūrvva apara ādi rūpaḥ atha kṣaṇa lava ādayaḥ kalā avayavāḥ tadā kālaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ eva prāptaḥ kālatvad nāma sāmānyam nityam iti ced na kālasya dravya padārtha tvāt tadā api vā pūrvva apara bhāvasya upalabdheḥ sārvvakāli vayā iva upalabdhiḥ atha kāla avayavānām anupalambhāt anupalabdhiḥ tat etat api asat yatas anyasya darśana abhāvāt dṛṣṭasya adarśanam katham adṛśyamānena ekatvam katham gabhyeta kenacid etena atīta sahacāri padārtha upadhānam pratyuktam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,25	 na ca pūrvva aparabhā vi kṣaṇa vyaṅgyaṅ kāla tvam yuktam tasmāt yadi śabdaḥ prayatna anantaram upalabhyaḥ pūrvva vyavasthita rūpeṇa api upalabhyeta pareṇa api ititi ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ tatas ca tasya api pūrvva aparasya rūpasya tadā eva upalambhāt aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ na asti iti kṣaṇikatā eva tasya ca ghaṭa ādi kṣaṇasya sarvu ātmanā upalambhāt āvaraṇam akiñcitkara tvāt ayuktam atha akṣa upakārī prayatnaḥ tadā api sarvu ātmanā upalabdhau pūrvva rūpa upalabdhiḥ ita na akṣa upakāraḥ pratiniyata rūpa upalambha kārī tatas niyamena ana tara rūpeṇa upalabdhiḥ iti na asti etat dṛśyate ca anantaram eva tatas tāvat mātra tā eva tasya na nitye akṣa upakāraḥ tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,26–3.1.5.2.5,29	 saṃskāra topi tasya eva tathābhūta upalabdhitaḥ na saṃskāra ipi yasya asti tatra tasya upalambhanam avidyamānat nitya tvam upalabdhum na śakyate satta upalambhaḥ eva iti na upalambha atirikta tā na hi nitya tvam anyat śakyam upalabdhum nanu yadi nāma na upalabhyate tathā api katham anitya tā bhāvaḥ anupalambhaā iva asatta upalabdhi lakṣaṇasya na ca tad rūpam anulabdhi lakṣaṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,30–3.1.5.2.5,32	 atas eva upalambhaḥ eva sattā tad abhāve katham sat tā iti na nitya tā sambhavaḥ śabda upakāra pakṣe tu sā eva anitya tā atas eva kadācid nirapekṣasya kārya ākṛti virodhataḥ kādācid ka phalam siddham tat liṅgam jñānam īdṛśam yadi asau śabdonyaḥ vā kāla antara vyāpī tadā tathā eva upalabhyeta kadācid upalambhaḥ kāryat na syāt na hi tasya kādicitkam rūpam na ca anyathā upalambhaḥ tad rūpa grahaṇam atha bhrāntiḥ asau na khalu arvāk darśanaḥ vyāpi rūpam upalabdhum samarthaḥ na ca tat asāmarthye grāhyam anyathā bhavati bhrāntiḥ api ca tad avisamvādāt pramāṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,33–3.1.5.2.5,36	 nanu bhrāntiḥ abhrānta darśanena bādhyate tadā ca asau bhrāntiḥ iti śakyam avasātum na pratyabhijñā pratyayena kāla deśa vyāpi rūpa sādhakena vinivarttanāt tat etat asat pratyabhijñāna sāmarthyam prāk eva atra apahastitam pratyakṣeṇa eva bādhā asya bhavati iti upapāditam na hi pratyabhijñā pratyayaḥ pratyakṣam pramāṇam pratyakṣam avyāpi rūpa grāhyam indriya vyāpārāt avisamvāda sambhavāt ca tatas pratyakṣaṇā eva pratyabhijñā bādhanam iti prāk eva upapāditam api ca 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,37–3.1.5.2.5,39	 khaṇḍaśas grahaṇam vyāptau= api syāt yadi vastunaḥ savva vastu ekam eva syāt tasya grahaṇam aṅśaśas yadi vastu ekam api nānā rūpa kāla deśa sambandhi tayā vyāpi anyathā parigṛhyate iti sambhavaḥ ekam eva sakalam vastu syāt vastu vastu iti saru u asya pratyabhijñānāt eka tve ghaṭa ādi bhedaḥ na syāt iti ced śabdasya api tarhi alpa mahat tva ādi bhedaḥ na syāt udātta ādi bhedaḥ ca iti samānam udātta ādi bhedepi śabdaḥ iti vyavahārāt eka tvam api ced ghaṭa ādi bhedepi vastu vastu iti kin na vyavahāraḥ ekatva aneka tvam astu iti ced ekatva asatti a tvam eva tarhi prāptam tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,40–3.1.5.2.5,43	 pratyabhijñāna sāmarthyāt ekatva grahaṇe sati eka tā aneka tā prāptiḥ apramāṇīkṛtañca tat yadā hi pratyabhijñānam apramāṇantada eka tvam pratyabhijñā asādhyam asattyam iti bhedaḥ eva sattyaḥ pariśiṣyate tasmāt abhinnasya na bhinna rūpam grāhyam pramāṇam kvacid asti sattyam bhinne tu bhāve tad abheda siddhiḥ vvikalpakāt eva na tad pramāṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,44	 bhede hi satye sati tad abhedaḥ kalpanā śilpa uparacitaḥ eva pratyavamarśana mātra sādhanaḥ bhedetu asattye kasya asauvabhedaḥ na ca abheda mātreṇa vyavahāraḥ tasmāt bhedena dharmiṇā bhavitavyam yasya dharmaḥ abhedaḥ na hi dharmiṇaḥ asattya tve tad abhedaḥ tathā bhavati na hi śaśa viṣāṇa asattya tve tat taikṣṇyam sattya tvam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,45–3.1.5.2.5,48	 nanu bheda upyabheda dharmiṇī asati kasya pratīyatām tat asat yatas yena eva anya sambandhaḥ tena bhedaḥ saḥ ucyate anyathā anyena saṃsarge bhedaḥ eva viśīryate abhedaḥ tu bheda pratyākhyānena bhavati tasya dharma rūpa tvāt sāmānya dharma vat tasmāt kadācid narapekṣasya kārya ākṛti virodhataḥ kādācid ka phalam siddham tat liṅgam jñānam īdṛśam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.5,49	 yadi na anyaḥ padārtha ātmā atruṭyat svabhāvaḥ sarvvadā tadā jñānam api tathā eva kāryam bhavet yat tu kadācid kārya akaraṇam viccheda rūpantan na syāt na hi tad rūpe gṛhyamāṇe tat rupam eva para apekṣa grahaṇantasya api agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt tasmāt tat jñānam īdṛśam vicchinna rūpantat rūpasya eva kādācid kasya phalam iti siddham tatas kāryāt anitya tā pratītiḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.6,1	 nanu svabhāva kārya siddhi artham dvau hetū nirddiṣṭau= udāharaṇa dvayena iti ayuktam prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti ayam eva kārya hetuḥ svabhāva hetuḥ cetu śakyam upadarśayitum svabhāva hetutva avadayam iti eka vākyatā eva atra vādinām kārya hetuḥ tu jñānam liṅga mita udānīm eva pratipāditam tatas ekena eva tantreṇa dvayat nirddiṣṭam iti vyarthakaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti nirddeśaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.6,2–3.1.5.2.6,4	 sattyam etat tathā api etena eva prasiddhopi su avabhāsya pṛthakkṛtiḥ kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvvam īdṛśam kāryeṇa hi saha nirddeśe tad sāha caryāt īdṛśaḥ eva sarvvaḥ svabhāva hetuḥ sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ eva svabhāva hetuḥ api syāt āśaṃkā tad vyāvṛti artham apara prakāra upi svabhāva hetuḥ asti yaḥ sa pakṣa vyāpī iti kṛtaka tva ādityasya pṛthak nirddeśaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.6,5–3.1.5.2.6,10	 nanu tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvidhā ca āsan= tad atyaye sa hetuḥ vviparīta usmāt viruddha unyaḥ tu aniścitaḥ iti kimartham pṛthak vacanam atra ucyate vyutpati arthā ca hetu ukti rukta artha anumitau kṛtā prabheda mātram ākhyātum lakṣaṇantu na bhidyate pṛthak vacane hi tat eva parisphuṭam bhavati tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvidhā ca yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt ca iti anyathā dvayasya apradarśane dvidhā ca iti etat eva sambhavati lakṣaṇam san= ā iva sajātīyaḥ iti etat tu udāharaṇa abhāvāt asambhavi lakṣaṇam bhavet 
PVA_3.1.5.2.6,11–3.1.5.2.6,17	 nanu vipakṣāt vyāvṛttaḥ bhavatu tāvatā sarvu asaṅgrahaḥ iti na āśaṅkā yuktāḥ sattyam etat tathā api vyutpati artham tasya eva ayam sva artha anumāna lakṣaṇasya udāharaṇa prapañcaḥ tat eva tu lakṣaṇam yat sva artha anumāne nanu tritayam tarhi darśanīyam kārya hetuḥ svabhāva hetuḥ tādṛśaḥ sa pakṣa vyāpī ced tathā ca dhyutpāda nam bhavet na ca udyam etat yatas tena atra kārya liṅgena svabhāva upi eka deśa bhāj uktaḥ sadṛśa udāhṛtiḥ ca atas prayatnāt vyakti janmanaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.2.6,18	 yatas vyutpati arthaḥ prabheda nirddeśaḥ tena anena eva kārya liṅgena svabhāva upi eka deśa bhāj pratipāditaḥ ācāryeṇa sadṛśam udāharaṇam atas eva anyathā agniḥ atra dhūmāt iti parisphuṭam eva kārya hetum kasmāt na udāharati kim yatna pratipādya kārya hetu tvena prayatna ānantarīyaka tva udāharaṇena tasmāt prayatnāt vyakti janmanaḥ kārya svabhāva lakṣaṇasya sadṛśam udāharaṇam abhyadhāyi jñānam api hi prayatna anantara bhāvi svabhāva upī iti bhavati sadṛśam udāharaṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.2.6,19–3.1.5.2.6,20	 nanu prayatna anantaram svabhāvaḥ eva svabhāva antarantu jñānam akāraṇasya aviṣaya tvāt na yuktam etat para abhiprāyeṇa ukta tvāt pare hi śabda nitya tva vādinaḥ jñānam eva prayatna anantara bhāvi icchanti tān pratīdam ucyate viṣayasya api kāraṇa tvam asti eva akāraṇasya aviṣaya tvāt tatas prayatna anantara bhāvi jñānam yat tvayā iṣyate śabdena api tat janayitavya su a ākāra arpaṇena tatas samasta pūrvvā parabhāvi rūpa grahaṇa prasaṅga tasya anyathā grahītum aśakyatvāt na khaṇḍaśas grahaṇam iti pratipāditam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,1–3.1.5.3.0,4	 atha api syāt gṛhyate eva bhāvi bhūta rūpa tā sakala kāla kalā kalāpa vyāpinī anyathā paścāt darśane katham smaraṇam ayam sa mayā tadā dṛṣṭaḥ iti tathā hi ayam dṛṣṭaḥ tadā api iti na agṛhīte pravarttate smaraṇena gṛhīta tvam pūrvva vṛttam hi sādhyate tat api kuca udyam eva yatas grahaṇam na vijānāti mayā bhāvi api gṛhyate smaraṇantu vijānāti tat etat parama adbhutam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,5	 yatra hi grahaṇasya grahaṇa svabhāvasya na vyāpāraḥ tatra tad anusāriṇa eva smaraṇasya vyāpāraḥ iti mahat etat vastu tattva viveka kauśalam na hi bhāvi rūpam grahītum śakyam sandehāt kadācid na bhavet api atha matiḥ yadi bhaviṣyati gṛhītam eva mayā iti paścāt smaraṇena gṛhītam iti viṣayīkariṣye iti pratīteḥ gṛhītantat api iti va sat 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,6–3.1.5.3.0,8	 gṛhīta upi hi yadi arthaḥ katham atra pravarttatām sandigdhañca gṛhītañca paraspara virodhinī yadi tat api bhaviṣyati tadā gṛhītam eva iti mahān grahaṇa vyāpāraḥ vidyamānam hi jñānam grahaṇa svabhāvam anyathā vā na aparaḥ prakāraḥ paraspara virodhāt anyonya vyavaccheda rūpa tvāt pratyakṣepi hi sandehaḥ yadi pratyakṣatā katham grahaṇe hi na sandeha unupalabdhau tu saṃśayāt 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,9	 yadi grahaṇam varttamānaḥ iva na saṃdehaḥ tasya avyatirekāt na ca tadā gṛhyamāṇam bhāvi varttamāna rūpa avyatirekāt varttamāna vat eva atha bhāvi kāla sambandhāt bhāvi evantarhi svarūpataḥ na bhāvānām varttamānāditā api tu bhāvi vartamāna bhūta padārtha sahabhāva mātram kālasya aparasya abhāvāt bhāve vā sā upi padārthaḥ eva sahakārī tathā sati tasya api bhāvi rūpa grahaṇe bhāvi rūpa tā gṛhītā eva iti na sandehaḥ bhavet anitya padārtha sahacarita tvam bhāvi bhūta tvam iti ced na tathābhūtasya grahītum aśakyatvāt katham ayam eva mayā gṛhītaḥ iti smaraṇam svarūpam gṛhītam eva sāhacarya agrahaṇepi iti api na samyak na hi svarūpam bhūta bhāvitā iti bhavataḥ eva idam matam tasmāt varttamāna jñāna grahaṇāt varttamānam eva gṛhyatām 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,10–3.1.5.3.0,14	 nīla avabhāsa jñānena yathā nīlatayā gatiḥ varttamāna avabhāsepi varttamāna tayā gatiḥ atha agṛhīte katham smaraṇam nanu ayam gṛhītepi samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi gṛhyamāṇe smṛtiḥ nna asti grahaṇa anantaram hi sā atīte grahaṇe tasya rūpa abhāve na sā smṛtiḥ idānīm smaraṇam jātam katham jānāti pūrvvatām avidyamānam nīrūpam kathantad rūpa tā smṛteḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,15–3.1.5.3.0,18	 atat rūpā api jānāti smṛtiḥ iti ati sāhasam atha ātmā jñaḥ tadā api āsīt sa jānāti eva pūrvvatām grahaṇe hi asya sāmarthyam smaraṇepi upapadyate smaraṇam grahaṇam ca ādaḥ vyatiriktam yadā ātmanaḥ grahaṇa smaraṇe tasya na evam staḥ atad svabhāvataḥ na smaraṇa grahaṇa pṛthagbhāve tasya atad svabhāvasya grahītusmartṛ tā śarīrasya api prasaṅgāt anitya tayā na iti ced ākāśa ādīnām api syāt tatra asamavāyāt anayoḥ iti yadi matam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,19–3.1.5.3.0,21	 tat api asat samam yasmāt anusandhānataḥ tasya grahaṇa smṛti yogitāḥ vyoma ādīnām api bhavet tulyantatrā api codanam smaraṇam anyathā na upapadyate iti smartā parikalpyate na hi pūrva apara kāla bhāvinam kañcid antareṇa idam yuktimat iti tathā ca ākāśa ādīnām eva idam astu kimartha antara parikalpanā prayāsena samavāya upi evam eva paricodanīyaḥ smaraṇa ādīnām vā nitya tā abhyupeyāḥ saḥ eva ātmani ced tat eva āyātam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,22–3.1.5.3.0,25	 smṛtvā ca katham ajñāyi yatra agrahaṇa saṃśayaḥ smaraṇasya tadā abhāvāt pūrvvatāyāḥ kathaṅgati riti tasmāt na pratyakṣeṇa iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt nityāyām na prayatna anantaram pūrvva anusandhānena grahaṇa sambhavaḥ iti apūrvvā apara rūpa grahaṇāt anitya tā śabdasya iti sthitam etat yat ca uktam svabhāva antaram jñānam na prayatna anantaram iti tat anyathā api pariharttum alam yadi nāma svabhāva anantaram tathā api prayatna anantara tā api sambhavati eva na hi atra ati sūkṣma īkṣikā prayojanavatī tasmāt anena eva udāharaṇena dvayam api kārya svabhāva liṅga dvyam darśitam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,26–3.1.5.3.0,29	 nanu kārya svabhāva hetu udāhaṇam eva kasmāt bhedena upadarśitam na anyopi bhedaḥ atra samādhiḥ yatna antarīyikā sattā yaḥ vā ātmā svaḥ avibhāgavān sa tena avyabhicārī syāt iti arthan tad prabhedanam yasya yatna anantareṇa sattā saḥ eva hetuḥ tat avyabhicārāt nahi vyatiriktaḥ kārya tām virahayya avyabhicārī nanu vyabhicārāt eva hetuḥ na kārya tayā bhasma api hi kāryam agneḥ na ca tasya avyabhicāraḥ tathā kārya tām antareṇa api saṃyogi jalam ādhāram gamayati 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,30	 tat asat yatas na ucyate kārya tayā gamakaḥ eva api tu gamakaḥ kārya tayā eva vyatiriktaḥ kārya tāmvinā na gamayati iti yathābhatamvā bhasma kāryam atītāt api agneḥ bhavat deśa antara sthāt api tathābhūtam gamayati eva atas eva kārya tā prayuktam gamaka tvam yena tad viśeṣāt viśiṣyate evambhūtaḥ eva khalu atra api nimitta nimitti bhāvaḥ saṃyogena tu gamaka tve adhāra upya ādheyasya gamakaḥ syāt atha ādhāraḥ ādheyam antareṇa api āste tena asau na gamakaḥ ādheyantu na ādhāram antareṇa jala ādyāḥ te tatas gamakam yadi avantadeva kāryam gamakam iti āyātam yena hi vinā yat na bhavati tat tasya kāryam na ca ādheyasya sthitiḥ ādhāram antareṇa bhavati atas kāryam na tu sthitiḥ eva kāryat na jalam evantarhi sthitiḥ eva gamikā na jalam iti na vyabhicāraḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,31–3.1.5.3.0,32	 atha sthiti viśiṣṭam jalam eva gamayati jala viśiṣṭā sthitiḥ eva gamayati iti kinna bhavati yuktañca etat eva tasyāḥ eva anvaya vyatirekeṇa gamaka tvāt na ca sthiti vyatiriktam aparam jalam nanu patat api jalam eva bhavati tat jalam na tu tat eva anyat api jalam jalam eva na ca jala tvam sāmānyam asti iti pratipāditam sattve vā na tat gamakam vyaktiḥ eva gamikā sā ca kāryam iti na kārya t anyasya gamaka tvam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,33	 atha ekā eva sā vyiktiḥ iti matam tat api asat tat eva sthitam tat eva anyathā iti prasaṅgāt paryāyeṇa tathā abhāvepi na doṣaḥ iti ced evantarhi pūrvva aparayoḥ eka tā pratīti abhāvāt katham ekā vyaktiḥ nakhalva pratīyamānam itareṇa saha ekam pratītiḥ eka tām sādhayati na pratītya pratītī apratīteḥ bhāva sādhana ayogāt pratyabhijñā tu pratyākhyātāḥ tasmāt sarvu atra nirūpyamāṇā kārya tā eva gamaka tve nibandhanam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,34–3.1.5.3.0,36	 yena rūpeṇa janya tvam jala bhasma ādi vastunaḥ tena eva gamaka tvepi sthitam iti anyatas agatiḥ yova ātmā svaḥ vibhāgavān iti yasya yaḥ ātmā sa gamakaḥ tasya vṛkṣa ātmā śiṃśapā sā gamikā vṛkṣatāyāḥ nanu yathā vṛkṣa ātmā śiṃśapā tathā vṛkṣopi śiṃśapa ātmā eva tādātmyasya ubhaya gata tvam antareṇa abhāvāt na avibhāgavat tva abhāvāt vṛkṣaḥ hi śiṃśapā vyatirekeṇa api asti palāśa ādiḥ na tu śiṃśapā tathā iti sā eva avibhāgavatī gamikā nanu 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,37–3.1.5.3.0,41	 samānepi tad ātma tve avibhāgaḥ gamakaḥ yadi tādātmyam gamaka tve syāt ekantat nibandhanam tādātmyantu vinā api anyaḥ avyabhicāraḥ tathā īkṣyate dhūmasya tena tādātmyam gamaka tve anibandhanam anvaya vyatirekābhyām na hi tasya animitta tā tat etat asat uktam etat na tādātmyam tad utpattī vinā kvacid gamaka avi abhicāri tvam tena te tad nibandhanam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,42–3.1.5.3.0,46	 tat avāntara bhedepi gamaka tvasya bhinna tā tad ātmakasya gamakaḥ tad ātmā eva na bhedinaḥ kāryantat vyatiriktasya kāraṇasya iti bhinna tā atas eva āha saṃyogi ādiṣu yeṣu asti pratibandhaḥ na tādṛśam na te hetavaḥ iti uktam vyabhicārasya sambhavāt saṃyogena gamaka tve agniḥ api dhūma saṃyuktaḥ iti gamakaḥ kinna dhūmasya avyabhicāra abhāvāt iti ced sa tarhi avyabhicāraḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva vyatirekiṇaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,47	 atra paraḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena gamaka tve tasya dbiṣṭha tvāt agniḥ api gamakaḥ syāt na yatna antarīyikā sattā iti vacanāt na ca kārya kāraṇa vyatirekeṇa aparaḥ kārya karaṇa bhāvaḥ tena kārya karaṇa bhāvena gamakaḥ iti kāryaṃtvena kāraṇam na ca gamakaḥ evantarhi kāraṇam api gamakam kasmāt na bhavati bhavati eva na anyathābhāvaḥ sa tu jñātuntathā na śakyate yathā jñāyate tathā agamaka tvemeva tena ca rūpeṇa gamakaḥ eva tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,49–3.1.5.3.0,53	 kurvvatā vahni tā dhūmam kāraṇa tvam avāpyate kurvvatām yadi gamyeta gamaka tvam bhavet api yat tva śakyan tathāḥ gantum iti doṣaḥ na tasya saḥ tathā tat kāryam eva syāt dhūma abhāvāt abhāvataḥ vyāpakam vyatirikta tve kāraṇam sarvvam eva hi evam svabhāva hetau= api vācyam tatra api śiṃśapa ātmā syāt vṛkṣopi gamakaḥ yatas tādātmyam sugamanna iti gamaka tvam na vidyate 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,54–3.1.5.3.0,56	 tathā vā āgamaka tve syāt avibhāga tayā gatiḥ tasmāt sarvvā gatiḥ kārya avibhāga tvena vastunaḥ yathā ca vṛkṣa apāvakayoḥ aniyatam tādātmyam kāraṇa tvam ca śiṃśapā tu adhūmam prati tathā gamaka tvam api aniyata tvena eva aniyame katham gamakaḥ aniyamena gamaka tva nibandhanasya bhāvāt evam hi tad tad nibandhana sambhavati yadi tat anuvarttanam anyathā api tattva iti prasaṅgaḥ saṃyogepi evam eva iti ced tat na yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,57–3.1.5.3.0,59	 saṃyoga ādiṣu yeṣu asti pratibandhaḥ na tādṛśaḥ na te hetavaḥ iti uktam vyabhicārasya sambhavāt saṃyogī ādhāraḥ ādheyena tulya tvāt saṃyogasya samavāyī jāti guṇa kriyā padārthaḥ na ca ādhāraḥ ādheyam gamayati avinā abhā= asya kārya kāraṇa bhāva ākhyasya asaṃbhavāt tathā jātiḥ kevalā api pratīyamānā vinaṣṭāyām vyaktau na jātimantam avagamayati kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya asambhavāt eva 
PVA_3.1.5.3.0,60–3.1.5.3.0,62	 atha ādheyam ādhāram gamayati tatra avinābhāvasya sambhavāt iti matiḥ tathā tarhi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva gamakaḥ avinā abhāvaḥ eva iti ced tat api asat avinā abhāvaḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ atas āha sati vā pratibandheḥ tu saḥ eva gati sādhanaḥ niyamaḥ hi avinābhāvaḥ aniyataḥ ca na sādhanam sa ca niyamaḥ parasya paratra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva gamaka tvasya anyathā abhāvāt iti pratipāditam svabhāva kārya siddhi artham dvau hetū dvau ca viparyayau nirddiṣṭau= iti vyākhyātam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.1,1–3.1.5.3.1,3	 idānīm vivādāt bheda sāmānyaḥ iti vyācaṣṭe bhedaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ ekānta vyatirekī sāmānyam ekānta anvayi tayoḥ anaikāntikayoḥ api gamaka tvam āha paraḥ tatra tattvam pratipādayati ācāryaḥ agamaka tvam tatra yaḥ sanni tyādinā nanu aikānti kavya tirikeṇa āgamaka tvam eva yuktam sattyam yadi ekasmāt eva antāt vyatirekaḥ sidhyati sa tu na sidhyati pakṣaḥ eva vyabhicāra āśaṅkātaḥ tathā hi aikāntika tvam vyāvṛtteḥ avinā abhāvaḥ ucyate tat ca na apratibaddheṣu tatas eva anvaya sthitiḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.1,4	 nirātmakāt vyāvṛttim eva prāṇa ādi katham sidhyati yadi sa ātmaka tvena avinābhāvaḥ bhavet tat ca apratibaddheṣu na sambhavati sarvvataḥ vipakṣāt vyāvṛtteḥ sva mukhena pratipattum aśakteḥ na khalu sakala vipakṣa darśanam yena atra na asti atra na asti iti pratīyāt anvaya mukhena tu sambhavati yatas tat niyata tvena grahaṇam pratibandha grahaṇam sa ca pratyakṣa pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ tatas niyata tva grahaṇāt anya vyāvṛttiḥ ākṛṣyate anyathā niyata rūpa agrahaṇam eva tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.3.1,5–3.1.5.3.1,6	 anya bhāvepya tad bhāvaḥ tad bhāve abhāvaḥ eva ca anya abhāvepya bhāvaḥ na tatas tad kārya tā gatiḥ yadā hi anya bhāvepi bhāvaḥ na asti candana gandhasya tad bhāve bhāvaḥ ca tadā candana gandhaḥ tad kāryam iti sidhyati anyathā na iti nirṇṇayaḥ sa ca vyatirekam antareṇa na astiti vyatirekopi tad ātma bhūtaḥ prasidhyati 
PVA_3.1.5.3.1,7–3.1.5.3.1,9	 nanu anvayopi vyāpī na sidhyati sarvu atra asmāt asya udayaḥ iti na etat asti asmāt eva udayosya iti tāvat mātreṇa tad gatiḥ sa ca anyasmāt anutpādaḥ tadā eva avagataḥ tathā na hi etasmāt anyatra bhavati eva iti etat gamaka tve nibandhanam api tu asmāt eva na anyasmāt iti tathā ca pratipattiḥ asti eva tat anyasmāt prāk anutpādasya darśanāt tad abhāve abhāvam jhaṭiti eva pratiyatām 
PVA_3.1.5.3.1,10–3.1.5.3.1,15	 nanu yadi nāma asvasmāt no tpattimat kutaścid anya viśeṣāt bhaviṣyati na hi anyaḥ iti eva sarvvaḥ samānaḥ tatas na vyatirekaḥ tad bhāve abhāvaḥ iti avyatirekopi na niścitaḥ adṛśyasya api sambhavāt tat etat asat yatas ayam hetuḥ tava evam syāt tava eva ayam anugrahaḥ sva anugrahepi anicchā ced vataḥ eva asi sarvu athā tava evam gamakaḥ hetuḥ anyathā asambhavāt iti pratipādite yadi evam na iṣyate anyā gatiḥ anviṣyatām na ca sambhavati iti sva badhāya tarhi śūla takṣā api ca tad abhāvāt abhāvosya jhaṭiti eṣa katham bhavet anantaram bhavet na evam yadi anyat api kāraṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.1,16	 aviguṇa sāmagrī sannidhānāt tat bhavati eva tad abhāve tu jhaṭiti eva na bhavati iti aniti api śācā ādi kāraṇa tvena sambhavati tat api jhaṭiti eva upayāti apayāti ca iti yadi abhyupagamaḥ sa tarhi piśācaḥ pāvakena vaśīkṛtaḥ iti pāvakasya eva hetu bhāvaḥ yadi anyasmāt api bhavet anvaya vyatireka abhāvāt yādṛcchikaḥ samvādaḥ iti prekṣā pūrvvakāriṇām upāya anveṣaṇam yat pratiphalam niyamena na syāt asmākam tvad vaitavādinām na paramārthataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ nāma tasmāt pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa abhyupagame parisphuṭa anvaya sthitiḥ yasmāt 
PVA_3.1.5.3.1,17–3.1.5.3.1,19	 sva ātma tve hetu bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā sidhyati atas viśeṣe na vyatirekaḥ na ca anvayaḥ na hi atadātmani yatas tad abhāvāt niyamena abhāvavān na hi apratibandhaḥ nivarttakaḥ parasya svayat nivarttamānaḥ ati prasaṅgāt tathā ca na idam nirātmakam jīvat śarīram apramāṇa ādi tā prasaṅgāt iti hetuḥ na hi apratibandhavataḥ nivṛttau pratibaddha itarasya nivṛttiḥ na ca pratibandhavān avyāpakaḥ na ca tādātmya tad utpatti pratibandham antareṇa vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ anyena api prakāreṇa kasmāt na bhavati iti ced na prakāra antara asambhavāt sā upi na prakāraḥ pratipannaḥ eva sādhakaḥ samīhitasya na ca tathā atas vyatirekitayā abhimatasya na vyatirekaḥ na api anvaya iti ubhaya abhāvāta gamakaḥ eva sa ātmakam jīvat śarīram prāṇa ādima tvāt iti 
PVA_3.1.5.3.1,20–3.1.5.3.1,23	 kathantarhi tad ubhaya abhāvāt ācāryeṇa ayam vyatireki uktaḥ tasya api etat eva vaktum abhimatam syāt na eṣa doṣaḥ yatas adṛṣṭi mātram ādāya kevalam vyatirekitā ukta anaikāntikaḥ tasmāt anyathā gamakaḥ bhavet para abhiprāyeṇa adarśana mātra siddham vyatirekam upādāya ācāryeṇa ayam vyatirekī iti pratipāditaḥ na tu niścita vyatirekaḥ anyathā niścita vyatireka sambhave gamakaḥ syāt tathā ca ācāryaḥ na kṣipet anaikāntika madhye tatas ācāryasya na atra niścita vyatireka abhiprāyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,1–3.1.5.3.2,4	 nanu prāṇa ādi abhāvaḥ nairātmya vyāpī sa ca jīvat śarīre na asti iti niyamena vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpyasya jīvat śarīre nairātmyasya nivṛttiḥ iti kathanna ātma siddhiḥ na siddhiḥ yatas prāṇa ādi abhāvaḥ nairātmya vyāpī iti vinivarttane ātmanaḥ vinivartteta prāṇa ādiḥ yadi tat ca na yadi vipakṣayoḥ vyāptiḥ sidhyet tadā aprāṇa ādi nivṛttau jīvat śarīre nairātmya nivṛttiḥ iti sidhyati ātmā vinā api anvayena sā eva tu vyāptiḥ vvipakṣayoḥ sa pakṣa prāpti mantareṇa na sidhyati ātmanaḥ apratibandhe vattvena nivarttaka tvam eva na sidhyati na ca anivarttakasya nivṛttiḥ nivartti anivṛttyā vyāptā sidhyati tasmāt avyāpyasya nivṛtti abhāve pya avyāpakasya nivṛtteḥ anivṛttiḥ iti na ātma siddhiḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,5–3.1.5.3.2,8	 anyasya vinivṛttya anya vinivṛtteḥ ayogataḥ tad ātmā tad prasūtaḥ ced na etat ātma upalambhane pratibandham antareṇa api yadi nivṛttiḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ eva tad ātmā tad prasūtaḥ ced atha ātmā prāṇa ādiḥ sarvvam idam ātmā eva eti tatas vā prasūtaḥ ātmanaḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt na eṣa parihāraḥ yatas etat ātma upalambhane tasya upalabdha avagatau ca gatau ca prasidhyati 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,9–3.1.5.3.2,10	 yadi ātma upalabdhiḥ tad lakṣaṇa tvāt aparopi tad svabhāvaḥ iti sidhyati saḥ eva tu na upalabdhaḥ kutas tad lakṣaṇa tvāt iti hetuḥ sidhyati samavāya upi iha buddhi nibandhanaḥ na ātma anupalabdheḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tu pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ na apratyakṣaḥ ātmani iti kutas tad ātma tva tad prasūtī yatas te ca atyantuparokṣasya dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,11–3.1.5.3.2,13	 na ca ghaṭa ādau nairātmyam yatas atyantam na parokṣa tve anupalabdheḥ abhāvā vid ātmanaḥ asambhava abhāve katham tat vyāpta tā gatiḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya hi bhavataḥ anvaya vyatirekau kāraṇa vyāpaka tva sādhakau na ca ātma upalambhaḥ tatas kathantasya kāraṇa vyāpaka bhāvaḥ tad abhāve ca na prāṇa ādiḥ tad ātmā tad prasūtaḥ iti ca na sidhyati api ca 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,14–3.1.5.3.2,16	 anyatra adṛṣṭa rūpasya ghaṭa ādau na iti vā kutas ajñāta vyatirekasya vyāvṛtti vyāpitā kutas yaḥ hi anyatra dṛśyate deśe kāle vā saḥ idānīm atra vā na asti iti pratīyate iti sakalasya jagataḥ pratītiḥ yaḥ tu na jātucit pratīteḥ vviṣayaḥ sa na asti atra iti kutas ullekhaḥ na hi adṛṣṭe pravarttante vitarkkāḥ kasyacid kvacid 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,17–3.1.5.3.2,19	 tādātmya pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarvu āpekṣaḥ param yadi vitarkkaḥ hi dṛṣṭaḥ eva kvacid aparatra adṛśyamāne pravarttata isti na vā iti na iti tu kutas niścayaḥ yadi paramayam ātmā na bhavati iti tādātmya niṣedha mātram na tu ghaṭa ādau= ātmā na asti iti niścayaḥ vyāpita āyāntu sutarām eva tad vivikta upalambhena yadi ātmā na iti niścayaḥ ghaṭa ādau jīvataḥ kārī api asau na iti bhavatu asau 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,20	 yathā vyatirikta tayā ghaṭa ādiḥ upalabhyamānaḥ nirātmakaḥ iti gamyate jīvat śarīram api tathā syāt na hi tat api tad vivikta tayā na upalabhyate tasmāt upalabhyatā abhāvāt ātmanaḥ na ghaṭa ādau na astitā gatiḥ tena ātmanaḥ ajñāta vyatirekasya vyāvṛtti vyāpitā prāṇa ādi abhāva vyāvṛtti vyāpita ātmanaḥ kutas yasya hi vyāvṛttiḥ yat vyāvṛttyā vyāptā tad vyāvṛttiḥ tena vyāpyate na ca ātma vyāvṛttiḥ asiddhā prāṇa ādi abhāvena vyāptā iti jñāyate tatas katham prāṇa ādi a bhāva vyāvṛttiḥ ātmanā vyāptā sidhyati yena prāṇa ādi abhāva vyāvṛtteḥ ātma siddhiḥ tasmāt na atra vyatireka niścayaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,21–3.1.5.3.2,25	 nanu yathā ghaṭa ādau na prāṇa ādayaḥ iti pratīyate tathā ātmā na asti iti kim iti na pratītiḥ viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ yatas prāṇa ādeḥ ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva asattvam pratīyate na anupalambha mātrāt tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva asattvam pratīyate upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpteḥ prāṇa ādīnām abhāva pratīti rajīvat śarīre nanu evam ātmā iti viparyayaḥ api ca santu nāma nirātmakāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ tathā api na ātmā prasidhyati prāṇa ādi abhāva anivṛttyā 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,26–3.1.5.3.2,28	 nanu yadi ātmā jīvat śarīre na bhavet prāṇa ādīnām api asambhavaḥ ātma abhāvasya prāṇa ādi nivarttaka tvasya ghaṭa ādau dṛṣṭa tvāt na anya abhāvasya nivarttaka tvāt tathā hi yasya hetoḥ abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇaḥ na dṛśyate dehepi yadi asau na syāt yuktaḥ dehena sambhavaḥ buddhi prayatnāt ayopi ghaṭa ādau na santi eva tad kintada bhāvāt prāṇa ādi nivṛttiḥ atha ātmanaḥ iti kaḥ khalu atra bhavataḥ sandeha apoha hetuḥ tatra yasya buddhi ādeḥ kāraṇasya abhāvena ghaṭe na dṛśyate prāṇa ādiḥ saḥ eva yadi dehe na syāt syāt prāṇa ādi viraha prasaṅgaḥ na ca buddhi ādayaḥ na santi tat katham prāṇa ādi nivṛtti prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,29–3.1.5.3.2,35	 atha nairātmyena sādharmyam asti jīvat śarīra ghaṭa ādīnām yadi nāma buddhi ādi sadbhāva asadbhāva kṛtam vaidharmyam api tathā api nirātma tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat jīvat śarīram api prāṇa ādi virahi aprāṇa ādi virahi dharma tayā vā sa ātmakam atra ucyate bhinnepi kiñcid sādharmyāt yadi tattvam pratīyate tadā prameya tvāt ghaṭa ādīnām sa ātma tvam kinna mīyate na hi evam api kiñcit mātra sādharmyat na asti aniṣṭañcet pramāṇam hi sarvu eṣṭhīnāt nibandhanam bhāva abhāva vyavasthām kaḥ karttuntena vinā prabhuḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.2,36–3.1.5.3.2,38	 na hi icchayā pramāṇam api tu yatra pramāṇa sambhavaḥ tatra prekṣāvat icchā na aniṣṭam api pramāṇa ānītam viparyeti svātantryeṇa hi icchā nirapekṣam pramāṇam yuktam anyathā icchayā pramāṇasya svātantryeṇa vinā bhāva abhāva vyavasthā na syāt vādī icchayā viṣaya bhūta sādhya pratipādanam prativādi icchayā parityāgaḥ iti na bhāva abhāva vyavasthā asaṃkaraḥ tepi tarhi buddhi ādayaḥ ātma abhāvena syuḥ iti pratipādayāmaḥ tatas yat uktam buddhi ādi sadbhāve na prāṇa ādi nivṛttiḥ iti tat ayuktam na ayuktam anyeṣām eva tatra pravarttaka tvāt yadi ātma abuddhi ādīnām pravarttaka tayā niścitaḥ yuktam nivarttamānaḥ nivarttakaḥ iti na ca evam yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,1–3.1.5.3.3,3	 smṛti icchā āyatna jaḥ prāṇa nimeṣa ādiḥ tad udbhavaḥ viṣaya indriya vittibhyastāḥ sva jāti samudbhavāḥ anyonya pratyaya apekṣā anvaya vyatireka bhāj etāvatī ātma bhāvoyam anavasthāni akalpane kvacid aniṣṭe tad anyatra vā smṛtiḥ icchā prayatnaḥ ca tatas prāṇa nimeṣa ādayaḥ pravarttante smṛti ādīnām kutas iti ced viṣaya indriya āyatta vittibhyaḥ tāḥ sva jāti samudbhavāḥ viṣayasya viṣayaḥ eva pūrvvakaḥ tathā indriya vityoḥ anyonyaya pratyaya apekṣitayā etāvati hetu pratyaya kalāpe ayam ātma bhāvaḥ pratibaddhaḥ kim apareṇa anupayoginā 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,4	 nanu smṛtiḥ pūrvva para anusandhāna rūpa ātmānam vinā na bhavati tathā hi yena dṛṣṭam saḥ eva smarttā na hi anya dṛṣṭam anyasya smaraṇa viṣayaḥ nanu idam api vyatireka mātram eva katham atopi prasiddhiḥ na hi smaraṇam eka tve dṛṣṭam pūrvva aparayoḥ eka tvasya pratyakṣeṇa apratipatteḥ smaraṇasya ca apramāṇa tvāt yadi api pareṇa upalabdham na smaryate pariviśeṣeṇa smariṣyate na hi paraḥ iti eva sarvvaḥ samānaḥ sva hetutaḥ tathābhūtaḥ sa jātaḥ yena saḥ eva smaraṇasya hetuḥ na aparaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyamāt na hi ātmā iti eva smaraṇam api tu pāṭava abhyāsa sambha visantāna bhāvāt anyathā tadā smaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,5–3.1.5.3.3,9	 nanu na evam ucyate ātmani sati smaraṇam eva yadi smaraṇam ātmani eva sati ātma antare smaraṇa abhāvāt na etat api samyak yatas tad vikāra vikāri tvāt anvaya vi atirekataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvoyam anyathā na vyavasthitiḥ pūrvva anubhava abhyāsa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinī smṛtiḥ tad vikāra vikāriṇī ca iti na ātmā kāraṇam atha nitya vyāpinā vinā na bhavati tathā sati kāla ādīnām api kāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt atha anubhavitṛ smartṛ tvena vinā na bhavati 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,10–3.1.5.3.3,12	 tat etat asat smaraṇanubhavābhyām hi smartā anubhavitā ca yaḥ kalpyate vyomni tad bhāvaḥ kathat na iti avagamyate smaraṇa anubhavānyatha anupapattyā hi smarttā anubhavitā ca kalpyate kaścid na tu ākāśa ādi vyatiriktaḥ tathā ca ekaḥ kaścid asti iti kalpyatām sa ca na ākāśa ādi vilakṣaṇaḥ vyāpi nitya tva amūrtta tva ādinā viśeṣa abhāvāt atha aham iti karttṛ tvena pratīyamānaḥ ātmā nāmurtta tva mātram 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,13	 nanu aham iti pratyaye śarīram eva pratibhāti aham devadattaḥ gārgyaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti śarīram anityam iti ced na śarīra avasthāḥ anityāḥ avasthātā tu para loka ādau na bhinnaḥ iti varam eṣa eva kalpanā na tu vyatiriktasya śarīra adhiṣṭhānam eva ca smaraṇa ādiḥ pratīyate na amūrtta adhiṣṭhitam atha nityaḥ tāvat pratipattā siddhaḥ śarīram anyat hā iti kim apareṇa vicāreṇa 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,15–3.1.5.3.3,23	 tat api asat avasthā saṃhatiḥ yasmāt aparasya apravedanāt śarīram atas eva asmad pakṣa siddhiḥ abādhitāḥ api ca nitya rūpe avikārya ihi smaraṇa anubhavau kutas yadi smarttā tat eva asya sadā rūpam kutortha vid sukha ādinā vikāresya nityatā api na yujyate sukha ādinā avikāresya na yuktā sukhita āditā smaraṇantu phalam yasmāt anubhūteḥ tatas na kim atha aham iti vijñānāt na hetu phala mātrakam tathā hi pūrvvadṛś grāhyam aham smṛtya artha niścitam pratyemi iti janaḥ sarvvaḥ karttṛ tvam avagacchati tat asat yasmāt pūrvvadṛṣṭam smarāmi iti na eva ātma udaya mātrataḥ pramāṇam pratyayaḥ sarvvaḥ tathā satya samañjasam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,24	 yadi ātmanaḥ kāraṇa tā mātrāt pratyayaḥ pramāṇam sarvvaḥ pramāṇam bhavet iti sakalam eva sakalasya siddhimat tatas mahat asamañjasam tasmāt anupahata āśrayeṇa yat utpadyate tat eva pramāṇam tathā ca sati cakṣuḥ ādi janitaḥ pratyayaḥ na anusaṃhinam paricchinatti iti kathaneka tā āgamaḥ pūrvva aparayoḥ sattyaḥ syāt yena smaraṇena ca asya sāmarthyam sandhāne ca api vidyate iti vacaḥ sattya tām yāyāt na hi pramāṇa bhūtam pratyayam vinā ātmānam anya t vā anusaṃhitam pratyeti ātmā tatas aham smarāmi iti samvṛti mātrakam etat atas sāmu ṛtena eva ātmanā sakalam samañjasam eva api ca 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,25–3.1.5.3.3,27	 śrāvaṇa tvena tad tulyam prāṇa ādi vyabhicārataḥ na tasya vyabhicāri tvāt vyatirekepi ced katham na asādhyāt eva viśleṣaḥ tasya nanu evam ucyate sādhyenuvṛttya bhāvorthāt tasya anyatra api asau samaḥ na hi śrāvaṇa tvasya prāṇa ādeḥ ca viśeṣaḥ vyatirekasya kevalasya ubhayatra samāna tvāt tatas ekasya vyabhicāritā anyasya na iti koyam nyāyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,28	 nanu na vyatirekasya samāna tvam viṣaya bhedāt śrāvaṇa tvam hi sa pakṣa vipakṣābhyām api vyāvarttate na prāṇa ādiḥ asādhyāt eva vyāvṛtteḥ nanu sa pakṣāt api vyāvṛttam śrāvaṇa tvam iti sa pakṣa anugama abhāvaḥ pratipādyate sa prāṇa ādeḥ api samānaḥ eva na hi tasya api sa pakṣa āsthitā sa pakṣa bhāva abhāva upanyāsaḥ tad kva upayogī tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,29–3.1.5.3.3,30	 asādhyāt eva vicchedaḥ iti sādhyeḥ titā ucyate artha āpattyā atas eva uktam ekena dvi a darśanam niyamena avadhāraṇam avadhāryamāṇa viparyaya sādhanam anyathā yadi asādhyāt eva vicchedaḥ sa pakṣāt api syāt tad avadhāraṇam apārthakam atas eva bhavadbhiḥ api artha apatya ekena dvi adarśanam atas vākyāt asādhyāt eva vicchedaḥ iti kṛtam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,31–3.1.5.3.3,33	 īdṛś avya bhicārotonanvayeṣu na sidhyati yaḥ hya vyabhicāra unvayena vyāptaḥ avadhāraṇa lakṣaṇaḥ sa katham vyāpaka anvaya abhāve bhavet athavā asādhyāt eva vikchedaḥ iti na idam anvaya pratītim antareṇa pratīyate na hi sakala vipakṣa darśana sambhavaḥ anvayadvāreṇa tu sambhavati ātmani pratibaddha tvāt anyasmāt vinivarttate anivṛttaḥ tad anyasmāt kathantatra nibadhyate 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,34–3.1.5.3.3,37	 atha sādhyestitā na asti na astitā tarhi prāptā iti katham asāghyāt eva iti avyabhicāraḥ yatas pratiṣedha niṣedhaḥ ca vidhānāt kīdṛśaḥ aparaḥ asādhyaḥ eva na asti iti yat avadhāraṇam tat sādhye nāstitvam niṣedhati asādhyaḥ eva na asti sādhye tu na na asti iti pratiṣedha niṣedhane vidhānam eva pratipādayet atha nivṛttiḥ nnāsataḥ sādhyāt asādhyeṣu eva no tatas na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kim nivṛtteḥ asataḥ matā 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,38	 atha prāṇa ādi hetoḥ sa pakṣa abhāvāt na tatas nivarttanam na hi asataḥ nivarttanam śakyam apādāna tva abhāvāt na ca asat nāma kiñcat yatas nivarttanam pratīyeta yadi asataḥ na nivṛttiḥ nivṛtti nivṛttiḥ katham sā api na iti ced nanu nivṛtti nivṛtteḥ nniṣedhe nivṛtti nivṛtti nivṛttiḥ katham asataḥ iti anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nivṛttiḥ iti ca ekaḥ eva arthaḥ yat eva nivṛtti nivṛttim pratyadhikaraṇam tat eva nivṛttim pratyapādānam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,39–3.1.5.3.3,42	 nanu yena saṃyogaḥ samasti tad viyoga īpādānam na ca abhāvena saṃyogaḥ yena na sambhavati sa kim sutarām na apādānam viśleṣa mātrepa ādānam na saṃyoge satī iti api sadā eva pāpāt virate iti etat katham anyathā buddhyā saṃbhāvanā tatra yadi atra api na kimmatā atostu sutarām eva tasya apādāna tā gatiḥ yatra sorthaḥ na sambhavati kadācid sutarām eva tat tasya apādānam yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,43–3.1.5.3.3,45	 nivṛtti abhāvaḥ tu vidhiḥ vvastu bhāvaḥ asatā upi san vastu abhāvaḥ tu na asti iti paśya bāndhva vijambhitam asatya bhāvaḥ na iti nivṛtti abhāvaḥ vidhiḥ eva vastu bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saḥ asata upyasti abhāvaḥ tu abhāve yukta rūpopi na asti viparyayepi itaraḥ iti kim anyat vā andhya viceṣṭitāt yatas anyonya parihāreṇa sthitirvvidhi niṣedhayoḥ prakāra antara tā bhāvāt ubhayat netyayuktimat 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,46–3.1.5.3.3,48	 asati bhāve asattvam niyama bhāvi iti tat eva nivṛttiḥ api vyapadiśyate na hi tatra avidyamānam anivṛttantataḥ avidyamānam api tatra na eva adhikaraṇa tvasya ayogāt na vidyamāna tā abhāvaḥ eva tatra abhāvaḥ sā upi na iti ced na anyonya abhāva rūpa tvāt bhāva abhāvayoḥ kutas pratiṣedhaḥ dvayoḥ api bhāvaḥ hi niyamena abhāva vyavacchedena tattvam pratilabhate abhāve hi na bhāva ssyāt iti yatas bhāvaḥ abhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ tatas tad nivṛttau niyamena bhāvī anyathā bhāva nivṛttau= api yadi na bhavet na bhavet eva tathā hi yadi bhāvaḥ na abhāve na bhāvaḥ eva pratīyate abhāvaḥ yadi na asti eva tatas bhāvaḥ pratīyate sā upi na pratiṣedhaḥ sonupalabdheḥ asattvataḥ dvayoḥ asattve abhāvasya na sattvam vinivāritam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,49	 yadi api bhāva abhāvyoḥ dvayoḥ api asattvantathā api bhāvasya asattvam anivāritam eva evam hi bhāvasya asattvam yadi bhāvaḥ na bhavati tathā abhāvasya api asattvam bhavet yadi abhāvaḥ na bhavati bhāvasya anavagamane saḥ eva abhāvaḥ pratīyate tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ pravarttamānaḥ eva tad vivikta upalambha lakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vidhi bahirbhāvena vyavasthāpyate tatas eka pramāṇa vṛttyā eva anyathā tve anyathā bhāva vyavasthāpanam na prakāra antara sambhavaḥ yat tatra pratyakṣena antaryātam tat sarvvam anyat eva bhāva rūpa grāhiṇā ca pratyakṣeṇa tatra yat na tādrūpyeṇa paricchidyate tasya tena rūpeṇa abhāvaḥ eva na prakāra antara tā abhāvepi paricchidyamāne yaḥ tathā na paricchidyate sa bhāvaḥ eva iti kutas prakāra antaram bhavatu prakāra antara abhāvaḥ sa tu bhāva ubhāvaḥ vā abhāve na iti sādhikaraṇa tā na paricchettum śakyā tasya eva aparicchedāt na hi asan paricchettum śakyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,50–3.1.5.3.3,52	 tat asat yatas nivṛttiḥ yadi tasmin na hetoḥ vṛttiḥ kim iṣyate sā api na pratiṣedha uyam nivṛttiḥ kinniṣidhyate bhavantam eva tāvat paryanuyuṃjmahe yadi tasmāt asataḥ sa pakṣāt na nivṛttiḥ kim vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati na prakāra antaram asti iti evam hi nivṛttiḥ abhāva rūpā na bhavati yadi bhāvaḥ syāt vṛtti rūpaḥ sā api na iti ced na nivṛttā tarhi nivṛttiḥ yatas ayam eva bhavet pratipāditaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nivṛttiḥ tatas kinniṣidhyate na hi pratipāditam tat eva ca niṣiddham bhavitum yuktam tasmāt vṛtti niṣedhaḥ eva nivṛttiḥ iti na niṣedhaḥ tasyāḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,53–3.1.5.3.3,56	 atha adhikaraṇa tayā na tasya pratītiḥ apādāna tayā vā iti na tasmāt nivṛttiḥ iti ucyate atra ucyate vidhānam pratiṣedhañca muktvā śābda usti na aparaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūka tā yadi kaścid paryanuyuṃkte bhavantam nanu prāṇa ādiḥ sa pakṣe na dṛśyate tatas nivṛttaḥ tasmāt asādhāraṇaḥ katham agamakaḥ tathā tve ca aśrāvaṇa tvam api gamakam syāt tatas niyamena asati sa pakṣe na nivṛttiḥ iti vaktavyam anyathā mūka tā atra prāptā 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,57–3.1.5.3.3,58	 atha api bhavet evam eva bhavatu na svayam api kathañcid pariccheda sambhavāt vacanam nivārayitum śakyam na buddhiḥ avaśyam eva kathañcid pratipattavyam api ca yadi abhāvaḥ na adhikaraṇa tvena apādāna tvena vā pratyetum śakyaḥ sadā sarvu ātmanā eva vyavahāra ucchedaḥ yatas sa tāñca na niṣedha usti saḥ asatsu ca na varttate jagati anena nyāyena nañarthaḥ pralayaṅgataḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,59–3.1.5.3.3,61	 nañarthaḥ abhāvaḥ eva tatas ca abhāvasya aparicchede kathantasya prayogaḥ yatas buddhiḥ tena abhidheyena vācakam viniyujyate tasya pratītaye abhāva dvyam etat na sambhavi yadi abhāva mātram viṣayīkriyate vyarthakaḥ eva prayogaḥ nañaḥ anirūpita viṣayasya najaḥ aprayogāt prayoge vā na prayojanam atha yasya abhāvaḥ sa viṣayīkarttavyaḥ tathā sati katham pratīyamānasya eva abhāvaḥ atha anyathā pratīyatenyatha abhāvaḥ tathā hi santaḥ eva kenacid deśa ādi yogena niṣidhyante 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,62–3.1.5.3.3,64	 atra ucyate deśa kāla niṣedhaḥ ced yathā asti na niṣidhyate na tathā na yathā sosti tathā api na niṣidhyate idānīm iha anena rūpeṇa na asti iti api na śakyaḥ eva niṣedhaḥ tathā hi yat rūpam yaḥ kālaḥ yaḥ deśaḥ sa yadi asti kathat niṣidhyate atha na asti na buddhyā viṣayīkaraṇa sambhavaḥ abhāvasya paricchettum aśakyatvāt atha viṣayīkriyate tathā sati adhikāraṇa ādi tayā api anyathā viṣayīkarttum aśakyatvāt avaśyam hi kāraka bhāvena paricchedonyathā asambhavāt atra deśe na asti iti yadi adhikaraṇa bhāvosti viṣayīkṛtaḥ katham abhāvaḥ atha abhāvaḥ atham viṣayīkaraṇam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.3,65–3.1.5.3.3,67	 atha pratiṣeṣyamāna upya niṣedhaḥ kriyate tathā sati sa pakṣa āropeṇa api sa pakṣāt vinivarttanam asti eva iti katham sa pakṣāt avyāvṛttiḥ tena vidhi niṣedha vyavahāraḥ na bāhya āśrayaḥ sambhavati atas vyavahāra ucchedaḥ nanu vidhi vyavahāraḥ sambhavati atas na vyavahāra ucchedaḥ na viṣayīkṛtasya vidhāna abhāvāt ghaṭosti iti yadi sattvena parigrahaḥ tat eva vidhānam kim punar asti iti vidhānena atha asattvena tatas virodhāt na asat asti iti vidhātum śakyam sattvena ced paricchedaḥ vidhiḥ tatra nirarthakaḥ asattvena paricchede vidhiḥ tatra nirarthakaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,1–3.1.5.3.4,3	 asattvena paricchedāt asamarthaḥ paraḥ vidhiḥ tasmāt āśritya śabda arthe bhāva abhāva samāśrayam abāhya āśrayam atra iṣṭam sarvve vidhi niṣedhanam anyaḥ hi pramāṇa arthaḥ anyaḥ ca śabda arthaḥ bhāva abhāva samāśrayaḥ śabda arthaḥ na tu evam pramā arthaḥ pramāṇa arthaḥ hi na bhāva abhāva samāśrayaḥ na hi pramāṇa arthonyathā sambhavati niyata rūpeṇa grahaṇāt
