PVA_3.1.5.3.4,4–3.1.5.3.4,5	 śabdāt tu yādṛśī buddhiḥ nnaṣṭe anaṣṭepi tādṛśī bhāva abhāva āśrayaḥ tena śabda arthaḥ na pramā tathā tatas vikalpa buddhi nirūpyamāṇaḥ viṣayaḥ vidhi niṣedhayoḥ vikalpānām vastu vṛtti niyama abhāvāt na ca sarvvam avikalpakam api pramāṇam vidhi rūpeṇa ced vṛttam apramāṇantataḥ tad apramāṇa tā pratipādanāya pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedha rūpeṇa ced vidhiḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,6	 nanu yadi asau bhrāntaḥ eva pratyayaḥ tadā tathā tvena eva ātmānam prakaṭīkaroti sva samvedanasya abhra anta tvāt na hi svarūpam anyathā darśayitum śakyam sva rūpa hāni prasaṅgāt anya ākāra pratibhāsane hi tat eva svarūpam tatra api tathā iti anavasthā bhavet svarūpasya ca bhāve bhāva upādana tā niṣidhyate sa ca dharmī svena rūpeṇa pratipannaḥ katham vidhi niṣedha sādhāraṇaḥ yena tābhyām sambadhyeta 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,8–3.1.5.3.4,12	 atra ucyate tābhyām sa dharmī sambaddhaḥ khyāti abhāvepi tādṛśaḥ śabda pravatteḥ asti iti sa upīṣṭaḥ vyavahāra bhāj na khalu bāhya antara sva sva rūpa āśrayoyam vyahāraḥ api tu śabda artha āśrayaḥ na ca śabdāt bāhya abhyanta svarūpa pratītiḥ nanu tad vyatirekeṇa aparasya abhāvāt kim adhikaraṇaḥ vidhi niṣedha vyavahāraḥ anya apoha adhikaraṇaḥ iti brūmaḥ koyamanyā apohaḥ nāma yaḥ śabdāt pratīyate nanu tat eva idam ucyate kaḥ pratīyate iti na kiñcid api tathā api vyavahāra uyamanādi vyāmoha vāhī yatas śabda artha lakṣaṇaḥ dharmī vidhi niṣedhābhyām sambaddhaḥ prakāśate vicāryamāṇasya bāhyasya antarasya vā tādṛśasya abhāvepi tathā ca uktam rūpantasya na kiñcana 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,13	 nanu āropita bāhya rūpam rūpantasya vidyate eva na jñāna jñeya vyatirekeṇa aparasya abhāvāt bhrāntam rūpam iti ced tat api yadi svarupeṇa pratīyate katham bhrāntam atha na pratīti viṣayaḥ katham apratīyamānam asti iti śakya madhyavasātum paścāt bhrānta tā jñāyate iti ced prathamantarhi svarūpeṇa na pratīyate katham asti iti vyavasthā viṣayaḥ para rūpeṇa pratipattau pratipatti antaram bhrāntam na saḥ iti anavasthā 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,14	 atha sattyepi tasmin sattya tā niścayāt bhrānta tā ucyate kā tasya sattya tā artha asaṃsparśitāḥ nanu tat eva tasya rūpam katham asattyatā na hi nija rūpa sthitiḥ eva asattyatā anyathā niścaya jananāt asattyaḥ iti ced niścayaḥ eva tarhi asattyaḥ tena tasya jananāt sa upyasattyaḥ eva iti ced na anyathā niścayasya vāsanayā jananāt niścayasya bhrānta tā tarhi iti api na saṅgatam tasya api svarūpe avasthānāt tasmāt arūpaḥ eva śabda arthaḥ kathantarhi asti iti vyavahāraḥ śabda vṛtteḥ asti iti vyavahriyate śabda pravṛtti lakṣaṇāt hi vyavahārāt asti iti pratīyatenyāpohaḥ iti nāmnā pratyāyyate sāmānya ādi graha vyāvṛttayoḥ yadi tu na kiñcid iti ucyate tadā uttrāsaḥ syāt pareṣām atas eva āha sa upīṣṭaḥ vyavahāra bhāj anyathā vyavahāra ucchedaḥ eva syāt iti paraḥ pratikṣipet 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,15–3.1.5.3.4,19	 tathā hi anya vyāvarttanam śabdāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvataḥ paraspara apratītānām kevalā eva atra vidyate agnim ānaya iti ukte anagni parihāreṇa pravarttate pratiyanti api pāvakam śabdāt avastu saṃsparśī vikalpaḥ svarūpa samvedanaḥ udaya bhāgī tatas pravṛtti vikalpaḥ tatas gamana svarūpa anubhavaḥ tatas prāptiḥ anyathā vā iti vyavahāraḥ na nāma vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ kaścid anyathā syāt padārthānām vidhāna pratiṣedhane eka dharmasya sarvu ātma vidhāna pratiṣedhanam anānātma tayā bhede nānā vidhi niṣedha vat eka dharmiṇī a saṃhāraḥ vidhāna pratiṣedhayoḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,20	 yadi dharmiṇaḥ dharmāṇām abhedaḥ tadā eka dharmasya vidhāne pratiṣedhane vā sarvu adharma vidhāna pratiṣedhane syātām na hi tasmin vihite tadā ātmā avihitaḥ nāma tasya api avidhāna prasaṅgāt tathā pratiṣedhasya na hi khalu go vidhāna niṣedhane bheda abhāvena khaṇḍa tā abhāvāt na hi tena śabdena pratipādite tasmin= tad ātmā apratipāditaḥ yuktaḥ pratipāditaḥ eva asau bhrāntyā na avasīyate sarvvam eva tarhi na avasitam iti pratīti vilopaḥ na ca kiñci d avasitam kiñcid nā iti śakya samarthanam vibhāgasya asattvāt vibhāge hi sati evam bhavati na anyathā upalambhaḥ eva hi sattā ucyate tad vibhāgāt vibhāgaḥ eva sattāyāḥ tatas katham ekasya eva kiñci d avasitam na aparam iti 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,21–3.1.5.3.4,24	 yat kiñcid etat nanu kṣaṇikatā aviniścayepi bhavati nīlat niścitam na ca dṛṣṭe anupapannam nāma na tatra api virodhāt tathā hi niścayena yadi nīla tā gatiḥ sā kṣaṇa sthiti vidhāna varjitā na aparaiḥ kṣaṇika bhāva sādhanam māna siddham aparaiḥ = na bādhyate yadi pramāṇa asiddham para pramāṇena bādhyate anavasthā tat api apareṇa iti anāśvāsaḥ eva atha yadi nāma nīla niścayasya kṣaṇikatāyām apravarttanam tathā api na tena kṣaṇika tā bādhyate na api tad sādhanena nīla niścayaḥ samuccayena dvayoḥ api pravarttanāt trayaḥ hi yogāḥ samuccayaḥ vikalpaḥ bādhanam iti samuccayaḥ nīlam idam utpalañca dharmayoḥ samuccayāta vikalpaḥ sthāṇuḥ puruṣova iti dvayoḥ ekatra asambhavāt bādhanam sarppaḥ rajjuḥ iti sarppa tā asambhavāt tat atra nīlanvakṣaṇika vasam uccaye kaḥ doṣaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,25–3.1.5.3.4,30	 atra ucyate bādha lakṣaṇa yogena katham atra samuccayaḥ na bādhyam bādhakena eva samuccetum kvacid kṣamam niścayaḥ hi nīla tāyāḥ kṣaṇika tā parihāreṇa yadi syāt bādhitā eva kṣaṇika tā bhavet tad vivikta rūpa grahaṇāt vivikta rūpa pratipādanam eva hi bādhanam nanu na idam atra iti bādhanam abhāva pramāṇena na ca pratyakṣam kasyacid bādhakam na yuktam etat yatas nati niścayaḥ eva ayam na pramāṇam phalam hi saḥ tad vivikta upalambhaḥ tu pramāṇam niścayaḥ tatas 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,31	 na khalu ayam niścayaḥ svatantram pramāṇam pratyakṣa pramāṇa anusārī khalu ayam na asya anyathā bhāvaḥ yadi nāma kathañcid vivikta pratyaya udayepi na udayam āsādayati tathā api tad yogya tayā eva tasya niṣedhaḥ etat ca uttaratra pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tatra yadi nīlam kṣaṇika parihāreṇa niścitam tena eva kṣaṇikatā bādhitā katham sā pareṇa sādhyate atha sādhita eva tena api tathā api pareṇa spaṣṭīkriyate 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,33–3.1.5.3.4,40	 atra ucyate yadi pramāṇam tat pūrvvam gateḥ aspaṣṭa tā katham na ca spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ sorthaḥ sādhitaḥ ca iti durghaṭam aspaṣṭa tā kathat nāma niścayepi bhavet iyam atra asau spaṣṭa tā anyatra niścayaḥ ayukti saṅgataḥ tasmāt sa pūrvvakaḥ bhrāntaḥ uttaraḥ vā iti gamyatām na hi eka viṣaye jñāne paraspara virodhinī tasmāt eka vidhāne tad avyatirikta sakala vidhānam iti vyarthakaḥ śabda antara vikalpa antara avatāraḥ atha nānā bhūtāḥ upādhayaḥ nānā bhūta śabda vikalpānām viṣayaḥ tat ayam aprasaṅgaḥ tat asat bhede eka dharmiṇī a saṃhāraḥ vihita pratiṣiddhayoḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,41	 yadi parasparam āśrayāt ca bhedaḥ tadā bhinnāḥ eva terthāḥ pratipāditā dharmī ca tadā na aparaḥ teṣām āśrayaḥ iti katham sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā hi nīlam utpalam iti guṇa dravya pratipādane na aparam adhikaraṇantayoḥ tat na sāmānādhikaraṇyam na ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣa tā pratītiḥ pṛthak artha pratipādanāt ghaṭa paṭa vat atha nīlat na kevalam tathā sati nīla rūpa pratipattyā eva dravya pratītiḥ khaṇḍaśas pratīti abhāvāt atha jāti guṇau tathā api sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ adhikaraṇa vācakasya aparasya abhāvāt atha nīlam dravyam eva pratīyate na nīla tā mātram tathā sati eka śabdena dvya abhidhānam apareṇa api tathā iti catuṣṭayasya trayasya vā abhidhāne katham iva sāmānādhikaraṇyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ vā na hi ekena anekena vā śabdena pratipāditāḥ bhinna rūpāḥ sāmāna adhikaraṇa bhājaḥ atha nīla ādi kevalam pratyetum aśakyam tatas na bhinna pratīti vat asāmāna ādhikaraṇyam te tu nīla ādayaḥ aniyata jāti bhāvinaḥ jāti ādayaḥ ca aniyata guṇa bhāvinaḥ tatas niyata tva pratipādanāya śabda antara prayogaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,42–3.1.5.3.4,44	 tat asat pratyakṣāt vyatirikta tvam nīla ādeḥ gamyate na ced śabdena api saḥ eva arthaḥ pratīyeta anyathā katham yadi pratyakṣe niṣkṛṣṭam nīla ādi na pratibhāsate śabdāt api tathā eva pratibhāsatām tatra eva sambandha pratipatteḥ atha parokṣa tayā tathā na pratītiḥ pratīyamānam katham parokṣam asat nihita tvāt ced na asannihitepi śabda jñāna vṛtteḥ akṣa vyāpāra abhāvāt iti ced na akṣam eva pratīti kāraṇam svarūpa pratyāyanaḥ ced akṣā nakṣayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ yatra ca sannidhānam tatra katham anyathā pratītiḥ akṣa vyāpāra abhāvaḥ tu na kiñcadvihanti spaṣṭa tām vihanti iti ced nanu yadi nāma spaṣṭa tā abhāvaḥ tathā api nīla tā pratiniyata dravya āveśena eva pratyāyyāḥ katham anyathā pratyeyāḥ tathā ca pada antara prayoga abhāvaḥ atha aniyata dravya vṛttayaḥ nīla ādayaḥ tathā sati nīlam api aniyatam nīla śabdāt gamyate utpalam api tad vācaka tvāt tatas 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,45–3.1.5.3.4,47	 punar api na sāmānādhikaraṇyam dvayoḥ aniyata vācakayoḥ eka artha pratipādana asambhavāt paraspara vyavacchedāt evam pratītiḥ iti api na saṅgatam upāttasya vyavacchedaḥ katham anyonyataḥ bhavet vyavaccheda kriyāyām hi sānya apohasya vācya tā yadi aniyatam nīla ādi śabda pratipādyam na punar anyena niyantum śakyam na hi pratyakṣe pratipannam anyena vivarttyate bhrānta tā prasaṅgāt saṃśayaḥ tarhi śabda antarāt nivarttyate samuccayena hi pratipāditam aśakyam nivarttayitum yadā tu vikalpaḥ kim nīlam utpalam atha anyat iti tadā vikalpasya nivarttanam śabda antarāt upapannam 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,48–3.1.5.3.4,50	 tat api asat yatas vikalpa upi hi yadi arthaḥ sattyaḥ tad śabdataḥ gataḥ nivarttanam kutasyasya śabda antara samāgame yadi asau= arthaḥ eva asattyaḥ kalpanā viṣayaḥ kim apareṇa anyathā karttum śakyaḥ dvayoḥ api pramāṇa tvāt atha tena sandigdha rūpaḥ eva pratipāditaḥ sandigdha rūpa tā ca dṛḍha pratyaya nivarttyatā eva tata upareṇa nivarttanam upapannam na hi tathābhūtaḥ eva na tathābhūtaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.3.4,51–3.1.5.3.4,57	 tat api asat nivarttyatā hi tena eva śabdena pratipāditā tatas parasya śabdasya kim vidheyam bhaviṣyati nanu pūrvva pratyayena niyamena nivarttyatā pratipādita apareṇa tu niyamena iti asti upayogaḥ tat api asat yatas yaḥ pramāṇa bala āyātaḥ aniyamaḥ sonyathā katham māna antara gatena api śakyaḥ karttum iti sthitam tasmāt apramāṇa tā eva pūrvvasya parasya vā tatas asādhaka tvāt parasya api tathā bhūta tvāt sāmānya mātra vacane param vyartham 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,1–3.1.5.4.0,2	 atha anumānam bādhakam eva na tasya api pratyakṣeṇa bādhanāt na anumānāt tīkṣṇa jvālā ādi viśeṣaṇa parigrahaḥ tatas tatra api sandehaḥ eva sāmānyena sandehaḥ iti ced na sāmānya pratipatteḥ sandeha rūpa tvāt aniyata viśeṣa pratipattiḥ hi sāmānya pratipattiḥ na hi ākāra niyama sambhavi sāmānyam tathā hi sāmānyam yatra tatra asti vyaktiḥ evam vidhā iti na pratītiḥ tena sāmānya jñānam sarvvam upaplavaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,3–3.1.5.4.0,5	 tadā kim aparatra anupaplavena api na hi sāmānyam pratīyamānam api vyakti pratiniyama pratiniyata pratītim ākarṣati tatas sāmānya pratītiḥ upaplutā vyaktau= upaplatā na sāmānyaḥ iti ced tat asat vyaktau= upaplatā sā ced sāmānyam kva upayujyate na sāmānyam kvacid vāha doha ādau= upayoga vat yad arthaḥ ca ayam ārambhaḥ tatra ced tad upaplavaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,6	 nanu sāmānya pratipattim antareṇa saḥ eva vyakti viṣayaḥ vikalpa upaplavaḥ na yuktaḥ nanu sāmānya niścaya ipi tat eva sāmānyam niścitam bhavet katham aparatra saṃśayaḥ na anyasmin niścite paratra sandehaḥ yuktaḥ sarvu atra niścaye saru u asan deha prasaṅgāt atha api syāt sambhavinaḥ eva arthasya sandeha viṣaya tā na aparasya tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,7–3.1.5.4.0,10	 yaḥ yatra sambhavī dṛṣṭaḥ sa yatra vyabhicāra bhāj tad darśanena tatra eva saṃśayaḥ saṃpravarttate saṃśayaḥ hi sambhavini vyabhicāriṇi na upapannaḥ sāmānye ca yatra yaḥ sambhavati tatra dṛśyamāne tatra saṃdehaḥ go tve niścite śāvaleya ādau= aśva tve karkādau= iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ tat etat asat yatas śavaleya ādi sandigdha rūpa pratyaya mātrakāt pratītiḥ nnāparasya atra katham sāmānya kalpanā 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,11–3.1.5.4.0,14	 kim ayam śāvaleyaḥ atha vāhuleyaḥ garjita mātrakam eva śrūyate śāvaleya ādi viśeṣam tu na avadhārayāmaḥ iti śāvaleya ādi ākāra vikalpakam eva kevalam lokaḥ pratyeti evam anyat api sāmānya vikalpanam draṣṭavyam athavā anādi vāsanā saṅgi sāmānya ākāra vittitaḥ vikalpa upamataḥ sāmya padārthasya na kalpanā tasmāt na bāhya āśrayaḥ vidhi niṣedha vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi ayogāt atha upādhaye eva kevalāḥ śabdaiḥ vvikalpaiḥ ca pratīyante lakṣita lakṣaṇena tu tad upādhimataḥ pratītiḥ liṅgatā tarhi upādhi vibhāgānām tatas liṅgena niścite dravye na sandehaḥ iti kim apara upādhi pratyāyanena dravyam na jñāyate kimbhūtam iti tad artham apara upādhi pratipādanam 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,15–3.1.5.4.0,18	 tat asat yadi eka upādhinā saḥ arthaḥ pratītaḥ sva svarūpataḥ upādhi antara samvittiḥ aparam kim kariṣyati atha anyathā pratīta usau= eka upādhi samāgame upādhi antara saṃsargaḥ param karttum aśaktikaḥ atha udhi antara yoga mātrakam eva śabda antara pratipādyam na tasya viśeṣaḥ tathā sati kevala pratipādane katham artha kriyāyāḥ prasiddhiḥ na khalu artha kriyā upādhinā eva kevalena vidhātum śakyā atha tad vāreṇa upādhimataḥ pratītiḥ na pūrvva upādhinā eva pratipādanāt atha pūrvva upādhina upādhi antara rahitasya pratipādanam tathā ca svayam eva abhyadhāyi na sa śakyaḥ tatonyena iti 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,19	 nanu yadi anya upādhinā saḥ anyathā pramāṇa bhūta pratyaya pratipādyaḥ kṛtaḥ katham upādhi antara sahasreḥ api anyathā vidhīyeta na hi pramāṇena vihitam anyathā pramāṇena anyena vidhātum śakyam samavāya sambandhāt hi sakala upādhi avapṛktaḥ eva vyavasthitaḥ tat katham anyathā pratyetum śakyam pratipādane vā tat eva tasya rūpam katham anyena anyathā vidhānam atha na eva anyena anyathā vidhānam api tu adhyāra upamātram anyatas bhavati tad anya nivṛttiḥ tu asambhava niyamāt na hi tad dharma yuktañca syāt tad anya dharma yuktañca iti 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,20–3.1.5.4.0,23	 tat asattyam yatas prāptiḥ paśu antarāṇāñcet pramāṇena upapāditā na adhyāra upasahasrepi tasyāḥ śakyam nivarttanam atha api aprāptiḥ anyeṣām tad arthasya eva mānataḥ kim upādhi antareṇa atra nivarttyam na hi kiñcana tasmāt abhra anta pratyayena sakalam eva pratyeyam pratyakṣa pramāṇa vat tatas para upādhi pratipādanam vyartham yadi tu pṛthak eva upādhayaḥ pṛthak upādhimān= tatas upādhi pratipādana mātrāt alakṣita lakṣaṇāt eka dharmiṇī a saṃhāraḥ eva atha upādhi pratipādana īpi upādhimatām tathā sati punar api ekopādhinā pratīteḥ sarvvā upādhi grahaṇam na hi prapyakṣeṇa na tathā āgrahaḥ atha pratyakṣeṇa api kadācid saṃsthāna mātrasya grahaṇam dūrāt saṃnirṣe tu varṇṇa sākṣāt 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,24–3.1.5.4.0,31	 tat api ayuktam varṇṇa saṃsthāna mātrasya grahaḥ dravyamvinā yadi kadācid api na dravyam grāhyam prāptam na vastu tat atha saṃsthānam adravyam grahītum na hi śakyate varṇṇa upya dravyakaḥ na iti tatas dravyam param katham tasmāt na sāmānya ādhikaraṇyam bhavatām api kathantat iti ced tat āha ekam dharmiṇam uddiśya nānā dharma samāśrayam vidhau= ekasya tad bhājām iva anyeṣām upekṣakam niṣedhe tad viviktañca tad anyeṣām apekṣakam vyavahāram asatya artham prakalpayati dhīḥ yathā tam tathā eva avikalpya artha bheda āśrayam upāgatāḥ anādi vāsanā udbhatam bādhanterthaṃna laukikam 
PVA_3.1.5.4.0,32	 na khalu asmāka mayam pāramārthikaḥ vyavahāraḥ sāma anadhi karaṇya ādi viṣayaḥ śabda artham āśritya avastu sanniveśinam pravarttanāt tathā hi śabdaḥ iti aśabda vyāvṛtti apekṣayā dharmi tayā vyavasthāpanam śabda śabda arthasya sa ca śabdaḥ pratyabhijñāna balāt sadā sthāyitayā svīkṛtaḥ kṛtaka tā bahirbhāve na ca tatas pratibhāsitam apya nitya tvam viparyasta vyavahāra apahārāt anupalabdham iva asat iti iva vyavasthāpitam tatas anitya tā sādhaka pramāṇāt apara vyavahāra pravarttane na viparyaya vyavahāra viṣaya apahārāt tadā sattvena vyavasthāpitam vihitam iti pratīyate tatas sa śabda śabda arthaḥ dharmī tad bhāja ātma bhāvena pratipannaḥ niṣedhe ca tad apasāritam tatas tad vivikta tayā pratipattau tad viparyasta dharma apekṣaka tayā pratīyate pratītayaḥ eva vidhi niṣedhavatyaḥ kevalam na bhāvaḥ tathā abhatarūpataḥ calati tathā hi evam eva mayā pratipannaḥ prāk iti sā eva pratipattiḥ pratyakṣā tathātvena vyavahāra viṣaya tām āpāditā na tu tatra vikalpaiḥ apara aparaiḥ vihitam niṣiddham vā kiñcid 
PVA_3.1.5.4.1,1–3.1.5.4.1,3	 na khalu vikalpā atīta pratipatti rūpa saṃsparśinaḥ tadā tasyāḥ abhāvāt atas eva anya apohaḥ śabda vikalpa arthaḥ bhrānti mātra vyāvarttanāt yadā tarhi na bhrānteḥ avatāraḥ pratyakṣa anantaram eva ghaṭoyam iti vikalpaḥ akasmāt ca dhūmāt agni pratipattiḥ tatra katham anya apoha śabda artha tā na idam api sādhīyaḥ tathā hi avṛtti viṣayaḥ vahniḥ pravṛtteḥ vviṣayīkṛtaḥ avṛtti viṣaya tvasya tatra api vinivarttanam 
PVA_3.1.5.4.1,4	 tathā hi vahni niścayaḥ prāha pravṛtti viṣayoyam agniḥ kim audāsīnyam atra bhavataḥ iti tad audāsīni aviṣaya tā nivarttana mātrakam vikalpasya arthaḥ na hi tatra vahniḥ svarūpeṇa pratīyate na ca anyathā pratipatti pratītiḥ pratipattiḥ nna ca pratyakṣa uttara kāla bhāvinā vastu vikalpena nīlam śabda viṣayam pratipannam pūrvva apara rūpa asannidhānāt idantat iti nu vikalpaḥ eva na bhavati mānasa pratyakṣa tvāt atha kṣaṇika tā tena na pratipannā tatas na pratyakṣatā na varttamāna tā pratipattiḥ eva kṣaṇika tā pratipattiḥ iti niveditam nivedayiṣyate tasmāt anya apoha āśrayeṇa dharma dharmi bhāva sāmāna adhikaraṇyā ādi vyavahārāḥ artha bhede hi vyavahāra viṣaye sarvvam upapannam tasya eva sarvu atas vyāvṛtteḥ nna hi vyāvṛttiḥ tasmāt anyāyena eka artha upasaṃhāraḥ na syāt kathantarhi śabdasya anitya tvam iti bheda nibandhanā vibhaktiḥ śilāputrakasya śarīram iti yathā 
PVA_3.1.5.4.1,5–3.1.5.4.1,9	 nanu vyāvṛttīnām abhinna tvāt kathambhedaḥ na hi vastunaḥ vyāvṛttayaḥ bhidyante na eṣa doṣaḥ samvṛtyā bheditā tāsām parama artha tayā na sā tena śabda artha tā bheda abheda rūpa nibandhanam parama arthapekṣayā na kadācid bhedaḥ samvṛtyā tu tāsām ubhaya rūpa tā tathā hi tad phalaḥ atad phalañca arthaḥ bhinnaḥ ekaḥ tatas tatas taiḥ taiḥ upaplavaiḥ nnīta sañcaya apacayaiḥ iva 
PVA_3.1.5.4.1,10–3.1.5.4.1,11	 atadvān api sambandhāt kutaścid upanīyate dṛṣṭimbheda āśrayaiḥ tepi tasmāt ajñāta viplavāḥ nanu yadi saṃvṛtya ayam vyavahāraḥ sa vāsanā mātra nibandhanaḥ kathat na visamvādī laukikaiḥ nna vikalpya parityajyate na khalu avisamvādinam vyavahāram kaścid na parityajyate uktam etat tam tathā eva avikalpya ityādi nanu etat eva katham na khalu atyantamūḍha upi pramāṇa bādhanam anutprekṣyāḥ te 
PVA_3.1.5.4.1,12–3.1.5.4.1,15	 atra ucyate avisamvādāt avikalpanam avisamvāda sambhave hi nāvā antara sūkṣma aikṣikāḥ yuktāḥ vyavahāriṇaḥ avisamvāda arthī hi tad lābhāya khalu vikalpayitum kṣamaḥ bheda abheda visamvādaḥ kva nu tasya upayujyate artha kriyā na bhinnena mādhuryeṇa bhavet guḍāt atad vyāvṛtti mātreṇa prāptena artha kriyā udayaḥ dharma bhedaḥ tu anādi vāsanātaḥ tad phala itara avadhi nibandhana buddhi ākāra parikalpitaḥ sattya vastu pratibandhāt avisamvādī tatra pratibhāsa bheda nirūpaṇāyām abhimata phala prāpti janita paritoṣaḥ pūruṣaḥ na ādriyate vastu tatva nirūpaṇa aparopi tad artha kriyā arthī loka vyavahāram eva anusarati 
PVA_3.1.5.4.1,16–3.1.5.4.1,18	 tathā ca uktam rūpaṇa vyavahārābhyām laukike vartmani sthitau jñānam pratyabhilāpañca sadṛśau bāla paṇḍitau tena sa dharmī vyāvṛtti bheda nibandhanaiḥ upaplavaiḥ vikalpa lakṣarṇa eni iti sañcaya upacayaiḥ iva kutaścid vyavahāra sambandhāt dṛṣṭim upanīyate darśana patham tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇāt prāpti lakṣaṇam tasmāt te vyavahāriṇaḥ parijñāta viplavāḥ iti tasmāt asataḥ vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ sa pakṣāt vā na viruddhāḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,1–3.1.5.4.2,3	 api ca nairātmye ghaṭa ādīnām prasiddhe sati prāṇa ādi abhāve vyāpti siddhiḥ nna anyathā na ca ātmā ghaṭa ādiṣu na asti iti sidhyati sattā sādhana vṛtteḥ ca sandigdhaḥ syāt asat na saḥ asattvam ca abhyupagamāt apramāṇāt na yujyate jīvat śarīre hi sandigdhaḥ ātmā katham ghaṭāt au= asandigdhaḥ na khalu sandigdham sādhanena prāṇa ādinā anyena vā viṣayīkarttum śakyam tatas ca 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,4–3.1.5.4.2,6	 asataḥ avyatirekepi sa pakṣāt vinivarttanam sandigdham tasya sandehāt vipakṣāt vinivarttanam ātmanaḥ sandehe ghaṭa ādayaḥ eva syuḥ sa pakṣāḥ vā tatas sa pakṣāt vinivṛttiḥ sandigdhā tatas katham ayam vyatirekī nanu bauddha abhyupagamāt nirātmanaḥ eva ghaṭa ādayaḥ yadi evam sarvu adharmā anātmānaḥ iti jīvat śarīrepi na ātmā syāt apramāṇakaḥ eva bauddha abhyupagamaḥ iti ced tadā tarhi ghaṭāt ayopi tad abhyupagamāt na nirātmānaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,7–3.1.5.4.2,8	 ekatra niyame siddhe sidhyati eva nivarttanam dvairāśye sattyadṛṣṭepi syāt adṛṣṭeṣu saṃśayaḥ adarśane sati api adṛṣṭeṣu anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpteṣu saṃśayaḥ eva na hi kaścid anupalambha mātra kāt abhāvam sādhayitum samarthaḥ api ca siddhaḥ nāma ghaṭa ādiṣu ātma abhāvaḥ tathā api prāṇa ādayaḥ na ātma sādhana samarthāḥ na hi teṣām vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva siddhā vṛtteḥ api sambhavāt 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,9–3.1.5.4.2,12	 nanu vipakṣān nivṛttaḥ kathantatra eva varttate na hi nirātmakam ekam prāṇādimat anyathā ca yuktaḥ na hi idam arddha jaratīyam labhyam eka bhāva niyamaḥ eva yuktaḥ na etat asti yatas avyakti vyāpinā upyarthāḥ santi tad jāti bhāvinaḥ kvacid na niyamaḥ dṛṣṭyā pārthivāḥ loha lekhya vat bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ sandeham nivārayet 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,13–3.1.5.4.2,15	 na hi nairātmyam iti eva sakalam samānam yena nirātmaka tayā jīvat śarīram aprāṇa ādikam bhavet api tu nirātmakam eva kiñcid prāṇa ādimat aparam anyathā yathā pārthivam eva loha lekhyam aparam itarat tathā hi bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ saṃdeham nivārayet na khalu nairātmyena saha virodha aprasiddhau prāṇa ādeḥ nnivṛttiḥ nnairātmyasya na hi prāṇa ādi saha anavasthāne na itareṇa vā virodha lakṣaṇena viruddham nairātmyena yena tat nivarttayet atha sākṣāt virodha bhāvepi pāramparyeṇa virodhaḥ iti nivarttakāḥ praṇādayaḥ nairātmyasya 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,16–3.1.5.4.2,18	 tat asat yatas kvacid viniyamāt konyaḥ tad kārya ātma tayā sa ca yadi prāṇa ādayaḥ ātmani niyatāḥ syaḥ syāt nairātmyena saha pāramparyeṇa virodhaḥ vyāpaka virodhena vyāpyasya api virodhāt na ca asti ātmani niyamaḥ prāṇa ādīnām tādātmyam tad utpattim antareṇa niyama ayogāt anyathā niyamasya asambhavāt na ca prāṇa ādīnām ātma kārya tvam ātma tmaka tvam vā prasiddham pramāṇataḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,19–3.1.5.4.2,22	 nairātmyāt api tena asya sandigdham vinivarttanam nairātmyāt api tena ātma pratibandha abhāvena asya sandigdham vinivarttanam na hi tatra apratibaddhaḥ tad vipakṣāt vyāvarttate astu nāma tathā api ātmā na anairātmyāt prasidhyati yena asau vyatirekasya na abhāvam bhāvam icchati yathā na avyatirekepi sa pakṣe prāṇātādikaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,23–3.1.5.4.2,25	 sa pakṣāvyatirekī ced hetuḥ hetuḥ atonvayī na anvaya vyatirekī ced anairātmyan na sa ātmakam yathā sa pakṣa abhāva abhāvepi na sa pakṣe bhāvaḥ tathā nairātmya abhāvepi na ātmā jīvat śarīraḥ iti nanu viṣamoyam upanya saḥ sa pakṣe hi vyatireka abhāvepi na bhāvaḥ tasya asattvāt na hi asati bhāva saṃbhavaḥ jīvat śarīre tu tasya sattvāt vyatireka abhāve niyamena bhāvaḥ parasya rāśeḥ abhāvāt 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,26–3.1.5.4.2,27	 sattyam etat na viṣama upanyāsa mātrakāt eva iṣṭa siddhiḥ yadi sa pakṣe na abhāvaḥ saḥ eva tarhi na nivṛttaḥ bhāvaḥ abhāve tu nivṛtte niyamena bhāvaḥ abhāva vyāvṛttiḥ eva bhāvaḥ iti sa pakṣa abhāvāt na evam iti ced na abhāva tva ayogāt prāṇa ādi bhāve hi katham sa pakṣasya abhāvatā yathā hi asati sa pakṣe aprāṇa ādi vyatirekepi na viparyayaḥ tathā jīvat śarīrepi narātmya vyatireke atha jīvat śarīrasya sattvāt viparyayaḥ na sa pakṣe avidyamāna tvāt na hi avidyamāne bhāva sambhavaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,28–3.1.5.4.2,31	 avidyamāna tā eva tarhi na nivṛtta iti āyātam avidyamāne vidyamāna tāyāḥ virodhaḥ iti sā vyāvṛttā avidyamāna tāyāḥ tu na virodhaḥ iti sā avyāvṛtti ttā eva yathā eva sa pakṣaḥ avidyamānaḥ tathā tatra api na hi avidyamāne avidyamāna tā virodhaḥ atha sā api avidyamāna tā na tatra tathā sati jīvat śarīre nairātmya vyāvṛttau= api na nairātmya vyāvṛttiḥ yathā sa pakṣe bhāva abhāvepi na abhāvaḥ tasya sattvāt iti ced na idam asti yatas anya sattve kathat nāma vyabhicārī niyamyate vyabhicārī sva doṣeṇa parasmāt katham anyathā 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,32	 yaḥ hi svayam vyabhicārī sa katham anya sattve nā anyathā vā tat avyabhicārī syāt kiñca yadya vidyamāne kiñcid na sanna asat vidyamānam avidyamānam api vidyamānena sanna asat iti kinnābhyupagamyate yathā avidyamānasya na ādhāra tā tathā adheya tāpi iti yat kiñcid etat etat ca prāk eva pratyapādi api ca na abhāva mātram nairātmyam api tu pratiniyata rūpasya ātmanaḥ abhāvaḥ na ca pratiniyata rūpa adarśane tad abhāva siddhiḥ na khalu abhāvāḥ parasparataḥ vyāvarttante bhāva bhede tad abhāvānām bhedāt bhāva pratiniyama abhāve ca kutas tad abhāva bhedaḥ na ca ātmā pratiniyata rūpa tayā upalabdhaḥ yena tad viparyaya abhāve sa sidhyet tatas nairātmya abhāve abhāva nivṛtti mātram na tu ātma siddhiḥ tasmāt 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,33–3.1.5.4.2,37	 sa pakṣāvyatirekī ced hetuḥ hetuḥ atas anvayī na anvayya vyatirekī ced anairātmyam na sā ātmakam iti saṃgrahatiḥ api ca yat na antarīyakaḥ sva ātmā yasya siddhaḥ pravṛttiṣu nivarttakaḥ saḥ eva atas pravṛttau ca pravarttakaḥ yasya dhūmasya agninā antarīyakaḥ svabhāvaḥ pravṛttiṣu vidhiṣu siddhaḥ saḥ eva agneḥ nnirvvarttakaḥ svayam nivarttamāne na anyathā pravṛttau ca saḥ eva pravarttakaḥ agniḥ dhūma ādeḥ iti hi prāmāṇikī gatiḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,38–3.1.5.4.2,40	 na antarīyaka tā sā ca sādhanam samapekṣate kārye dṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭiḥ ca kārya kāraṇa tā hi te na khalu na antarīyaka tā sā dhanam darśana adarśanam lakṣaṇam anvaya vyatireka sādhanam vinā prasidhyati nanu vyatiriktayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvānāntarīyaka tā sā dhanam na dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭī na tayoḥ eva dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭyoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva tvāt na hi anvaya vyatirekābhyām anyaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na api dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭibhyām anyau= anvavyatirekau= iti yasya tu punar 
PVA_3.1.5.4.2,41–3.1.5.4.2,44	 artha antarasya tad bhāve abhāvaḥ niyamataḥ agatiḥ artha antarasya na sādhanam na antarīyaka tāyāḥ tad bhāvepi na aparasya abhāva niyamaḥ iti na tad abhāve abhāvasya gatiḥ tasya vyāpaka tā abhāvāt na ca avyāpakam nivarttamānam aparasya nivarttakam na ca ātmā vyāpakaḥ siddhaḥ tat katham asau prāṇa ādeḥ nnirvvarttakaḥ yatas abhāvāsambhavāt teṣām abhāve nitya bhāvinaḥ ātmā hi na svayam deśa kālayoḥ vvinivarttate nitya tā vyāpti sadbhāvāt tatas tad abhāvāt abhāvaḥ prāṇa ādīnām itya siddham etat 
PVA_3.1.5.5,1–3.1.5.5,4	 atha anvaya mātrāt eva ātmā kāraṇam prāṇa ādīnām na hi vyatirekam apekṣate sarvu atra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sarvvaḥ tat api ayuktam yatas kārya svabhāva bhedānām kāraṇebhyaḥ samudbhavāt taiḥ vinā bhavataḥ nyasmāt tad jam rūpam katham bhavet yadi anvaya mātrāt eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tadā tad abhāvepi bhavati iti prāptam tatas taiḥ vinā api kāryasya bhavataḥ anyasmāt katham tad jam rūpam anyasmāt api bhaviṣyati iti ced na anyasmāt tad rūpa abhāvāt 
PVA_3.1.5.5,5–3.1.5.5,9	 atad rūpa tve saḥ eva na bhavati yatas sāmagrī śakti bhedāt hi vastūnām viśva rūpa tā sā ced na bhedikā prāptam eka rūpam idam jagat nanu sāmagrī bhedāt bhedaḥ iti kutas etat bhedaḥ tāvat upalabhyate sa kāraṇa bhedāt anyathā ca iti cintā antaram eva etat tat asat yatas ātmā prakalpyate adṛṣṭaḥ prāṇa ādeḥ pratibandhataḥ niyamena vinā tasya pratibandhaḥ kathat na saḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,10–3.1.5.5,14	 yathā eva ātmā vyāpī nityaḥ anvaya mātreṇa kāraṇam tathā ākāśādayopi tatas ātma vat ākāśa ādi gatiḥ api iti na artha siddhiḥ atha ātmanā prerakeṇa vinā na prāṇa ādayaḥ tatas ātmā bhastrā ādhmāpayitā iva pratīyate golaka prerayitā iva karaṇaiḥ gavākṣa antarita prekṣakaḥ iva darśanena iti tat api ayuktam yatas niṣkriyasya vibhoḥ na eva preraka tvam pramāṇa vat karaṇaiḥ nna vinā dṛṣṭiḥ iti na ātmā prasidhyati 
PVA_3.1.5.5,15	 bhastrā ādhmāpayitā hi sa kriyaḥ sa prerakaḥ tathā avyāpitayā na tu evam ātmā kathantasya preraka tvam na hi vyāpya mūrttasya prerakata yukti saṅga tā atha prerakaḥ tasya api anyaḥ prerakaḥ iti anavasthā gavākṣaka antaritaḥ ca karaṇa cakṣuḥ ādi samanvitaḥ puruṣaḥ ātmā tu na evaṃbhūtaḥ katham prekṣakaḥ atha tasya api karaṇāni santi tatra api aparaḥ gavākṣaka antarita nyāyaḥ iti anavasthā eva 
PVA_3.1.5.5,16	 api ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām agni ādau kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sa katham atra anyathā bhavet atha tatra api anvaya mātrakāt eva tathā sati taiḥ vvinā anyasmāt api bhavati iti prāptam anyathā vyatirekasya api sambhavaḥ tathā ca taiḥ vvinā bhavataḥ anyasmāt api śakra mūrddhādeḥ bhavataḥ katham agni janya tā ubhaya janya tā ced na tatas nyasmāt bhavati iti na ubhayam api kāraṇam tasmāt anyata upi bhavataḥ na tad kāryatā na api anyakārya tā iti kāryaka raṇa bhāvaḥ eva syāt tathā sati kārya bheda abhedau kāraṇa bheda abheda āyattau= iti tad abhāvāt na syātām dṛśyate katham pratikṣepaḥ iti ced na darśanasya api kārya kāraṇa bhāvā sambhave asambhavaḥ eva 
PVA_3.1.5.5,17–3.1.5.5,19	 nīlam hi nīla vijñānāt pratīti niyame sati pratīyate anyathā na eva bhrāntā abhrānta vivecanam yadi hi īdṛśī sāmagrī bhrānta itara pratyaya janikā iti niyamaḥ tadā bhavet prameya pratiniyamaḥ anyathā yathā kathañcid pratibhāsa mātrakam iti sakala loka vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ atha pratibhāsaḥ svayam paraspara bhedī sva samvedana pratyaya prameyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,20–3.1.5.5,23	 tat api asattyam pratibhāsa mātrāt lokasya vyavahāraḥ na sidhyati tāvat mātra avabhāse hi karttavyam kim atas param artha kriyā karaṇa pravaṇaḥ hi bhāvaḥ upādeyaḥ anyaḥ anyathā iti prekṣāvatām vyavahāraḥ pratibhāsa mātra kantad kṣaṇaḥ eva tathā bhavat aheya upādeyam tathā vijñaptimātrakam advaitam iti na bheda abhedau sa ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām iti na ātmā kasyacid kāraṇam iti na tasya kutaścid anumānam tatas 
PVA_3.1.5.5,24–3.1.5.5,26	 sāmagrī śakti bhedāt hi bhāvānām viśva rūpa tā sā ced abhedikā prāptam eka rūpam idam jagat eka rūpam iti aheya upādeyam pratibhāsa mātrakam advaitam iti yathā atha śakra mastakasya agni rūpam api asti tad vilakṣaṇam api asti tatas kāryam agniḥ tata upi bhaviṣyati atra āha bhedaka abhedaka tve syāt vyāhatā abhinna rūpa tā !ekasya nānā rūpa tve dve rūpe pāvaka itaraḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,27–3.1.5.5,29	 rūpa bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt padārtha bhedasya tata ugniḥ eva dhūmasya janakaḥ iti na vyabhicāraḥ kārya hetoḥ na hi tad agni rūpa tāyām aparam śakraśiraḥ yena tu rūpeṇa bhinnam tat ajanakam eva kutas vyabhicāra āśaṅkā tat tasya ājananam rūpam anyasya yadi sā eva sā na tasya ājananam rūpantat tasyāḥ sambhavet katham tatas svabhāvau niyatau= anyonyam hetu kāryayoḥ tasmāt sva dṛṣṭau= iva tat dṛṣṭe kāryā ipi gamyate 
PVA_3.1.5.5,30–3.1.5.5,33	 nanu ekam katham anekasmāt kleda vat dugdha vāriṇaḥ drava śakteḥ yatas kledaḥ sā tu ekā eva dvayoḥ api bhinna abhinnaḥ kim asya ātmā bhinne ca dravatā katham abhinne hi ucyate buddheḥ tad rūpāyāḥ abhedataḥ na khalu dugdha vāriṇoḥ abhinna rūpa tā tad anya kaṭhina rūpa bhedāt vyāvṛtteḥ eka tvāt ekatā tathā kāryasya api vikledasya na hi vikleda upi paramārthataḥ abhinnaḥ tad anya vyāvṛttyā tu tathā vyapadeśaḥ iti na vyabhicāraḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,34–3.1.5.5,36	 tadvat bhedepi dahanaḥ dahana pratyaya āśrayaḥ yena aṃśena dadhat dhūmam tena tena tathā gatiḥ dahana pratyaya aṅgāt eva anya apekṣāt samudbhavāt dhūmaḥ tat vyabhicārī iti tadvat kāryan tathā param tadvat iti dugdha vāri vat eva drava tāyāḥ tat anyavya tvattyā bhedepi dravya pratyaya āśraya tva vat bheda upi dahana prayaya āśrayaḥ tad anya vyāvṛttya eva yena aṃśena iti dahana pratyaya kāraṇa tvena tena eva gatiḥ anyatra dravya vyabhicārāt dahana pratyaya aṅga tām antareṇa na utpadyate dhūmaḥ iti na tat vyabhicāraḥ tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.5,37–3.1.5.5,39	 dhūma indhana vikāra aṅga tā pade dahana sthiteḥ anagniḥ ced dhūma ūsau sa dhūmaḥ ced sa pāvakaḥ dhūmaḥ ca indhana vikāraḥ ca tayoḥ eva aṅgam vahniḥ nna anyaḥ tena yadi asau na uṣṇa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ śakra mūrddhādiḥ tadā na sa dhūmopi tuṣpādiḥ eva etat eva kutas na hi adṛṣṭam niyamam arhati na anyathā bhavati iti nīlam api tarhi na anyadā anyathā bhavati iti kutas etat tathā sati nīlam eva na bhavati iti ced samānam etat dhūmaḥ eva na bhavati iti kutas etat iti samānam aparatrāpi iti 
PVA_3.1.5.5,40–3.1.5.5,44	 nanu svarūpa lakṣaṇam nīla ādi na sva rūpa abhāve sati na ca janyatā lakṣaṇam dhūma ādikam tatra api svarūpam eva lakṣaṇam iti na samānam etat atra ucyate na svarūpa ābhāsa mātrāt vastutas vastu tā sthitiḥ svarūpasya avabhāsaḥ hi bhrānta itara vidām samaḥ sva rūpa mātra nīla pīta ādi avabhāsanam hi bhrānta abhra anta pratyaya samānam iti na vastu sidhyati kāraṇa kārya tā kṛtaḥ tu vibhāgaḥ iti alam prasaṅgena svabhāva hetoḥ kathat na antarīyaka tā iti ced 
PVA_3.1.5.5,45–3.1.5.5,48	 atra ucyate na antarīyaka tā jñeyā yathā svam hetu apekṣayā svabhāvasya yathā uktaṃprāc vināśa kṛtaka tvayoḥ vastu mātra anubandhī vināśaḥ iti prāk pratipāditoyam arthaḥ iti punar nna carvvita carvvaṇasya vidhānam tasmāt anvaya vi atireka lakṣaṇaḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti na ātmanā prāṇa ādīnām iti na gamakāḥ ācāryasya api ayam eva abhiprāyaḥ sakalaḥ iti kutas etat iti ced 
PVA_3.1.5.5,49–3.1.5.5,51	 ahetutva c ati nyāyaḥ sarvvoyam vyatirekiṇaḥ abhyuhyaḥ śrāvaṇa tva ukteḥ kṛtāyāḥ sāmya dṛṣṭaye sakala vyatireka hetu udāharaṇa sāmya kathana artham ācāryeṇa śrāvaṇa tvasya vyatirekiṇaḥ na aikāntika pratipādanam kṛtam iti sarvvoyam nyāya ācāryasya api abhiprāya sthaḥ iti mantavyam evantā vat vyatirekī na hetuḥ iti pratipāditam sarvu asya vyatirekiṇaḥ śrāvaṇa tve asamāna tvāt tasya ca asādhāraṇa tvena anaikāntika tvāt tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.5,52–3.1.5.5,53	 sa pakṣāt ca vipakṣāt ca vyatirekaḥ na bhāvikaḥ sambhavya dṛṣṭi mātreṇa vyatirekī iti kathyate nitya anitya nirātmaka sātmaka rāśi dvaya vyatirekeṇa na rāśi antaram bhāva abhāvayoḥ paraspara parihāra virodhasya bhāvika tvāt anyathā avyavahāra masam aṃjasam jagat syāt na ca ubhaya pakṣā sambhavi kiñcid yadi nityāt anityāt ca vyāvṛttam śrāvaṇa tvam na bhavet eva tarhi niradhikaraṇa tvāt śabdaḥ eva adhikaraṇam iti ced na śabda tvasya api samānaḥ doṣaḥ tat api sarvu atas vyāvṛtteḥ nna bhavet eva tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.5.5,54–3.1.5.5,57	 nitya anitya tva sandehe śabde hetu upapācanam sa ced ubhayatas hīnaḥ sandehotra tayoḥ katham na hi tatas vyāvṛtta tvena niścitaḥ tayoḥ eva sandeha sambhavī na tarhi śrāvaṇa tvam sapdeha hetuḥ śabda tva mātreṇa eva sandehāt nanu śabda tvāt sandehe kim apareṇa api na sandeha hetu tā bhājā bhāvyam nanu yaḥ hi kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ sa uparatra dṛśyamānaḥ tatra śaṅkām upajanayet tat eva ca sandeha hetutvam ucyate śrāvaṇa tvat na katham sandeha hetuḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,58–3.1.5.5,61	 na etat asti yatas dṛṣṭe vidhi vidhānena saṃdehetra niṣedhataḥ bhāva abhāvena saṃdehe kaḥ sva pakṣa parigrahaḥ yatra hi prameya tva ādau sādhāraṇa anaikāntike saṃdehaḥ sa darśana dvāreṇa vidhi mukhena asādhāraṇe tu pratiṣedha mukhena iti tu konayoḥ viśeṣaḥ nanu na dṛṣṭam śrāvaṇa tvam nitya anityayoḥ iti tayoḥ apratipatti hetuḥ eva yuktam apratipatti mukhasya eva dṛṣṭa tvāt 
PVA_3.1.5.5,62–3.1.5.5,65	 na idam sādhīyaḥ yatas vyāvṛttiḥ ekasya yadā niyamāt pratiyoginaḥ vṛtyā abhāvya virodhe hi vyāvṛttiḥ na uṃbhayoḥ api na ekānte dvābhyām paraspara virodhibhyām vyāvṛtti sambhavaḥ audāsīnyam tu atra na labhyate eva nanu dvayoḥ ekatra pramāṇa abhāvāt eva sandehaḥ na śrāvaṇa tva hetu kṛtaḥ yadi param tat apratipatti hetuḥ eva sādhāraṇa anaikāntikepi tarhi pramāṇa abhāvāt eva sandehaḥ na sa hetu kṛtaḥ darśana dvāreṇa sa upi saṃdeha hetuḥ eva śrāvaṇa tvam api adarśana dvāreṇa iti samānam etat 
PVA_3.1.5.5,66–3.1.5.5,69	 atha sandehe sati na saṃdeha vyāvṛttiḥ tatas iti saṃdeha hetuḥ ucyate śrāvaṇa tvam api evam eva iti yat kiñcid etat api ca prameya tvam dvayoḥ dṛṣṭam dvayoḥ nniścaya kṛt na kim dvayoḥ darśana yoge hi vidhāne syāt dvayoḥ api dṛṣṭam hi yadi atra tat tad vidhānam eva kuryāt na asti iti dvītīya aṃśa avalambanam kutas atha dvaya rnna ekatra paraspara virodhinoḥ bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ evantarhi pakṣaḥ eva saṃdehaḥ na spakṣa dvārakaḥ darśaneṃpi pakṣa saṃdeha dvārakaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ saḥ ubhayatra adarśanepi samānaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,70	 nanu ekānta vyāvṛtti kṛtaḥ saṃdehaḥ ekāntena dvābhyām vyāvṛtta tvena niścayāt yohi dvābhyām rāśi antarā sambhavibhyām vyāvṛttaḥ sa tena eva rūpeṇa apratipatteḥ hetuḥ tathā ca ācāryeṇa apyaya vyatirekī kathitaḥ tathā ca āha yaḥ hi asādhāraṇaḥ sādhana dharmaḥ sa yāvatā bhedena sarvu asaṃgrahaḥ tatra saṃśaya hetuḥ tadvatā tad saṃgrahāt ekānta vyāvṛtteḥ ca tat katham ayam vyāvṛtteḥ eva saṃśayāt saṃśaya hetuḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,71–3.1.5.5,75	 na etat asti uktam etat yatas dvābhyām vyāvṛtteḥ yasya niścayaḥ anyatra tasya bhāve asanniścayaḥ syāt dvayoḥ api vyāvartta kañca tatra eva punar saṃdeha kṛt kathaḥ tad vyāvṛtteḥ dvayoḥ anyat na vyavaccheda sādhanam yaḥ hi yasmāda vyāvṛttaḥ sa kathantasya na vyavaccheda sādhakaḥ atha dvayoḥ vyavaccheda sādhyaka tvāt eva apratipatti hetuḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,76–3.1.5.5,80	 na idam asti yatas sarvu asya hetoḥ hetu tvam vyavaccheda prasādhane vyāvṛttiḥ śabda liṅgābhyām prasādhyate iti sthitam sattyam anya vyāvṛtti sādhakaḥ eva hetuḥ kintu tad anya vidhāna ākṣepaka tvena iha tu na kiñcid anyat ākṣipyate dvayoḥ api nivṛtteḥ kṛtaka tvena tu nitya tā nivṛttyā anitya tā ākṣepaḥ sattyam etat nitya vyāvartta nāt a nyat na anitya tvam vidhīyate anya vyāvarttanāt eva kṛtortha unumayāḥ yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.5,81	 anityasya nityata ropasya vyavaccheda mātreṇa kṛtārtham anumānam nitya anitya vikalpayoḥ eka vyāvarttanena aparasya svatas eva sthānāt tat api kadācid na bhaviṣyati iti ced na tasya pratyakṣa siddha tvāt kārya hetau katham iti ced āstānta avat etat śrāvaṇa tvena tu yadi dvayam api vyavacchinnam tat anyathātva vidhānam pratyakṣa siddham bhavet iti hetuḥ eva bhavet anyena tu hetunā tad eka sādhanena na hetuḥ iti ced na pratyakṣa siddhe katham anyaḥ hetuḥ niṣedhakaḥ syāt vidhāyakaḥ vā atha pratyakṣam na niṣedha kṛt tatas parasya pareṇa vidhānam niṣedhanam vā na śrāvaṇa tvena dvayoḥ vvyavacchede katham apareṇa vidhānam anyathā tatra api apareṇa vidhānam iti katham aparasya api pramāṇatā bhavet iti sarvu atra anāśvāsaḥ na ca pratyakṣam aniṣedhakam tathā abhāve hi vidhāyakam api na syāt vidhānam vastu pratipādanam na ca vastu tad apara vyatirikta niṣedham antareṇa pratipāditam bhavati yatas 
PVA_3.1.5.5,83–3.1.5.5,85	 anya asaṃsargi tat vastu bhavet vā an yena miśritam anyena miśraṇe vastu na syāt avyavahārataḥ tathā vā na niṣedhasya parasmāt api sambhavaḥ atra vicāryate vastu svayam svarūpataḥ parasmāt avyāvṛttam anyathā vā yadi vyāvṛttam pratyakṣeṇa tathā gṛhītam agṛhītam vā gṛhītañcet katham anyasya aniṣedhaḥ saḥ eva hi parasya tatra niṣedhaḥ yat parihāreṇa tasya rūpa antara tayā pratibhāsanam anyathā saṃkula pratipatteḥ avyavahāraḥ iti niṣphalam pramāṇam atha pareṇa pramāṇena aparasya niṣedha vyavahāraḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,86–3.1.5.5,89	 tat api asat yatas pratyakṣeṇa pratītasya parasmāt yadi bādhanam pratyakṣasya apramāṇa tve parasya api apramāṇa tā pratyakṣasya apramāṇa tve kaḥ paratra samāśvāsaḥ atha vastu miśraṇam eva pareṇa tatas para pramāṇa śatena api na niṣedhaḥ na hi svarūpam anyathā karttum śakyam atha kenacid rūpeṇa āmiśritam iti niṣedhaḥ yena rūpeṇa āmiśraṇam tena api rūpeṇa pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītam eva anyathā anyathā grahaṇe katham vyāvṛtta tā arthasya pareṇa pratītau vyāvṛtta tā avagamaḥ iti ced pareṇa anyathā pratītau sarvu atra anāśvāsaḥ iti pratipāditam uṣṭrāt praviṣṭa mātrasya yoni athā garbbhaveśmani pratibhāsaḥ parodhyakṣaḥ tena pūrvvasya bādhanam 
PVA_3.1.5.5,90	 garbbhagṛhe hi prathama praveśe apramāṇam eva prathama darśanam tena tat bādhyate na tu pramāṇam eva tasmāt yadi pratyakṣeṇa ubhaya vyāvṛtta śabda grahaṇam tadā na parasmāt saṃdehonyathā vā tathā śrāvaṇa tvena vā tasmāt avyāvṛtta tayā eva śrāvaṇa tvāt saṃdehaḥ evam sarvvaḥ vyatirekī adarśana mātrantu upādāya ācāryeṇa vyatirekī pratipāditaḥ kathantarhi ekānta vyāvṛtteḥ iti vacanam na ekāntena niścaye vyāvṛtteḥ iti artha upi tu ekāntasya niścayasya vyāvṛtteḥ iti na hi nitye anitye vā asya bhāvena abhāvena vā niścayaḥ tatas paramārthataḥ avyāvṛttiḥ eva tatas na aikāntika tā evantā vat vivādāt bhedaḥ iti vyākhyātam 
PVA_3.1.5.5,91–3.1.5.5,95	 sāmānyam idānīm vyākhyāyate yathā ekānta vyāvṛttaḥ vyatirekī gamakaḥ tathā ekāntena anvayi api tathā hi prameya tvāt anitya tvam śabdasya api ghaṭa ādi vat ākāśāt asataḥ tasya vyāvṛtteḥ hetuḥ anvayī na hi ākāśasya sattvam asat tvam vā tasya asattvāt tena avyabhicārita anvayaḥ hetuḥ gamakaḥ eva na etat asti ākāśa asattva pakṣe hi yadi api asya na sambhavaḥ tathā api asyā prameya tvam kathañcid na nivarttate 
PVA_3.1.5.5,96^1	 asatām api kathañcid prameya tā asti eva anyathā vidhi niṣedhāmyām vyavahāraḥ eva na bhavet na hi sattvam kevalam vyavahartum śakyam paraspara parihāreṇa hi vyavyasthitāḥ padārtha ātmānaḥ vyavahāra viṣayaḥ anyathā artha kriyā virahāt anartha tā syāt artha kriyā arthinām sva para vibhāga abhāve ca kaḥ vyavaharet kva vā kimartham vā iti sarvvam asat eva bhavet na hi para pakṣam asat apratiyatā sva pakṣaḥ śakyaḥ samarthayitum ākāśañca sa pratigha padārtha abhāva mātram avaśyam pramātavyam anyathā na padāt padam api calitavyam āpatet tasmāt sataḥ padārthān pratiniyamena vyavasthāpayatā prameyaḥ abhāvaḥ evam sa vyavasthāpitaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,96^2	 pramāṇena vyavasthāpitaḥ iti prameyaḥ na hi vastu viṣayam eva pramāṇam pariccheda lakṣaṇa tvāt pramāṇasya pariccheda kāryā iva pramāṇam na ced sva viṣaye pareṇa bādhyate tasmāt vyavahāra avisamvāda sādhana pratyaya paricchedya tvāt prameyaḥ eva abhāvaḥ iti na avyabhicarita anvayam prameya tvāt iti tatas sādhāraṇa tayā na aikāntikam atha prameya tā pratyakṣa paricchedyata eva ucyate tathā sati pratyakṣasya vastunaḥ udayāt artha kriyā sāmarthyam eva prameya tvam tata urtha kriyā kāri tvam eva gamakam iti āpatitam tat ca avastunaḥ pi vyāvṛtteḥ vyatireka sambhavāt katham anvayī hetuḥ bhavati ca asatā upi vyāvṛttiḥ iti pratipāditam 
PVA_3.1.5.5,97–3.1.5.5,102	 etena vastu tvādayopi vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt anvayavyatireki eva kārya svabhāva lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ nanu anupalabdhiḥ api tṛtīyaḥ hetuḥ iti pratipāditam pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarvu atra sādhyate anupalambhate ityādinā atha vastu viṣaya hetu prabheda upadarśanam etat tathā sati pratibandha unupalabdherūpa pādanīyaḥ na ca tādātmya tad utpattibhyām apara pratibandha prakāraḥ iti pratipāditam atra ucyate kāraṇa vyāpaka abhāvāt abhāvaḥ vyāpya kāryayoḥ gamyate na aparaḥ kaścid abhāvasya prasādhakaḥ 
PVA_3.1.5.5,103	 abhāvaḥ hi nāma na kaścid svatantraḥ vyavahāra viṣayaḥ api tu vivakṣitasya vastunaḥ eva tat ca vastu sandihyamāne parokṣa tayā kathat na asti iti sidhyati na hi tasya anupalabdhiḥ eva gamikā abhāvasya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt evam tu tad abhāvaḥ sidhyati yadi tasya kāraṇam vā na asti iti tatra ca darśitaḥ saḥ eva dvividhaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti siddha pratibandhikā eva anupalavdhiḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,1–3.1.6.1,5	 udāharaṇam kasmāt na upāttam upāttam eva yatas hetu svabhāva vyāvṛttyā eva artha vyāvṛtti vaṇarṇanāt siddha udāharaṇa iti ukta anupalabdhiḥ pṛthak na tu upāttam eva anupalabdheḥ udāharaṇam na tu pṛthak kim kāraṇam hetu svabhāva vyāvṛtya eva arthasya kāryasya svabhāvasya ca vyāvṛtti kathanāt niveditam etat ātma tve hetu bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā 
PVA_3.1.6.1,6–3.1.6.1,8	 sidhyati ityādi svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ api nirddiṣṭā eva hetu svabhāvayoḥ anupalabdhayoḥ eva bhāvasya nivarttanāt tathā ca uktam siddham pramāṇaiḥ vvadatā mityādi upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvam viśeṣaṇam iti katham sidhyati atra ucyate tatra api adṛśyāt puruṣāt prāṇa ādeḥ anivarttanāt sandeha hetu ta ākhyātyā dṛśya arthe sā iti sūcitam 
PVA_3.1.6.1,9–3.1.6.1,11	 pareṇa uktam ghaṭa ādau prāṇa ādi nivṛttiḥ ātma nivṛtteḥ yadi ca jīvat śarīrāt api ātmā vyāvṛttaḥ prāṇādayopi vyāvartteran atra ācāryeṇa pratipāditam ghaṭādau= ātmā sattvam eva dṛśya tvam eva adṛśya tvāt ātmanaḥ na siddham anupalavdhi mātrāt saṃdehāt iti atas dṛśya īrthe anupalabdhiḥ gamikā iti sūcitam eva nanu vyavaccheda sādhana tve sarvvaḥ eva hetuḥ anupalambhaḥ eva tat katham hetu tritayam 
PVA_3.1.6.1,12–3.1.6.1,14	 na eṣa doṣaḥ yatas anaṅgīkṛtavastu aṃśaḥ niṣedhaḥ sādhyate nayāḥ vastuni api tu pūrvvābhyām paryudāsaḥ vidhānataḥ vastuni api pradeśe na paryudāsaḥ sādhyate api tu anaṅgīkṛta vastu abhāve niṣedhaḥ sādhyate pūrvvābhyā tu svabhāva kārya hetubhyām paryudāsa dvāreṇa tena viṣaya bhedāt bhedaḥ eva pratibandha samāna tāyām api 
PVA_3.1.6.1,15–3.1.6.1,22	 nanu kaḥ svabhāva anupalabdhau pratibandhaḥ tādātmyam iti āha tatra upalambheṣu astitvam upalabdheḥ nna ca aparam na hi anupalabdheḥ anyā eva asattā api tu anupalabdhiḥ eva nanu jñāna vyatirekaḥ anupalabdhiḥ sattā vyatireka unupalabdhiḥ sattā vyatirekaḥ tu abhāvaḥ tat katham anayoḥ tādātmyam yathā ca jñāna jñeyayoḥ bhedaḥ tathā tad abhāvayoḥ api na khalu jñānam eva padārthasya sattā jñāna vyatirekeṇa api tasya abhāvāt tathā hi sattā parokṣa api arthānām anumānena gṛhyate pāvakasya na kimbhāvaḥ dhūma dṛṣṭyā anumīyate na ca tatra api anumāna upalambhaḥ eva sattā anumāna abhāvepi sattāyām vyabhicārāt na anumāna nivṛttiḥ abhāvam gamayati atīta anāgatayoḥ api anumāna vṛtteḥ na idam sādhīyaḥ na hi anya anupalabhyeṣu na astita anupalambhanāt 
PVA_3.1.6.1,23	 upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya hi tad anupalabdhyā abhāva vyavahāraḥ sādhyate na ca teṣām upalambhāt anyā eva sattā tathā hi vipratiṣiddham etat upalabdhi yogyaḥ na ca upalabhyate iti tasmāt upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta padārtha satta upalabhbhaḥ eva tathā hi yadi upalabhyamāna tā upalabdhissā padārtha svabhāva eva atha upalambhanam upalabdhiḥ kartṛsthatayā ucyate tadā api upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta sattā tayā prāptā eva tat avyatireke ca na bheda pratipattiḥ vyatirekasya gamya tvāt bhedasya tat avyabhicārāt upalambhaḥ sattā ucyate na ca vyatirikta samāna kāla upalambhāt upalambhaḥ padārthānām api tu tad anupraviṣṭa upalabhyamāna tā lakṣaṇa upalambhāt eva tasmāt upalambhe eva sattā tatas tad anupalambhaḥ eva asattā iti vakṣyati na hi parasparam abhāvānām paramārthataḥ kaścid bhedaḥ bhāva viśeṣaṇa bhede tu bhedaḥ paṭasya abhāvaḥ śakaṭasya iti ca na ca nirvviśeṣaṇaḥ bhāvaḥ tattvam pratilabhate atha bhāva abhāvayoḥ bhāva bhūtam viśeṣaṇam ekam eva atas tad abhāvayoḥ api eka tvam eva na ca paramārthataḥ abhāvasya tatas pratiṣedhya bhedepi 
PVA_3.1.6.1,24–3.1.6.1,27	 nanu yadi abhāvaḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ tadā avipratipattiḥ eva sattyam etat yatas iti ajña jñāpanāya eka anupākhyodāhṛtiḥ matā ekā svabhāva anupalabdhi lakṣaṇāḥ iti parijñāna rahitasya yaḥ hi jñāna jñeya abhāvayoḥ abhedam na avagacchati yaḥ vā sāṃkhyotyanta vimūḍhaḥ sarvvam sarvu atra vidyate iti āgrahavāt tasya ājñasya pratī yartham ekā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ kintarhi tatra prasādhyate viṣaya asattvataḥ tatra viṣayi pratiṣidhyate jñāna abhidhāne sandeham yathā adāha āt apāvakaḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,28	 viṣayaḥ hi jñāna abhidhānayoḥ sattvam tad saṃdehaḥ ca tayoḥ sandehasya tasya viṣayasya abhāve niyamena jñānam abhidhānam sandehaḥ ca nivarttate viṣayasya viparyayasya sattvāt yathā na pāvakaḥ dāha abhāvāt dahana bhāve hi pakṣa antare pāvaka saṃdehaḥ tad abhāve tu viparyayasya bhāvāt kutas tasya sambhavaḥ yatas adāhāt aparāḥ na asti apāvaka tā yathā ca na adāhāt aparā apāvaka tā 
PVA_3.1.6.1,29–3.1.6.1,33	 tathā anyāna upalabhyeṣu na astita anupalambhanāt tad jhāna śabdāḥ sādhyante tad bhāvāt tad nibandhanāḥ na khalu anyā eva na astitāḥ nāma upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpteṣu anupalambhana svarūpāt bahis tatas tad siddhausiddhaḥ eva tad ātmībhāvaḥ nanu abhāvaḥ anupalambhena sādhyate tat katham sādhya sādhanayoḥ eka tā tat api asat na siddham etat eva atra na ca asiddham asiddhataḥ siddhim ṛcchati na eva atra pratibandhaḥ tatas na tat 
PVA_3.1.6.1,34	 yat ucyate sādhya sādhanayoḥ bhedena bhavitavyam saḥ eva atra sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na siddhaḥ tad kathai tathā bhedasya siddhiḥ na khalva siddham asiddhataḥ siddhimatā yāvat sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na siddhaḥ param prati na tāvat bheda siddhiḥ yāvat ca na bheda siddhiḥ nna tāvat sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ pratibandhe hi sati sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na tādātmyam pratikṣipataḥ anupalambha abhāvayoḥ aparaḥ pratibandhaḥ na hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tayoḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,35–3.1.6.1,37	 nanu abhāvena anupalambhaḥ kriyate yadā eva ghaṭa ādeḥ apanayanam karoti kaścid tadā eva anupalambhaḥ satyam etat yadi abhāvaḥ pareṇa anupalambhataḥ pramāṇena jñāyate tatas na saha anupalambhavat asya pratibandhaḥ prasidhyet anyathā itaretara āśraya doṣa prasaraḥ kena nivāryaḥ pratibandhe pramāsiddhenu palambha pramāṇa tā pramātvenu palambhasya pratibandhaḥ prasidhyati 
PVA_3.1.6.1,38–3.1.6.1,42	 anyonya āśrayataḥ na evam ekasya api prasiddha tā itaretara kṛta kāryam atas eva na sidhyati tasmāt anupalambhāt na abhāvaḥ prasidhyati pratibandha abhāvāt tādātmya pratibandhe tu saḥ eva anupalambhaḥ abhāvaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ eva sādhyate siddhaḥ hi vyavahāroyam dṛśya adṛṣṭa avasan= iti tasyāḥ siddhau= asan digdhau tad kāryatvepi dhī dhvanī nanu vyavahāra sādhanepi na asti eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ anupalabdhyā eva sakalaḥ vyavahāraḥ sādhanīyaḥ tadā ca dṛṣṭānta antara sa dhane anavasthā eva vyavahāraḥ ca kārya bhūtaḥ eva anupalabdheḥ tatas kāraṇāt kārya sādhanam ayuktam na avaśyam kāraṇāni tadvanti iti tat asat yatas 
PVA_3.1.6.1,43	 siddhaḥ eva ayam vyavahāraḥ dṛśya adṛṣṭi nibandhanaḥ tāvat mātra nibandhana tayā abhāva vyavahāra yogya tā anupalabdhi svabhāva eva yogyatāyāḥ anartha antara tvāt vyavahāraḥ tu avaśyam eva tad darśanāt sa cetanaḥ pravarttayet tāvat mātra nibandhanam abhāva vyavahāram smaran= avaśyam eva tad cetanāvān bhavati kāya vāc vyavahārantu yadi nāma na pravarttayati mā sma pravarttayat pramāṇasya pramāṇa tā pratīti sādhana tayā na kāya ādi vyavahāra sādhanāt tasmāt 
PVA_3.1.6.1,44–3.1.6.1,47	 vidyamāne hi viṣaye mohāt atra ananubruvan kevalam siddha sādharmyāt smāryate samayam paraḥ iti saṃgrahaḥ kārya kāraṇa tā yadvat sādhyate dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭitaḥ kārya ādi śabdāḥ hi tayoḥ vyavahārāya kalpitāḥ na khalum darśana adarśana viśeṣa vyatirekeṇa aparākārya kāraṇatā kāryam asya iti ayam eva arthaḥ etad antareṇa na bhavati iti yadi tu vyatiriktaḥ etasmāt tadā etat abhāvepi bhavet eva tathā sati vyarthakaḥ pratibandhaḥ paraḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,48–3.1.6.1,51	 atha tad abhāve na bhavet tathā sati saḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti vyarthakaḥ paraḥ nanu sambandhe sati tad abhāve na bhavati tad bhāve bhavati iti sidhyati sambandhe sati tad bhāve bhavati iti yat i iṣyate tad abhāvepi sambandhaḥ pūrvvakasya iti cintyatām dviṣṭhaḥ eva hi sambandhaḥ eka bhāve katham bhavet yogya tā yadi sambandhaḥ kāraṇasya phala udaye 
PVA_3.1.6.1,52–3.1.6.1,54	 kāraṇāt eva kāryasya bhāvaḥ iti eva yuktimat tathā hi kāraṇam tādṛś nija kāraṇa sambhavi na ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām aparaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratibhāti atīndriya dṛśā upi tasmāt anvaya vi atirekābhyām kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavahārasya sādhya tā kathantarhi śabda anyat tvam artha anyat tvam antareṇa na tayoḥ eva dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭyoḥ vyavahāra artham lāghavena kārya ādi śabda niveśaḥ tena 
PVA_3.1.6.1,55–3.1.6.1,59	 kāraṇāt kārya saṃsiddhiḥ svabhāva antargamāt iyam hetu prabheda ākhyānena darśita udāhṛtiḥ pṛthakaḥ kāraṇam hi samartham kārya svabhāvaḥ eva vastutas tata unupalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetuḥ eva tatas na asyāḥ pṛthak upanyāsaḥ nanu katham svabhāva anupalambhaḥ svabhāva hetau= antar bhavati tādātmya pratibandham antareṇa yathā ca bhāvayoḥ na parasparam bhedaḥ tathā abheda upi na khalu nirātmanaḥ tādātmya sambhavaḥ na hi śaśa viṣāṇam khara viṣāṇa ātmakam atra hi pratividhīyate pratiṣeghya viparīta svabhāva ātmikā eva anupalabdhiḥ tathā hi eka upalambha anubhavāt idam na upalabhe iti buddheḥ upalabhe vā iti kalpikāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,60	 na khalu rikta ātmā abhāvaḥ pramāṇa gocara vicāravattaraḥ na ca tena siddhena api sva rūpa mātrataḥ kiñcita prasiddhimat vastu sāṃkarya paryālocana locanaiḥ eva sa tathā iṣyate tatra yadi vastu deśa kāla avasthā antara bhāvāt vyāvṛttam svarūpataḥ kim aparābhāva kalpanayā atha na vyāvṛttam svarūpataḥ tathā api vyarthakaḥ paraḥ abhāvaḥ ekatra vyarthaḥ para trāsam arthaḥ iti pratyapādi idam prāk eva tasmāt anya bhāva rikta tayā evam svabhāva bhūtaḥ dharma bhedena tathā vyapadiśyate ghaṭa ādeḥ abhāvaḥ iti yatas ekasya padārthasya vivakṣita padārtha svarūpa vivikta ātmanaḥ yaḥ upalambhaḥ tasya yaḥ anubhavaḥ sva samvedana tayā tasmāt eva idam na upalabhe iti smaraṇa viparivarttamāna matiḥ kalpanā rūpa upajāyate tatra pradeśa anubhavaḥ eva aparasya anupalambhaḥ yatas etat anyena svarūpeṇa na upalabhe iti ayam eva atra arthaḥ tena sva rūpeṇa anupalabdhiḥ asya tena rūpeṇa idam na asti iti 
PVA_3.1.6.1,61–3.1.6.1,63	 nanu ca tad upaghātakam iha na asti iti tasya abhāvaḥ anena rūpeṇa iti sādhyam tat katham viparyayasya vacanam sattyam etat yadi para upyatra arthaḥ na antar bhavet sa tu antarbhavati eva tathā hi viviktaḥ tena rūpeṇa pradeśa ūnena vā ghaṭaḥ na bhedotra vidagdhānām pratibhāti kathañcana yadi sa ūnena rūpeṇa viviktaḥ na syāt ayam api na tena iti parisphuṭa arthe kaḥ parasya vyāmohaḥ tasmāt tad vivikta tā eva asya atra abhāvaḥ yatas ca tad vivikta pradeśa darśanāt eva na upalabhe tat iti matiḥ tad anya rūpeṇa ca upalabhe iti tatonupalambhasya upalambhasya ca tādātmyāt upalambhaḥ eva anupalambhaḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,64–3.1.6.1,70	 nanu bhavatu ayam anupalambhaḥ jñāna antarasya jñeyā antarantu katham jñāna jñeyayoḥ abhedaḥ iti pratipāda nāt adoṣaḥ athavā vā śabdaḥ iva arthe yathā upalabhe iti vikalpa viṣaya tvāt tathā adhyavasīyamānaḥ upalambhaḥ tathā na upalabhe iti vyavasāyāt anupalambha upi iti ced na aviviktasya vedane abhāva vedanasya sāmarthya pramāṇena gṛhītasya anyathā karttum aśakyatvāt pratipādi tañca etat iti na ucyate tathā hi na hi smṛtim vinā abhāva pramāṇasya asti sambhavaḥ vinā viśiṣṭa anubhavam pratiyogi smṛtiḥ na yat nanu abhāva sādhitāḥ bhāva saṃbhavāt eva viśeṣa siddhiḥ bhāvānām tat katham abhāvam antareṇa āsākaryaḥ na etat asti yatas viśeṣaḥ gamyaterthānām viśiṣṭāt eva vedanāt tathābhūta ātma saṃvittiḥ bheda dhī hetuḥ asya ca 
PVA_3.1.6.1,71	 yadi na viśiṣṭam vedanam vedanā antara viviktam bhavet na vedya viśeṣa gatiḥ yadi ca sva sambedanena tad rūpa samvedanasya ananubhavaḥ tadā tasya api viśiṣṭa tā na gamyate abhāva samvedanena gamyeta na hi pratiyogi smaraṇam antareṇa abhāva pramāṇa udayaḥ na ca viśiṣṭa samvedana abhāve pratiyoginaḥ smaraṇam atha pūrvvantasya viśiṣṭa anubhavaḥ tathā satyasya api iti vyarthakaḥ eva abhāvaḥ atha abhāvena saḥ eva abhāva vyavahāraḥ sādhyate kim anyena siddhasya anyena sādhanena vyavahāra sādhane sā eva anupalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetu svabhāvāḥ tasmāt anya vivikta sva samvedana bhāvāt eva bheda vikalpaḥ saḥ eva ca bhedaḥ tad anya abhāvaḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,73–3.1.6.1,76	 tasmāt svatas dhiyoḥ bheda siddhiḥ tābhyām tad arthayoḥ anyathā hi anavasthānāt bhedaḥ sidhyet na kasyacid dhiyaḥ sva samvedanā t eva anya vyāvṛtta tā prasiddhiḥ tata upyarthasya iti parisamāptaḥ sva samvedana vyavahāraḥ yadi tu na pratyakṣāt eva bhedaḥ api tu abhāva pramāṇataḥ tathā satya navasthānāt apratipattiḥ tathā hi abhāvena pramāṇena yadi bhedasya kalpanā sa upyabhāvaḥ pareṇa anya abhāve na eva avatāryate 
PVA_3.1.6.1,77	 sopyanyena tatonyena tad anyopya nava sthitiḥ iti na vyavahāraḥ abhāvena hi pramāṇena yadi anadhigataḥ pratyakṣeṇa bhedaḥ pratīyate tasya abhāvasya pratiyogi smaraṇe satyavatāraḥ pratiyogi tayā ca smaraṇam pratyakṣatas bheda grahaṇe sati bhavati iti vyarthakaḥ abhāvaḥ idānīm api pūrvva vat pratyakṣeṇa eva bheda grahaṇam iti 
PVA_3.1.6.1,78	 atha tathā api na abhāvam antareṇa bhedaḥ iti na abhāvasya vyartha tā tathā sati tatra api apareṇa pratiyogi smaraṇena abhāva avatāra kṛtā bhāvyam tat api smaraṇam apekṣyate iti anavasthā abhyupagamya ca idam ucyate na tu punar sambhavati idānīm gṛhyamāṇasya tadā pratiyogi tayā smaraṇam yena tadānīm abhāva avatāre tasya asmāt bheda grahaṇam iti na sambhavati abhāva avatāraḥ tasmāt apratipattiḥ eva para darśane bhedasya 
PVA_3.1.6.1,80–3.1.6.1,84	 viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavān na atonyāni anirākriyā tad viśiṣṭa upalambhotaḥ tasya api anupalambhanam viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavaḥ eva tad anyasya abhāva sādhanam na tu viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavam antareṇa anyasya tatra abhāva siddhiḥ nanu viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavāt tathābhūta tā eva tasya sidhyati kathantatra tasya bhedāḥ bhāvaḥ na hi deśa kāla antara bhāvinaḥ tatra abhāvaḥ tasya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt tat asat yatas viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhave katham anyā nirākriyā anya anirākriyāyām hi saḥ eva tu na sidhyati 
PVA_3.1.6.1,85	 viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhave hi padārtha anubhavaḥ eva na syāt viśiṣṭaḥ ced adhigamyate rūpam ghaṭa ādeḥ kim apara abhāva pratipattyā na cā bhāva sahasra pratipattyā api viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavaḥ sva rūpa viśeṣa pratipad amvinā svarūpa pratipattiḥ tu avaśyam eṣitavyā na ca āparaḥ bhāvaḥ svarūpataḥ pratyetum śakyaḥ iti pratipāditam tasmāt viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavaḥ eva aparasya abhāva sādhanam anupalambhanam api tasya viśiṣṭa upalambhanam eva anyasya 
PVA_3.1.6.1,86–3.1.6.1,87	 tasmāt anupalambhoyam svayam pratyakṣataḥ gataḥ sva mātra vṛtteḥ gamakaḥ tad abhāva vyavasthiteḥ tad niyata rūpa upalambhaḥ eva abhāvaḥ iti siddham abhāva anupalambhayoḥ tādātmyam pratyakṣa siddha tvañca siddham iti na āsiddhi pratibandha abhāva doṣaḥ sa ca anupalambhaḥ samarthaḥ eva hetuḥ iti sva mātra vṛtteḥ eva abhāva vyavahārasya pravarttakaḥ anyathā yadi anubhava abhāvaḥ anupalabdhiḥ bhāva abhāvaḥ ca abhāvaḥ tadā anavasthānāt asiddhiḥ eva iti āha 
PVA_3.1.6.1,88–3.1.6.1,89	 anyathā arthasya nāstitvam gamyatenu palambhataḥ upalambhasya na astitvam anyena iti anavasthitiḥ yathā abhāva abhāvaḥ anupalambhena tathā upalambha abhāva rūpa upyanupalambhaḥ tasya apareṇa anupalambhena tad abhāva upya pareṇa iti na anavasthānataḥ muktiḥ atha arthasya abhāvaḥ upalambha sādhana tvāt upalambha abhāvena sādhyate upalambhasya tu bhāvaḥ na apara sādhanaḥ iti tad abhāva upi na apara sa adhanaḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,90–3.1.6.1,98	 tat etat asat sva samvedana siddha tvam upalambhasya yuktimat tad abhāvasya samvittiḥ svatas iti ati sāhasam sva samvedana bhāve hi bhāvaḥ eva bhavet ayam pratyakṣa siddhaḥ abhāvaḥ ced vijñānasya anya vittitaḥ atha apara pratyakṣa siddhaḥ abhāvaḥ samvedanasya vastunopi tarhi iti prāptam nanu vastu anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt na para pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati tasya vijñānāt anyat rūpam iti samvedanasya samvedana tvāt apara rūpa abhāvaḥ iti tad apara pratyakṣa siddhaḥ abhāvaḥ tathā ca idam na upalabhe iti upalambham eva uttama puruṣeṇa nirasyati na vastu idam na asti iti tasmāt anupalambhoyam svayam pratyakṣataḥ gatam iti jñāna abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ eva tat asat anya upalambhena anyasya parā asattā gatiḥ katham tad vivikta tayā ced syāt tat kim na anupalabdhi tā 
PVA_3.1.6.1,99	 na khalu tad vivikta tām antareṇa jñāna antarasya abhāva sādhanam jñāna antara samvedanena tad vivikta upalabdheḥ eva ca tad anupalabdhiḥ tat katham pratyakṣa siddhaḥ tad anya samvedana abhāvaḥ atha upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam iti na viśeṣaṇam avyabhicārāt tathā sati viśeṣaṇam na syāt anupalabdhi tā tu na apaiti tasmāt yāvān kaścid pratiṣedhaḥ sa sarvvonupalabdheḥ iti paryudāsa lakṣaṇaḥ abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ saḥ eva ca anya apekṣayā anupalambhaḥ yat tu punar idam na upalabhe iti uttama puruṣa prayogaḥ sa jñāna paryudāsa lakṣaṇa anupalabdhi prakaraṇataḥ na tu artha abhāva nirāsāya tat avyatirekāt asau= eva vastunopya bhāvaḥ iti yadā hi satta upalambhayoḥ eka tā tadā vastu vyatirekasya api pratyakṣa siddha tā eva na khaṇḍaśas sambhavaḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.1,100–3.1.6.1,103	 nanu vyāpaka anupalabdhyā abhāvaḥ sidhyati tathā hi upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya bhāvaḥ upalambhena vyāptaḥ tad abhāvataḥ tad sarūpāt vastu abhāva prasiddhiḥ sattyam etat svabhāva anupalambhaḥ yam abhāvasya aprasādhakaḥ sarvatra eva bhavet evam pratyakṣāt tad abhāva vid yadi vyāpaka anupalabdhi rūpa labdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya pratyakṣa prasiddhaḥ abhāvaḥ sarvu atra tarhi tad abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ eva na svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ = nāma vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ca amūḍhasya yadi abhāva sādhanī mūḍhasya api sā eva smaraṇena viṣayīkriyatā kim anupalabdhi antara kalpanayā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ vvā yadi mūḍhasya sā eva punar amūḍhasya api bhaviṣyati akasmāt dhūma pratipatti vat na khalu tatra tri tvam apaiti kiñca 
PVA_3.1.6.1,104–3.1.6.1,105	 vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ atra bhedaḥ na paramārthataḥ upalambhaḥ eva sattā iti pūrvvam saṃpratipādanāt dṛśyasya hi satta upalambhena vyāptā iti ayam avaṣṭambhaḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhi vādinaḥ ayañca svabhāva anupalabdhi vādepi samānaḥ eva na hi tādātmye sati na vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ tathā ca upalambhaḥ eva sat tā iti pratipāditam tad kārya hetu vyāpti avyatirekāt tad svabhāva aviśiṣṭam iti tad anapalambhaḥ svabhāva anupalambhaḥ eva uktaḥ iti kārya anupalabdhim svabhāva anupalambhaḥ eva antar bhāvitām yaḥ vyācaṣṭe vyāmūḍhaḥ sa katham saṃvedana anupalambham svabhāva anupalambhanam na vyākhyāsyati tasmāt anya bhāvaḥ eva aparasya abhāvaḥ anya upalabdhiḥ eva ca anyasya anupalabdhiḥ sā ca svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva 
PVA_3.1.6.2,1–3.1.6.2,3	 nanu evam api vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ asambhavinī sattyam svabhāva anupalabdhau= eva sarvu āsām antarbhāvaḥ iti iṣṭam eva saṃgṛhītam na kācid naḥ kṣatiḥ kathantarhi bhedaḥ vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ bhedāt pracaya apacaya āptitaḥ vṛkṣa śiṃśapayoḥ dūrādūra tvena ca bhinna tā vṛkṣa tā pracayinī śiṃśapā tvam tu apacaya vat dūre vyāpaka an upalabdhiḥ vyāpya apekṣayā samīpe tu svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ iti anayoḥ bhedaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta satta upalambhayoḥ tu parasparam vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvāt na bhedaḥ śakya kalpanaḥ tena svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva iti sthitam anupalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetau= antarbhavati iti atas eva 
PVA_3.1.6.2,4–3.1.6.2,9	 adṛśye niścaya ayogāt sthitiḥ anyatra vāryate yathā aliṅgonya sattveṣu vikalpa ādiḥ na sidhyati atas aniścaya phalāḥ hi eṣā na alam vyāvṛtti sādhane ādya adhikriyate hetoḥ niścayena eva sādhane eṣā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ hetoḥ nnābhāvam vipakṣe niścāyayati dūra deśa ādau niścaya ayogāt adṛśya apekṣayā hi na iyam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ ādyā tu hetoḥ vvipakṣāt sarvu atas vyāvṛtti niścaye vyāpriyate yā kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ hetu svabhāva vyāvṛttyā eva ityādi varṇṇitā tatra api prasaṅga sādhana tām aṅgīkṛtya sa adhikā nanu virodhī nāma liṅga antaram na asti atra śīta sparśaḥ agneḥ iti sa katham prabheda lakṣaṇena uktaḥ anupalabdhau= eva tasya api antarbhāvāt yatas tasyāḥ svayam prayogeṣu svarūpam vā prayujyate artha bādhana rūpam vā bhāve bhāvāt abhāvataḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.2,10^1	 virodhī hi hetuḥ tasyāḥ eva anupalabdheḥ prabhedaḥ tad anya prabheda vat anyathā virodhi virodhi kārya virodhi vyāpaka ādīnā mapi paraḥ pṛthak nirddeśa kṛt bhavet yadā tu tasyāḥ eva ayam aneka prakāraḥ bhedaḥ tadā ayama doṣaḥ tathā hi svarūpam vā prayujyate svabhāva kāraṇa vyāpaka kāryān upalabdhiḥ iti atha apratiṣedhasya bādhana rūpam vā na asti atra śīta sparśogneḥ iti yathā eva anupalabdhiḥ abhāva sādhikā tathā sākṣāt paramparayā vā virodhinaḥ upalabdhiḥ api kasmāt virodhasya nivarttaka tvāt katham virodha prasiddhiḥ ekasya agneḥ bhāve avikala kāraṇasya śīta ādeḥ abhāvāt virogha gatiḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.2,10^2	 upalambha anupalambha lakṣaṇaḥ hi virodhaḥ tatas virodhi darśanāt anupalambhaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya sādhyate tatra dūra deśa varttinaḥ vahne rūpa labdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ anumāna siddhā sā abhāvam sādhayati iti na virodha upalabdhiḥ svabhāva anupalabdheḥ anyā saḥ eva ca uṣṇa sparśaḥ śīta sparśa bhāvaḥ tad vivikta tvāt anuṣṇa aśīta sparśaḥ ca tatas te yā upalabdheḥ eva tad anya anupalabdhiḥ evam viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ api kārya hetu anumāna siddha svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ pūrvvatra viruddha upalabdhau eka sāmagrī adhīnatayā anumānam 
PVA_3.1.6.2,11–3.1.6.2,13	 anyonya bheda siddheḥ vvā dhruva bhāva vināśa vat paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇa tayā virodhaḥ śāśvata itara vat tādātmya pratiṣedhaḥ hi paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇa virodhataḥ sādhyate tat yathā na sa ghaṭoyam pradeśaḥ tad parihāreṇa upalabdheḥ sarvu atra sākṣāt abhāva sādhanī viparyaya upalabdhiḥ eva pramāṇa antara bādhāt vā sa apekṣa dhruva bhāva vat 
PVA_3.1.6.2,14–3.1.6.2,15	 yathā paraspara bādhane virodhaḥ tathā pramāṇa bādhanepi sa apekṣa dhruva bhāvayoḥ iva tathā hi sa apekṣam anapekṣam iti paraspara virodhaḥ dhruva bhāvi tvam itarat iti ca sa apekṣa dhruva bhāvi tvayoḥ tu paraspara parihāra abhaḥ vopi pramāṇa bādhana lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ iti virodha antaram etat tathā hi sa apekṣāt viruddhaḥ bhāvaḥ sa dhruva adhruvayoḥ api anyonya parihāreṇa virodhaḥ paramārthataḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.2,16–3.1.6.2,17	 yadi evam pramāṇam virodhinam sādhayati na tu pramāṇavirodhaḥ nāma aparaḥ sattyam etat tathā api virodhi vyāptena rūpeṇa arthataḥ virodhāt uktam etat asya api kim prayojanam virodhi vyāpta upalabdhiḥ api pratiṣedhasya sādhikā yathā syāt iti darśana artham tathā hi na dhruva bhāvī bhutasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti dṛśyate prayogaḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.2,18–3.1.6.2,22	 aparaḥ punar āha viruddha kārya vyāpyasya yā upalabdhiḥ prayujyate tatra kārya svabhāvasya hetoḥ antar gamāt api sarvu aeka tayā hetuḥ nna bhinnaḥ anupalabdhitaḥ trividhopi tatas hetuḥ tasyāḥ eva prabhedanam anupalabdhiḥ eva ekaḥ hetuḥ kārya svabhāvayoḥ tad prabheda tvāt na khalu tad prabhedaḥ tatas bhidyate na hi śāvaleya ādikasya go tvāt bhedaḥ tatra kārya hetuḥ vviruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetuḥ api viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ anagni nitya tva abhāva sādhanāt 
PVA_3.1.6.2,23–3.1.6.2,25	 tat etat asat pratibandha ānurūpyeṇa yadi hetuḥ prakalpyate tādātmyena tad utpattyā svabhāvaḥ kāryam eva ca anitya tvena saha vahninā ca pratibandhe vyāpaka viruddhena virudhyate hetuḥ iti tad anupalabdhi bhāva kalpanam tatra ca sākṣāt hetu kalpanam parityajya pāraṃparya āśrayaṇam asambhavi kāryeṇa vahni gatau tad viruddha śīta nivṛttiḥ nna tu śīta nivṛttau= eva sākṣāt vyāpāraḥ dhūmasya tatas pāramparyeṇa hetu tā kalpanam anumita anumānam na ca dvayoḥ ekena śabdena pratipādane trayāṇām vā na anyaḥ eva asau hetuḥ 
PVA_3.1.6.2,26–3.1.6.2,32	 na hi śabda vaśāt arthaḥ sambhavati anyathā kvacid bhedaḥ prayoga mātrasya kalpitaḥ syāt tathā sati na asti atra śīta sparśaḥ dhūmāt iti dhūmāt agni anumānam kārya hetuḥ agninā śīta sparśa abhāva sādhanam viruddha upalabdhiḥ śīta anupalabdhyā śīta abhāva vyavahāra sādhanam svabhāva an apalabdhiḥ iti pāramparya hetūnām atas anumita anumānam aparam eva anumānam na ca trayāṇām eka śabda pratipādane bhavati ekatvam hetu antara tvañca prayoga samāsaḥ eṣaḥ na rūpa samāsaḥ iti nyāyaḥ tasmāt sarvu atre eva hetuḥ anupalabdhiḥ iti ayuktam atha vyavaccheda sādhane sarvvā anupalabdhiḥ na viṣaya bhedāt eva hetu bhedāt tathā ca uktam anaṅgīkṛta vastu aṃśaḥ niṣedhaḥ sādhyatenayā vastuni api tu pūrvvābhyām paryudāsaḥ vidhānataḥ iti 
PVA_3.1.7,1–3.1.7,4	 atha paramārthataḥ vyavaccheda sādhanāt anupalabdhiḥ eva iti matam tathā sati pratyakṣam eva sva samvedam iti kinna uktam tasmāt asat etat tatas prayoga bhedāt eva bhedaḥ viruddha vyāpta upalabdheḥ sa apekṣa tvāt vināśasya na dhruva bhāvaḥ yatas hetu antara samutthasya sannidhau niyamaḥ kutas tasya api hetu antarasya sva hetu sāpekṣa tvāt aniyamaḥ punar aparasya api iti na phala bhāvi niyamaḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,5–3.1.7,9	 atha bhāvasya yaḥ hetuḥ kulāla ādiḥ saḥ eva tad vināśasya api iti niyamaḥ atra ucyate bhāva hetu bhava tve kim pāramparya pariśramaiḥ tathā hi nāśanam janayitvā anyam sa hetuḥ tasya nāśanaḥ tam eva naśvaram bhāvam janayet yadi kimbhavet yadi vināśam janayitvā sa sva hetuḥ eva tasya nāśanaḥ naśvaram eva janayatu kim anena pāramparyeṇa atra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam iti ced anyathā vastu svabhāva tvāt na etat iti tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.7,10–3.1.7,12	 ātma upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddha ātmanaḥ sataḥ na ātma upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate yadi ātma upakārakaḥ vināśa hetuḥ nna sambhavati siddha svabhāvasya sata iti siddha itara svabhāvena tena bhāvyaṃtasvabhāvena tena bhāvyam tathā ca na sa tasya vināśa hetuḥ atha siddhasya api viśeṣasya karttā tathā sati sa viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ tad anyaḥ vā bhavet yadi sa siddhaḥ pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ atha siddhe tasmin= tad ātmā na śakyaḥ karttum iti tad ātma vyatirekī vidheḥ tathā sati tasya na upakārakaḥ eva asau= iti kaḥ tasya asau bhavet na kaścid iti arthaḥ syāḥ dvā da bhaṅgaḥ tu vihitaḥ eva na sa vidheyaḥ punar 
PVA_3.1.7,13–3.1.7,16	 api ca sa padārthaḥ sva kāraṇāt kāla antara vyāpī tat anyathā vā yadi pūrvva pakṣaḥ tadā sarva kāla kalā vyāpī sarva kāryasya sādhakaḥ pratipannaḥ yadi tadā nāśakaḥ kiṅ kariṣyati gata udake kaḥ khalu setubandhaḥ payonirodhāya hi setubandhaḥ payaḥ avirodhī na hi setubandhaḥ prayāsa mātram hi sa setubandhaḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,17	 atha na tathā asya sampratipattiḥ tathā satya nirūpita sva viṣayaḥ katham vināśa hetuḥ pravartteta nirūpya bhāvinam bhāvampravarttate iti ced na na rūpite siddhi svabhāve kaḥ iva vināśa hetoḥ upayogaḥ virodhi svabhāve kapāle upayogaḥ iti ced nanu asau= api virodhī nivarttakaḥ eva tatra api saḥ eva pūrvvakaḥ prasaṅgaḥ paraspara parihāra mātreṇa tu nivarttakaḥ eva na syāt 
PVA_3.1.7,18–3.1.7,19	 atha siddhasya kāla antara sthāyitayā abhāvam karoti śūnyatā lakṣaṇam vināśa hetuḥ kāla antara sthāyinaḥ śūnyatā kriyamāṇā tad avirodhinī na tasya nivarttikāḥ jalam iva ādhārasya jalam api āsakta kumbhaḥ tasya nivarttakam eva iti ced na tatra kāla antara sthānasya aprasiddha tvāt nanu anumānena kāla antara siddham eva nivartyate tat asat 
PVA_3.1.7,20–3.1.7,21	 anumāna aprasiddhasya na tasya eva nivarttanam anyasya abhāvaḥ eva iti na tasya api nivarttanam pratyakṣa vat anumānam api pramāṇam eva tat siddham api sattyam eva katham abhāvaḥ tasya abhāve hi tasya tad pratītiḥ asattyā bhavet iti na pratyakṣa anumāne staḥ tad abhāvāt na bhāva siddhiḥ iti kasya vibhāgaḥ saṃbhāvyamānasya vibhāgaḥ iti ced anvayāt abhyāse eva eṣa na ca vastunaḥ nirṇṇayaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVA_3.1.7,22–3.1.7,24	 atha tasya eva anyathā tvaṅ karoti kapāla ādi lakṣaṇam vināśa hetuḥ atra api ucyate ghaṭa ādau= anyathā tvaṅkiṅkim vā mṛd dravyaḥ iṣyate ghaṭa ādau= anyathātvasya siddheḥ bhāvaḥ kathat na saḥ yadi ghaṭa rūpe sonyathā bhāvaḥ saḥ eva ādhāra unyathātvasya tatas ghaṭaḥ svena rūpeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ katham anyathā atha na dṛśyate ghaṭaḥ kasya asau= anyathā bhāvaḥ ghaṭa pūrvakonyathā bhāvaḥ tasya iti vyapadeśyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,25–3.1.7,26	 nanu vināśe sati tad pūrvakaḥ sa upi vināśoni athā bhāva iti anavasthā atha mṛd dravyasya anyathā bhāvaḥ tat api avinaṣṭam eva kathantasya anyathā bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ vināśaḥ tatra api pūrvasya mṛd dravyasya na vināśaḥ tadā abhāvāt na uttarasya bhāvāt iti nanu bhavat pakṣepyayam eva doṣaḥ kārya kāle hi na kāraṇṅkathantasya tat kāryam na etat asti yatas kāraṇam pūrvva bhāvi ā iva sama kālan na kāraṇam vināśaḥ sama kālaḥ tu bhāvena iti asat uttaram 
PVA_3.1.7,27	 na hi anyadā bhāva unyadā vināśaḥ iti upapattimat etat yadā eva bhāvaḥ tadā eva vināśe vinaṣṭaḥ iti yuktam na tu abhāve abhāvaḥ yuktaḥ mṛtasya maraṇa abhāvāt kāryante mṛtepi yuktam eva tasya bhāva antara tvāt abhāvaḥ tu tasya eva śūnyatā na asti tat iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīteḥ asāmāna adhikaraṇyantu padārthasya vināśaḥ iti vyapadeśi vat bhāvāt śilā putrakasya śarīram iti yadvat na tu evam agniḥ dhūmaḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam 
PVA_3.1.7,28–3.1.7,30	 nanu atra api na sāmāna adhikaraṇyamparama arthataḥ smaryamāṇam hi pūrvakam rūpam vinaṣṭam iti pratīyate tad uttara kāla bhāvinā vināśena na ca tathā sāmānādhikaraṇyam tat api asat evam hi sati mahān virodhaḥ tathā hi smaryamāṇasya rūpasya na vināśosti tattvataḥ tadā dṛśyasya rūpasya vināśaḥ iti sāhasam 
PVA_3.1.7,31	 vināśaḥ iti hi na astitvam ucyate na ca vidyamāna avasthāyāḥ na astitāḥ avidyamāna avasthāyān tu saḥ eva na asti iti kathat na astitāḥ tasmāt na asti iti vyatirikta abhāva vādinaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāvaḥ tasmāt na anyaḥ abhāvaḥ bhāvāt tatas sāmānādhikaraṇyam uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ hi saḥ eva abhāvaḥ yaḥ tad vyāvṛttimataḥ pūrvvasya bhāvaḥ tasya ca upalabdhi rūpa antarasya anupalabdhiḥ sā ca varttamāna rūpa grāhya grāhi pratyakṣa svabhāva uttareṇa saha saṃghaṭitasya grahaṇe kāraṇa avadhi grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti pratipāditam atas para asaṃghaṭitasya eva pratītiḥ udaya mātrāt eva iti para anapekṣaḥ vināśaḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,32–3.1.7,36	 nanu svabhāvaḥ hi sa tasya ittham yena apekṣya vinaśyati tat katham anapekṣyaḥ atra ucyate vyāpī yadi bhavet bhāvaḥ kasmai param apekṣyate atha avyāpī svayambhāvaḥ tad apekṣā vṛthā bhavet iti uktam atas eva āha anapekṣaḥ ca kimbhāvaḥ atathābhūtaḥ kadācana yathā na kṣepa bhāj iṣṭaḥ saḥ eva udbhūta nāśanaḥ prathamataram eva pratyakṣa dṛṣṭaḥ truṭyat tayā katham atathā bhūtaḥ kadācid yathā saḥ eva nittya vādinaḥ naśyat avasthāyām 
PVA_3.1.7,37–3.1.7,42	 kṣaṇam api anapekṣa tve bhāvaḥ bhāvasya na iti ced yadi anapekṣaḥ bhāvaḥ vināśe kṣaṇam api eket na apekṣate iti na bhāvaḥ bhāvasya bhavet kṣaṇam api tathā hi nittyam sattvam asattvam vā ahetoḥ anya anapekṣaṇāt iti uktam tathā bhāva kṣaṇa an antarambhavan vināśaḥ kathantad ātmā bhavet atadātma tā āyāñca na sāmānādhikaraṇyam tat etat api kāśa kuśa avalambanam bhāvaḥ hi sa tathābhūtaḥ abhāve bhāvaḥ tathā katham 
PVA_3.1.7,43	 bhāvaḥ eva uttara bhāva asaṃghaṭitaḥ vināśaḥ sa katham bhāva abhāve bhavet na hi tad ātmā ca syāt tad abhāve ca bhavati ca iti yuktam evantarhi vināśa usti iti katham vināśa bhāve vinaṣṭaḥ vyatirikta vināśa bhāvepi svarūpasya apracyuteḥ katham vināśaḥ sā eva vyatirikta vināśa bhāvepi svarūpasya apracyuteḥ katham vināśaḥ sā eva vyatirikta vināśāsikā pracyutiḥ iti ced bhavatu tathā api asau vyatirikta tayā eva pratyaya viṣayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ upalabhyatām etat eva vyatiriktasya vyatirikta tvam yat para rūpa avihantṛ tvam nāma virodhāt vighātaḥ pratyuktaḥ eva vināśam antareṇa virodha aprasiddheḥ tasmāt 
PVA_3.1.7,44–3.1.7,45	 ye apara apekṣya tad bhāvāḥ tad bhāva niyatāḥ hi te asambhavāt vibaṃdhe ca sāmagrī kārya karmmaṇi tat yathā antyā kāraṇa sāmagrī vibandha sambhāvana avahitā sva prasava janane na kiñcid apekṣate iti tat niyatā tathā vināśepi bhāvaḥ iti anapekṣa tvāt vināśe kṣaṇikaḥ bhāvaḥ iti sa apekṣatāya at na avaśyambhāva vibhāvi nāśasya utpattimat tvāt vināśitā eva iti ced na pratibandha abhāvātas na hi pratibandham antareṇa hetuḥ sādhyasya sādhakaḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,47–3.1.7,50	 ahetu tvepi nāśasya tādātmye sādhya sādhanam kāraṇatvantu sādhyasya paścāt bhāvāt na yuktimat na hi paścāt bhāvinā vināśena kāraṇena bhavitum yuktam prāgbhāvinaḥ utpattimatu asya kāryantu na avaśyambhāvi kāraṇāt atas tad kāraṇa tvena na hetuḥ nanu tādātmyam ahetuka tve bhavati iti kutas etat katham vā hetuka tvat nāśasya mudgarāt anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt saḥ eva hi kārya dharmmaḥ atra ucyate 
PVA_3.1.7,51–3.1.7,52	 bhāva abhāvaḥ vināśaḥ ced uttarā ghaṭana ātmakaḥ sa pūrvam api dṛṣṭa tvāt kathat na aśaka hetukaḥ yaḥ hi yam antareṇa api dṛśyate sa kathantad hetukaḥ na anvaya mātreṇa hetuḥ iti pratipāditam etat yathā ca vināśaka sannidhau kapāla ādi bhāve parāsaṃghaṭitasya ghaṭasya pratītiḥ tathā udaya anantaram api na hi pūrvam api para rūpa saṃghaṭanā pratīyate maraṇa avadhi pratīti prasaṅgāt iti pratipādanāt parāsaṃghaṭanam eva ca yat atra api vināśaḥ vināśena eva asaṃghaṭanā kriyate iti ced tat asat yatas 
PVA_3.1.7,53–3.1.7,54	 asāmarthyāt apārtha tvāt nāśena eva na tad kriyā na hi asaṃghaṭite nāśaḥ samarthaḥ ghaṭitepi hi yadi asau hetoḥ saṃghaṭitaḥ eva utpannaḥ iti tathā eva pratyakṣa gṛhītaḥ iti kaḥ tatra nāśasya upayogaḥ asāmarthye hi tadā tasya bhavet atha asaṃghaṭitaḥ eva asau sva hetutaḥ tathā sati vyarthakaḥ nāśaḥ kṛtasya karaṇa abhāvāt tasmāt kṣaṇikaḥ eva svabhāvataḥ pratyakṣa tova gata unyathā pratipatteḥ asa bhavāt yaḥ ca anyathā pratipattum aśakyaḥ sa na unyathā bhavati pratyakṣatonyathātu asya bādhanāt tasmāt anapekṣaḥ eva tat niyataḥ na aparaḥ yathā antyā kāraṇam āmagrī 
PVA_3.1.7,55–3.1.7,56	 nanu sa apekṣya upyāditi asya astamayaḥ udayaḥ ca avaśyambhāvī nirapekṣatāyām udaya astamaya anantaram eva bhavet astamaya udayam sāma agrī ca abhedena niyatā api tu padārtha antareṃkura ādike tatas tat dṛṣṭāntataḥ viparyayaḥ eva bhavet na tu prakṛta sādhya siddhiḥ atra ucyate na udaya astamaya vyāptiḥ āditya astamaya udaye kadācid anyathā api syāt pramā na asti viparyaye 
PVA_3.1.7,57–3.1.7,61	 yadi nāma bhūyas darśanantathā api pramāṇa abhāvan na vyāptiḥ udaya astamayābhyām astamaya udaya bhāvayoḥ tathā hi pativrata upākhyānam śrūyate sambhavaḥ ca asti hemante cirāt udaya bhāvataḥ jhaṭiti a ḥ taṅgateḥ bhāvāt tadvat ati anta saṃbhavaḥ na ca astamaya ādityasya api śailādinā antarita tvam tat ca antarita tvam asmad ādi apekṣayā pare tu yoginaḥ paśyanti eva api ca sa apekṣāṇa antāvat avaśyam bhāvitā iti yadi nāma keṣāñcid avaśyambhāvaḥ pareṣāntu na tathā iti saṃśayaḥ yat api uktam vyatirikta bhāva niyata antyā sāmagrī vināśaḥ tu na vyatiriktaḥ tat api asat yatas yonyasvabhāve niyataḥ sva hetoḥ sutarām asau sva svabhāva ātmake nāśe kim evat na prakalpyate 
PVA_3.1.7,62	 na hi vināśaḥ nāma avastu svabhāvonyaḥ eva vastunaḥ eva tu tattvam aparā saṃghaṭitam pratīyamānam śilāputrakasya śarīram iti nyāyena tathā pratipādana viṣayaḥ bhāvasya vināśaḥ iti yathā antyā kāraṇa sāmagrī tad aṃkura utpādana svabhāva niyatā tathā bhāvopi tad uttara svabhāvā saṃghaṭita vyavahāra niyate iti kinnāma aniṣṭam api ca anapekṣyatayā tat niyata tvam sāmānyena sādhyate vastu avasthā bheda kalpanantu jāti uttaram eva ghaṭa śabda mūrttā mūrtta vikalpanā avata tasmāt anupalabdhi prabhedaḥ eva viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ sā ca svabhāva hetau= eva hetuḥ bhavatī bhūt bhāve ca viparyayau tena yaḥ san sa jātīye dvedhā ca sa hetuḥ viparyaye viruddhaḥ tad anyaḥ tu aniścitaḥ pañca prakāraḥ tatra bheda sāmānyayoḥ gamaka tva vivādaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ śeṣaḥ tri prakāraḥ vyāvṛtti dvāreṇa gamaka tva pratipādana arthaḥ tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.7,64–3.1.7,65	 na anvayat vārakaḥ hetuḥ gamakattva vyavasthitaḥ bhāva mātra samādhikye tridhā api agamaka tvataḥ yadi anvayaḥ gamaka tve prayojakaḥ anitya tvāt aprayatnā anantarīyakaḥ iti api gamakaḥ syāt asti abhāva anvayaḥ atha ana bhāva mātreṇa gamaka tvam anvayasya vyatireka sāhitya apekṣayā gamaka tvāt ayantarhi gamakaḥ sparśa tvāt nityaḥ iti ayam api na gamakaḥ sama tvāt anvayasya ayantarhi syāt anitya tvāt prayatna anantarīyakaḥ iti atra hi balavān anvayaḥ durbalaḥ vyatirekaḥ tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.7,66–3.1.7,67	 na pradhānantadanyasya viśeṣam samapekṣate prayojaka para apekṣan na dṛṣṭam bhojana ādiṣu yadi prayojaka tvam anvayasya gamaka tve syāt na vyatirekasya sa pūrṇṇa tām apekṣeta tam anādṛtya eva gamaka tvam prayojayet bhojana prayojaka vat vyatirekaḥ tu prayojakaḥ sadbhāva mātram eva anvayasya apekṣate na sama tva ādikam yathā prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ iti yaḥ prayatna anantarīyakaḥ saḥ nityaḥ eva nitya tā vyavacchedaka tvena gamakaḥ evam anyopi hetuḥ tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.7,68–3.1.7,69	 nityāt vyāvarttate yena tad abhāvam sa sādhayet anitye varttamānan na tad abhāvasya sādhakam anitye yadi nāma dṛṣṭantathā api na nitya abhāvam sādhayati nitya tā abhāve tu dṛṣṭantada bhāva sādhane niyamena rāśi antara saṃkrāntiḥ dṛṣṭantu na niyamena anyatra na bhavati tat anyatra yadi ca darśana dvāreṇa gamakaḥ tadā dṛṣṭam eva agnim gamayet sakalat na tad apara vyakti gatiḥ tatas tad anya vyakti prāptau= apramāṇa tā bhavet atha sā upi kroḍīkṛtaḥ eva na dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa kroḍīkaraṇa asaṃbhavāt 
PVA_3.1.7,70–3.1.7,74	 nanu vyāvṛttiḥ api tad anvayat vāreṇa eva niścitā tad kathanna anvaya prādhānyam na darśanasya vyāvṛtti niścaye nadhikārāt darśanam hi dṛśyamāna tām eva niścāyayati na tad aparam na anya darśanam anya niścaya hetuḥ saṃskārāt anyatra api niścayaḥ iti ced tat asat saṃskārāḥ khalu yat vastuḥ upaprakhyā prabhāvitāḥ vyavasthā hetavaḥ tatra tatonyatra na niścayaḥ yadā tu saḥ eva pratibandhaḥ vyatireka pradhāna tayā gṛhyate tadā tad dvāreṇa hetuḥ anya apohasya gamakaḥ nanu darśana dvāreṇa pratibandha gatau katham vyatirekeṇa pratibandha gatiḥ na etat api samucitam vacaḥ anvayena api sambandhaḥ vyatireka pradhānataḥ atikramya na sāmbhāvyaḥ iti prāk eva varṇṇitam 
PVA_3.1.7,75	 anvayena hi sambandha grahaṇe tad vyaktyā eva bhavet na anyathā uktyai tathā hi na anyasya ukteḥ tadā anvaya gatiḥ atha tayā api paścāt tathā sati vyabhicārāt asambandhaḥ eva prāk tanyāḥ na syāt vyabhicārataḥ vyakti sāmānye sambandhaḥ iti ced kim idam vyakti sāmānyat nāma na khalu a vibhāvita svarūpam sambandhitayā anyathā vā pratyetum śakyam vyaktiṣu samāna pratipatti nibandhanam iti ced asti samānaḥ iti pratipattiḥ na tu tasya anibandhanam idam iti śakyat nidarśayitum yadi nāma pratyakṣataḥ na pratītim kārya darśanāt anumānāt pratīyatām pratīyatām kāraṇa sāmānyat na tu tad sāmānyantasya īdaṃtayā nirūpaṇāt eka kārya kāri tvam vā nibandha naṅ kim apareṇa tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.7,76–3.1.7,78	 na asmākam asmin karttavye bhedaḥ kaścana vidyate iti lokaḥ samastoyam eka vākya tayā sthitaḥ tasmāt ayam dhūmaḥ eṣāmpāvaka bhedānām ekena kenacid a vinā na bhavati iti etat abhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ dhūma iti anya apoha sambandhena eva sambandha grahaṇat na anyena iti vyāvṛttiḥ eva sādhyate hetunā śabdena vā tatas vyāvṛttiḥ eva prādhānyena gamyate sāmarthyāt tu vyakti sattānāntarīyaka tayā pratīyate anagneḥ abhāve niyatam kācid agni vyaktiḥ ākṣipyate anyathā nagni vyāvṛttiḥ eva na syāt
