PVA_3.1.7,79	 nanu anyaḥ tu aniścitaḥ iti pañca prakāraḥ anaikāntikaḥ uktaḥ na ca idam yuktam toṣavataḥ viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ ca aparasya api aneka antika tvāt nābhi prāya parijñānāt na hi ayam arthaḥ anyaḥ pañca prakāraḥ niścitaḥ api tu tatra yaḥ sat sajātīye dvedhā ca āsan= tad atyaye niścitaḥ sa hetuḥ viparīta tayā niścitaḥ sa viruddhaḥ sa ca sarvvaḥ tādātmya tad utpattibhyām pratibaddhaḥ eva anyaḥ tu na niścitaḥ eva saḥ eva sa pratibaddhaḥ anaikāntikaḥ iti vākya arthaḥ śeṣavat viruddha avyabhicāriṇoḥ api idam eva lakṣaṇam iti tayoḥ api anaikāntika tvam na nivāryam tasmāt sakalam anavadyam tathā hi viruddha avyabhicāriṇoni ena apahṛta viṣayasya sādhya apratibaddha viṣaya tvam kathantarhi avyabhicārī apratibaddhaḥ avyabhicārī ca iti vyāhatam evantarhi avyabhicārī saṃśaya hetuḥ iti api vyāhatam eva asmad pakṣe tu apratibandhāt eva saṃśaya hetuḥ avyabhicāri tvaṅ katham iti ced abhyupagamat vāreṇa iti na doṣaḥ tathā ca āha yadā tarhi śabda tvam nityam abhyupaiti tadā ayam hetuḥ eva syāt yatas 
PVA_3.1.7,80–3.1.7,82	 na kvacid śrāvaṇa tvasya nāśi tve dṛṣṭi sambhavaḥ nityaḥ eva hi dṛṣṭa tvāt gamaka tvasya sambhavaḥ gamakatva lakṣaṇa abhyupagamāt gamakaḥ darśana adarśana mātreṇa ca vaiśeṣikasya gamaka hetu tā sā ca atra asti iti gamakaḥ eva prāptaḥ ācāryaḥ prāha syāt gamakaḥ yadi atra kṛtaka tvam api kaścid anitya tve hetun na brūyāt ubhayantu gamakam upalabhamānasya sva abhyupagamāt eva saṃśayaḥ tasmāt vaiśeṣikasya evam abhyupagacchatoti saṅkaṭa praveśaḥ tathā hi 
PVA_3.1.7,83–3.1.7,84	 śabdasya anitya teṣṭā ced yojyā śabda tva nitya tā tad dvāreṇa hi nitya tve paropi gamakaḥ bhavet na khalu samāna nyāya yogī na tathā bhavati nyāyaḥ eva asau tathā na syāt tathā ca sakala vyavahāra ucchedaḥ eva samānaḥ ca kṛtaka tvena hetu tva nyāyaḥ śrāvaṇa tvasya api iti asau= api kṛtaka tva sādhya viparyaya avyabhicārī na gamakaḥ katham tasmāt para abhyupagamena viruddha avyabhicārī na anyathā iti ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ avagantavyaḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,86–3.1.7,87	 yadā tarhi śabda tvam nityam abhyupaiti iti vacanāt tasmāt apratibaddhaḥ eva saṃśaya hetuḥ iti vyāpti hetu ādi lakṣaṇam tatra pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti sāmarthyāt apakṣa dharmaḥ na hetuḥ viparītaḥ pakṣa dharma aviruddhaḥ iti apakṣa dharmaḥ na viruddhaḥ anyaḥ tu anaikāntikāḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ iti apakṣa dharmaḥ na anaikāntikaḥ tatas sva nāmnā eva vyapadeṣṭavyaḥ siddham iti dharmya siddhau= api asiddhaḥ eva anyatara ādya siddhau= api tathā ca ācāryaḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,88–3.1.7,91	 dvayoḥ siddhena dharmeṇa vyavahārāt viparyaye dvayoḥ ekasya ca asiddhau dharmmya siddhau ca na iṣyate yadi tarhi pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ katham anityaḥ śabdaḥ nityasya akṛtaka tvāt anityasya kṛtaka tvāt iti tathā asat akaraṇāt upādāna grahaṇāt sarvu asambhava abhāvāt śakyasya śakya karaṇāt kāraṇa bhāvāt ca satkāryam iti 
PVA_3.1.7,92–3.1.7,95	 atra ucyate hetoḥ sādhya anvayaḥ yatra abhāve abhāvaḥ ca kathyate pañcamyām tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ hetuḥ tu upanayāt mataḥ tat yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ anityasya kṛtaka tvāt tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti tathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ nityasya akṛtaka tvāt tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti pañcamī antena nanu dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām iti artha sata tvam tathā asat akaraṇa ādikam api draṣṭavyam ete ca yathā na hetavaḥ tathā pratipāditam api ca 
PVA_3.1.7,96–3.1.7,97	 asiddha pratibandhasya na hetoḥ sādhya sādhane sāmarthyam atra na asti etat atas eva na hetavaḥ asat akaraṇāt iti katham ayam hetuḥ asataḥ śaśa viṣāṇa ādeḥ na karaṇam dṛṣṭam iti na ca etāvatā vyatirekeṇa viparyaya sādhanam yadi kasyacid asataḥ kriyā na upalabhyate sarvu asya tathā na iti kutas iyam vyāptiḥ na hi viparyaye pratibandham antareṇa vyatireka vyāpti prasiddhiḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,98–3.1.7,101	 dhūma abhāve agni abhāvasya katham vyāptiḥ prasidhyati pāvakena yadi vyāptaḥ dhūmaḥ sidhyati mānataḥ na khalu sakalam jagat baṃbhramyamāṇena api tatra anyatra atra ca na asti iti vyāpī vyatirekaḥ pratyetum śakyaḥ kāla deśa vyāptikasya bhramaṇasya eva asambhavāt anvayena tu pratibandha grahaṇe tad sāmarthyāt eva vyāpi vyatireka prasiddhiḥ etat ca prāk eva pratipāditam 
PVA_3.1.7,102–3.1.7,104	 tasmāt ete na hetavaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ eva hetuḥ vviruddha unaikāntikaḥ ca anena ca para artha anumānam eva sat asattva prakhyāpana prakrameṇa prakaṭitam śeṣaḥ prapañcaḥ pramāṇa samuccayaḥ eva avagantavyaḥ pariśiṣṭa rūpanirūpaṇāya iti vyudāsitam manosya vārtika kṛtaḥ he vādinaḥ na khalu saṃtata pakṣa pāta dveṣam manaḥ sva para pakṣa kṛta andhakāram 
PVA_3.1.7,105–3.1.7,109	 tattva prabodhana vidhāyi manasvi vṛttam madhyastha bhāvaḥ iti tatra matiḥ vvidheyāḥ tīrthyāḥ śrī dharmakīrtteḥ mmatam idam amalam tādṛśām eva gamyam mādṛś vyākhyātum īśaḥ katham iti su ciram cintyatām atra hetuḥ asmin= tu abhyāsa mātrāt yadi bhavati paraḥ tatra tatvā artha siddhyai yuktosmin pakṣapātaḥ sva paramatiḥ iyam yukti ayuktyoḥ kṛtārthāḥ 
PVA_3.1.7,110–3.1.7,114	 saṃkṣepataḥ kṛtam idam para bodha siddhyai vaktum punar su bahu sādhu ca śakyam atra ratna ākarāt adhigatasya hi ratna rāśeḥ prauḍhaḥ pratigraha kṛtasti na tena bhāṣyam śarīra śomām rāgāya grāmyā vāñchaṃti alaṃkṛtim vārttikasya api alaṅkāraḥ mayā kāri na garvvataḥ iti unmukta para artha sādhana dhiyām evam matiḥ śreyase 
PVA_3.1.7,115–3.1.7,122	 tad tāthāgata dharma nīti nipuṇam cetaḥ vidheyam sadā kṣīrodāt a paropi kim jalanidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ vidhātā kvacid lakṣmī candramasoḥ samasta jagatām ānanda dātroḥ janaiḥ iti anindyam idam āracayya yat prāptam artha kuśalam maya amalam tena sarvu ajagat artha sādhanī siddharaḥ tu jagatosya sarvvadāḥ iti vārttika alaṅkāra pramāṇa mahā bhāṣye tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ ca ayam pramāṇa mahā bhāṣya vārttika alaṃkāraḥ kṛtiḥ iyam kutīrthyatama stoma vighana paṭoḥ ācārya prajñā kara gupta sahasra aṅśumālinaḥ
